K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:6b-30: da lha btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:6b-31: ci'i slad du 'di lta bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:6b-32: mdor na 'gum lags su bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-1: kyis lha la gsol ba btab pa yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-2: don gyis na nga'i ched kho na yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-6: de langs te des khyi gu gnyis shig ra ba'i drung du btags te bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-7: de ji tsam mi tsam gyi sha za nus pa de tsam du sha gong nas gong du bskyed de byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-8: gang gi tshe khyi gu de gnyis sha de tsam za nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-9: rgyal po shar pa ni chung ma de la chags pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du ma zos pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-14: nor lhas byin gyis me tog phreng rgyud mkhan rnams la yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-15: rgyus pa dag gis me tog dri zhim po dag brgyus la myur du khyer la shog cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-16: sbyor ba 'chang la yang deng du lha'i dka' thub rdzogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-17: khyod kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-22: grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zan sbyor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-24: blon po gzhan dag ni mi tshor bar bya ba'i phyir gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu las su bskos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7a-25: sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal po la snying nye zhing rjes su chags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-0: gyo mo ni med par @7b byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-1: tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-2: bdug pa dri zhim po'i pog phor ni bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-8: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni bkram ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-9: lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-10: gnas dang gnas rnams su rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs ni bsgrags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-13: 'jo tshar can gyi bro mkhan rnams kyis ni bro gar bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-14: ca co chen po byung ba de'i tshe nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar pa'i bu ra ba'i khar rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me tog gis dkris nas bsnyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-15: de nas ra ba'i kha nas phul nas ltung ma thag tu gson por khyi dag gis rus gong 'ba' zhig lus par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-19: mi ro la za ba'i srog chags gzhan dag kyang 'thab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-20: ko'u shimbhi'i lha ra ba'i kha nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-22: zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-23: de ni kha cig ni ngu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-25: kha cig ni tha mal par 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-26: kha cig ni 'phrog rlom byed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-27: ku co chen po byung ba de'i tshe ko'u shambhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag so sor bros nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-28: kha cig ni mnyan yod du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-29: kha cig ni gnas gzhan dang gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:7b-32: ko'u shambhi na gnas pa'i mi'i gtso bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-1: khyim bdag rnams kyis ku co zhi bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-2: de nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal po ra ba'i khar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-3: ji ltar ra ba'i drung na khyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tu brtag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-4: des de ltar brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-5: nor lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis bsad pa brtsad chod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-6: de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-7: dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-8: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-10: btsun pa rgyal po shar pa'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-11: khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las 'das lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-14: rgyal po shar pa'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-16: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-17: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-19: rgyal po shar pa'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan sus so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-21: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8a-24: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-0: 'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa dag ni zin pa'i phung @8b po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-2: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-3: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-4: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-5: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-6: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-8: sngon 'byung ba ri bor zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-9: bram ze mdun na 'don zhig 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-10: sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-11: rang sangs rgyas phongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-12: dman pa la thugs brtse bas bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-13: sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-14: rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing ri bor der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-15: phyogs shig tu nub mo gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-16: de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-17: lhung bzed thogs nas ri bor gyi grong khyer der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-18: mdun na 'don de yang khyi khrid nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-19: des rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la khyi sbad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-22: mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po shar pa'i bu 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-23: 'dis ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rang sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa la khyi sbad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyis zos nas dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:8b-24: da ltar gyi bar du yang khyis zos te dus las 'das par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-0: de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa @9a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-2: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-3: 'dren ma rnams kyis yan 'dren ma ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-5: de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-6: 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-8: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-10: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-11: rgyal po shar ba'i bu dus las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-12: rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'gran zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-13: de dus gzhan zhig na khang bzang gi steng du byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-14: blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-15: gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod do; ;shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-17: gnas gang na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-18: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-19: lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-20: rgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi la mkhas pa zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-21: de mthong ma thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i steng na 'ga' yang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-22: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-23: thos ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9a-24: gsos pa ci byas kyang mi phan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-0: de lta bu'i bud med la @9b dga' mgur spyad dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-2: de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-4: lha rgyal po padma'i snying po can ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-6: mi mdza' bar gyur pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-7: de ni rtag tu rdo 'jog na mchis lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-8: ji ste rdo 'jog tu gshegs na gdon mi 'tshal bar des lha brlag par bgyid lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-10: mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag lta yod mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-14: ji ste lha de lta bur dgyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-15: lha nyid mkhyen mod kyi; 'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-16: rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-17: des de'i tshig ma mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-18: glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te rdo 'jog tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-20: gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-21: des der glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu ri bzhag nas rdo 'jog tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-22: de nas mu tig gi do shal srang brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-23: bzang mo gzugs kyis 'tsho ba'i gan du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-24: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-26: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-27: 'phags rgyal na gnas ba'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-31: gar bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-32: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:9b-33: de ci mi phal ba yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-0: @10a *// des na mi mngon mngon par 'gyur du zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-1: de gar yang ni ma bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-3: de ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-4: ci'i phyir phyi rol tu 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-5: btsun mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-6: rtsed mo so sor nyams su myong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-8: 'di la the tshom byar ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-11: kha cig gis legs kyi de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-14: gsos pa'i drung du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-16: lha mi snang na ga shed du ma bzhud grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-18: shes ldan dag ci rings mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-21: ji srid cig na mthong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-23: lo bcu gnyis lon nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-24: de dag khros nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-26: gang gi phyir de skad smra ba las na gdon mi za bar khyod kyis lha bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal srid byed par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-27: de'i phyir re zhig gal te zhag bdun na lha blta yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-29: ji ste med na ni nged kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-31: de cang mi zer bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-32: sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-33: ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-34: des de bos te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10a-35: gsos pa khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-2: lha mo bram ze dag 'di skad ces mchi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-3: ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-6: gal te de lta na song la nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa gser snod kyi nang du blugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-7: rta mang po lag pa brgyus pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du zhog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-8: 'di skad ces gang zhig deng nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba des nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-10: de ltar byas te rta bzang po gang gis zos pa nged la sbron cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-11: gsos pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-12: 'ga' yang za bar spro ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-13: phyogs gzhan zhig zhig na rta rid rke ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-17: rnam chag pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-18: gang zhig deng nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-19: nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-21: des de dag zos so; ;gsos pas song nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-23: gsos pa song la rtod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-24: gal te rtod pa'i tshe mi srun byed na khyod kyis ma 'jigs par spungs skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-25: sems stobs dang ldan pa la ni sus kyang mi rdzi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:10b-26: de song nas de rtod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-0: de rtod pa'i tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs @11a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-2: kva'e mi khyod kyis sngon chad 'di lta bu'i rta mthong ba 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-4: de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-5: kva'e rta'i srin po khyod kyis sngon chad rta zhon ba su la yang lcag 'di lta bu mthong ba yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-10: des kye rta'i srin po gal te re zhig mi srun mi byed na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-11: ji ste byed na mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-14: ji ste de lta na gal te bdag phyir 'dir khrid de mi 'ong bar dam 'cha' na 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-19: des de la zhon te song nas rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-20: rgyal po rab snang gis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-24: dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-25: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-27: gsos pa re zhig zhag bdun gyi bar du rtsis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-29: dus shes par bya'o zhes byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-30: gtun shing rir phyin nas bdag nyid kyis glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bstad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11a-31: des bstad pa na skad phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-0: de dang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan long ba zhig @11b gnas pa des thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-2: glang po che'i gtso bo 'di'i skad dang sbyar na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-3: 'di ni 'di nas dpag tshad brgyar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-4: lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-5: de nas rgyal po rab snang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:11b-6: gsos pa glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-18: de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-19: shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-21: de dag ni de'i ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-22: rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bar snang las sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-23: khyod kyi khyim gyi gdung ma de la srin bu zhig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-24: de'i snying po ma yin pa thams cad zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-25: snying po nye tshe lus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-26: de de ltar mngon par mi dga' nas tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-27: thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-28: 'di la snying po tsam zhig lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-29: rgyal po srin de snying po la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-30: dga' ba med pas re ba bor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-32: nam mkha'i sgra dang po ni de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20a-33: de bas na khyod kyis phyung la gdung gzhan zhig chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-0: rgyal po chen po @20b gzhan yang khyod kyi rta rdzi gnyer len zhes bya ba des bya rog mo'i sgo nga byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-1: byung ba rnams bcom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-2: de bu dang bral bas yid ma bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-3: snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing dal bus tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-4: su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-5: mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-6: des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-7: bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-9: nam mkha'i sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-10: khyod kyis de 'joms su ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-11: gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slebs tsam du chus kha da can du gang ba nya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-13: sbal pa mang po gnas pa de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-14: chu skyar gcig cig nya dag za zhing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-15: de bskams te chu med par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-16: chu skyar des de lta bu de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-17: mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-18: rdzing 'di nya dang ru sbal ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-19: mang po dag gis gang ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-20: da ni sbal pas 'tsho mod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-21: bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-23: nam mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-24: khyod kyis de chus khong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-25: gzhan yang khyod kyi yul na ri bo gtum ldan zhes bya ba de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-27: glang po che mo dmus long zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-28: de gnyis la bu gcig cig yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-29: de dag gi rim gro byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-30: de de gnyis kyi zas kyi phyir song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-31: glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:20b-32: de khyod kyis thabs kyis grongs te khrid de 'ongs nas btags te bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-1: ma dang pha'i rjes su mya ngan byed cing rtsva yang mi za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-2: chu yang mi 'thung bar de dag rjes su dran zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-3: gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-4: bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-5: long ba nyon mongs de dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-6: da ni mgon yang med par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-8: nam mkha'i sgra bzhi pa ni de yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-9: pha ma'i grogs byed pa shin mi rung bas khyod kyis de thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-10: gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ri dvags shig bzung ste 'dug pa de khyu dang phral bas dgon pa'i ri dvags rnams dran nas tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-11: de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-12: chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-13: bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-14: bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-16: bar snang gi sgra lnga pa ni de yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-18: gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ngang pa dag cig bzung ste 'dug pa de dag gis ngang pa gnam la 'phur ba dag mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-19: 'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni; ;phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-20: bdag ni rnyi yis bzung gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-21: sngon ko sdig pa ci zhig byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-23: nam mkha'i sgra drug pa ni de yin pas de dag kyang khyod kyis btang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-24: de ni de dag gi ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21a-25: rgyal po chen po khyod kyi rmi lam brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ci'i snga ltas yin zhen /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-0: re zhig tsandan dkar pos lus byugs par mthong ba gang @21b yin pa ni khyod la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gos be'u ras yug po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-1: de zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-2: khyod kyi rmi lam dang po ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-3: khyod kyi lus la tsandan dmar pos gtor bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-4: khyod las 'dzin gyi rgyal pos la ba rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-5: de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-6: rmi lam gnyis pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-7: khyod kyis klad pa la me 'bar ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-8: khyod la yul ya ba ni'i rgyal pos gser gyi phreng ba zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-9: de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-10: rmi lam gsum pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-11: khyod kyi mchan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-12: khyod la rgya'i rgyal pos ral gri zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-13: skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-14: de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-15: khyod kyi rmi lam bzhi pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-16: khyod kyi rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis lngag [* ldag ?]pa mthong ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-17: khyod la singga la'i rgyal pos nor bu'i lham zung zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste; de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-18: khyod kyi rmi lam lnga pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:21b-19: khyod kyis ngang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-1: rgyal pos rta gnyis shig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-2: de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-3: khyod kyi rmi lam drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-4: khyod kyis ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'ongs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-5: khyod la ka lingka'i rgyal pos glang po che'i gtso bo zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste; de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-6: khyod kyi rmi lam bdun pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-7: khyod kyis chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-8: khyod dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba shes par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-9: khyod kyis bram ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-11: rgyal po rab snang srog stor ba las phyir rnyed pa bzhin du dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-17: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos bshad pa la rjes su yi rang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-18: rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-19: stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-20: de rang gi khyim du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-21: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bsgrubs te; gdung ma yang gzhan zhig bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-22: rta rdzi gnyer len yang de ltar byed du ma bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22a-26: ngang pa rnams kyang btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-0: zhag @22b bdun na de'i skyes ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-1: de nor rnyed pas yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-2: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la je sems mngon par dad par gyur te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-3: bdag gi khyim na dpal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad ni 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po la brten nas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-4: de'i phyir re zhig gos be'u ras yug po che 'di bskur la phyis rgyal srid bstab par bya'o snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-5: kye skyes bu khyod tshur gos be'u ras yug po che 'di khyer la 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-7: des gos be'u ras yug po che de khyer nas 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-8: de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-9: skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-10: gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-13: shes ldan dag nga la yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-15: khyed gang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-16: de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas ni gser gyi 'phreng ba khyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-17: skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas ni la ba rin po che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-18: gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis ni rta gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-19: gsos pas ni ral gri zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-20: mdun na 'don gyis ni nor bu'i lham zung zhig khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:22b-21: glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-0: de nas rgyal po rab snang yan lag gi @23a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-1: mchog lnga la rin po che dag gis bgo bsha' byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-2: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-3: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-5: rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-6: 'phags pa sman 'dogs shing gces spras mdzad pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-7: de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa la rgyal srid stobs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-8: thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste rgyal srid bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-9: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-10: rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-12: 'phags pa gal te de lta na 'dod pa thams cad stobs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-13: 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spyad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-15: rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dod pa thams cad kyang bkag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-17: 'phags pa gal te de lta na longs spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-18: longs spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs na yongs su spyad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23a-20: rgyal po chen po re zhig bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-0: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das ni mnyan yod na rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs @23b so; ;skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-3: rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-5: dge slong ka tya'i bu chen po longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-6: 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma rnams la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-7: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-8: gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-10: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-11: byol song gi skye gnas su song ba rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-12: don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-13: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i thugs dang sems su 'phrod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-15: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba mngon par bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-16: phan tshun blta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:23b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-0: btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du longs spyod dang longs spyod @24a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-1: kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-3: ka tya'i bu chen po skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-4: sbyin pa po rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-5: de lta bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-6: gang zag la ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-7: de la longs spyod ni 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-10: longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba lang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-15: rgyal po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-16: rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-17: sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dge 'dun la longs spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-18: longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-19: de nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po las brten nas yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-20: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-22: longs spyod kyi mchog rnams kyang phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-0: nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar 'dod pa thams cad stobs pa rnams @24b kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-1: 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po rab snang 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-4: nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar bshos 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-5: rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-8: nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gnas mal 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-9: mnyan yod kyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-12: nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gtsug lag khang byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-13: yul w'a ra n'a si'i khyim bdag bzang ldan 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-15: 'dod pa kun gyi rab snang ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-16: dge 'dun bshos kyi bzo sbyangs yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-17: gnas mal mgon med zas sbyin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-18: gtsug lag khang ni bzang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-19: rgyal po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du res kyis zan za ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-20: nyi ma gcig ni ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i drung du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-21: gcig ni skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma'i drung du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-22: de'i dus gzhan zhig na dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-23: ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i thad du zan za ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-24: rgyal po de zho la dga' bas ba lang skyong gi ma zho'i phor ba thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-25: de zan za ba'i mdun na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-26: ji tsam na phyogs der skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:24b-27: des la ba rin po che bgos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-0: des glog byung ba lta bur rgyal po de ba lang skyong gi ma zhib dang bcas @25a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-2: zhi bas snang ba de mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-4: glog cig glo bur du byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-7: zhi ba 'di ni glog gi 'od kyang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-8: mar me yang ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-9: 'on kyang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma phyogs 'di nas song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-10: des la ba rin po che bgos pas 'di ni de'i 'od yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-11: khyod kyis la ba rin po che de lta bu btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-12: gser gyi phreng ba blangs pa ni khyod blun no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-13: ji bdag gi khyim na gser gyi phreng ba med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-14: nyis na rigs ngan pa las skyes pa de the gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-16: lha de la de lta bu'i shes rab ga la mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-17: gdon ma 'tshal bar khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che long zhig ces bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-18: des na des blangs lags mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-20: ngas de la ma smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-21: des rang gi blos blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-24: zhes de gnyis 'thab par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-25: zhi bas de'i mgor zho'i phor bas bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-26: rgyal po de spyi cer zhig pas de'i klad pa zhom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-27: des lag pas mnams te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-29: bdag gi klad rgyas kyang lug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-31: ji srid srog dang ma bral gyi bar du je 'di gsad do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-32: des gsos pa la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25a-34: ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-0: sod cig @25b gsos pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-1: de 'di la shin tu phangs na 'di khro ba'i kun nas dkris pas 'di skad du zer bar zad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-3: kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas bsams pa shes par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-5: re zhig gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-9: des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-10: rgyal po kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-12: ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-15: ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-18: bdag gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-21: da ni nga dang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-22: gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-24: khyod nyid cod pan chings te rgyal srid byed la rag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-25: ngas ko de la nga la ma gus pa byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-26: ngas de nan tur byas la phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsams bsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-27: khyod kyis mod kho na la bsad pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-29: lha 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig smras pa'i don dpes kyang kun 'tshal bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-30: re zhig dpe gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-32: khra bo dang ni sgren mo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-33: rnyed par dka' dang bslu ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-34: mi ngoms pa dang gnyis gtogs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:25b-35: bsdum pa'i sdom du yang dag bsdus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-2: long bdag ste tha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-3: rgyal po chen po sngon 'byung ba ri'i phyogs mi 'du ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-5: shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa; sengge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-11: bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis bsten pa gcig cig tu srog chags thi bas shing chen po zhig gi khar tshang bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-12: des de 'bras bu smin pa rnams kyis bkang nas chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-13: bzang mo khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-14: da lta ni gang yang rung bas bdag nyid 'tsho bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-15: nam rlung dang yul ngan byung ba de'i tshe 'di dag bza' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-18: ji tsam na rlung dang nyi mas phog pas 'bras bu rnams bskams te; tshang de 'gribs par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-20: bzang mo ngas khyod la khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-21: rlung ngam yul ngan byung ba'i tshe bza' bar bya'o zhes ma bkag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-22: 'o na ci'i phyir khyod kyis zos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-26: ngas tshang 'di bkang ste bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-27: gal te khyod kyis ma zos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-28: 'o na tshang 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26a-31: bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu gcig kyang ma zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-1: yang lan 'debs pa na 'thab mo byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-2: des thi ba mo de mchus bsnun nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-4: de de nyid na 'phyan zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-5: re zhig cig na dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-6: yang tshang de de kho na bzhin du 'bras bu de dag gis gang nas nges bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-7: tshang 'di 'bras bu dag gis yang gang ba las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-8: des 'di dag ma zos so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-9: des de la bzod pa gsol par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-10: khra mo sdug pa longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-11: 'di dag khyod kyis ma zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-12: bdag gi tshang 'di gang gis nyes pa zhig bzod par mdzod cig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-13: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-14: nags tshal rgyu ba'i thi ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-15: 'dab ma khra bo mig dmar ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-16: rang gi sdug ma bsad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-17: blo ngan ci zhig mya ngan byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-18: ji ltar thi ba bab col spyod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-19: 'di na sdug pa nyes med bsad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-20: blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-21: des la bzhams te nyes gcig bzod gsol pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-22: de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-23: zhi ba yid dang 'thad pa 'dir bsad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-24: blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-25: des la bzhams te nyes gcig bzod pa gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-27: lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra bsnyam bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-28: lha gzhan yang khyim bdag cig dbyar 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:26b-29: ston gyi dus su sran ma'i khur 'tshal nas zhing thog tu chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-0: des sran ma'i khur de shing drung zhig tu @27a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-2: pha zad du bshang ba'i sar mchis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-3: ji tsam na spre'u zhig shing de las babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-4: sran ma las sbar gang blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-6: de 'dzegs pa na sran ma 'brum bu gcig shor te sa la lhung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-7: des sran ma sbar gang po da bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-8: sran ma 'brum bu gcig po de btsal bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-9: khyim bdag des de la bong ba cig bsnun te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-11: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-12: sran ma sbar gang bor nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-13: gang zhig 'brum bu gcig tshod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-14: shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-15: spre'u 'di kye ma re mi mdzangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-17: lhas gsungs pa'i don gang zhig ba lang skyong gi ma bkum nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-18: yang bzod pa gsol bar bzhed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-19: bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-21: gsos pa khyod kyis tshig gcig kho na'i kha la ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-23: lha ston pa gang zag zla med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-24: gcig bu tshig ni gcig gsung ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-25: gsung ba de ni nges lags pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-27: zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-29: gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga long bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27a-32: long ba gnyis ni nges grub pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-0: rang bzhin gyis ni dmus @27b long dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-1: gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-3: gzhan yang long pa gnyis lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-4: gang la sdig lta de yod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-5: gang zhig khrims la mi brtan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-6: zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-8: sgren mo cir yang mi rung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-9: ma spyad gtun dang lan gcig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-10: nad dang bag tsha brnyas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-11: de bzhin du ni bags bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-12: byis pa dang ni bshes dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-13: skyes bu tha shal nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-14: shing rta yi ni 'khor lo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-15: g-yo rtogs par ni yongs su rdzogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-18: khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga sgren mor byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-20: lha sgren mo gsum mi mdzes pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-24: klung ni chu med sgren mo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-26: gal te ming po bcu yod kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-27: khyo med bud med sgren mo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-30: gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga cir yang mi rung bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-32: lha 'jig rten na cir yang mi rung ba gsum mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-36: rta po thal kar bang bul dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-37: ston mo bya na med pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-38: bud med gang zhig khyim sun 'byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:27b-39: 'di gsum cir yang mi rung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-2: gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba longs ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-5: sol ba byed pa'i gos dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-6: bkru bshal byed pa'i lham dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-7: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-8: longs ma spyad pa dengs par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-9: zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-10: lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas gzhan yang gsum ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-11: nags kyi shing gi me tog dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-12: dka' thub can gyi lang tsho dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-13: shing rta mkhan gyi chung ma dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-14: longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-16: gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-17: khyod ni gtun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-20: shing mkhan rtsang rtsing 'jog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-21: bza' mkhan skud pa ring po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-22: kha lo sgyur ba mig rgyang thung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-23: de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-24: zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-25: lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-26: gzhan yang gsum ste; pho nya'i pho nya gang yin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-27: mngag gzhug pa yi mngag gzhug dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-28: bud med 'phyon ma byed pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-29: de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-31: de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-33: gnag rdzi grong na rgyu ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-34: 'dreg mkhan nags na rgyu ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-35: mag pa rtag tu 'ong byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28a-36: de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-1: gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba lan gcig gis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-4: rgyal po smra ba lan gcig ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-5: bu mo sbyin pa lan gcig go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-6: 'phags pa'i gzigs pa lan gcig ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-7: de gsum lan re lan re'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-8: zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-10: gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-11: khyod ni rang gis nad bslangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-14: sngar ma sna tshogs go gyon dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:28b-15: rtsa mjing chung ngu nor mang dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-10: tshe stong phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-11: tshe brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-16: 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-17: 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-19: 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma yang rjes su dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-20: gang du bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-23: kha zas ni 'di lta bu za za /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-27: yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-28: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di srid cig yin par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-29: sems can ni de dag byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-30: bdag gnas de nas shi 'phos nas ni che ge mo zhig tu skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-31: de nas kyang shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-32: zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rnam pa dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-33: yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dgongs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-36: tshe gcig kyang dgongs pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-37: 'dir skyes zhes bya ba'i bar sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rnam pa dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38a-38: yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dgongs pa gang lags pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-0: lha de'i stobs brgyad @38b pa lags te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-11: bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-12: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-13: ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-14: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-16: log par lta ba'i las dang /
