K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-19: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-20: ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-21: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-22: yang dag pa'i lta ba can te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-23: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i las dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:38b-24: chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-0: rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhi gnas bde 'gro mtho ris su lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @39a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-2: des lha'i spyan zhes bya ba nas bde 'gro mtho ris su lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-4: lha de'i stobs dgu pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-5: stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-6: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-8: gzhan yang de zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kho na la zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-9: shes rab rnam par grol ba rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-10: bdag gi zag pa zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-11: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-13: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-15: de zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kho na la zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-16: shes rab rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-17: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-18: lha 'di ni de'i stobs bcu pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-20: de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-21: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39a-22: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-0: rgyal po rab snang spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug @39b go ;gsos pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-1: lha ni spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-2: 'di dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ji srid mtho btsam snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-3: des de ngom zum gnag bzhin khrid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-4: rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-5: rgyal po la bzod par gsol bar zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-7: mi yi dbang pos 'dir rtag chos kyi tshul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-8: bgrod cing rjes su bgrod pa yang dag gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-9: bzod pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos gtso lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-10: ba lang skyong gi ma yi nongs bzod mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-11: 'jig rten lta bya legs gsungs rin po che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-12: ji ste gzigs par ma gyur gsan ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-13: khyod kyis glang po che yang 'dul bar spyod lags na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-14: cung zad nongs bgyid bud med smos ci 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-15: khyod las mi 'phyo gzugs dang yon tan ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-16: sngon dang phyis kyang de bzhin btsun mo lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-17: rje slad kho nar lhan cig ba lang ma'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-18: thams cad bzod pa mdzod ces de skad mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-19: rgyal pos kyang gsos pa la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-20: rab smras legs par smra 'di khyod kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-21: nga la snying nye bskyed de smras pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-22: de ltas khyod la kan n+ya kub dza byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-23: nga yis zhi ba la yang snying nas bzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-26: drag shul can gyi gser snod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-27: 'od bzang ma dang dgon pa pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:39b-29: 'khor ni mang po sun byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs ba can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram @40a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-1: na; khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-2: de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po dpong sa na 'dus shing 'khod pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-3: bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-4: shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u tam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-5: de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod chen che ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-6: mu stegs can dag ni de lta ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-8: de'i tshe khyim bdag drag shul can 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-9: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-10: yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-11: khyim bdag mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so; ;shes ldan dag re zhig sdod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-15: 'dod chen chung ba dag khyod kyi mngon sum du bya'o zhes byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-19: shel gyi snod dag bsdogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-21: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-22: yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-25: yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40a-26: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-0: @40b yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-1: rnam grangs du mar chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-2: yang dag par len du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-4: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-5: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-6: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-9: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi sdum par sang gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la cang mi gsung pas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-12: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-14: des mu stegs can rnams la yang shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-15: sang bdag gi khyim du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-16: khyed kyang de nyid du zan la shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-18: yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:40b-21: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-1: sang bdag gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-2: khyed kyang de'i tshe grogs byed du shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-4: de nas rang gi khyim du song ste zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-5: shes ldan dag zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa mang po dag sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-6: de dag gis zhal zas bsod pa mang po dag sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-7: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-10: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-12: da de'i dus la bab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-14: zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-16: sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-17: lhung bzed bsnams te; khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-19: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can yul yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-20: khyim bdag rnams dang lhan cig tu gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-23: shel gyi snod rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'brim par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41a-25: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la khyim bdag drag shul can ni bgam pa'i bsam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-3: dge slong khyed cag su yang ma len cig par bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can bgam pa'i bsam pas gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-12: dge slong khyed cag su yang ma len cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du mi blang bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-17: de dag gis ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-18: de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-20: 'khar ba las byas pa'i snod rnams brims te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-22: rang gi lag bdar te bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-23: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas yang dag par tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-24: yang dag par stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-25: rnam grangs du mas rang gi lag bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-26: bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas yang dag par tshim par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-30: lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:41b-31: stan ches dma' ba zhig bting nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-1: mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-3: yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-4: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-5: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-6: rnam grangs du mar chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-7: yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-8: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-9: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-10: yon bsngo ba brjod nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-11: de nas mu stegs can ma dul ba'i cha byad can dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-12: bab bab tu ca co zer zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-13: khyim bdag drag shul can gyis sgo ba'i mi la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-14: kye nang rje gal te mu stegs can 'ga' zhig gser las byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-16: bee d'urya las byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-17: shel las byas pa'i snod rnams khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-19: ji ste nged la khyim bdag gis byin no zhes zer dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-20: kye khyed la khyim bdag gi zan gyi phyir yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-21: gtan ni ma byin no zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-22: de ste yang mi ster na rgyob la phrogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-24: khyim bdag de ltar 'tshal lo zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42a-25: mi des khyim bdag drag shul can gyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-0: de nas khyim @42b bdag drag shul can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-1: mu stegs can rnams la gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-3: bee d'urya las byas pa'i snod rnams brim par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-7: khyim bdag bdag la ni gser las byas pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-9: la la ni bdag la dngul las byas pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-11: de ltar de dag ku co 'don pa de'i tshe 'thab mo byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-12: phan tshun du khu tshur dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-16: rdog pas rdeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-17: de dag khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bsdigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-19: dbye ba'i sbyor bas nan gyis zan zar bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-20: gang gis snod gang du zan zos pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-21: de nyid khyer te 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-22: sgo bas gzung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-24: kye nang rje khyim bdag gis nged la byin na ci'i phyir bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-26: khyim bdag gis khyed cag zan gyi phyir byin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-27: gtan ni ma byin no; ;zhog la deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-28: de dag gis ma bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-29: sgo bas de dag brdegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-30: ku co rab tu che bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-31: yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-34: bu mo zhes bya ba skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad 'dus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:42b-35: khyim bdag drag shul can gyis mi sdug pa de dag mthong nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-2: shes ldan dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-3: de dag gi khyad par mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-4: de dag gis smras pa; khyim bdag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-6: shes ldan dag de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed chen chung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-7: de'i nyan thos dag kyang 'dod chen chung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-8: mu stegs can nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba can 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par ma dad pa mang po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-10: mngon par dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-11: bar ma rnams las kyang kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-12: bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas zhabs bkrus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-14: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-15: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-16: dge slong dag de lta bas na tshod rig pa la phan yon de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-17: gzhan dag kyang yod pas de'i phyir dge slong gi gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-20: shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-21: za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-0: shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' @43b stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-1: dge slong skyon dang bral ba gzhan dag ci yod pa de dag gi dbang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-2: so so skye bo dag lha'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-3: klu'i gnas su song ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-4: der de dag zan la bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-6: rang gi bsod nams las grub pa'i gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-10: gzhan med pas de dag der 'gyod de zan ma zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-11: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-14: de lta bas na gang du snod gzhan rnyed pa med pa der ni gser dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-17: shel la sogs pa'i snod du za bar gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-20: mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-23: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-24: rnam thos kyi bu'i ner dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-25: rnam thos kyi bu dang nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-26: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-27: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-29: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-32: dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:43b-33: dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de la sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-0: gang gis nyin mo de sems can zhugs par @44a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-1: gyur ba de nyid kyi nyin mo nas mdangs bzang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-2: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-5: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-6: de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur na mnyan yod kun du khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-9: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-10: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to zhes sgra de grags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-11: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-12: khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'dus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-13: re zhig nas bram ze ltas mkhan zhig yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de yang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-14: mtshar gyi phyir de nyid du 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-15: des de la phan tshun du bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-16: skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-18: khyed kyis bu mo 'di mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-22: bu mo 'di ni ci nas kyang skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-25: 'di'i gzugs 'di ltar mdzes pa dang sbyar na; 'di ni gdon mi za bar skyes pa lnga brgya dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44a-26: mnyan yod thams cad du yang khyim bdag gcig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-0: blta na sdug @44b pa; yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-1: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim de nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-2: de la mtshan mkhan gyis bu mo 'di ni skyes pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-4: gang gis sgra thos pa de yang der 'ongs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-5: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de btsas pa'i brtsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-7: bu mo 'di ni ming ji skad du gdags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-8: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-9: bu mo 'di btsas pa'i tshe khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-10: de'i phyir bu mo'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-11: zhes de'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-13: ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-14: nu zho ldud pa ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-15: dri ma phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-16: rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-17: de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-22: gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo dag gis bskyed bsrings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-23: rdzing gi padma bzhin du skyed drag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-24: de dag gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-25: gzugs dang lang tsho mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-27: sgyu rtsal gyi yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-28: nags tshal me tog rgyas pa'i nang na nags tshal gyi lha bzhin du khyim de na mdzes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:44b-29: de'i gzugs dang lang tsho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-0: @45a *// gnas pa'i khyad par gyis 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i drang srong dag kyang sems 'phrog par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-1: thog ma med pa'i dus nas nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod pa bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-5: dbang phyug gi dregs pas rgyags pa'i mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-6: khyim bdag de yang nang mi'i skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-7: de srung lhur len cing gnyid kyang mi log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-8: yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-11: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-12: gzhan yang 'dab chags na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-14: mdun na 'don gyi bu la sogs pas bslang bar brtsams kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-15: bu mo 'od bzang ma skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mtshan mkhan gyis lung bstan pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-16: 'jig rten gyis dpyas su dogs pa'i phyir sus kyang ma bslangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-17: de yang de'i khyim gyi skar khung dra ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-20: khang thog tu 'dug nas su slong snyam zhing skyes pa dag la lta bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-21: khyim bdag des de'i spyod pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-22: rang gi rigs rgyud dang mthun pa gzhan dag la mi slong yang de bzhin du sbyin par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-23: 'ga' yang len du ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-24: de nas khyim bdag de de su yang ma 'dod pas yid mi bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45a-25: bya ba thams cad kyi blo gtang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-0: de sbyin pa'i thabs sems @45b pas; lus skya bo bseng bseng po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-2: rke ba shig shig tu gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-3: de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-5: longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-6: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-7: de rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-8: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-9: gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar blangs kyang de yang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-10: de dag gis kyang tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-11: des kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-12: de'i ming chung ma gsod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-13: chung ma gsod pa zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-14: des gzhan du blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-16: nged kyi bu mo ci se gsad ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-17: des yugs mo dag kyang bslang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-18: de dag kyang nged kyi lus ci'i phyir dor zhes zer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-19: de la thams cad kyis kyang ma ster ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-20: chung ma med kyang bla zhes chung ma 'dod pa'i re thag bcad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-24: kun tu rgyu rnams dang lhan cig tu bsten par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-25: de'i pha sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen zhig pas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-26: bdag gi pha sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-30: kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis ci zhig bya; bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-31: de dag la bya ba byas nas de nyid du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:45b-32: de yang dang yang du rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-1: dus gzhan zhig na mdza' bo zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-3: grogs po khyod rgyal byed kyi tshal du yang dang yang du 'gro na rab tu 'byung bar mi rtsol grang grogs po bdag rab tu byung zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-5: bdag gis chung ma gcig blangs kyang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-6: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-7: gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar yang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-8: de dag gis kyang tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-9: kho bos kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas kho bo'i ming chung ma gsod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-10: chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba chags nas bdag yi chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-11: dge slong dag la nges par bsnyen bkur bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-12: bdag gi pha'i lugs yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-13: 'di mi bya na gzhan su la bsnyen bkur bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-14: des smras pa; grogs po de yang bden na 'on kyang gdon mi za bar bu bskyed dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-15: gzhan du na rabs chad par 'gyur na ci ste gzhan gyi bu mo slong bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-18: gang la bslangs pa de nged kyi bu mo ci ste gsad ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-20: grogs po gal te de lta na yug sa mo dag bslang na ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-22: grogs po bdag gis bslang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-23: de dag kyang nga'i lus ci'i phyir yongs su dor zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-25: grogs po gal te de lta na 'od bzang ma ci'i phyir mi bslang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46a-27: grogs po 'jig rten kun tu grags pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-0: ji smad @46b 'tshong ma'i khyim du bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-2: grogs po khyod dad pa can yin pas khyod kyi khyim du dge slong las su zhig 'ong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-5: grogs po gal te de yang mi ster mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-7: de'i pha yang skyo zhing 'dug pas ster bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-8: de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-16: des de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-18: lde mig kyog po dag byin nas khyim gyi bdag mor bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-20: bzang mo kho bo cag gi rigs kyi lugs kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-22: dge slong dag sbyin gnas yin pas khyod kyis kyang de dag la bya ba byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-26: khyim bdag de'i khyim du dge slong dag nyin gcig bzhin du zan za ba la 'od bzang ma rang gi lag dar te 'brim mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-27: de na dge slong gang dag kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-29: lang tsho'i khyad par phun sum tshogs pa de dag des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-30: rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-31: de de dag la rtog pa 'phel bas yid bde ba skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-32: khyim bdag de yang ri bor zhig tu don zhig yod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-33: des bzang mo kho bo ni ri bor che ge mo zhig tu don zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:46b-35: khyod kyis yon gnas dag de bzhin du bshos gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-5: des dge slong rnams la yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-7: bdag ni ri bor che ge mo zhig tu bgyi ba zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-9: khyed cag de bzhin du bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-13: zan bza' bar bya'o zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-14: de yang ri bor gyi grong du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-15: dge slong dag kyang de bzhin du de'i khyim du zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-16: 'od bzang ma bdag gi khyo med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-20: bud med kyi tshul 'chos pa gang dag yin pa de dag dge slong rnams la ston par rtsom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-22: gcig la gcig nyes dmigs byung na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhes bgros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-23: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-25: sang nas mi 'ong du zad mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-28: bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas sang nas bsod snyoms la 'dong du zad mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-30: kye legs kyi de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-31: de dag phyi de nyin nas bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-32: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas 'od bzang ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47a-33: 'od bzang ma yon gnas dag bshos gsol tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-0: @47b nyin gcig byon nas de phan chad ye ma byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-2: nges par 'dis de dag gi mdun du bud med kyi g-yo dag bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-3: bkur sti ma byas pas 'dzems nas de dag ma 'ongs so snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-4: de de dag gi drung du song nas yang spyan drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-6: khyim bdag bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas bsod snyoms la rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-8: 'phags pa bdag gis 'tshal gyi gshegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-9: de lta bu'i nyes dmigs mi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-10: de dag gis khas blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-11: de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-12: dge slong dag phyi de nyin de'i khyim du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-13: khyim bdag des 'od bzang ma khyim du bcug nas phyi sgo bcad de bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-14: de nas de dag la rang gi lag dar te 'brim par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-15: 'od bzang ma khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du dge slong zan za ba de dag la rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-16: 'phags pa che ge mo zhig gi rkang pa ni 'di 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-29: mgo ni 'di 'dra'o zhes de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-30: sa bcu pa'i 'dod chags kyi me byung bar gyur pa rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gi shugs bdo ba des sbar bas rtul te de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-31: dge slong dag zan zos te yon bshad pa byas dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:47b-32: khyim bdag des sgo phye nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-3: de dus las 'das pas su zhig lan 'debs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-5: ci tsam nas la 'gyel pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-7: gdon mi za bar 'di gnyid kyis log gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-9: des de bskul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-10: re zhig na dus las 'das par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-11: de ngom zung gnag cing sma bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-12: nang gi mi dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-15: chung ma rin po che 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-19: 'od bzang ma dus las 'das so zhes sbron cig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-20: de dag gis ku co bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-21: kha cig ni sa la 'gyel nas ngu zhing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-22: kha cig ni khyim bdag ngu ba'i lag pa dang rkang pa nas 'dzin par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-25: gnyen kha cig ni ngud mo'i sgra 'byin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-26: khyim bdag de rang gi skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-27: bshes kyi 'khor rgya che ba zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-28: de rnams ji srid du ngu ba de'i bar du nyi ma nub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-29: de dag gis gos sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-32: dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-33: bkur sti chen pos de dur khrod du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-34: re zhig cig na mi rgod lnga brgya tsam zhig ri bor zhig tu song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48a-37: dur khrod de dang ha cang yang mi ring bar 'ongs pa grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-0: skye bo'i tshogs @48b chen po grong khyer nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-1: 'od bzang ma skyel bar dur khrod du song ba rnams mi rgod de dag gis tshul ma yin par gnod pa byas na mi rung gi sbran to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-2: snyam nas de mgyogs par song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-3: skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-5: mi rgod lnga brgya tsam ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug gi bros shig ces sbran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-6: de dag gis kyang sang rim gro bya'o zhes srung ma bzhag ste 'od bzang ma ji ltar rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-13: ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas te phyung nas bsnyal ba bzhin du bor te 'gros bslang nas grong khyer du bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-14: ji tsam na mi rgod de dag phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-15: srung ma rnams kyang bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-16: mi rgod rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-17: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-18: de nas 'od bzang ma'i gos rnams bshus nas bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-19: de dag gis de'i gzugs gzhon la mdzes pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-22: gar bskor kyang bud med 'di lta bu dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par zad do zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-23: de dag gis de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-24: karsha pa na lnga brgya bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-25: 'od bzang ma'i ro la yang skyes bu lnga brgyas karsha pa na lnga brgya byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-26: dga' mgur spyad do zhes kun tu sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:48b-27: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-2: btsun pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang 'od bzang mas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-3: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'od dang ldan par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-4: btsas ma thag tu khyim thams cad 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-5: gum nas kyang mi rgod lnga brgyas karsha pa na lnga brgya stsal nas dga' mgur spyad lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-7: dge slong dag khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-9: dpa' rgal bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nges par gyur pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-10: 'od bzang mas las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-11: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-12: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-15: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-16: 'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-19: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-20: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-21: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-22: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-23: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-25: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-26: skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49a-27: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-5: w'a ra n'a sa'i grong khyer na; nye bar rten cing drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-7: w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-12: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-21: ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-22: chos kyi rgyal pos chos bzhin byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-23: ji tsam na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-24: bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-25: rgyal po kri kri btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-28: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas de'i sku gdung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-29: bkur sti chen pos sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-30: rin po che sna bzhi'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-31: 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa gcig brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-32: de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig dad pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:49b-33: srog shing la me long gcig btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @50a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-1: 'od srung gi mchod rten la dad pa skyes nas srog shing la me long btags pa gang yin pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu mo de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-2: khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi srog shing la me long btags pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'od dang ldan bzhin du skye la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-5: skyes ma thag tu yang khyim thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-6: gang yang shi nas skyes bu lnga brgyas karsha pa na lnga brgya byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-7: dga' mgur spyad pa de yang nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-8: dge slong dag sngon byung ba w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-9: rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-14: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-24: ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-25: chos kyi rgyal pos chos bzhin byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-26: de'i tshe de'i dus na w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-27: gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-29: blta na sdug pa skyes pa'i yid du 'ong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-30: sngon rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi zhang pos yongs su spyad pa zhig 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50a-31: re zhig dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-0: dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag @50b sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-1: skyed mos tshal du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-2: phan tshun shes ldan dag bdag cag gis skyed mos tshal gyi longs spyod thams cad ni bshams na bud med med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-3: dong la smad 'tshong 'ga' zhig dgug go zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-4: legs kyi de bzhin du bya na su zhig dgug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-6: de dag bzang mo'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-10: gal te karsha pa na stong byin na 'gro yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-11: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-13: karsha pa na lnga brgya je khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-14: lnga brgya ni dga' mgur spyad nas sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-16: legs kyi de bzhin du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-18: de dag gis karsha pa na lnga brgya byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-23: gos dag bgos la 'ong ngo zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-26: gal te bdag dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-27: bdag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-28: bdag gis karsha pa na lnga brgya zhig kyang blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-29: da ji ltar bya snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-30: des bdag rgyal po'i zhang pos yongs su spyad pas de kho na la skyabs btsal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-31: gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam pa'i blo skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-32: des de'i gan du bran mo mngag gzhug ma mngags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-33: bu mo rgyal po'i zhang po'i drung du song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-34: song nas 'di skad ces bdag ngan te dga' 'dun pa las karsha pa na lnga brgya blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:50b-35: dga' 'dun pa de dag lnga brgya yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-0: ji ste bdag dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya dang @51a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-1: lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-2: bdag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-3: khyod kyis sngon bdag yongs su bzung bas de'i slad du khyod kyis bdag de dag las yongs su bskyab pa'i rigs so zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-4: bu mo des de'i drung du song ste smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-5: de yang rgyal po la rten pa yin pas de dag las de phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-6: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang phongs pa la thugs brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-7: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-8: 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-9: de nas rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing w'a ra n'a sir phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-10: bdag nyid chen po zhi ba'i bdag nyid can rab tu dben par gnas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-11: rab tu dben pa'i gnas tshol zhing skyed mos tshal der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-12: dga' 'dun pa de dag gis lus mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-15: gar bskor kyang yon gnas kyi zhing 'di lta bu la bya ba bya dgos so snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-16: de la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-17: bca' ba dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-18: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-19: dag gis chos mi ston gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51a-20: lus kyis chos ston pa yin pas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-0: glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul bya bar @51b brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-1: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dad par 'gyur bas shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la gtugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-2: gang bdag cag gis yang dag pa'i sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gzugs kyis 'tsho ba la tha na shi na yang karsha pa na lnga brgya byin nas dga' mgur spyod par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-3: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-4: gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya po de dag ni mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-7: smon lam btab pa de'i las kyis rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-8: 'di dag gis 'di 'khor bar 'khor ba na tshe rabs lnga brgyar karsha pa na lnga brgya byin zhing dga' mgur spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-9: da ltar khyim bdag gi chung mar gyur pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-10: shi ba'i bar du yang karsha pa na lnga brgya byin nas dga' mgur spyad pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-11: de lta na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-12: gcig tu dkar ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-13: 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma rnams yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-14: de lta bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:51b-16: gcig tu dkar pa'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-1: kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-3: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-4: dge slong dag de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro ba las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-5: de'i phyir dge slong dag gis de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro bar mi bya bar mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-6: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-7: dge slong dag khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma dge slong mthong nas rnam par rtog pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-8: srog dang bral bar gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-9: de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong gis gang du 'di lta bu'i nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-10: dge slong de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-11: gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-12: dge slong sbong ba pa zhig yod pa de yang dang yang dgon pa'i gnas su song nas bsam gtan byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-13: der de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis tshul ma yin par spyad pa bsgugs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-15: des 'phags pa khyod ma btub dang gnod pa bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-17: sring mo nga ni dge slong tshul khrims can yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-18: khyod kyis nga la gnod pa byar ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-20: de la glags tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-21: de dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar pus khyud ltar ma dud pa bor nas gnyid log par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52a-23: 'di la sha glan pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas des blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-0: rgyal @52b po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi steng na gnyid kyis log pa'i steng du bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-1: de sdangs nas gnyid sad de de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-2: khyod su zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-5: dge sbyong gi nang na gang zhig sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-7: des de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-9: 'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po dag gi gnas mal du gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-10: ji ste bdag bcom ldan 'das la dad par ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-11: bdag gis khyod gsad par 'gyur ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-12: bstan pa dang phral bar 'gyur zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-13: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-14: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-16: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-17: dge slong dag de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal na gnas pa las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-18: de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas par mi bya bar mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-20: rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-21: de bas na dge slong gis de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-22: dge slong de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas su gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-23: gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:52b-24: de'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu zhig kha zas dang spyod lam nyes pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-2: de nad kyis gzir bas 'khun 'byin cing dge slong rnams kyis de bskor nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-3: ci tsam na sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-5: 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-6: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-7: 'tsho byed dge slong gzhon nu 'di nad gcig gis thebs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-9: dpyad ci bya ba ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-11: 'phags pa 'bras yin pas brtol na phan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-12: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-13: gal te de lta na rtol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-15: de bya ba cung zad cig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-16: des der glan pa ma byas par song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-17: de rab tu na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag gang mkhas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-20: glan pa gyis shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-21: de la dge slong gzhon nu gzhan zhig gis glan pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-23: bdag gis 'phags pa de'i glan pa ma byas pas slar 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-24: des slar log ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-26: 'phags pa gang zhig bdag gis 'bras brtol ba de ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-27: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-31: 'tsho byed de glan pa byas zin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-35: blta'o zhes de'i drung du song ste bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53a-36: legs par glan pa mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-0: 'phags pa glan @53b pa legs lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-1: bdag ma mchis na yang slan chad de bzhin du mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-3: 'tsho byed 'di yang re zhig bdag gis gnang ba med par byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-4: yang bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngam mi gnang gi gtol med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-8: thugs rje can lags pas ci'i phyir gnang bar mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-9: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-11: de lta bas na dge slong gang mkhas pas glon du gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang mkhas pa des glon du gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-17: bang rim dag tu glan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-19: dben pa'i phyogs su gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-20: gzhan du byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-21: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-23: khyim bdag dad ba can dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-25: bdag nad 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bus thebs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-26: bdag gis g-yar zas ni ji lta bu zhig 'tshal bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-27: sman ni ji lta bu zhig bsten par bgyi zhes zas kyi chog dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-28: de na dge slong gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni ci'ang mi smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:53b-29: shes pa rnams ni the tshom du gyur nas ma smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-1: rnams mi dga' bzhin du dong ba'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-4: de lta bas na dge slong gang mkhas pa des kha zas kyi cho ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-5: sman dpyad rnams ston par gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-8: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-9: mu stegs can rnams ni thag bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-10: lha dang mi rnams ni kun dga' bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-11: skyes bu dam pa rnams ni mgu bar mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-12: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa dag grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-15: rgyal po'i pho brang de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas kyang mnyan yod du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-18: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-21: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-22: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-23: rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-24: phya mkhan drang srong byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-26: ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-27: gzhan yang dad pa can mang po mnyan yod du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-28: der zang zing gi rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-29: mchod pa'i bkur stis skye bo'i tshogs mang po yongs su tshim par byas so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54a-32: de lta bu'i 'byor ba mchog mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-0: mi @54b ma yin pa kha cig ni de nyid du mngon par dga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-1: kha cig ni rang gi yul gyi gnas nyid du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-2: gang dag der mngon par dga' ba de dag gang gi tshe sems 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-3: bud med gang dag gi khyo phyi rol du don gnyer du song ba de'i cha lugs su bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag dang lhan cig tu dga' mgur spyod par byed do;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-4: de nas bud med de dag las rgyu mthun pa las skyes pa'i khye'u dang bu mo dag rkang lag dang mig dang lus mi sdug par skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-5: kha cig ni gnag la mig dmar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-6: kha cig ni mgo che lus chung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-8: kha cig ni skra ljang khu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-9: de dag ma de dag gis mthong ba dang sdangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-11: tshang tshing gi phyogs dag tu bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-12: de dag mi ma yin pa'i mdangs kyis gso bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-13: kha cig ni mi'i gzugs su mi gsal bar skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-14: gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe 'gyur ba ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-15: de dag kyang mas lam po che'i khar bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-16: de yang mi ma yin pa'i mdangs kyis gso bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-17: drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-18: de dag ji snyed rab tu 'byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-19: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa de dag dang ji srid du gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid du lhan cig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:54b-20: gang gi tshe yongs su shes pa de'i tshe rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-0: gzhan du na ston pa'i bkas dus gsum @55a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-2: re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' snga gro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-4: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-5: de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-6: srang na skra ljang khu can zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-8: 'di ni lhung bzed nag po can dag gis phrogs par mi 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-9: gal te rab tu byung na 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam du bsams nas de'i drung du song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-12: 'phags pa bdag la su yang ga las mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-13: bdag mgon med pa zhig lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-15: bzhin bzang gal te de lta na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-17: 'phags pa skra ljang khu can bdag su zhig rab tu 'byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni snying rjes rab tu phye ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-20: gal te sus kyang rab tu ma phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-21: tshur shog ngas rab tu dbyung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-23: de yid bde ba skyes te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-24: des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-25: de nas nyin zhag mi mang ba zhig tu kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos rnams bslabs te bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-26: bzhin bzang ri dvags kyis ri dvags mi sos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-27: mnyan yod rang gi spyod yul yangs pa yang yin la pha'i yul yang yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55a-28: slong mo la rgyu bas 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-0: de mi dga' nas phyi de nyin snga dro @55b sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-1: chos gos dang lhung ba zed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-2: re zhig na bud med cig bsod snyoms khyer te phyir byung ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-3: des de mthong ba dang brang brdungs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-4: 'phags pa khyod skra ljang khu can na sus rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-7: mkhan po nye dgas snying rjes bdag rab tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-9: gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma yin pa gzhan su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa kun nas mdzes pa sun par byed ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-11: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'phya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-12: ma dad pa kha zer ba rnams srang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-14: sum mdo dag tu dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu ba rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-15: tshangs pa'i tshul yang tshig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-16: da ni skra ljang khu can dag kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes mi snyan pa smra ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-18: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-20: de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu dag rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-21: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-23: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:55b-24: de lta bas na dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:56a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-0: @57a *// sor rdum sgur po mi'u thung dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-4: drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-5: mdze can 'bras can phol mig can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-6: gta' gam shu ba g-yan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-7: nad ni gzhan can thams cad kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-8: drang srod chen pos spangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-9: bud med lam dang khur gyis dub //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-10: ya za ma lug gta' gam dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-11: de dag dang gzhan yan lag nyams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-13: mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-21: byed na nyes pa sbom bor 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-23: bran can dang ni skyong ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-24: gleng gzhi dang ni zhu ba dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57a-26: dmag kun dang ni srin bu ri //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:57b-29: tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag mi bya bas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-0: dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na @58a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis de gnyis gsol ba'i las gcig gis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-3: de gnyis gang la phyag bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-4: las su ji ltar bsko bar bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-5: rnyed pa ji ltar blang pa mi shes pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-6: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-8: de gnyis kyis gcig la gcig phyag ni mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-9: rnyed pa ni gang sngar 'ongs pas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-10: phyis 'ongs pa de ni sngar las su bsko zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-11: rnyed pa phyis sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-12: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-26: dge bsnyen rnams kyi sngon gyi bka' mchid dag la gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58a-31: dge bsnyen rnams kyis ming bskyud par gyur na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-3: gang gis gnas la sogs pa'i ming brjed par gyur pa de dag gis grong khyer chen po drug las gang yang rung ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-4: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gang du lan mang du bzhugs pa brjod bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-5: ji ste rgyal po'i ming brjed na ni gsal rgyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-6: khyim bdag gi ming ni mgon med zas sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-7: dge bsnyen ma ni ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-8: sngon gyi gtam gyi gnas ni w'a ra n'a si'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-11: dge bsnyen ma ni khyim bdag gso sbyong skyes kyi chung ma brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-14: chos mngon pa rnams brjed par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-15: glegs bu la bris nas bcang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-33: snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-34: yo byad rnams kyang brnyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:58b-35: mu stegs rnams ni rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-4: ded dpon rnams kyis rim gror ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-11: nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-12: yo byad rnams kyang ma rnyed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-13: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gis yun ring mo nas dge sbyong go'u ta ma la rnam par mtho btsams na glags ma rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-14: ma la bdag gis mu stegs can rnams la mtho btsam mo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-15: de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par nga rgyal byed pa rnams rgyal po'i khab na rten cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-16: de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid rdzogs byed kyi cha byad du mngon par sbrul nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-26: mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-27: ka tya'i bu nog can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59a-28: gnyen gyi bu gcer bu'i mdun du 'bar ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-2: rdzogs byed khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-4: de bzhin du bdag nyid kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-5: thams cad kyi drung du song nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-9: thams cad kyi drung du song nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-11: thob bo zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-12: de bzhin du bdag nyid smra 'dod kyi bu yang dag rgyal ba can gyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-13: thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-14: de bzhin du bdag nyid ka tya'i bu nog can gyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-15: thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-16: de bzhin du bdag nyid gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-17: thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te; de rnams so so nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-18: bdag gcig pu ma gtogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni mthu che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-20: de nas dus gzhan zhig na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rtog khang du 'dus shing 'khod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-21: bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:59b-23: sngon ni bdag cag rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-6: ded dpon rnams kyis bkur stir byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-13: yo byad rnams kyang rnyed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-14: da ni bdag cag la bkur stir mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-17: mchod par mi byed ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-21: nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-22: yo byad rnams mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-24: dge sbyong go'u ta ma de la ni bskur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-25: ri mo byas zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-26: dge sbyong go'u ta mas ni chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-29: nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-30: yo byad rnams kyang rnyed do zhes bya'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-31: shes ldan dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-32: bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug par bya zhing gal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-33: dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-35: dge sbyong go'u ta mas gnyis na bdag cag gis bzhi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-36: dge sbyong go'u ta mas bzhin bdag cag gis brgyad; dge sbyong go'u ta mas brgyad na bdag cag gis bcu drug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60a-37: dge sbyong go'u ta mas bcu drug na bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-0: dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla @60b ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji snyed bstan pa las bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-1: de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rgyal po gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-2: rgyal po gzugs can snying po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-4: tshe spel ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-5: lha bdag cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-6: ye shes can du smra ba lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-7: dge sbyong go'u ta ma yang bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-8: ye shes can du smra ba lags par sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-9: de'i slad du ye shes dang ldan par smra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-10: ye shes dang ldan par smra ba lhan cig tu mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par stsal ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-11: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na bdag cag gis gnyis zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-12: bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-13: dge sbyong go'u ta ma yang shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-14: bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-16: kye ro dang 'dra ba khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:60b-17: rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-0: @61a *// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-1: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-2: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-3: de dag de'i lam khar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-4: rgyal po la rgyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-5: tshe spel ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-6: lha bdag cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ye shes can du smra ba lags zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-7: mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du bstan par bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-8: dge sbyong go'u ta ma shul gyi phyed dag tu dgug par gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-9: bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-12: gal te khyod don 'di lan gsum gyi bar du zer na khyed spyugs te btang ngo zhes des de dag thag bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-14: rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-16: shes ldan dag ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyogs byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-17: mnyan yod na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzu bo lta bu zhes yod ces grag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-18: gang gi tshe dge sbyong go'u ta ma mnyan yod du 'ongs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61a-19: bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-0: ci tsam du gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ji srid dgyes kyi bar du bzhugs @61b nas mnyan yod gang na bar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-1: rim gyis ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las mnyan yod du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-2: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-3: de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes shing mnyan yod du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-4: de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-5: de dag lam gyis dub pa ngal bso nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-6: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-11: ye shes can du smra ba lags par sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-12: de'i slad du ye shes can du smra ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-14: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-16: dge sbyong go'u ta mas gnyis na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:61b-22: dge sbyong go'u ta mas bcu drug na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-0: dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji @62a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-2: bdag cag gis nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du mi chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-3: dge sbyong go'u ta ma shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-4: bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-5: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-7: gal te de lta na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus te byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-10: lha legs kyi de ltar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-12: de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-15: bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-17: mu stegs can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan 'dren na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-18: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-19: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-20: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyir gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-21: skyes bu dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyir gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-22: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-0: rgyal po chen po nga ni nyan thos rnams la @62b 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-3: bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 'ongs pa rnams la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-4: ces chos ston par mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-5: 'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-7: dge ba ni ma spyoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-8: sdig pa ni shogs te gnos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-10: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lan gnyis /
