K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-16: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyir gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-17: skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyir gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-20: nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-22: bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 'ongs pa rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-23: mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-24: ces chos ston par mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-25: 'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-26: dge slong dag dge ba ni ma spyoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-27: sdig pa ni shogs te gnos shig ces chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:62b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nges par mdzad pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-2: snga phyi med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-3: nyan thos dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-4: yab dang yum bden pa la 'god par mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-5: mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-6: sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad 'dul ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis cho 'phrul chen po gang du bstan ces dgongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-8: mnyan yod du yin par gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-9: yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos dus ji tsam na khong du chud par 'gyur zhes dgongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-10: zhag bdun lon nas 'gyur bar mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-11: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-14: ci rigs par sgrubs shig ces bgyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-15: bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-16: rgyal po chen po; zhag bdun na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-17: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-19: mu stegs can rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-21: zhag bdun na rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63a-22: khyed cag gis bya zhing bshams dgos pa ci yod pa de gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-0: mu stegs can @63b rnams kyis bgros pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-2: yang na ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-3: yang na ni grogs tshol bar 'gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-5: kye dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi za bar grogs tshol bar 'gyur bas ji ste de ltar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-6: bdag cag gis kyang grogs btsal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-7: de'i tshe ku sha'i grong khyer na kun tu rgyu shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba rgas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-10: ku sha'i grong khyer gyi gyad rnams kyis dgra bcom par bkur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-14: mchod par byas pa zhig 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-15: de rnams kyis gros bcas nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-16: shin tu bzang po khyod dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-17: bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul la bos kyi grogs gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-19: kye khyed kyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-21: de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-26: gang gi tshe dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-27: kho bo dal gyis 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i mtsho 'gram na nyin mo gnas shing kho bo'i bsod snyoms blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:63b-28: mtsho chen po ma dros par song ste za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-0: de na kho bo phyogs gcig na 'dug pa la ma dros pa na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis chu bcus shing @64a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-2: gang gi tshe dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-3: de'i nyan thos kyi mchog sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba de'i dge sbyong skul byed ces bya ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-4: phyag dar khrod pa khyer nas mtsho chen po ma dros par 'ongs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-5: ma dros pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams de'i phyag dar khrod pa de dag bkrus nas 'bul bar byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-6: bkrus pa'i chu des kyang bdag nyid kyi mgo bor 'debs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-7: de lta bas na bdag cag gang gi yang slob dpon dang yang mi mnyam pa de khyed kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-8: de rnams phan tshun du kye 'di yang de'i phyogs shig yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-9: bdag cag gzhan tshol du dong ngo zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-10: de rnams kyis de la g-yo'i kun tu spyod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-11: bkur sti bya ba ltar byas te dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-12: sa phyogs dben pa gzhan zhig tu 'dus nas bgros pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-13: kye bdag cag gis grogs gzhan ji ltar btsal bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-15: de las kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-16: grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi nags zhes bya ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-17: lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhig gnas pas de'i gan du dong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-18: des bdag cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-21: 'on kyang dka' thub kyi nags tshal che ge mo zhes bya ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64a-22: dka' thub can lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhes bya ba gnas pa de'i drung du dong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-0: des bdag @64b cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-1: de'i tshe gangs ri'i sul shing sna tshogs kyi nags tshal gyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-5: rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'bab chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-6: mtshe'us mdzes par byas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-7: drang srong lnga brgya tsam zhig gnas te phal cher mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-8: de'i nang nas drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gcig grong khyer gyi nye 'khor du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-10: de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-11: de rnams kyis de la byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-12: zhes bya ba kun tu spyad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-13: khyod gang na 'dir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-14: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-15: de rnams yid bde ba skyes nas de dag gi drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-16: de nas phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar byas nas lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-17: kye khyed dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-18: bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-19: khyod kyis kyang grogs gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-21: kye legs te de bzhin du bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-22: 'on kyang nged la mtshan ma ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-23: de rnams yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-24: de dag la gus par smra bas mgu bar byas te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-25: re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mas dben gyi nu bo rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu zhes bya ba de dri dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:64b-26: rgyal po'i pho brang gi drung na mar song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-1: mo zhig steng gi khang bzang gi thog nas me tog gi phreng ba bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-2: de'i lus la phog pa gzhan zhig gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-6: des kyang blon po la byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-7: blon pos kyang rgyal po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-8: lha rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu ni lha'i btsun mo dang khri'o zhes gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-9: rgyal po rnams ni ma brtags par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-12: ngas rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu yongs su btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-13: deng la rkang lag med par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-15: de dag gis de srang du khrid nas rkang lag med par byas te bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-16: de'i gnyen mig mchi mas gang ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-17: skye bo'i tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-18: ji tsam na mu stegs can rnams kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-19: de dag la de'i gnyen rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-21: rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu'i yan lag dang nyid lag dag ji ltar snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ba'i bden pa'i tshig mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-23: de dag spobs pa med nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-24: cang mi zer bar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-25: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsod snyoms la rgyu ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65a-26: de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-0: rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu yan lag dang nying lag dag ji ltar snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur bar bden pa'i tshig mdzad @65b du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-6: sos zin to zhes dbugs phyin par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rings pa rings par mnyan yod du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-10: skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-12: kun dga' bo song la rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu'i gnyen gyis yan lag dang nying lag dag gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog tu chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-13: bden pa'i tshig 'di ltar gyis shig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-14: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rkang pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-22: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gang su yang rung ba de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-25: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-26: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog tu gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-30: 'khor gang su yang rung ba de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:65b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog tu gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-2: tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-3: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-4: bden pa'i tshig 'dis rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu'i yan lag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-5: nying lag sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-10: de'i gnyen rnams kyis yan lag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-11: nying lag gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-12: 'di ltar bden pa'i tshig bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-13: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis sems can rkang pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-15: gang su yang rung ba de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-16: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-17: bden pa'i tshig des de'i yan lag snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-18: ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-19: bden pa'i tshig gis de'i yan lag dang nying lag ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gnas par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-20: skye bo'i tshogs kyis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-21: aa la la 'phags pa kun dga' bos mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-22: zhes sgra bo che bton to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu khrid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66a-24: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-0: bcom ldan @66b 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-4: btsun pa rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu de ni 'di lags so zhes gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-5: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-10: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-11: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos ston pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-12: rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gus de thos ma thag tu bden pa mngon par rtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-13: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-14: rdzu 'phrul yang thob par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-15: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-16: 'phags pa kun dga' bos bden pa'i tshig ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-17: rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu'i yan lag dang nying lag snga mkho bzhin du gyur to zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-18: thos nas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-19: rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-23: lha bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur 'tshal zhing 'di nyid du mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-24: legs kyi de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-25: ces des kun dga' ra ba'i nang der 'chags byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:66b-26: de de na 'dug pa na de'i yan lag dang nying lag dum bu slar 'byor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-0: de'i ming dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba @67a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-1: dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba na zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-2: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-5: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-7: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-8: bdag gis mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ji srid pa de'i bar du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-10: rgyal po chen po legs kyi gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-11: der gdon mi za bar skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-13: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan yod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-14: rgyal byed kyi tshal ji srid pa de'i bar du sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-15: cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-16: 'dun khang gos brgya stong ri bas g-yogs pa tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-17: dri zhim pa'i bdug pa'i snod bzhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-18: ba dan dang rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-19: dar gyi chun 'phyang gi tshogs dpyangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-20: me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-21: lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du nyams dga' bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67a-22: der bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rdo rje dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-4: padma r'a gas brgyan cing spras pa'i gser gyi seng ge'i khri yang bshams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-5: mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen rnams kyis kyang rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i gos kyis g-yogs pa'i 'dun khang drug kyang byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-7: de dag tu mu stegs can rnams rang gi 'khor gyis bskor nas sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-9: lha bdag cag ni mchis lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-10: dge sbyong go'u ta ma dgug tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-12: rgyal pos thos nas kyang btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-14: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-15: des bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-16: bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa der song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-24: stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-25: kha na ma tho ba mi mnga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-26: zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-27: btsun pa mu stegs can de rnams tshogs shing mchis lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:67b-30: lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bram ze'i khye'u bla ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-0: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste @68a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-2: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-3: yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-5: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze'i khye'u bla mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-8: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal go'u ta ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-13: stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-14: kha na ma tho ba mi mnga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-15: zhes snyun gsol zhing mchis zhes gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-16: bram ze khye'u bla ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang khyod bde bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-17: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-18: kye go'u ta ma mu stegs can rnams cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du lhags nas 'dus shing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bla ma song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-24: bram ze'i khye'u bla ma song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68a-26: srog chags brgya stong du ma ngo mtshar gyis mig phye nas aa la la zhes ca co dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-0: lta @68b bzhin du nam mkha' las cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-1: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'byor pa de dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-2: ya mtshan gyis yid dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-3: mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-4: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-5: da ni khyod kyi res la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-7: de rnams kyis smras pa; lha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-9: skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-10: cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-11: 'on te bdag cag gi lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-13: de nas de'i mod la dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing aa mra yal ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-15: 'dab ma dkar po du mas klubs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-16: bya'i tshogs du ma skad 'byin pa blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-17: cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi byang phyogs su bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-18: de yang rgyal pos mthong nas yid bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-19: lan gnyis kyi bar du mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-21: da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-24: lha bdag cag gis khyod la sngar ma gsol tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-25: lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-26: cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:68b-27: 'on te bdag cag gi lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-1: de nas de'i mod la khyim bdag ngan legs sbyin gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-2: cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-3: de yang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-4: yang shin tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-5: lan gsum gyi bar du mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-6: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-7: da ni khyod kyi res la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-10: bdag cag gis gsol mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-11: 'on kyang lan gsum gyi bar du gsol bar bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-12: lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-13: cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-14: 'on te bdag cag gi lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po lta bar spro ba'i srog chags brgya stong dum yang 'dus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-17: lha brgya stong du ma yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dus par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-19: gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-20: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69a-21: me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-0: de nas sgo 'phar gyi gseb nas 'od zer byung bas cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang thams cad bsreg par @69b brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-1: mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-3: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang tshig cing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-4: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas rngo thog na 'dir mchis la; zhi bar bgyid grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-6: rgyal po cang mi zer bar sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-7: de bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-8: rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-9: phya mkhan drang srong byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-11: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-12: ri dvags dgra'i ma sa ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-13: gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-14: bar mar gnas pa kha cig kyang cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-16: de'i slob ma rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-17: de nas me des cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi dri ma thams cad bsregs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-18: rang nyid zhi bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-19: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-20: lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang dri ma med cing gsal la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-22: de nas yang rgyal po srog shor ba las rnyed pa lta bur dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-23: yid bde ba skyes nas mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-24: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-25: da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyi khyed kyis ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:69b-27: de dag spobs pa med pas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du bya @70a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-1: ba dang bcas par zhabs g-yas pa dri gtsang khang gi nang du bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-2: sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-8: kun tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-9: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-10: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-11: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-12: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-14: mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-15: sa g-yos pa des gangs re'i khrod kyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa'i drang song rnams la bskul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-18: bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag gis mtshan ma dag bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-19: 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba la gzigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-21: nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-22: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer dag ba kye bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-23: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas drang srong de rnams kyi bar thag ji srid pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-24: gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-25: drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-26: gser mchog sbyangs pa'i dum bu'i tshogs spungs pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-27: me tog ku man da ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70a-28: mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i mdangs can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-0: @70b gsung dbyangs sprin chu dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-3: rnga sgra lta bur zab cing brtan pa rnam par gsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-4: mnyan na bde zhing snyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-5: dpral pa'i phyogs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-6: mu tig gi do shal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-10: shel spungs pa lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-11: yon tan rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-12: grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-15: bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'i chags pa'i dri ma'i 'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-16: dus dpag tu med pa nas tshogs bsags pa'i ye shes bla na med pa phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-17: lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i myu gus zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-25: drang srong mchod 'os rnams kyis rjed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-26: mdor na sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-27: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-29: 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-30: rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-31: ji ltar sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:70b-32: lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-3: rgyal po mngon par 'dod pa dang po rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-4: de lta ma yin pas drang srong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-9: rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-10: de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-11: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-12: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-13: de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-15: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-16: btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-17: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-19: bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-23: bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71a-24: mi g-yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71b-0: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa @71b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71b-3: 'joms pa'i chos can du rtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71b-4: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71b-13: bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:71b-16: gus par bya bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-14: skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-15: 'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-16: nga 'di rnams kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-17: nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-18: gal te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:72b-20: dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-1: thos dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-2: 'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-4: khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-5: de yang rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par gsol pa 'debs pa su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-9: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-10: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-11: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-13: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-14: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-15: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-16: skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi bar gsol pa bdag lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-17: de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-18: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73a-19: phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal @73b rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-1: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-2: rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na nyid kyi gdan las mi snang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-4: shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-5: spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-9: gzims pa mdzad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-10: me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-16: shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'thon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-17: zung gi cho 'phrul sku'i smad nas ni me 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-18: sku'i stod nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-20: sku'i smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab pa dag kyang ston par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-21: shar phyogs su ji lta bar lho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-23: byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-24: phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-25: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-26: seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:73b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs can rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-6: skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan par gsol ba 'debs pa su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-7: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-8: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-9: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-12: skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-13: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-14: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-15: skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par mdzad par bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba bdag lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-16: de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-17: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-18: phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-21: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74a-22: rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-4: g-yung drung can dra bas 'brel pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-5: bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-6: 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-7: kye ma klu rnams kyis padma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-9: thams cad gser las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-10: rin po che'i chu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-11: rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-13: srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs sems kyis shes par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-15: gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni; nyan thos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-16: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes par mi 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-18: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba klu rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-20: cho 'phrul chen po ston par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-21: de dag gis padma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-22: thams cad gser las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-23: rin po che'i chu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-24: rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te sa brtol nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:74b-25: bcom ldan 'das padma de'i snying po la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas @75a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-1: g-yon du padma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-2: de dag re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-3: de dag gi g-yas g-yon du yang padma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-5: de dag la yang gzhan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-6: de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas phal po che sprul to; ;de na sangs rgyas kha cig ni 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-7: kha cig ni gsal bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-10: kha cig ni kun shes pa lung ston /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-11: kha cig ni zhu ba zhu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-18: ji ltar byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis kyang sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba de ltar yang byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-20: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-23: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-24: yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-25: nam mkha'i dkyil na lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad par phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75a-26: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang rnga dag rdung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-0: gnas gnas na yang rnga bo che rnams @75b ni rdung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-2: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-4: la la ni gar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-5: byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-6: rang gi rigs dang 'dra ba'i sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-8: glang po che rnams ni ngur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-12: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-13: rab tu dga' ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-14: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya bar spor bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-15: de nas lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-19: man da ra ba rnams gtor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-20: lha'i aa ga ru'i phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-21: rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-23: lha rdzas kyi gos dag kyang gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-24: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-25: de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-26: gdul ba'i skye bos rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-27: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-28: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-29: sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-30: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-31: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-33: bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-34: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:75b-35: sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-2: gcig car du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-3: ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-4: de srid srin bu me khyer gsal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-5: mkha' la nyi ma shar ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-7: ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-8: rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-10: rtog ge mi gsal de slob min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-12: dge slong dag cho 'phrul chen po mi snang bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs ma thag tu mod la mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-15: de mi snang bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-16: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-17: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-18: da ni khyed kyi res la bab pas khyed kyis ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-19: de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed cang mi smra bar kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la gru phug byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-20: des kyang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-21: des kyang mi pham skra'i la ba can la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-22: des kyang ka tya'i bu nog can la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-23: des kyang gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-24: des kyang 'od srung rdzogs byed la byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76a-25: 'ga' yang smra bar mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-0: de dag la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skad ces smras @76b na; de bzhin du gcig la gcig gru phug byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-4: mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-5: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-6: skyes bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la mtho 'tshams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-7: de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-8: des gang gis na cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-9: de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab pa de lta bu'i rlung dmar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-11: de na kha cig ni bred nas ri'i gseb tu zhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-12: kha cig ni rtsva tshang tshing du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-13: kha cig ni nags thibs por /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-15: kha cig ni lha khang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-16: bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-17: tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-18: 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-19: phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-20: kun dga' ra ba ljon shing dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-21: mchod rten rnams la skyabs su 'gro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-22: skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-23: skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-24: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-25: sdug bsngal kun las rab mi thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-26: gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-27: chos dang dge 'dun skya bas song zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-28: 'phags pa yi ni bden pa bzhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-29: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:76b-30: sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-2: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-3: shes rab kyis ni lta byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-4: skyabs de dag ni gtso yin zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-5: skyabs de dag ni mchog yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-6: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-7: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-11: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-12: gang thos na sems can brgya phrag mang pos khyad par chen po thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:77a-13: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81a-27: de nas btsun mo de g-yer bag che ba zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81a-28: ji ltar rgyal po dam pa de ltar mnyes par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81a-30: khyod la dam pa ci zhig sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81a-31: des thal mo sbyar nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81a-32: gal te bdag la lhas skabs phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-0: bdag gi bu btsas pa gang lags pa de rgyal @81b tshab tu stsal bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-1: de'i tshig thos ma thag tu rgyal po mtshon gyis gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du ting zhes byed nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-2: bdag gis 'di la dam pa sbyin par skabs phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-3: 'dis kyang de lta bu'i dam pa bslangs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-4: bdag gi bu bza' btung 'di yang dpa' zhing brtson pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-5: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-6: rigs dang mthun par skyes pa'i bu gcig pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-8: gzhan la rgyal thabs sbyin par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-9: da 'di la ji ltar bya zhes the tshom skyes nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-10: re zhig na blon po rnams kyis rgyal po yid mi bde bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-11: lha ci dgongs zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-12: rgyal pos de rnams la rang bzhin smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-13: ngas btsun mo la dam pa sbyin pa'i skabs phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-14: des kyang bu zhig mchis gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-15: rgyal tshab tu stsal bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-17: de'i phyir nga sems khong du chud par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-18: de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-20: nyi 'og gi rgyal po gang las bdag cag gis 'di bslangs pa de las kyang dam pa 'di lta bu bcas pas stsal mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-24: bu mor 'gyur ba da dung sus 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-25: re zhig de la mchog stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-26: de nas rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-28: de nas dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:81b-29: btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas zla ba dgu tshang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-2: blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-3: de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-4: gzhon nu 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes mir 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-5: de nas rgyal po skyed pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-6: gang gi phyir 'di ma btsas pa nyid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-7: rgyal srid mngon par 'dod cing mngon par dga' bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-8: de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-9: de ma ma brgyad po rnams la gtad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-10: de dag gis kyang dril ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-15: mar dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-16: gang gi tshe chen por gyur kyang rgyal tshab tu ma bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-17: de nas de'i ma mes nyi 'og gi rgyal pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-18: lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa la pho nya btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-19: ji ltar bdag gi tsha bo rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab tu ma bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-20: bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te khyod kyi gan du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-22: des pho nya'i chig thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-23: 'jigs skrag nas yid mi bde zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-24: de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po skyed pa skrag cing mi dga' bar rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-28: nyi 'og gi rgyal po des tsha bo'i phyir pho nya btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-29: pho nya de 'di skad ces ci ste nga'i tsha bo rgyal tshab tu mi gzhug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82a-30: nga 'ongs te khyod rgyal po las phyung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-0: nga'i tsha bo gzhug go @82b zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-1: de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-3: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-4: rgyal tshab kyi thabs stsal la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-5: gzhon nu bza' btung 'di dgum par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-6: de nas rgyal po skyed pas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-7: chos dang mi ldan pa'i tshig de lta bu ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-8: 'di ltar 'di na bu pha gsod pa thos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-9: pha bu gsod pa ni ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-10: nga ni de ltar gtan mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-12: ji ste mi dgum na yang yan lag ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-13: de nas rgyal po skyed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-14: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-15: gal te yan lag med par byas na bsad pa kho nar zad mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-16: de nas blon po rnams kyi rgyal po skyed pa'i tshig thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-18: lha 'di la gzhan ci bgyir mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-21: nyes pa med pa ji ltar bskrad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-22: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-23: ci'i slad du'ang mi bsngo ba ring po mi thogs par gzhon nu la nongs par 'byung bar rngo thog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-24: re zhig rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba la thabs stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-25: de nas ni rgyal po bza' btung rang nyid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-26: de nas rgyal po skyed pas dbang thang gi nyi ma shis pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-28: shis par brjod pa byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-29: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab kyi thabs byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-30: de thabs byin par gzhon nu bza' btung gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-32: lhas ni bdag spangs par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:82b-33: da bdag 'dir 'dug kyang ci zhig rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-3: de'i ma'i thad du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-4: mi bde ba'i lo rgyus bshad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-6: bdag rgyal po lnga len gyi yul du mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-8: de nas de yang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni myos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-9: bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-11: snying rje rje skad smre sngags bton te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-12: du gul ras kyi gding bas mdzes byas pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-13: mal stan che la 'os par bder nyal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-14: bu gcig da ni sa steng thang bu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-15: gos kyi phyogs gcig gting nas ji ltar nyal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-16: mal du bde bar nyal nas rol mo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-17: glu sgra sna tshogs dag gis sad byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-18: grang dang tsha ba'i chu yis phog gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-19: mdangs can lus ni ji ltar nags na dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-20: sngon chad rgyal pos gnang ba'i bza' btung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-21: stan dang bzhon dang theg mchog la spyod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-22: byug pa rgyan dang gos kyis phongs bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-23: su yi dbang gis sdug bsngal gyur par 'khyams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-24: 'jig rten dang phrad skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-25: thal mo rab sbyar rnga sgra glu dbyangs dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-26: yid dang rnar 'ongs rnams kyis legs mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-27: skom pas mngon par gdungs bzhin gang du 'khyams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-29: gtan du bde ba yang ni su zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-30: gtan du sdug bsngal ba yang su zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83a-31: mi bde ma thob pa yang su zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-0: thob par mi 'gyur ba @83b yang su zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-1: 'gyur ba'i dbang gis mi rnams bde sdug ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-2: rgyu skar 'khor lo mkha' la 'khor ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-3: bde bas dga' min sdug pas mi dga' med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-4: mi dbang rigs rjes 'gro ba'i rtags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-5: des ma la de lta bu rnam pa mang po khong du chud par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-6: yul lnga len gang na ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-7: de der grong dang nye bar phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-9: lus bkres pas shing gi grib ma zhig la nyal zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-10: ji tsam zhig na rgyal po'i bya ba cung zad cig gi phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-11: lnga len gyi bkrabs pa dag cig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-12: bza' btung grib ma de la nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-19: dpung pa ring ba'i skyes bu 'di su zhig ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-20: de dag gis de bslangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-25: bdag ni lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-26: dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-27: des de rnams la ji ltar gyur pa smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-28: de nas bkrabs pa de dag gis rgyal po'i bu de skyes su khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-29: lnga len gyi rgyal po'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-30: bza' btung de la phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-31: lha 'di rgyal po skyed pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bgyi ba lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-32: phas 'di lta bu zhig gi slad du bskrad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:83b-34: de nas bza' btung gis kyang lnga len gyi rgyal po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-2: mi yi bdag po skyed pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-4: gzugs ldan yon tan phun tshogs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-5: rgyal srid nyams nas 'dir mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-6: de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos mgul nas 'khyud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-7: dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-8: dga' ba khong du chud par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-9: de la bu mo dang yul dag kyang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-10: de yang de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-13: re zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-14: zla ba dgu tshang ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-17: thong ga seng ge ltar 'dug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-19: ro stod seng ge 'dra ba zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-20: de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-21: gzhon nu'i ming cir gdags snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-22: bdag gi ming bza' btung yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-24: de nas gzhon nu bza' btung mang po ma ma brgyad po la gtad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-25: de dag gis bsku ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-30: mar dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-31: gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-32: khye'u yi ge slob pa'i grvar yi ge slob tu btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-33: de'i pha bza' btung ni nad kyis btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84a-36: nad g-yog rnams kyis kyang gso bar ma nus nas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-0: rgyal po'i bu mo @84b shin tu mya ngan gyis thebs nas cho nges btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-2: de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-3: bud med thams cad kyi bsam pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-4: phal cher skyes pa 'dod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-5: de gcig la sbyin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-7: gzhon nu bza' btung mang po dang bcas par mdun na 'don la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-8: de nas mdun na 'don de de dang lhan cig dga' ba rgya chen po nyams su myong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-9: re zhig na mdun na 'don de'i khyim drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-10: bya gag gcig skad 'byin pa phyogs de na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig 'gro bas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-11: des mi gang gis de'i sha zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-12: tshig de mdun na 'don gyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-13: des bram ze de la dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-14: de nas mdun na 'don gyis bya gag bzung nas bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-16: bya gag 'di 'phral du tshos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-17: nga rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-18: de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-19: ji tsam na khye'u bza' btung mang po grva nas bkres te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-20: khyim du 'ongs na ma yang mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-21: de nas des bdag cag gi ci dag btsos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-23: re zhig na ma ni mi snang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-24: bltas na rdze'u zhig gi nang na bya gag cig mgo gyen du byung zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-25: de nas des kyang rdzi'u'i nang du 'dug bzhin du mgo bcad de zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-27: de la mgo sus zos zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:84b-28: des bdag gis 'chal to zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-0: de nas khye'u zan byin te grvar @85a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-4: bya gag gi mgrin pa mi snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-7: khye'us 'tshal to zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-8: de nas bya gag gi lhag ma zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-10: ci re zhig bya gag ril gyis zos pas rgyal por 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-11: 'on te yan lag ma tshang ba zos pas kyang rgyal por 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-12: the tshom gcad pa'i phyir thabs gzhan zhig gis bram ze ltas mkhan de nyid bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-13: kye bram ze chen po khyod kyis sngar gang gis bya gag zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-14: yan lag ma tshang ba zos pa der 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-17: yan lag ma tshang yang gang gis de'i mgo zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-18: yang na gang gis de'i mgo zos pa de bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-19: de'i mgo zos na de nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-20: de nas mdun na 'don gyis blo skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-21: gzhon nu 'di bsad nas 'di'i mgo bza' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-22: mas shes par ma byas na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-26: mi btub 'di nyid kyi ma'i nyam drod blang ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-27: des snyan pa'i tshig rnam pa du mas bzhams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-28: bzang mo ci khyos rgyal po byas na legs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85a-29: 'on te bus rgyal po byas na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-0: des zur dang snol dag las legs par brtags @85b te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-1: gal te bus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-3: ci nas kyang de dang mthun par smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-5: des khyos rgyal po byas na legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-7: bud med de yang mkhas shing mdzangs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-10: bya gag gi mgo'i phyir khon du bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-11: bdag gi bu bsad par chad par 'phrigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-12: da ni dus la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-13: ci nas kyang bu bsrung ba bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-14: de bu la gsang ste bu khyod kyis bya gag gi mgo zos pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-15: yul 'di nas myur du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-16: song nas mes po rgyal po byed pa de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-17: khyod kyi rang gi skye bo'i tshogs yod pa der bde bar 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-19: nge bros nas lus 'phags su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-20: de ngal zhing bkres skom pas lus gzir te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-21: gnas kyi nye 'khor gyi skyed mos tshal gyi shing zhig gi drung du gos shig gting nas nyal zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-22: de'i tshe rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba nad kyis thebs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-25: nad g-yog rnams kyis gso bar ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-26: de shi ste rgyal po rabs chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-27: 'di ni rgyal po'i chos nyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-28: ji srid du gzhan rgyal por dbang ma bskur ba de srid du rgyal po'i ro mi 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-29: ci tsam na blon po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:85b-32: ltas mkhan rnams gal te bsod nams kyi dbang cher grags pa'i sems can 'ga' zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-1: go ;zhes phan tshun tshol zhing song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-2: de rnams kyis btsal ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-3: grong khyer gyi phyi rol shing drung zhig na khye'u gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-4: blta na sdug pa; mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-6: nyi ma yol yang shing gi grib ma shar phyogs su mi 'khor bar de'i lus mi gtong ba zhig nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-7: de nas blon po drug po de rnams kyis de mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'gyur te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-8: bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can 'di las gzhan bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-12: mtshan dang ldan pa zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-13: 'di ni rgyal srid la gzhag par 'os so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-14: zhes gcig tu nges par byas nas; bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-18: de yang langs te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-23: rgyal po nyal ba de ltar bslang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-24: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-29: rol mo'i sgra mi drag pas bslang mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-30: de rnams kyis de thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-31: 'di snyam du 'di ni rigs dma' ba las byung ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86a-32: 'di nges par rigs mthon po las skyes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-0: de nas khye'u @86b gzhon nu des kyang seng ge bzhin du bsgyings nas rang gi rigs smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-1: lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa zhes bya ba de'i bu ni bza' btung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-2: bza' btung de'i bu ni bza' btung mang po zhes bya ste nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-3: de nas blon po drug po rnams 'dzum phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-4: bdag cag gis ni bdag cag nyid kyi gzhon nu rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-6: de nas gnas de nyid nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-10: shis par brjod pa la sogs pas mdun du drangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-11: grong khyer du bcug nas rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-12: gang gi phyir 'dis rgyal po'i brgyud chad pa bsabs pa de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-13: ming skyed pa kho nar btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-14: de'i ming bza' btung mang po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-15: de nas de rgyal srid byed du bcug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-17: blon po rnams kyis de khyad du bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-18: de la dbang cung zad kyang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-19: de nas dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-20: rgyal po bza' btung mang po yul bltar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-23: tshong dus rnams bltas nas grong dang grong khyer dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-24: ri bor pa 'di rnams su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-25: de dag gis blon po drug kho na'i lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-30: zhes de skad du gang dang gang la dris pa de dag thams cad de skad zer bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:86b-31: bdag lta zhig bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-2: gzhan ci la yang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-3: snyam du rang gis rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-4: de sems khong gi rgya mtshor chud nas 'di ji ltar bya zhes sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-5: de de ltar sems pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-6: lha zhig gis rgyal po mi dga' bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-7: 'di ltar khyod nyid kyi yul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-8: ri bor gang po'i mtshan zhes bya ba de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-9: sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-10: bu sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-11: de khyod kyi blon por chug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-12: des yul bdag gir byas nas khyod la 'bul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-17: de nas bza' btung mang pos mi dag mngags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-18: ri bor gang po'i mtshan de na sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de tshol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-20: de'i chung ma la bu yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-22: de dag song ste mthong nas dris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-23: des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-24: de dag slar 'ongs nas rgyal po la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-25: rgyal po sna la gtogs pa de mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-26: de'i mchis brang yang sbrum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-27: de nas rgyal pos yi ge spring ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-28: gang po bkug nas bshes pa'i tshig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-29: de la ri bor de byin nas 'dis rang gi bu ma'i lto na 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongs su skyongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87a-30: ci nas kyang de yan lag gang yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-0: de @87b nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-2: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-3: ci 'byor pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-4: khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-6: bdag 'di lta yun ring du nad bu can du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-9: nad g-yog rnams kyis nad zhi bar bya ma nus pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-10: gang gi tshe khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa de nyid nas nad zhi bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-11: des na 'di'i ming sman chen por gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-13: sman rnams kun gyi nang na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-14: bdag gi bu ni sman chen po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-15: 'di ni sman pas lhag pa'i sman /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-16: de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-17: de nas sman chen po pha'i phrag pa la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-18: khrus bya ba'i phyir srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-19: re zhig na sa'i steng na nya'i dum bu zhig 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-20: des de la rin po che yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-21: de'i rkang pa'i mthe bos sa steng nas blang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-22: ji tsam na sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-23: pha gcig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-24: las btang mig mi 'dzum par nya dum la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-25: rtog cing de nas rin chen yin par sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-26: pha gcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-27: nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-28: rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-29: de nas de rdzing du song nas gang pos sman chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-31: khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:87b-32: padma'i steng na chu skyar zhig 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-1: chu skyar de bzung ngo snyam nas de de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-3: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-6: padma'i steng nas chu skyar mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-7: 'phur ba re zhig pha gcig gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-8: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-9: des sman chen po phrag pa la khyer nas chu bo gangg'ar khrus byed du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-10: des de dang gos chu 'gram du bzhag nas chur zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-12: khar gzhong zhig chu bos khyer ba de'i steng na ngang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-13: de mthong nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-14: chu bo gangg'as khar gzhong khyer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-15: khar gzhong de steng ngang mo 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-16: khar gzhong ngang mo lhan cig tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-17: gangg'as khyer ba pha gcig gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-18: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-19: sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-20: re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs su bum pa zhig khyer ba de'i steng na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-21: chu sreg zhig 'dug pa de mthong nas; sman chen pos pha la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-22: chu bo gangg'as bum pa khyer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-23: de yi steng na chu sreg 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-24: re zhig pha gcig bum pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-25: chu sreg gangg'a bcas te gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-26: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed par 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-28: des sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88a-29: der khrus byed pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-0: re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs @88b su lug thug cig khyer ba de'i steng na bya dkar zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-1: de nas de sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-2: chu bo gangg'as lug thug khyer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-3: de bzhin de steng bya dkar 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-4: lug thug bya dkar lhan cig tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-5: gangg'as khyer ba yab gcig gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-6: de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las re zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-8: da rgyal por bcug go ;des kyang kha cig blon por bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-9: de de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-10: ji tsam na bram ze rgan po zhig chung ma gzhon nu dar la bab pa zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-11: khyo shug lhan cig tu lam du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-12: re zhig na bram ze bshang gci'i sar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-13: de nas g-yon can pho zhig gis 'phrigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-14: bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-15: bzang mo khyod kyi pha de gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-18: de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-19: des mes po yin pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-22: de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-23: de khyod kyi mes po yin pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-27: yang mes kyang ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-28: de ni nga'i khyo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-29: de nas g-yon can gyis cung zad cig bgad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:88b-31: ngo tsha shes pa gzhan gyi drung du 'di lta bu nga'i khyo yin no zhes smra ba ngo mi tsha'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-0: sa skal ba ldan pa 'di'i steng na skyes bu lha'i gzugs 'dra @89a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-1: bas rab tu gang ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-2: 'di lta bu'i gzugs mdzes pa chud zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-4: tshur bdag cag dang lhan cig 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-5: gal te khyod kyi phyir bram ze rgan po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-7: der yang khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po la nga'i khyo 'di yin no zhes nga khyo yin par phye zhig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-8: de dang g-yon can 'grogs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-9: bram ze yang bshang gci dang bkru bshal byas nas langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-11: re zhig na sgang bu mthon po zhig gi steng du 'dzegs nas bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-12: skyes pa gzhan zhig dang 'grogs te song ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-13: bram ze des brgyugs te lag pa ya gcig gis bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-14: g-yon can gyis kyang lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-15: de nas bram zes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-16: nga'i chung ma ci'i phyir dbrog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-20: bram zes kyang nga'i yin no zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-21: de gnyis lam kar 'thab mo byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-24: g-yon can de dar la bab pas stobs che nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-25: bram ze las drangs te phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-26: de nas bram ze bcom pas 'brog der bram zer ma byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-27: ra mda' log ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89a-28: de'i tshe sman chen po byis pa rnams dang lhan cig dgon pa na rtse zhing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-0: bram zer ma byas so zhes bya ba de yang byis pa @89b dag gis thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-1: de nas byis pa de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-2: kye sman chen po khyod cig na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-4: bram ze pha bi bram zer ma byas so zhes 'bod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-5: de ci'i phyir 'jigs pa las mi bskyab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-6: de nas des byis pa rnams la song ste khrid la shog ces bkye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-7: byis pa de dag gis de kun khrid de 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-8: 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-10: bdag grogs ma mchis shing nyam chung ba'i chung ma g-yon can stobs po che 'dis phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-13: 'di ni bdag gi chung ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-14: bud med des kyang bdag gi khyo 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-15: zhes g-yon can de nyid yin par phye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:89b-16: de nas sman chen pos bram ze de ma 'os par yi chad par shes nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-8: de rnams kyang byed du mi gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-9: de nas sman chen pos sbad gnyis shig la bslabs te btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-10: khyod grong khyer chen por rgyal po las mi ring ba zhig tu song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-11: shing gi gzhong khung gcig ltor chor la gos kyis dkris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-12: sa la phar 'gre tshur 'gre zhing du ba ltar byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-13: de nas khye'u khyod kyis phyogs kun tu gsol ba thob la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-16: bshos kyis phyogs bcur gtor la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-18: bkra shis par bu phyung zhig ces brjod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-19: der sbad gnyis ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-20: yul purna ka tstsha'i grong rdal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-21: rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-22: mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-23: ji ltar bstan pa'i chos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-24: smre zhing du ba la sogs pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-25: gang 'jig rten na 'jig rten skyong bas bdag gi pha 'di srungs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-26: bde zhing legs la bkra shis pa bu btsas bar shog cig ces de skad du bos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-27: rgyal po skyed pas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94a-28: de rtogs shig ces mi zhig btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-0: skyes pa zhig gsus pa che la sa la 'gre ldog @94b cing du ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-1: de'i bu yang gshin rje dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-3: ngal bso po dang bcas pa la sogs pa lha'i dbang po rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-4: de dag gis de ci'i phyir zhes dris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-5: de nas khye'us bdag gi pha las bu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-6: de dag gis dong nas rgyal po la gsol ba dang /
