K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-7: rgyal pos de sbad gnyis pos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-8: khye'u des bdag gi pha las bu 'byung bar shog cig ces de bzhin du smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-9: de nas rgyal pos bgad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-10: gang na yang 'di ltar skyes pa las bu byung ba ni ma thos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-13: de nas khye'u des lha khyod de bzhin du gsungs pa bzhin lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-15: de nas khye'u des de ltar na ci'i slad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-16: purna katstsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du glang lnga brgya bdas ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-21: chur bdag kyang skur cig ces byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-22: khyod kyis glang sbrum ste pu byung ba gang na gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-23: gang nas gsan ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-24: de nas rgyal pos bgad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-25: ci gang po'i yid brtan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-29: pho nyas lha sman chen po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-32: blon po rnams kyis shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan par bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-33: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:94b-34: rgyal pos bgam pa'i phyir pho nya dre'u zhig bkri ste btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-0: purna katstsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du @95a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-2: gang po la dre'u 'di ma bcing bar srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-3: bla gab yod par yang ma gzhug par 'tshos shig ces bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-4: pho nya de rim bzhin purna katstsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-5: gang po la khyod kyis dre'u 'di srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-6: de lta bu'i tshul las brgya la shor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-7: lus la chad pas cher gcod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-9: de de skad thos nas skrag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-10: de dag thams cad byar rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-12: des bdag la 'di 'dra ba bka' stsal pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-13: lhas kyang de 'dra bar byed mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-15: rab tu sems shing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-16: sman chen pos pha rab tu sems pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-17: mi dga' bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-19: dre'u de nyin mo ni gzas la ci bder btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-20: nub mo ni mi nyi shus bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-21: mi lnga lngas mel tshe thun re re byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-22: rkang lag la mi re res bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-23: dre'u de'i steng du rtag par mi zhig zhon te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-24: thabs de lta bur mi nyi shus bla gab med pa na srung zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-25: rgyal po skyed pas mngag gzhug byed pa'i mi zhig gang po'i drung du de ji ltar 'tsho ba ltos shig ces rtog tu btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-27: rgyal po la lha 'di lta bu'i thabs su bgyid do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-29: rgyal po de ltar bsrung na 'bros mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95a-30: mi de rnams las gcig kha drang ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-0: gang kha drang bar @95b bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-1: rgyal pos nub mo steng na zhon pa de kha drangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-3: de khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-4: de nas rgyal pos steng na zhon pa de kha drangs nas des kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-7: gang po la dre'u de bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-9: de nga ni bdag gi 'tsho ba ma rung bar gyur to zhes skrag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-10: smre sngags 'don par byed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-12: zhes de mi dga' zhing 'dug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-14: de yang sems pa la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-15: thabs de dag thams cad thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'di'i thabs ni mi snang zhes smra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-16: de yang skrag nas de'i thabs sems pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-17: des pha la khyod kyis don de bsgrub par nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-18: thabs cig yod do zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-19: phas ci zhig yod ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-20: sman chen pos ci nas bdag nyid la mtho btsam par bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-21: gdod don de bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-23: de nas gang pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-24: ci nas bdag gi 'tsho ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-25: de nas sman chen pos pha'i mgo bo skra khrem gnyer bdun du bregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-29: dkar po la sogs pas mgo ri mo byas nas bong bu la skyon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-30: rim gyis grong khyer chen por dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-32: zhes kun tu sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:95b-33: des pha'i mgo bo khrem gnyer bdun du bregs shing bong bu la zhon te 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-2: so;/ de nas rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-3: blon po dag gis de lta bur gyur pa thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-6: zhes gtam snyan pa thams cad du grags pa ni legs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-7: ci'i phyir na des mi rigs pa 'di lta bu byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-8: de nas rgyal po skyed pa blon po dang 'khor du bcas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-9: sman chen po ltar dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-12: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas de lta bu mngon sum du mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-14: rgyal po la lha ci'i phyir sman chen po la mkhas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-17: zhes bsngags te; des mi rigs pa 'di lta bu bgyid pa ganga'am zhes gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-18: de nas rgyal pos sman chen po ci 'di lta bu phal mtho btsam par byas zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-20: lha 'di ni mtho 'tsham pa ma lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-22: bdag kyang pha bas shin tu mang du 'tshal bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-23: bdag kyang pha bas shin tu mang du 'tshal bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-24: bdag gis 'di la rnam par mchod par bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-33: ngas gang du yang ma thos ma mthong mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-35: mas ni bu gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96a-38: de bas na ded kyis ni ci nas pha bzang ba yin no snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-0: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po la @96b yang pha de ltar lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-2: shin tu rtogs shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-4: blon pos de bzhin yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-5: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-6: lha de ltar lags mod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-7: lhas bdag cag la dre'u 'tshor stsal pa de bros te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-8: lha dang blon po rnams kyis bka' stsal pa yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-9: pha rab tu bzang ngo zhes bstod na; dre'u de'i pha ni bong bu 'di lags na skyin par bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-12: blon pos de'i tshig gis thabs de lta bur sbyar bar thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-14: ae ma'o zhes de rigs pa dang mi rigs par bya ba 'di lta bu mkhas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-15: de lta bu khong du chud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-18: rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-19: rnam pa mang po'i rgyan klubs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-21: pha la yang ri brags kyi grong khyer de byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-23: bye ma bkal ba 'bras chan dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-24: ae randa yi shing dang glang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-25: dre'u dang de ru song ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-26: de la blon po'i thabs byin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-27: de nas sman chen po blon po'i dbang byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-29: rgyal po'i don ji ltar bya zhes rab tu bde bar sems pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-30: grong khyer kun tu yang sman chen po blon por bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-31: mdzangs pa mkhas pa'i sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:96b-32: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-0: bram ze zhig gi bu mo zhig bag mar blangs pa'i yo byad du nor mang @97a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-2: de dang lhan cig zhag mang zhig tu yongs su spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-3: bdag gis bag ma blangs pa'i yo byad du nor mang du zad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-4: da ni 'di ltar nor du gyur pa chen po med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-5: khyim na 'dug na ma legs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-7: bram ze de kha ton mang du lobs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-9: smrang gi yan lag dang ldan par pha rol tu phyin pa nor bsgrub pa'i phyir ljongs gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-10: de yang de nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-11: des gser gyi dong tse gna' ma lnga brgya rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-12: de khyer nas slar bdag gi khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-13: des bdag sngar nor khyer nas khyim du mi 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-14: bud med kyi sems kyi spyod pa sus kyang mi rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-15: bram ze mo de yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-16: bzang bas na bdag med pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-17: skyes pa gzhan dang chags shing 'dug kyang srid kyi snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-18: des nam sros pa dang dur khrod du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-19: shing n+ya dro dha'i drung du khung brkos nas de'i nang du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-20: nam sros nas khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-21: chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan bram ze rna bo che zhes bya ba de la chags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-22: de'i tshe na lhan cig kha zas zhim po zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-23: dri bsung zhim pos lus byugs te nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-24: mal gyi steng na de gnyis dga' ba myong zhing 'khod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-25: bram ze de yang bdag gi khyim du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97a-26: sgo phye zhes bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-1: 'di skad kye khyed su zhig ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-2: des bdag gi ming phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-3: mo nyid kyis dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-5: rna bo che nyal ba bslang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-8: des khyo la g-yo byed cing rjes byas te 'ongs nas sgo phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-12: bram ze de za zhing 'di ni skyes pa gzhan zhig la chags par nges pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-13: 'di ltar mtshan mo kha zas 'di lta bu sbyar ro snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-14: de yang drang ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-15: de la kye bzang mo tshes grangs khyad par can ni ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-17: grong khyer gyi dus kyi ston mo la ni ma bab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-18: bza' ba 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-19: bdag la lhas khyod kyi khyo de 'ong ngo zhes bstan pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-20: khyod kyi phyir 'di ltar sta gon bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-22: bram ze ae ma'o nga ni bsod nams can du bas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-23: bdag gi chung ma'i rmi lam du yang lhas bstan pa lta zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-24: des zan zos nas khrus byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-25: mal du nyal nas gcig la gcig mdza' bas bde ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-26: nyon ma mongs sam zhes gtam 'dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-27: de nas chung mas jo bos cung zad mchis sam zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-30: de nas chung mas brda tshig tu smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:97b-31: 'di ni ci zer ba rna bas nyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-1: lnga brgya po bdag la ma bstan na gar bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-8: de nas bud med des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-9: bdag khyod kyi lus phyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-11: bram ze rang bzhin gyis drang bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-12: grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu bzhag go zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-15: sa phyogs gang du bzhag ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-16: bram ze des dur khrod kyi shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du sa brkos te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-18: de nas bram ze mo des jo bo lam nas brdabs brdabs te mnyel ba bdag gis kyang gtses te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-19: da khyod mnol cig ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-20: de nas gnyid kyis log par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-21: rna bo che la gang khyod kyis thos pa de myur du bsgrubs zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-22: de nas rna bo che dal bus 'jab cing khyim de nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-24: des ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du dur khrod kyi shing n+ya gro dha'i drung nas de blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-25: rna bo che bdag gi khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-26: bram ze de de'i phyi de nyin par langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-27: dur khrod du song nas bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-28: de'i phyogs nas ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-29: de nas mgo dang brang rdung zhing khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98a-33: phu nu dag gis ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-0: des gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya bslangs nas khyer te 'ongs nas khar @98b tshang mi rgyun chad pa'i dus su dur khrod du brkos te bzhag nas khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-1: de ring bdag gis btsal na mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-3: de dag gis sman chen po'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-5: mkhas shing shes pa brtags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-6: dpyad pa yang rtogs shing don rnams la rjes su dpog pas rig gi de la skyabs su song zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-7: des gal te thob par byed kyang srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-8: skyabs gzhan ni mi snang ngo zhes bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-9: de nas bram ze de gdong la mchi ma 'dzag cing du bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-10: sman chen po'i drung du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-12: tshe ring bar shog ces brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-14: lha 'di ltar bdag gis bslangs pa 'tshal te mchis nas khar tshang mi rgyun chad pa'i dus na dur khrod du brkos te sbas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-16: deng bdag slar der mchis na ma rnyed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-17: de nas blon po'i mchog sman chen po de ji lta bu zhig ces skad cig cang mi smra bar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-18: bram ze de la kye bram ze khyod kyis phyogs gang du bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-21: kha cig la smras pa lta med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-23: des ji ltar gyur ba zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-24: de nas yang bram ze mo de skyes pa gzhan la chags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-25: de'i sgyu yin par gdon mi za'o zhes bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-26: bram ze de dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-27: khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:98b-28: de med na bdag nyid kyi nor las sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-1: ze dbugs phyung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-2: khyod kyi khyim na khyi lta yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-3: bram ze des mchis so zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-4: song la bram ze brgyad bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-5: bzhi ni khyod kyis bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-6: bzhi ni chung ma la khyod kyis bos shig ces bsgo la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-8: bdag khyim du slar dge zhing bkra shis par 'khor na bram ze brgyad la zas sbyin par lha dbang phyug gi spyan sngar khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-10: de nas de khyim du song ba chung ma la bdag lam du zhugs te song ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-11: lha'i spyan sngar ji ste dge zhing bkra shis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-13: bram ze brgyad la zan sbyin par dam bcas pa de da bod kyi khyod kyis ni bzhi pos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-14: bdag gis kyang bzhi bod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-15: de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan nas bram ze des bzhi bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-16: bram ze mos kyang bzhi mgron du bos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-17: de ltar mgron du bos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-18: sman chen po'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-21: de nas yang sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-22: nam de dag khyim du khrid pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-23: bdag gi drung nas mi 'di khrid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-24: de dag nang du dong ba'i tshe sgor zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-25: zan za ba'i tshe ci yang byed du ma gzhug par mdun du zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-26: mi de la yang khyod kyis mtshan ma rnams bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-27: de dag nang du 'jug pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-28: bram ze gang la khyi zug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99a-29: gang la mjug ma 'dril bar 'gyur ba ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-0: khyi'i tshul ni 'di lta bu'o zhes @99b de la bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-1: bram ze de la yang khyod kyis bram ze rnams la ma 'brim par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-2: bram ze mo de nyid 'brim du chug cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-3: mi de la yang khyod kyis brtag pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-4: bram ze mo de 'brim pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-6: mig btsugs shing lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-7: dgod cing tshig 'byin la lhag par 'grim pa rnams shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-10: bram ze des mi de khrid de sgo drung du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-11: bram ze mo la khyod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-12: bram ze gang mgron du bos pa de dag khyod nyid kyis bos shig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-13: rang gis gang mgron du bos pa de dag kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-14: bdag nyid kyis bos so; ;de dag rim gyis nang du song ba la khyi zugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-15: nam rna bo che de 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-16: khyi des kha bltas nas rna ba phab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-17: mjug ma 'dril nas phyi bzhin du 'brangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-18: nang du zhugs nas khyi 'dris pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-19: rgyal po'i mi des rna bo che 'di yin par shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-20: de nas des zas 'brim pa la bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-21: bram ze mo de 'brim pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-22: rna bo che de la smin ma'i brda byed cung zad dgod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-24: de dang lhan cig gtam zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-25: lhag par yang der 'brim pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-26: de nas rgyal po'i mi des ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-29: zhes sman chen po la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-30: sman chen pos de thos ma thag tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-31: rna bo che khug cig ces rgyal po'i mi btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:99b-33: sman chen pos de la gzhan gyi nor dbrog par bya ba de lta bu ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-2: khyod kyis khyer ba de slar byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-4: des sdig bzhi par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-5: bdag gis de yod ma 'tshal to zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-6: de nas sman chen pos mi rnams la ngan pa can 'di btson rar chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-7: ji nas rus pa byung ba de lta bur nan la bor cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-8: de de lta bus bsdigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-9: 'jigs skrag shin tu gdungs pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-11: bdag gis de slar dbul lo zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-12: de nas rna bo che de dag gis khyim nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-13: gser gyi dong tse gna' ma lnga brgya bo ji ltar bcings pa bzhin du khyer te 'ongs nas sman chen po la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-14: de nas sman chen pos kyang bram ze de la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-15: de nas bram ze de dga' mgu nas yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-16: de nas bram ze de 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-17: bdag gi gser gyi dong tse gna' ma lnga brgya po med pa las slar rnyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-18: thams cad kyang sman chen po'i mthu yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-19: ji nas bdag gis de la bkur sti bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-21: sman chen po bdag la byams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-22: bdag gis kyang lan glan par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-23: des gser gyi dong tse gna' ma de dag las phyed khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-24: sman chen po'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-25: skyes 'di bzhes shig ces phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-26: sman chen pos kyang blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-27: de nyid la slar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100a-28: de'i snyan pas kyang grong khyer der khyab par byur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-0: rgyal po dang @100b blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-1: grong khyer ba rnams kyis kyang de mkhas pa dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-2: zhes bya ba'i sgra kun tu bsgrags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-3: bdag cag bsod nams dang ldan pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-4: 'di 'dra ba'i blon po bdog go snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-5: de nas gzhan zhig rang gi don zhig gi phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-6: yul gzhan du song song ba las slar log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-8: phye'i rkyal pa kha phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-11: zan zos nas rkyal pa kham bcings bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-12: phyi rol gyi sar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-14: sprul reg na gdug pa'i dug can de'i rkyal ba'i nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-15: mi de slar 'ongs te des ma bltas par rkyal pa'i kha bcings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-16: phrag pa la thogs nas grong khyer chen por phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-17: de nas ltas mkhan zhig gis rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'tsho ba dang bral du nye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-19: mi des kyang slar log ste de la bltas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-20: de nas de la tshig de skad thos pa'i 'og tu ci'i phyir bdag gis ltas mkhan de la ma dris zhes 'gyod pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-21: de the tshom skyes nas bdag gis don de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-22: blon po sman chen po la ma dris kyi bar du khyim du mi 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-24: de sman chen po'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-25: 'di ltar bdag grong khyer du mchi ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-26: ltas mkhan gyis 'di ltar lung bstan pa'i don de dag smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-27: de la slar bdag gis ni ma dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:100b-28: de bas na khyod la gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-1: des ji lta bur gyur pa zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-3: rkyal ba'i nang du sbrul reg na gdug pa yod yang dag gis ltas mkhan des kyang de'i phyir smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-5: de nas sman chen pos skye bo mang po'i mngon sum du rkyal pa 'di kha khrol la rgyang ma nas shing gis kha phye shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-7: de lta bur byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-8: sbrul reg na gdug pa de de'i nang nas mgo ni bteg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-10: lce ni bskyod bzhin du phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-11: sman chen pos khyod kyi dogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-12: de nas sman chen po yul blta ba'i phyir yan lag bzhi'i stobs mang po rnams go bskon te phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-17: grong 'dab 'di su'i yin zhes dris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-18: yul na gnas pa dag gis 'di blon po che ge mo zhig gi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-19: 'di ni 'di dag gi'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-20: de nas sman chen pos brtags te bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-21: 'di ltar yul thams cad blon po drug gis kun rnogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-22: rgyal po skyed pa bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-23: btung ba tsam 'ba' zhig la dbang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-25: de de nas sman chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-28: grong khyer rnams su dbang zhes gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101a-29: rgyal pos de ji ltar bya ba de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-0: snying brtse ba'i lha rnams kyis @101b bdag la bstan pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-1: pu rna katstsha'i ri brags kyi grong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-2: gang po zhes bya ba'i bu sman chen po khyod kyi blon por chug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-3: khyod kyi yul rnams rgyas par byas pas 'dul bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-4: de'i tshe na khyod nyid kyang thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes lung bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-5: khyod ni 'di lta bur dgos pa'i phyir bdag gis rum na 'dug tshun chad du bde ba'i yo byad kyis bskyed pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-6: da lta na yang blon po'i mchog tu bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-7: da ni lha'i tshig gis khyod bdag gis blos ci lcogs pa ston pa ci nas bdag rgyal po'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar byos shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-8: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa la phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-9: thugs brtan par mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-10: ji ltar bdag gis lha mnyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-12: de nas sman chen po yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-15: ri brags kyi grong de dag na gtso bo gang yin pa de rnams dbyen bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-16: so sor phye nas ci nas khyed bdag la dga' bar gyur pa de lta bur bdag gis bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-17: blon po de dag ni 'dod chen che bas dpya nar ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-18: bla skyes dag kyang mi rigs par 'bebs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-21: 'di ltar bdag gi tshig bzhin du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-22: bdag gis kyang khong du chud par bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:101b-24: gzhan yang bde bar dgod cing bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-1: khyed cag mi mthun par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-2: khyed mi mthun par byas pa las ji ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-4: blon po rnams lhags na yang bdag med kyi bar du de dag gi dbang du ma 'gro bar 'di skad smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-5: ci ste blon po'i mchog sman chen po 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-6: de la bdag cag gis blon po'i dbang du bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-7: gzhan la ma yin no zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-8: de nas des 'di lta bu'i rigs pa sngar sbyar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-9: yul de dag kun mi mthun par byed cing byed du bcug pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-10: bka' rnams kyang gcog par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-11: de nas blon po de dag gis rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-12: 'di ltar rgyal po skyed pas blon po drug po de dag nyid yan lag bzhi'i stobs mang po dang lhan cig bkye yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-14: ri brags kyi grong gcig la yang dbang byed ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-15: de nas rgyal po la lha nyid ma byon na 'di dag dbang du bgyir mi nus so zhes pho nya btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-16: de nas rgyal po nyid 'ongs kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-17: ri brags kyi grong gcig kyang dbang byar ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-18: 'thab pas mang zhig shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-20: blon po drug po de dag kyang mi dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-21: de nas ri brags kyi grong mi dag gis dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-23: de'i ngag nyan cing de'i dbang bzhin du bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-24: bdag cag rgyal po skyed pa dang mi mthun par bgyid pa ni ma lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102a-25: blon po rnams bdag cag la gnod par bgyid pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-1: sman chen po la nged kyis yul rnams phebs par mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-2: khyod tshur shog cig ces pho nya btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-3: de nas sman chen pos yi ge mthong ma thag tu rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so; ;de mthong nas yul gyi mi kun gyis phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-4: yul mi de rnams la ma 'jigs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-8: skyabs med pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung ba byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-10: grong khyer ba rnams la pha ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-12: rang gi skye bo bzhin bkur sti dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-13: bya dgas kun snyoms par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-14: phang nas 'khyud do; ;de nas yul na gnas pa'i rgan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-16: bud med de dag thams cad kyis kyang sman chen po la bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-17: bdag gi ming po bzhin du blta bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-18: des kyang thams cad la sems dga' bar byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-19: de nas mthar gyis yul thams cad gcig tu bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-20: rgyal po skyed pa dang lhan cig slar rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-21: de lta bu'i las byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-22: rgyal po gzhan dag la yang snyan pa'i sgra grags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-23: de nas rgyal po mnyes pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-24: bdag gi bu mo sman chen po'i chung mar byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-25: de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-26: de nas yang yul gzhan zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-27: rgyal po'i longs spyod nyams pa gzhan zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-28: rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:102b-29: rgyal po skyed pas kyang de ma 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-2: des snying rje ba'i dbang gis blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-4: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-6: de nas bre gang zhig blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-8: bang ka ba la gtad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-10: gnangs sbyin pa las ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-11: de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po la blon po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-13: ljongs pa dag gis bskor te mi mang po phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-16: gsang ba ni su la smra bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-17: gang la yid brtan par bya; zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-18: de nas blon po de dag sems pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-19: de dag las gcig gis ni mdza' bo la smra bar rigs so zhes byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-20: kha cig gis ni lha de'i chung ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-22: kha cig gis ni sring mo la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-23: kha cig gis ni pha la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-24: kha cig gis ni phu nu la'o zhes gzhan dag gis de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-25: rgyal pos sman chen po la gzhan dag gis ni ji ltar bsams pa bzhin smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-26: khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi smra zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-29: lha bdag gis ni 'di snyam du bsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-30: gsang ba de ni su la yang bgyi bar mi rigs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-31: chung ma la lta ci smos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-32: de ni bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar mngon par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-34: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103a-35: rgyal po'i rma bya stor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-0: sman @103b chen pos btsal te phyogs gzhan zhig tu sbas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-1: de dang 'dra ba gzhan zhig bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-2: chung ma la khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang nas rma bya stor pa thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-4: des kyang bdag gis thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-6: sman chen pos khyod kyis su la yang ma zer bar 'di myur du tshos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-8: des ri brags kyi grong mi 'dis rgyal po'i rma bya za ba ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-9: bdag gis pha ni 'di la shin tu yid brtan par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-10: 'di ni rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed do snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-11: yang re zhig na rgyal po de'i btsun mo 'dra ba bud med smad 'tshong ma zhig rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-12: bdag gi bud med kyi nang du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-13: chung ma la 'di ni rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di zhes bya ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-14: bdag 'di la shin tu yid brtan gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-16: su la yang ma zer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-18: de nas rgyal po'i bu mo de 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-19: sman chen po dang lhan cig tu 'dug go snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-21: pha la 'phya nas bdag gi pha 'di lta bu don la rtog pa ci yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-22: ri brags kyi grong mi rigs ngan pa las byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-23: blon po'i mchog tu bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-24: ngan pa 'di la rgyal po'i don thams cad gtad pa ga la rigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:103b-25: de ci nas sngon gyi gnas rnying par bzhag pa de lta bur bya'o zhes bsams te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-0: pha yab kyis ngan pa de lta bu ma brtags par blon @104a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-2: yid brtan par bgyis pa ga la rigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-3: des 'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo la glo ba rangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-4: yab kyi btsun mo 'di zhes bgyi ba dang lhan cig tu spyad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-5: rgyal po'i rma bya de yang 'dis zos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-6: yul gzhan nas mi 'ongs pa rnams kyang bsnyen cing yo byad kun sbyor bar bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-7: yab ni rtag tu yang bdag la sman chen po 'di thams cad pas sdug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-8: 'di las yid du 'ong ba med do zhes gsung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-9: de ni 'di lta bu mi bgyi ba rnams bgyid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-10: ji lta bu yin mkhyen par gyis shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-11: de nas rgyal pos don de dag brtag pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-12: gshed ma'i mi rnams la sod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-14: de nas rigs ngan de dag gis shing kar bi ri'i me tog gis phreng ba ni mgul du btags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-15: bong skad lta bu'i rnga brdungs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-19: mtshon thogs pa gshin rje'i mi lta bu'i rigs ngan rnams kyis dur khrod du khrid mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-20: de gsad par ni gang yang mi 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-21: grong khyer gyi skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-22: ljongs pa rnams ni mig nas mchi ma 'dzag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-23: bdag gi bu bsad pa ltar sdug bsngal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-25: lha dag la yang gsol pa 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104a-27: sman chen pos rgyal rigs dbul po bsnyen cing longs spyod bgos te byin pa de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-0: rgyal po'i mi rnams la bdag cag gis @104b 'di bsad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-1: khyed cag slar log cig ces smras so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-4: ji tsam na grong khyer nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-5: bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' ma nas 'jus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-6: khyod kyis nas bre gang sbyin par byas pa de byin la song zhig ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-7: sman chen pos gnas der tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-8: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-9: gdol pa la ni bshes pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-10: bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-11: rma bya'i sha ni bza' mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-12: bram ze mong rtul po yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-13: nas bre gang yang chags mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-14: des de skad smra zhing song ba dang; de nas gshed ma mi rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-17: rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-20: kho bo ni mi bla ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-25: 'on kyang sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dgos pa smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-28: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-29: ces bya ba rgya cher ro; ;des yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-30: lha gsol bar 'tshal na re zhig gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-32: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-33: ces gang smras pa ni sngon lha grong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-35: grong rdal rnams kyi don gang la yang mi mnga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-36: khyod gang gi phyir de skad smra ba smras pa de'i don khyod kyis ma go bar zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:104b-38: rgyal po skyed pa la sman chen po ji zhig bla na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-0: de bla ba zlos su stsal @105a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-3: de nas rgyal pos bos nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-6: slas gang dag lags pa de la mnga' ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-7: lha deng sang sa la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-11: dmag la mnga' mdzad par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu bdag gis bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-12: bdag la khyod kyis sngon byas pa gzo ba nyid ma dgongs par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-14: de'i slad du bdag 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-15: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-17: gdol pa la ni bshes pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-18: ces bgyi ba ni; lha gdol ba mal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-20: rgyal po skyed pas bdag la 'tsho ba'i yo byad byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-21: des bdag 'tsho bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-22: lha'i drung du mchis pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-23: lhas yongs su ma bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-24: bdag gis ni bkren pa'o snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-25: yul nas 'khyams pa'o snyam nas bgo bsha' bgyis pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-26: 'di ltar deng sang bde bar gyur pa lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-27: deng bdag dgum pa'i slad du chas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-28: de'i slad du bdag 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-29: gdol pa la ni bshes pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-31: bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-33: rgyal po dus gcig na 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-34: tshig 'di skad du ji ltar su la yid gcugs par bya zhes gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105a-35: de na blon po rnams kyis pha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-0: zhes gang @105b la smra bar bgyi ba de smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-1: lhas kyang chung ma la brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-2: 'di ltar chung ma ni lus kyi phyed yin pas de'i phyir brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-4: de nas bdag gis don 'di lha'i spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-5: bgam pa'i slad du rgyal po'i rma bya sbas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-6: rma bya gzhan zhig blangs te 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-7: slas las kyang slas che ge mo zhig las rgyan btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-8: smad 'tshong ma che ge mo zhig gi mgul du btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-10: lha smad 'tshong ma de yang gzigs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-11: de nas rgyal pos bkug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-13: smad 'tshong ma phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-19: gcig la yang khyad par dmigs pa ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-20: cig shos la yang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-21: de nas rgyal pos brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-22: bdag gis sman chen po ni nyes pa med par khong du chud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-23: bram ze mong rtul po yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-24: nas bre gang yang chags mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-26: bdag lhas dgum par btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-27: gshed ma pa rnams kyis khrid pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-28: des nas bre gang byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-29: ces nas bre gang gi don du gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung bas de'i slad du bdag gis de skad smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-30: de nas rgyal po don de thams cad mngon sum du bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-31: dga' ste bkrol nas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:105b-32: de nas rgyal po la phyag byas nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-0: lha khyod kyis bud med rnams kyi gsang @106a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-3: bdag la yong dgos pa ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-7: shes rab bdag dang 'dra ba de kho na lta bu'i mchis brang zhig blang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-8: des rgyal po la gnang ba gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-9: bdag nyid bram ze'i cha byad du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-10: lag pa g-yas pa bya ma bum thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-11: lus mchod phyir thogs kyis mdzes par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-12: lus la ri dvags kyi pags pa gos su bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-13: gdong la byug ris gsum byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-14: ri bor nags kyi tshang tshing can ga la ba der bu mo btsal ba'i phyir chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-15: ji tsam na lam gyi bar du grong zhig tu mun sros par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-16: tha gi tsam na bram ze zhig gis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-19: lus 'phags pa'i ljongs nas so; ;gang du 'gro bar sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-20: nags kyi tshang tshing can du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-21: ci gang gi khyim du brang gdab pa'i ngo shes 'ga' khyod la yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-24: de nas des khyim du khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-25: tshul dang mthun pa'i 'byor pas phu dud byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-26: des de'i chung ma la yang 'di ni skyes pa gzhan la chags pas rung ba ma yin no zhes 'phrigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-27: de phyi de nyin dris nas chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106a-31: phan tshun 'gro ba'i tshe phyin pa na rang gi khyim bzhin du soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-0: ji tsam @106b na lam gyi bar zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-1: nas kyi zhing zhig yod pa de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-2: bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la rigs btsun pa shin tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhig mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-3: mthong nas kyang de'i yid de la zhen to; ;de nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-4: bzang mo khyod gang zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-11: gang zhig grong thams cad kyi shing sgrub par byed pa'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-12: de nas sman chen pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-13: 'di byad ni bzang mo zhig yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-14: da re zhig blo ci 'dra ba blo bgam par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-15: de nas de gro zhing zhig tu zhugs te lag pa bsgreng nas lag pa phangs par bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-17: de nas sa gas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-18: mkhan po ji ltar lag pa phangs pa de bzhin du khyod kyi rkang pa gnyis kyang phangs par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-20: bu mo 'di ni mdzangs ma zhig go snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-21: de nas yang bram zes bgad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-22: bu mo khyod kyis rna cha gdub kor sdu gu zhig ste shin tu lhang de'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-24: mkhan po rna ba gnyis dgab pa'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-25: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-27: blta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-29: grong gi bdag po rnams kyi bka' drin gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-33: lam gcig gnyis su bgyid du mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:106b-34: tsher ma'i yal ga bsdus nas lam gcod par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-0: de nas skye bo dag shul @107a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-2: khyod kyi ma yang gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-3: zhing thogs nas sa bon gyi phyir mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-7: gal te grong gi bdag po btub na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-9: nags kyi tshang tshing can du lam gang nas 'gro na bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-12: nags kyi tshang tshing can gyi lam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-13: cher ma med cing thibs po med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-15: gang nas bdag 'gro dris pa ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-16: des de la lam 'khyog pa zhig bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-17: lam gzhan nas mdun du brgyugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-18: rdzing bu zhig tu gos rnams phud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-19: mig ya gcig btsums te ci ngo shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-20: 'on te ma yin zhes glo gcig gis snyes te 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-22: gang gis za bgyid de nas bzhud //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-23: gang gis za bar mi bgyid pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-24: de ni dor bar bgyis nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-25: zan gyi nags su bzhud par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-26: de nas sman chen pos ji skad bstan pa'i lam nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-27: ji tsam na rgyang ring po kho na nas de ngo shes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-28: ras bal thags su btags pa mi bdog pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-29: ma bkal thags su ma btags gyon byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-30: mdzes ldan g-yon pa'i mig can gang nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-31: me tog grong du 'gro ba bdag la ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-32: de nas bu mos cung zhig bgad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-33: 'dir ni g-yon pa'i lam bor la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-34: gang na yos ni yod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107a-35: pa la sha yi me tog rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-0: de nas bram ze bzhud du @107b gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-1: de song song ste phyin nas smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-2: sa ga'i pha'i khyim du song na de'i pham mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-3: de nas grong gi bdag po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-4: gal te khyod kyis gnang na sa ga 'di bdag gi chung ma bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-5: tshig de smras ma thag kho nar grong gi bdag po de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bram ze ngan pa slong mo ba khyod gang nged kyi sa ga lha'i bu mo 'dra ba slong ba khyod ngo mi tsha'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-7: khyod la khyi mi srun pa dag zar bcug ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-10: de kho na'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-11: sa gas rgyang ring po nas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-12: byon pa legs so; ;zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-13: de nas sman chen po de rnams kyis de'u brdegs so zhes grong gi bdag po rnams kyi gtam smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-16: thabs ci zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-17: de nas sman chen pos gtam ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-18: de nas sa gas sman chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-20: khyod tha gi mi sgam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-21: bu mo bslang ba ji ltar khyod kyis mdzad pa de ltar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-25: re zhig sngar nye bar bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-26: de nas rjes su mthun par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-27: rjes su mthun par bgyis nas mgron du bod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-28: zas skom bda' ba'i ston mos ston te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:107b-29: slad kyis khyod kyi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyi mod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-0: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grong gi bdag po rnams kha zas kyi rnam pa bsod pas @108a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-2: de nas langs te sa ga bslangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-3: de rnams kyis deng khyod kyis yid la bsam pa bzhin rdzogs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-5: de lta bu'i don la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-6: tha gi tsam na de'i pha ma 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-7: de nas sman chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-8: grong gi bdag pos pha ma la gsol ba btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-11: de nas grong gi bdag po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-13: bram ze gzhon nu byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-14: bstan bcos mang po shes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-15: rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu son pa zhig yin pas cir yang mi 'gyur gyi byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-16: de nas sman chen pos kyang bram ze rnams bos nas bu mo blang bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-17: de nas nyi ma gzhan zhig la gyos po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-18: sgyug mo bos la bkur sti byas te gos bskon nas gnyod bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-19: lus 'phags su skyed pa'i drung du chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-20: de nas 'gro ba na de bram ze zhig gis bcu bzhi pa'i ston mos ston te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-21: yon du nas bre gang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-22: des nas bre gang gos kyi mtha' mar bur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-23: grogs po'i khyim du son nas sgo brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-27: nga ni khyod kyi khyim thab kyi grogs po de yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108a-30: 'ga' yang med pas khyim bdag de med par skyes pa gzhan khyim du 'jug tu mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-0: gzhan zhig @108b tu brang thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-1: ji tsam na sman chen pos bdag ci'i phyir 'jug tu mi ster snyam dpyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-2: re zhig na skyes pa gzhan bcug par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-3: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-4: 'dis 'jug tu mi ster ba ni rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-5: de de ltar sems pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-7: bram ze de grong gzhan zhig nas 'ongs nas sgor bos ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-8: des khyo'i sgre thos nas ji ltar bya snyam nas mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-10: de nas gnyi ga zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-12: ji tsam na sman chen pos bram ze mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-18: des mal gyi 'og dang khyim gyi grva phan tshun du brtags na de mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-19: tha gi tsam na phyogs gcig na sbyang zhig snang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-20: des da ni 'di na yod do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-21: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-24: 'di na bdag gi nor gces pa yod na 'dir nas ji ltar blugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-26: bram ze mo skyon can de snod gang yang rung ba zhig tu byo zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-27: de nas der nas ldugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-28: sman chen pos kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-29: gzhan du ni nas rnams byi bas ma rung bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-32: nges par rtogs nas 'jigs shing skrag ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-34: nas rnams kyang ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:108b-35: de nas sman chen pos bram ze mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-1: khyod kyis sems khral bya mi dgos par kho bos ci nas kyang gsher bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-2: nas kyang ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes des langs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-3: ri dvags kyi pags pa snga log phyi log byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-4: mchod phyir thogs nyis lta ba tu mgul du thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-5: sbyang bskam mo zhes sbyang drung du ba lang gi lci ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-6: shing dag bskya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-7: de nas bram ze mo sdug pa dang bral ba las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal mngon du mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-8: 'di da ni med par 'ong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-9: byi pho de'i khyim du 'di ltar gyur gyi myur du sheg gcig ces bang chen btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-10: de nas de'i phas thos ma thag kho nar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-11: sman chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-16: gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya dag gis yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-17: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-18: zhes de skad kyang zer zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-19: sbyang de'i nyen kor du me sgron yang spor bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-21: don 'di ni bsnyad du mi rung ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-22: khyim sgo phye ste mi stobs po ches bteg nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-23: rang gi khyim du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-24: sman chen pos kyang phyi de nyin gser gyi dong rtse brgya phrag gcig ni khyim bdag de la byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-25: khyod kyi chung ma de ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes khyim gyi gtam de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-26: de bas na khyod kyis bag gyis shig ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109a-27: gser gyi dong tse lhag ma bzhi brgya ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-0: bram ze de'i lag tu gtad nas 'di @109b rnams nags kyi tshang tshing can du song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-1: bdag gis blangs pa'i sa ga la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-2: de dag la kho bo ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-4: kho bo ni lus 'phags pa'i rgyal po skyed pa'i blon po'i mchog sman chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-5: kho bo rtags 'dis tshol ba'i phyir 'ongs par zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-6: de'i phyir bu mo yongs su skyongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-7: ces kyang gyis shig ces des gser gyi dong tse de rnams brdzangs nas phrin yig kyang spring ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-8: rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-9: bram ze des kyang nags kyi tshang tshing can du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-10: sa ga la phrin yig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-11: gser gyi dong tse sum brgya byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-12: ji tsam nas gas bklags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-13: bzhi po yi ni chad ka las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-14: gal te cha gcig ma ster na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-15: shing gi su mi 'dod blangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-16: des 'di chug la cha do zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-17: des gser gyi dong tse brgya phrag cig ma thob par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-18: de nas rings par mal gyi 'og tu tshol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-22: pho brang 'khor nas rgyal po'i mi 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-23: gnod pa byed pa zung zhig ces byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-24: de'i phyir su mi 'dod tshol lo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-25: des blangs te bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-26: der de lta bur su zhig khrid kyang kho mos ma shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-27: re zhig 'dir rkang pa chud dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-28: mi chud sad kyi thang cig chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-30: bgam pa'i phyir rkang pa bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:109b-31: des rings par gzer bu btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-0: des bzhi brgya bskur na khyod kyis @110a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-1: de las brgya brkus pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-2: de nas bram ze ya mtshan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-4: sman chen po dang 'di ni 'dre dag cig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-5: 'dre chen po gnyis gnas gcig tu 'dus par gyur to snyam nas des lhag ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-6: tha gi tsam na pha ma 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-8: de ni bram ze ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-9: de ni lus 'phags pa'i rgyal po skyed pa'i blon po'i mchog sman chen po zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-11: pha ma dang bu mo de'i gnyen mdun gyi skye bo dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-12: bdag cag gis ni chen po dang gnyen du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-13: bdag cag ni bsod nams dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-15: nga ni bdag cag gi rigs sman chen pos gsal bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-16: zhes shin tu dga' ba dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-17: de phyin chad sa ga de bsku mnye dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-21: rgyan gyi khyad par dag gis shin tu byi dor bya bar brtsams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-22: ring po ma lon par de khyad par du gzugs shin tu bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-23: shin tu mdzes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-24: de nas sman chen po grong khyer du son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-25: rgyal pos 'ongs so zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-27: blon po rnying pa rnams sman chen po 'ongs so zhes shin tu dga' ba skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-28: rgyal po skyed pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110a-31: bdag gis mchis brang rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-0: gzugs bzang @110b zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-1: blo phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-2: de ni bdag gi spu la 'bab pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-3: de lta lags kyis kyang lha la da blang bar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-5: de nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-6: nga ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig khyod kyi thog tu 'bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-8: khyod ni blon po'i mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-9: de lta bas nas de ci nas kyang nga mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'byor bas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-13: sman chen po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-16: skye bo'i tshogs mgron du bos pa gzhan rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-20: dpung bu chung gi tshogs mang po chen pos bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-21: ri bor nags kyi tshang tshing can du gyos pos khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-22: song nas bag ma blang ba chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-23: mthar gyis chung ma khrid nas grong khyer du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-24: de na de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-26: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-27: de nas byang phyogs nas tshong pa lnga brgya zhig zong du rta khyer nas lus 'phags pa'i ljongs su rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-28: gnas de na smad 'tshong ma tshul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:110b-39: bsam pa mkhas pa de blta bur lnga brgya 'khod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-1: shing lhags pa rnams rdzas med par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-2: de nas de rnams kyis byang phyogs nas tshong ba'i 'gron pa ji ltar lhags pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-3: de rnams kyis re res tshong pa re re la rim gro bya ba khas blangs pas nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-4: de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-6: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-7: de nas de rnams kyis ded dpon gang yin pa de ni bag yod pa can zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-8: de de rnams dang lhan cig bag med pa mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-9: smad 'tshong ma de rnams kyi nang na kun gyi gtso mo gang yin pa de ni ded dpon de 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-10: ded dpon ni mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-11: de nas des tshong ba de rnams bsdus nas gsol ba btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-12: bdag dang ded dpon mthun par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-13: de nas tshong ba de rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-14: smad 'tshong ma de rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin rgyun du phe'u byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-15: bag med pa'i dbang du mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-16: de nas smad 'tshong ma de rang nyid 'ongs shing ded dpon dang lhan cig bgad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-18: de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-19: nga la 'khrul par bya bar mi nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-22: gal te 'khrul par bgyi na shes ldan gyis ci stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-24: rta'i mchog lnga byin no; ;'o na 'khrul par ma bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111a-25: slad kyis karsha pa na ma mchis bzhin du rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-0: de nas de ltar skugs btsugs nas 'bad de nye bar spyad par brtsams pa @111b las kyang ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-1: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa de rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-2: ded dpon grong khyer gyi gtso mo smad 'tshong ma bzhag pa las ma thug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-4: de nas ded dpon gyis de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-6: mtshan mo rmi lam na de la yongs su spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-7: tshong pa rnams kyis kyang de la bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-8: des ded dpon de rgyal po'i mi rnams 'dzin du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-9: khyed bdag dang 'dod pa spyad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-13: brdzun du smra ba zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-14: zhes de gnyis rtsod cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-15: de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shags bkye ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-16: nyi ma nub kyi bar du gcig kyang ma pham la cig shos kyang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-17: rgyal po dang blon po thams cad kyang skyo bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-18: bkres pas nyen te phyis dpyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-19: zhes rang gi khyim du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-20: de nas sman chen po nub mo rang gi khyim du son nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-22: rje'i sras de ring ci'i slad du thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-23: des zhal che gcad par yang ma nus pa'i gtam de thams cad rgya cher bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-24: de nas sa gas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-25: khyed de ltar rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-26: sel ba phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu thams cad kyis gcad par ma spyod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-27: khyed skyes pa'i tshul de lta bu lags pa lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-29: de ni de lta bu yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:111b-30: ci khyed kyis gcad nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-0: @112a *// rngo thog ste bdag gis blo'i nus pa la gzigs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-2: gshegs la rdzing bu'i 'gram du rta'i mchog lnga bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-3: de nas gnas de nyid du rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-4: blon po rnams kyang 'dus te shags 'gyes du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-5: gal te smad 'tshong ma gnyis dang gnyis 'dod pa spyad do zhes mchi na rta'i mchog lnga khyer cig ces gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-6: 'on te rmi lam na 'dod pa spyad do zhes mchi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-7: de nas rta'i gzugs brnyan chu na mchis pa dag ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-8: gal te blang du mi rung ba 'di dag bdag la ci dgos zhes smra na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-9: de nas ji ltar 'di blang du mi rung ba de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-10: rmi lam gyi 'dod pa spyad pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-11: de thos nas sman chen po nyid je ya mtshan du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-12: phyi de nyin par rgyal po yang 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-13: blon po rnams kyang tshogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-14: rta'i mchog lnga khrid de rdzing bur lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-15: der rta'i mchog lnga btags nas shags 'gyed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-16: de nas sa gas bstan pa bzhin sman chen pos zhal che bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-19: khrom gyi ru pa rnams kyis thos nas ya mtshan skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-21: kye sman chen po gang 'di khar tsang smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-24: skye bo gzhan yang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-25: khyod kyi thabs su las byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112a-27: 'di ni sa ga'i thabs lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-0: @112b des kyang khar tsang bstan lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-3: skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang ya mtshan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-4: kye ma'o shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga ni shin tu mkhas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-5: sa ga blo dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-6: zhes yul thams cad du grags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-7: de nas byang phyogs kyi tshong pa zhig gis rgod ma gnyis shig rgyal po la skyes su phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-8: lha rgod ma 'di dag smad lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-9: ma'am bu gang lags pa ni gzhan gyis ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-10: de la yang rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag skyo bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-11: de kho na bzhin du shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga la sman chen pos rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-12: rje'i sras gang gi spu shor ba de ni ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-13: gang gi spu 'jam pa de ni bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-14: phyi de nyin de bzhin du sman chen pos smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-15: lha sa ga'i thabs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-17: de la yang rgyal po ya mtshan skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-18: dus gzhan zhig na sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig gis sbrul gnyis khyer te 'ongs nas de la gcig ni pho /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-21: gang mo lags pa ni ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-25: de kho na bzhin du sman chen pos sa ga la dris shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-26: gang zhig po'am mo yin pa ma shes pa rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-27: de nas sa gas cung zhig bgad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-28: gang dag don 'di lta bu mi rtogs pa de lta bu khyed kyang blon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:112b-29: yong rgyal po go blon po rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-1: tshogs pa de lta bu drug gis brgyan pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-7: smig ma'i rtse mo la ras bal gyi 'dab ma'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-9: gnyi ga'i rgyab tu reg par bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-10: de dag las gang reg tu mi bzod pa de ni pho lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-11: phyi de nyin de bzhin du byas pa las rgyal po mgu bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-12: de nas dus gzhan zhig na lho phyogs nas tshong pa dag cig tsandan gyi sdong po zhig khyer te 'ongs pa de'i mgo mjug ma shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-13: de nas de kho na bzhin du chung ma la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-14: rje'i sras rdzing bu'i nang du bor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-15: rtsa ba gang lags pa de 'og tu 'bying ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-16: de yang rgyal po skyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-17: gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs dag gis thos nas ya mtshan skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-18: rgyal po skyed pa'i blo skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-19: nga'i blon po dag gi nang na nor bu rin po che rtogs su mkhas shes par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-20: des khang pa rtseg ma'i steng du rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la rin po che btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-21: de'i 'og na rdzing bu zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-22: rgyal pos kyang sus nor bu rin po che 'di shes pa de la sbyin par dam pa bstabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-23: rdzong bu der zhugs nas 'od de blang ba la zhugs na blang bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-24: de nas shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113a-25: rje'i sras steng du gzigs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-0: de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags @113b pa de'i mthus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-1: gzugs brnyan gda' mod kyi nang du bzhud de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las blang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-2: de phyi de nyin de bzhin du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-5: des sa ga'i thabs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-7: mgu nas rnam pa thams cad du shin tu mkhas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-9: de nas sa ga shin tu gzugs dang ldan par blon po drug gis shes te; de bdag cag gi nor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-15: rdo'i snying po la sogs pas brid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-16: lhan cig phrad par bya'o snyam pa las ma zug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-17: de dag rgyun du smra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-18: des sman chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-20: bud med gang su yang rung gzhon zhing gzugs bzang ba de gzhan gyi skyes pas bslu ba de lta bu zhig yod pa lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-22: 'di ni thams cad kyi chos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-23: skyes pa rnams kyis bud med thams cad la don du gnyer mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-24: bud med nyid kyis shes par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-25: gal te bud med mdzangs na de byed du mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-26: de nas sa gas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-27: rje'i sras gal te de lta bu la co bri ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-29: de la nyen du mi 'gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-32: de nas des khyed kyis na'o zhes sgyu mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-33: de nas mtho btsam par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:113b-34: de mi na bar sgyu byas te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-0: des kyang de dag gi pho nya gang dag yin pa de dag las bzlugs pa @114a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-2: ji ltar bka' stsal pa de bzhin du rim gro 'tshal lo zhes 'di skad du so sor spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-3: des kyang shing las sman chen po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-4: de gos kyis g-yogs te mal du bsnyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-5: de dag so so la yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-6: sman chen po 'di ni nyam chung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-8: che ge mo zhig gi dus su gzhan gyis ma 'tshal bar spyon cig ces byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-9: sgrom chen po drug byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-10: rang gi khang pa drug tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-11: de nas de dag 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-12: sgrom du bcug ste bcings nas phyi de nyin sman chen po shi'o zhes sgra yang btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-13: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-14: gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs dag gis thos nas mya ngan chen po dang ldan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-15: bdag cag sems can 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-16: zhes rab tu sems shing mya ngan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs nas snying rje rje skad du smre'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-17: shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga des kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-18: blon po sgrom du bcug pa de drug legs par bsdams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-19: rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-20: lha sman chen po ni dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-25: rin po che la sogs pa de dag de nyid kyi rgyas btab pa 'di dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114a-26: de nas rgyal pos de ni de ring shi nas deng nyid ngal 'di phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-0: zhes shin tu mya @114b ngan gyis gdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-1: de'i skabs su sman chen po nyid gnas gzhan zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-3: dgod cing rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-4: rgyal po la phyag byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-5: lhas bdag gdugs 'ga' yang byams pas ma bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-6: deng nyid sdum pa rgyal pos bzhes lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-9: khyod nyid kyi khyim nas khyer te 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-11: rgyal po chen po sman chen ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-13: de yi rin chen 'di rnams lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-14: de dag mi dbang bzhes su gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-15: rgyal chen bdag ni yugs ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-16: khyim thab dang ni bral bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-17: bdag la brnyas pa bgyis nas 'gas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-18: bdag las nor ni phrogs su mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-19: de nas sman chen pos blon po'i mchog rnams kyi blo'i spyod pa'i legs pa yang bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-20: rgyal po skyed pas kyang bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-22: rkang lag bzhi bskums pa'i blon po drug mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-23: bgad de sman chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-24: sman chen po thabs 'di su'i yin smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-26: zhes thams cad rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-27: de nas rgyal pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-28: kye ma bud med kyi blo gros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-30: kye ma blo yi dpyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:114b-31: des blon po'i mchog 'di dag 'di ltar co dris so zhes mgu nas de bkur ba cher byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-0: yul thams cad du yang shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga ni de @115a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-1: ltar blo dang ldan no zhes snyan ba grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-3: nga yang sman gyis de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-4: khyi dang phyugs la bzas bsod sbyin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-5: dam bca' rdo ba rol mo rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-6: au dum w'a ra sgyur mor 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-7: se mo do yang stor ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-8: ne tso gsang yang bsnyad pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-9: bar mdo gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-10: de nas rgyal pos sa ga mkhas shing mdzangs par shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-11: sman chen po bsod nams dang ldan pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-12: 'di lta bu'i chung ma blo dang ldan pa rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-14: de nas rgyal pos sman chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-15: gal te khyod dga' ba lta na; nga la yang chung ma 'di ltar blo dang ldan pa zhig btsal te blangs na khyim gyi srid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-16: gzhan yang phyi rol rgyal po'i pho brang gi don 'di la bde bar gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-17: sman chen pos smras pa; gang nas btsal bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-18: gang gi phyir rgyal po skyed pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-19: lnga len gyi rgyal po'i bu mo sman ldan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-21: shes bzhin can 'di ltar sa gci 'dra ba'i blo dang ldan pa zhig yod ces thos pa de chung mar long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-22: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-23: lha 'di la thabs ci zhig bgyi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-24: de yang lha'i mtshams las gzhan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-25: dgra lta bur mchis pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-26: de la sngar thabs btsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115a-27: de nas rgyal po skyed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-0: blon po 'dun na 'don dag btang ste de dag slong ba la zhugs @115b so; ;de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos blon po rnams bsdus te ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-3: rgyal po skyed pa 'di sngan chad lha'i bka' mi nyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-4: don 'dis 'o skol gyi dbang du 'gyur ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-5: de dag mchis nas ji ltar bgyi ba gdod mdzad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-7: des byin nas che ge mo zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-8: zla ba phyed kyi nyin bar yud tsam dag dang sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-9: bag ma len du shog cig ces byas nas phyir song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-10: rgyal po skyed pa la bu mo sman ldan ni thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-12: ji ltar nam blang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-13: de dag gis tshes grangs che ge mo zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-14: yud tsam pa dang sbyor la shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-16: dus de'i 'og tu lnga len gyi rgyal po des bag ma btang ba'i don du brtsams pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-18: btung ba dag sta gon byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-20: btung ba'i rnam pa thams cad dug dang bsre ba byas nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos bsdogs pa 'di las mi 'phyi bar shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-22: de nas de thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-24: rgyal po skyed pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-25: lha re zhig 'phral du bgyir mi rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-26: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-28: lha'i mtshams las gzhan pa'i rgyal po ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-29: de dang rtag tu rtsod cing 'dis rgyun du mi mthun pa lhan cig tu bgyis pas brtag par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-33: rgyal po bde bar bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:115b-34: bdag la ne tso spyod gsal zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-2: yid gzhungs par der btang la des thams cad la gtam bgyis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-5: de der song nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-6: su la bcar te gang gis na lhan cig 'grogs shing gtam bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-7: des kun tu bltas na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-8: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gang gis bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-9: ji tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te der bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-10: gdung gi bar na ri skegs zhig 'dug pa mthong ste /
