K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-12: de gnyis phan tshun gcig la gcig dga' bas yang dag par mgu bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-16: rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba de nas kho bo 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-17: kho bo de'i skyed mos tshal srung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-18: de la kho bo'i chung ma dam pa gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-19: mdzangs shing rjes su mthun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-21: ri skegs mo zhig yod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-22: ri skegs de yang gzhan du song ba las khras khyer te des na kho bo mya ngan gyis sems gdungs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-23: phan tshun 'khyams pa las khyod kyi drung du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-24: bzang mo khyod kho bo'i chung mar mi rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-26: ji ltar na ne tso'i chung ma ri skegs yin zhes ma thos ma mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116a-27: de lta mod kyi ne tso'i chung ma ni ne tso nyid yin no zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-0: des spyod gsal gyis gzhan dag phan tshun 'ong zhing 'gro ba'i rnam grangs @116b kyi rnam pas nye bar bsnyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-2: bzang mo bdag ni shi bi'i rgyal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-3: skyed mos tshal srung gyur pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-4: kho bo'i chung ma ri skegs ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-5: 'jam pa'i tshig tu smra gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-6: byas ni nan gyis khyer bas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-7: bdag ni de yis gdungs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-8: kho bo 'dod pas gdungs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-9: khyod kyi gan du 'ongs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-11: ne tso'i chung ma ri skegs ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-12: mi rigs par ni bdag gis bsams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-13: ne tso'i chung ma ne tso bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-14: 'di skad du ni mkhas pas bsgrags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-15: de nas de bzhin du smras shing bsam pa bsgrubs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-18: de nas ne tso spyod gsal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-20: bza' ba mang po sbrang rtsi'i mchog ces bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-22: phe'u te'u dag dog ler 'tshod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-23: bu ram las byas pa'i kha zas mang po mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-26: ji ste bdag cag gis thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-27: de nas ri skegs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-28: dog ler mar sar mang po ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-30: kha cig bdag cag gis thob bam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-31: ri skegs kyis ni 'jam por smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-33: dog ler bca' ba khur ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-35: ne tso mkhas pa spyod gsal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-36: 'di rnams khyod kyi bza' ba min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:116b-37: 'di dag skyed pa'i ched du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-2: de nas spyod gsal gyis rig pa sngon du btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-3: ri skegs la thabs kyis yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-4: lnga len rang gi bu mo pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-5: skyed pa la ni byin no zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-6: de lta bur yang sgra dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-7: phyogs kun tu ni rgyas gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-8: de la su yi tshig bden zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-9: gang gi tshig de de bzhin yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-11: ne tso mkhas pa spyod gsal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-12: gtum po de ni mi byin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-13: blo gros ngan pa nyid dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-14: de la gsad pa dag tu brtson //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-15: de dag thos nas slar log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-16: ne tso spyod gsal gyis mthong zhing thos nas rtogs shing shes pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-17: tshong pas don gyi rnyed pa thob pa yongs su grub pa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-18: ri skegs la shi bi'i phyir smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-19: bdag gi chung ma 'dra rnyed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-20: ri skegs 'jam por smra ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-21: shi bi'i rgyal pos mkhyen bya'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-22: bzang mo bdag ni 'gro bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-24: gal te rje yi sras gshegs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-25: shi bi'i rgyal po mkhyen gsol nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-26: dgung bdun dag las gzhan du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-27: yun mi ring par mkhyen par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-28: bdag gi rigs dang rus dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-30: shi bi'i rgyal pos mkhyen par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-31: bdag kyang slad rjes khyed ma dgu ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-32: de song nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-33: blon po sman chen po la rgya cher thams cad smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117a-34: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa la mkhyen par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-0: de nas lnga len gyi @117b rgyal pos kyang mi 'ong bar rtogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-1: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-2: glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-5: dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-6: rgyal po skyed pa'i pho brang bskor bar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-7: de nas blon po'i mchog sman chen pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-8: 'dis lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par yang mi nus na ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-10: des lnga len gyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi skyes bskur te dbyen byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-11: dbyen byas nas rgyal po skyed pas lnga len gyi rgyal po la pho nya btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-12: kho bo khyod la rgol mi nus pa ma yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-13: kho bo dang khyod gnyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-14: khyod nyid gyos po yin pas mi rgal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-16: gshin pa ni shin tu rig par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-17: nged kyis nus par gyur kyang khyod la mi rgol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-18: gal te yang khyod the tshom du gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-19: skyes 'di dang 'di dag ni blon po che ge mo rnams la bskur ba brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-21: skyes dang bcas su bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-22: de nas lnga len gyi rgyal po de nyid kyi nub mo chas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-23: rang gi khyim du song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-24: blon po lnga brgya de dag bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:117b-25: de dag gi bu rnams kyang blon por bcug pa bden no zhes smras pa 'dis rgyal po skyed pa dang lhan cig pa dag dga' ba skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-0: sman chen pos kyang de dag bsad par thos nas bdag gi de lta @118a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-1: bu dag byas so snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-3: de dag kyang bsad nas rgyal po la sman chen pos gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-4: 'di ltar bdag nyid dngos der mchis la thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-5: mi thob brtag par bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-6: gang gi phyir de der bdag nyid kyi dpung dang bcas nas lnga len gyi rgyal po'i yul du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-7: lnga len gyi rgyal pos grong khyer gyi nang du shog cig ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-9: skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-10: ji ste yang bdag nges par nang du mchi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-11: blon po che ge mo zhig gi khyim du mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-12: de nas lnga len gyi rgyal po bag tsha ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-14: re zhig gzhan yang bdag dang blon po dag dbyen byed do snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-15: de ltar dga' na de nyid du 'dug cig ces spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-16: de'i blon po rnams kyis 'di la bgros pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-17: bdag cag gi pha chud gsan pa byas pa de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-18: sman chen po 'di yin pas bdag cag gis sngon gyi sha khon rjes su dran par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-19: rgyal po la de bzhin du gal gyis bcus la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-20: de ltar 'di phyir mi 'gro bar bya'o zhes 'dus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-21: rgyal po la de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-22: rgyal po skyed pa gang la blo'i spyod tshul 'di lta bu de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-23: sman chen po de'i lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-24: de la rgyal po skyed pa ni pha rol gnon pa bgyid mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118a-25: de ltar de 'di nyid na mchis pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-0: bdag cag gis gzhan @118b nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-3: de nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-7: dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-8: rgyal po'i pho brang gnas der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-9: rgyal po skyed pa 'dis kyang sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-10: sman chen pos kyang lnga len gyi rgyal po lam che ge mo zhig nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song bar shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-11: des kyang der cung zhig 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-12: phyogs che ge mo zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-14: mdzod de na rgyal po'i bu mo sman ldan ma zhes bya ba 'dug par shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-15: de nas des nang 'khor mi zhig khrid de 'khor bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-16: ji tsam na rgyal po'i mdzod du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-17: mdzod phye nas bu mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-20: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-21: lam gzhan zhig nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-22: de nas rgyal po skyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-25: gzhan dag kyang las chen pos bsgrubs so zhes rab tu dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-26: rjed cing ri mor bya ba mang po dag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-27: lnga len gyi rgyal po'i blon po mchog kyang 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-28: sman chen pos bu mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-32: rang gis yul du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:118b-33: rgyal po skyed pas kyang gang gis phyir bkra shis kyi rnam pa dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-0: bu mo bag mar blangs nas @119a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-1: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-4: de nas lnga len gyis rgyal pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-5: bu mo sman ldan la pho nya zhig btang nas 'di lta bu su'i thabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-7: sus dbyen byas pa dag gi don shes par gyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-10: pho nya btang la sman chen po 'di la ne tso spyod gsal zhes bya ba mi'i skad du smra ba des 'di ltar brtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-11: de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-12: ne tso spyod gsal ci nas kyang slar thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-13: de nas des rab tu 'bad pas rnyis bzung ste; de la bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-14: de nas rgyal po khro bas dkris pas rnam pa mang por spyos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-16: de nas ne tso spyod gsal gyis rkang pa la gtugs te rgyal po la gsol pa; lha bdag gi pha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-17: mes po ji ltar bkum pa de bzhin du dgum par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-18: gal te de lta na de bzhin du 'di gsod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-20: ji lta bu nyid du pha dang mes po bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-21: ces des de la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-22: ras bal gyis mjug ma bkris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-23: yungs mar gyis bskus nas bsregs te btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-24: de nam mkha' la 'phur te rgyal po'i pho brang kun nas 'bar bar byas nas chur zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-25: de nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119a-26: sman chen pos kyang dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-0: des ji ltar byas pa @119b thams cad shes par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-2: lnga len gyi rgyal po khro bas dkris pas yang yi ge bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-3: des rnam pa 'di lta bus gnod pa byas te 'di nges par slar thong zhig des kyang bzung ste bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-4: lnga len gyi rgyal po khros pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-5: spu ril phyi nas sha'i ri lur bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-6: 'gro na song zhig ces de phyi rol tu bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-8: des kyang khra la gsol ba btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-9: kho bo zos pa ni nyin gcig gi zas su zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-10: kho bo btang na ni nyin gcig bzhin du ji lta bu'i dgos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-11: bza' ba mang po dag de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes des yid ches par mna' bor nas btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-13: phyogs che ge mo zhig na rgyal po'i gtsug lag khang der shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-14: des de bzhin byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-15: de gtsug lag khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-16: bu ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-17: phyi de nyin bram ze dag lha mchod pa'i phyir der lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-22: gtor ma sbyin par rtsom pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-23: spyod gsal des kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-24: kye bram ze rgyal po sdig pa can lnga len gyi rgyal po la nga'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-25: nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byas pa de ni ngas gnod par byas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-26: gal te nga'i tshig bzhin ma byas na phyir yang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-27: de ltar re zhig nyin re zhing sha rjen mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:119b-29: 'bras thug po bre'u chung gang gi lha bshos byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-0: @120a *// song nas des lnga len gyi rgyal po la khong du chud par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-1: rgyal pos kyang de'i don kho nar lha bshos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-2: gtor ma bya ba la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-3: nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-7: mi gnang bka' stsal pa gsol ba btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-10: 'di ltar dus mang du lon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-11: ne tso spyod gsal de'i gshog pa skyes shing 'phur nus par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-12: yang 'gro ba'i blo skyes te de la yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-13: 'di ltar nga la gang khyod stobs kyi dpung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-16: blon po dag dang lhan cig mgo gtun bzhin bregs la nga'i drung du shog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-17: 'di ltar yang bzod cing gnang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-18: des rgyal po la khong du chud par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-19: rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-20: de ltar thams cad mgo gtun bzhin du bregs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-22: rkang pa la gtugs nas bzod par gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-23: de nas ne tso nam mkha' la 'phur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-24: byed pa la ni slar byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-25: phyi ba slar ni phyi la ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-26: 'dir ni gcig pu phyi ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-27: btsun mo kun dang legs par phyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-29: de nas yang sman chen po'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120a-30: spyod gsal yun ring zhig tu ma mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-0: gang nas phyin ces dris @120b so; ;des 'di dang 'di lta bu'i thabs de dag bdag gis bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-2: de nas sman chen po yid dga' zhing mgu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-3: rgyal po skyed pa la ne tso spyod gsal gyis 'di ltar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-5: rgyal po yang mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-7: ae ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-9: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-10: rgyal pos blon po rnams la gang rab tu mkhas pa nyams sad do snyam pa'i blo skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-11: de dag bos te so sor khyi re re byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-12: 'di dag dus 'di tsam na thams cad mi skad du smra bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-13: de dag gis de khyim du khrid de gso bar bya ba ni shes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-14: mi skad du zer ba ni mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-15: sman chen pos khyi de khyim du khrid de 'ongs nas khri las mi ring ba zhig tu phur pa la btags te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-16: nam sman chen po kha zas drangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-19: 'khur ba sna tshogs su sbyar ba za bar mthong yang len mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-20: de nas ngan pa cung zad cig byin pas ma shi ma gson tsam du nyam chung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-21: rid de skem par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-22: de nas rgyal pos khyi de dag lobs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-24: khrid de shog cig par bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-25: de dag gis ni thabs la mi mkhas pas bslab ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:120b-26: de nas sman chen po la khyod kyis ci 'dra ba khrid de shog ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-2: des 'di ci'i phyir rid ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-3: sman chen pos lha bdag gis ci zos ci 'tshal ba de bzhin 'di la yang stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-7: bdag ltogs te de'u gum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-8: de nas sman chen pos bdag gis 'di 'di ltar mi'i skad du smra bar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-10: de nas rgyal po dgyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-11: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-13: lug 'di rnams khyed kyis bza' btung zhim po stsal la tshil med la mthu dang ldan par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-15: de nas blon po lnga brgya po de dag gis thabs ma shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-16: de sos te tsho bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-18: bza' btung zhim po mdun du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-19: shing las spyang ki'i gzugs zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-20: lug gi mdun du bzhag pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-21: des de mthong bas na skrag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-23: mthu dang ni ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-24: de dag kun bltas na gzhan dag ni mdog dang ldan zhing tshil mang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-25: sman chen po'i ni tshil med la mthu dang ldan par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-28: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121a-29: gang mkhas pa bgam ste blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-0: blon po de dag gi bu lnga brgya po de dag skyed mos tshal du zan @121b byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-1: za 'thung zhing 'khod pa las ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i gtam rtsom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-2: su gang gis ngo mtshar gyi gtam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-3: khyim na yod pa ci thos pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-4: de dag mdza' bas gcig la gcig ngo mtshar gang la ci yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-6: gzhan gyi phyogs na mthong ba rnams smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-7: de nas khye'u de dag gis sman chen po'i bu la khyod kyang smros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-9: sman chen po'i khyim na rdo zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-10: de ka rten yin pa las de chu'i steng du bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-11: phan tshun du 'phyo zhing nyug cing mnye ba la sogs pa'i las kun byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-12: de nas khye'u des bdag gi khyim na yod pa de dag la bsnyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-13: nged kyi khyim na ngo mtshar yod pa de lta bu ni su la yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-14: de dag gis de'i rjes nas bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-15: nged kyi khyim na rdo ba chu'i steng na 'phyo zhing 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-16: zhes smras pa dang; de dag gis bdag cag gis rdo chu'i steng nas 'phyo zhing 'gro ba de lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-19: de nas de dag gis gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya rgyal ba kye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-20: de nas gzhon nu des ji ltar gyur cing de'i phyir bdag dang rgyal bkye'o zhes pha la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-23: de nas de dag lhags nas ma bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-24: gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya rgyal du bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-25: de nas sman chen pos spre'u rnams bzung ste rol mo bslabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:121b-27: da ni song la sdum pa'i nang du sngar gtam glengs la khyod kyis ngo mtshar sus ci mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-2: khyim lta na ci yod pa smros shig byos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-3: de nas khyod kyis da ni rgyal nyis 'gyur du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-4: bdag gi khyim na ni rol mo mkhan spre'u yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-7: rnga rdung la mkhas so zhes byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-9: des kyang de bzhin du gtam gzhan dag la brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-10: 'di lta bu mthong ste yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-12: de nas de dag na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-13: bdag cag gis spre'u rol mo byed pa ma mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-16: de ste bdag gis bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-19: sngar yang khyod la gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya phab pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-20: da yang de bzhin ma rigs mi tshul ba zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-21: de ste yang khyod kyis ma bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-22: gser gyi dong tse stong bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-23: ji ste bstan na nged kyis sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-25: spre'u khrid de rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-26: des kyang spre'u rnams rgyal po'i pho brang bu ded de rgyal po'i mdun du glu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-27: gar dang rnga rdung ba kun bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-28: de nas de dag gis de la gser gyi dong tse stong byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-29: rgyal pos kyang ngo mtshar du bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-36: kye thams cad pas de gcig pu mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa la ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122a-37: kun gyis sman chen po la bkur sti byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-0: de @122b nas yul de de lta'i bram ze zhig 'dug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-1: des bdag dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-2: de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-3: phyi zhig na bram ze mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-4: zla ba dgu 'das te btsas na bu mo zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-5: gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-6: bram ze de yang smrang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-7: smrang gi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-8: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-9: shes rab rno ba des 'di gang bdag dang 'dra bar 'gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-10: bdag gi drung na slob cing 'don pa byed pa la bu mo 'di sbyin no snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-11: btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-12: 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes bgros nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-13: bu mo 'di'i ming au dum w'a ri kar btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-14: de gsos bskyed nas chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-15: de nas bram ze gzhan zhig la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-18: mdog ngan pa'i mtshan ma bco brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-19: de skyes ma thag tu pha mas kyang 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-20: mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir ming yang gzugs ngan du btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-21: de btsas bskyed nas cher bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-22: phas bu ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-23: gzugs ngan pa 'di 'dra ba la bslabs te ci rung snyam nas ma bslabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:122b-24: de nas khye'u gzugs ngan pa de nam chen por gyur pa de na bslab par 'dod na phas ni ma bslabs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-2: bram ze gzhan zhig gi drung du phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-3: bram ze'i khye'u de la langs nas bdag ni bram ze 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bu lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-4: khyod la slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du khyod kyi drung du mchis so zhes gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-5: des kyang de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-7: de nas ring po ma lon par bram ze des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-8: ci shes pa thams cad gzugs ngan pa des kyang lobs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-9: de nas slob dpon de 'di snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-10: bdag gi drung du slob cing shes pa yang bdag dang mtshungs par gyur pa de la bu mo au dum w'a ri ka sbyin par bdag gis dam bcas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-11: da bram ze gzugs ngan pa 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-12: bdag gi drung na bslabs la shes pa yang bdag dang mtshungs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-14: bdag gis gzhan bya mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-16: bdag dang pha mes la 'jig rten du yang mi rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-17: bram ze gzhan gyis kyang smad par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-18: ci nas yi dam bcas pa bzhin bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-19: des bu mo au dum w'a ri ka de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bram ze'i khye'u gzugs ngan pa la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-20: des de blangs te de dang lhan cig dga' bar spyod du mi spobs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-21: de nas des bdag nyid kyi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-22: de na ci dga' mgur bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-23: rang gi khyim du khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123a-24: au dum w'a ri ka de yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-0: de gzugs ngan @123b pa mthong na yang yid du mi 'ong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-1: bdag ni gzugs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-2: 'di ni mdog mi sdug pa rnam pa bco brgyad dang ldan pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-3: khyo 'di lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ni ngo tsha'o snyam du bsams te; de nas gzugs ngan des de khrid de bdag cag gi yul du song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-4: lam gyi bar du rgyags chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-5: de nas rdzing gzhan zhig gi 'gram du phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-6: gnyis ka bkres shing 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-7: lam grogs gzhan zhig kyang phye chu'i nang du shing bus dkrugs te 'thung ba la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-8: mo bru bas gzir te bslangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-9: de la gzugs ngan gyis phye spar gang blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-11: au dum w'a ri kas jo bo bdag kyang shin tu bru bas gdung gzir na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-12: kho mo 'o ni las chu zhig 'thung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-13: gzugs ngan gyis bud med la 'di 'dra ba'i chu grog 'thung du sngon gyi chos mkhan drang srong rnams kyis ma gnang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-14: de'i phyir mi spyin no zhes zer te ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-15: de nas yang char ba ma babs pa'i phyir dgon pa la bru bas gzir cing dong ba las gnyi gas khyi sha zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-17: bdag zos nas au dum w'a ri kas de bslangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-18: 'di yang bud med rnams la drang srong gis ma gnang ngo zhes zer te mi ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-19: des bdag lta bu byur ngan ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-20: bru ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:123b-21: pha ma gnyis kyis bdag gi nyes pa ci mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-2: yang de gnyis dong ba las shing au dum w'a ra smin pa zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-3: gzugs ngan de la 'dzegs te za zhig 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-4: au dum w'a ri kas khyod gcig pu ma za bar ngan bu la yang 'or zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-5: des smin pa ni bdag zos nas ma smin pa ni mar bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-6: des bdag la ma smin pa mdor bar smin pa yang stsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-7: des de ste khyod smin pa 'dod na bdag nyid 'dzegs te thogs la zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-9: bru bas gzir ba'i phyir nan gyis au dum w'a ra la 'dzegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-12: bdag lta bu bsod nams med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-13: chung ma 'di 'dra ba bdag nyid kyis mi sos pa lta ci smos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-14: 'di ni bdag la bltar yang mi btub bo snyam nas shing las babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-15: shing au dum w'a ri'i drung tsher mas bskor nas bor te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-17: de gnyis song ba nags nang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-18: au dum w'a ra smin pa mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-19: des kyang de la 'dzegs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-20: za zhing sbyin par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-21: snyan par smra ba'i tshig can ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-22: de la bu mos smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-23: bdag kyang bkres par gyur pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-24: jo bo stsol cig bdag la yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-25: rtsub pa'i tshig tu smra ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-26: des ni de la ngan pa mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-27: de sde bza' bar 'dod na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-28: zos shing bdag nyid 'dzegs nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124a-29: des kyang nan gyis bsgrims nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-0: shing chen de la 'dzegs @124b par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-1: shing la 'dzegs par shes nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-2: babs te yal gas drung bskor song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-3: de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-4: rgyal po skyed pa ri dvags shor du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-5: de'i phyogs su phyin pa dang; de nas de khyod dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-7: bod du yang med pa'i dgon pa na shin tu snying rje zhing brtse ba'i skad du ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-8: de nas rgyal po skyed pa de'i phyogs su ri dvags snyegs pa las des de'i sgra thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-9: 'di lta bur snying rje zhing brtse bas smre ngag 'don cing dgon pa na 'dug pa 'di lta bu zhig ci nas kyang de brtag go snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-10: sgra de'i logs su song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-11: au dum w'a ri ka'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-12: mig shin tu legs pa nags kyi lha mo lta bu gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-19: don ci'i phyir phyogs 'dir 'ongs zhes dris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-21: shin tu mi bzad yid 'phrog ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-22: rgyan kun gyis ni klubs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-23: ngang pa dbyangs snyan rkang gdub can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-24: sprin mangs kyi ni glog dang 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-25: skal chen lte ba smin ma bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-27: dri za mo'am ci yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-28: khyod la bdag 'dri legs par smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:124b-29: de ltar bdag la khyod kyis shes par byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-0: de nas rgyal pos de skad du @125a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-3: bdag ni lha mo klu ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-4: dri za mi'am ci ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-5: rgyal chen bdag ni mi lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-6: khyim thab dang ni bral ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-7: de nas de ni shing las phab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-8: de nyid du ni lhan cig nyal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-9: rgyal po sa dbang chen po pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-10: mi dbang de la sdug par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-11: de des shing rta'i steng du bskyon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-13: de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-14: bram ze de gcig po lam du 'gyod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-15: bdag gis dgon par chung ma por te 'ongs pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas kyi; slar song ste khrid de 'ong ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-16: de'i phyir au dum w'a ri ka'i drung du phyin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-17: de mi snang nas gzhan zhig las rgyal po skyed pas khrid de btsun mor byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-19: tshig de thos nas yang yid la shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-20: rgyal po'i sgor phyin na nang du ma chud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-21: bltas na rgyal po'i 'khor na las gsar ba byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-22: de las mi 'di dag dang lhan cig rdo ba khyer te 'gro'o snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-23: des rdo ba khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-24: bltas na bdag gi chung ma rgyal po dang lhan cig tu au shud brgya zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-25: chung ma 'di dang lhan cig gtam thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bya snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125a-27: gzhi ni gser las byas pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-0: brgyad du 'jog cing dga' @125b bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-1: bzang mo bdag la mi dga' ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-2: shing mkhan rdo ba blangs par byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-3: gnas der bdag gis smras pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-4: bud med sha zar mi rung zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-5: de skad smra ba'i tshig kyang dran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-7: au dum w'a ra'i shing dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-8: yid 'ong khyod kyis bdag la dris //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-9: dga' dga'i drung na skyes pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-10: shing mkhan gyis ni rdo ba long //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-11: chu grog shing bus dkrugs pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-12: dris pa'i lan ni bdag la smros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-13: bud med btung du mi rung zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-14: smras pa yin zhes 'dir bdag go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-15: mang thos nas tshogs smra ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-16: gser 'od grangs med slad du smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-17: bzang mo bdag la mi dga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-18: slob dpon rdo ba blang bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-19: ma smin rnams ni bdag la mor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-20: smin pa dag ni khyod kyis zos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-21: tshig rtsub smra ba de yang dran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-23: ri rtse nas ni bdag 'dor te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-24: dug kyang bza'o bram ze mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-25: khyod kyi mya ngan phyir bdag 'chi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-26: shing mkhan gyis ni rdo ba long //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-27: ri yi rtse nas bdag bor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-28: bram ze dug kyang za la rag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-30: au shud kyis ni khyim du byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-31: de nas de gnyis phan tshun de skad du gtam zer ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-32: rgyal po dogs pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-33: lha mo khyed cag gtam ci zer ba ni ngas khong du ma chud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-34: khyed cag ci zer ba bag phob la bdag gis thos par smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-36: bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:125b-37: bud med au dum w'a ri kas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-0: @126a *// lha la ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-1: 'di ni bdag gi khyo lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-2: bdag gi pha mas 'di'i chung mar byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-3: 'dis mkhas pa bram ze shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-4: shes pa'i yan lag kun shes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-5: de nas rgyal pos lha mo la ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-6: de'i sems ji ltar mgu bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-7: khyed ci de dang 'grogs te 'gro bar bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-9: des ji ltar bdag la 'dod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-10: de'i sngags ma rungs pas mi tshugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-11: bram ze'i sngags kyi stobs su mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-13: de nas rgyal po skyed pas ji ltar gyur pa de sman chen po la smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-14: sman chen pos lha dang ji ltar bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-15: ji ltar bya sman chen pos bram ze 'di ltar bus pa chung ngu rgya mi che la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-16: btsun mo rnams shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-17: de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-18: de btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas de 'dam du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-21: de nas sman chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-22: rgyal po shes par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-23: bram ze de pos te mkhan po ci tshol; rgyal po'i pho brang du ci'i phyir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126a-25: bdag gi chung ma rgyal po skyed pa 'dis khrid bas na de tshol du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-0: khyod @126b rang gi chung ma ngo shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-3: sman chen pos btsun mo lnga brgya khyod kyi mdun du bzhag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-4: de rnams las rang gi ma yin pa btsun mo gzhan zhig bzung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-5: mtshon gyis khyod kyi lus dum bur bya'o zhes bsgo na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-8: de nas rgyal po skyed pas btsun mo rnams la rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa bdag gi drung du shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-9: rgyan gyis khyad par yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-10: de nas rgyal pos bshos gsol pa'i lam snang ba'i sar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-11: brgya byin gyi btsun mo bzhin du dngar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-12: au dum w'a ri ka lha mo btsun mo thams cad kyi mdun du byas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-13: ji ltar lha'i bu mo rnams kyi bskor ba bzhin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-14: rgyal po'i drung du lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-15: sman chen pos bram ze de mdun du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-16: khyod rang gi chung ma ngo shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-17: 'di nas zung zhig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-18: de nas bram ze de au dum w'a ri ka de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-19: btsun mo gzhan yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-20: sbrul sngags kyis btab pa bzhin du spa gong nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-21: nyi ma phye ba la bltar mi bzod pa bzhin bram ze de de rnams la lta zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-22: de nas de dag phyi bzhin 'dre dang 'dra ba'i bran mo chu chun ma btsun mo gzhan zhig gi phyir bzhin 'gro ba mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:126b-23: de'i lag nas bzung ste 'di bdag gi chung ma'o zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-1: chen pos de yin na khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-3: des bran mo khrid nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-4: mchog la mchog gi yid kyang chags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-6: sgur mo la yang bdag yid chags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-7: bzang mo bdag ni 'dre 'dra khyod kyang 'dre'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-8: lha dag 'tshal na dga' bzhin du 'dre mo tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-10: bdag cag dga' bar bya'o zhes smras nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-11: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-13: blon po'i mchog sman chen po ji zhig nyes te spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-14: de nas rgyal po skyed mos tshal du btsun mo dang lhan cig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-15: der btsun mo dang lhan cig nyi ma thub par rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-16: de nas btsun mo mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong ri ba bkrol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-17: shing aa sho ka'i yal ga la gzar te bzhag nas rgyal po dang lhan cig tu rtse rtse ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-18: mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong ri ba de brjed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-19: rgyal po yang btsun mo dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-20: de nam phyed na btsun mo des mu tig gi se mo do skyed mos tshal nyid du lus par dran no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-21: mu tig gi se mo do de yang spra mos khyer te shing khar bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-22: de nas rgyal pos mi dag la skyed mos tshal du mu tig gi se mo do de lus kyi myur du song la khyer te shog cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127a-23: de dag der dong na ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-0: re zhig na sprang po zhig de na gzhan gyis zos pa'i @127b lhag ma po rab 'tshol du song song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-1: lhag mas la rnyed pa zos te skyed mos tshal nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-2: 'gro ba dang rgyal po'i mi de dag gis sprang po de bzung ste gzhan ni 'di na su yang mi snang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-3: mu tig gi se mo do de phul zhig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-5: mu tig gi se mo do de khyer ba ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-7: zos pa'i lhag ma 'tshol ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-9: de dag gis de khu tshur dang dbyug pas brdegs nas btson rar bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-10: de de na bkres pas gzir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-12: bdag gis 'dir thabs shig ma byas na ni ltogs te 'chi'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-13: des btson srung dag la bdag gis mu tig gi se mo do de blangs pa bden mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-14: de tshong dpon gyi bu 'di zhes bya ba la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-16: rgyal po'i mi des thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-17: de yang der bkug ste gnyis ka shing sgrom du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-18: tshong dpon gyi bu de khyim nas kha zas sna tshogs 'ongs shing za ba la sprang po des slangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-19: tshong dpon gyi bu des spyos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-20: khyod kyis nga la kha zas kyis gso bar 'jug pa'i phyir rkur sbyar grang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-21: yong mi sbyin no zhes smra zhing za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-22: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu bshad pas mi bde ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-23: de la longs te 'dong zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:127b-24: des da ni khyod kyi tshig bdag gis mnyan pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-0: de phan chad ji ltar bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar @128a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-2: zhes de la tshig 'jam po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-3: mnas yid ches par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-4: bshang bas mi bde ba yang bshangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-5: de nas sde'i nyin mo tshong dpon gyi bu des khyim du deng phan chad bdag cag mi gnyis kyis zan khyer te shog ces spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-6: sprang po de bde bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-8: bdag sngan chad ni grong khyer thams cad bskor yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-11: btung ba zhim po chog par yod mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-12: grogs ni 'di gcig pus mi chog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-13: smad 'tshong ma zhig kyang dgug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-15: des smad 'tshong ma zhig la 'di yang khyer ba la gtogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-16: zung zhig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-17: rgyal po'i mis de yang btson rar bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-18: de dang lhan cig tu bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-19: btung ba zhim po zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-21: ci nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'di lta bu las ma thar yang bla'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-22: de bzhin du yongs su spyod pa las phyis yang 'dod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-23: smad 'tshong ma 'di gcig pus kyang mi chog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-24: nam 'dod pa dang ldan par gyur pa de na dga' ba rgyas par myong bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-25: pi wang mkhan gcig kyang dgug go snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-26: sprang po des pi wang mkhan gcig la 'dis kyang mu tig gi se mo do khyer ro zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-27: de nas de yang snga ma bzhin der bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128a-28: de tshong dpon gyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-0: pi wang @128b mkhan dang btson ra na lhan cig tu bde ba spyod cing rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-1: de nas dus ring zhig 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-2: de rnams kyis sprang po de la ci nas kyang bdag cag thar bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-3: bdag cag thar na khyod la ci nas kyang mi brel bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-4: zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-5: des kyang de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-11: de dag la yang bdag cag rnams btson ra nas phyin par sman chen po gcig pus nus kyi gzhan ni ma mthong ngo zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-12: des rgyal po'i mi rnams la sman chen po'i bu yang 'dir gtogs so zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-13: rgyal po'i mis de yang der 'gug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-14: de nas sman chen pos khyod kyi bu yang btson rar bcug go zhes thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-16: ci nas kyang 'di'i phyir da ni rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'gror mi rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-17: der ma song na bdag gi bu nyon mongs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-18: de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-21: lha bdag la bka' phab tu bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-22: bdag gi bus lha la glo ba ring ba ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-23: btson rar stsal ces gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-24: rgyal pos mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong ri ba skyed mos tshal nas stor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-25: sprang po de der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:128b-29: des kyang de dag gi thabs zhib tu thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-1: ni gang gis kyang ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-6: de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang de la snga na gnas gang du bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-7: shing drung du bzhugs so zhes sa phyogs bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-8: shing de la bltas na shing de'i rtse mo na spra mo zhig 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-10: 'dis mu tig gi se mo do de khyer yang dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-11: 'di la thabs shig sbyar te dgug go snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-12: des lha btsun mo dang lhan cig tu 'dir gshegs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-14: rgyal po yang btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-15: skyed mos tshal der lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-21: spra mo de yang shing gi rtse mor 'dug nas mu tig gi se mo do de btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-22: de nas sman chen pos btsun mo gar gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-24: des gar byas na spra mo de yang shing gi rtse mor 'dug nas gar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-25: de'i mgul nas mu tig gi se mo do de mar ltung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-26: de yang mis ji ltar byed pa dang ji ltar chas pa de la bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-29: lha btsun mo 'dis mgo btud de gar bgyis na rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-31: rgyal pos de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129a-33: de mgo btud de gar byed pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-0: spra mo des kyang mgo btud de gar @129b byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-1: de'i mgul nas mu tig gi se mo do mar ltung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-2: de nas rgyal po dga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-3: sman chen po'i mgul nas 'khyud de mgu bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-5: de nas blon po drug po de dag lhan cig tu 'dus te sngon gyi dus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-6: de'i yang sngon logs na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-7: bdag cag la rgyal pos rim gror byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-11: da ni ri brags kyi grong mi blo can bkren pa'i rigs las byung ba 'dis bdag cag thams cad gzi brjid kyis gnas nas phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-12: de la ji ltar bya zhes bgros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-13: de nas blon po gzhan zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-14: kye bdag cag sngon gcig la gcig so sor bye bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-15: des bdag cag mthu med par byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-16: de lta bas na da ni skyed mos tshal du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-22: sman chen po bdag cag la ni spang ba ni ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-25: de dag 'dus te skyed mos tshal du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-26: 'dong pa sman chen pos mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-27: de nas sman chen pos nams kyang 'di dag gcig tu 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-29: sngon lta bu ma yin pa zhig sbyar ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-31: ne tso ma ta ra la phyi bzhin song la 'di dag ci spyod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:129b-35: de nas blon po drug po de dag skyed mos tshal du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-0: @130a *// phan tshun gnyen du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-1: de ste gcig la gcig mtshang 'bru /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-3: gdod bdag cag yid ches par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-7: de nas gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-8: bdag gis ni rgyal po'i rma bya zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-10: bdag gis ni rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig nyal ba byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-12: bdag gis kyang de lta bur bya'o snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-13: de bzhin du drug po de dag gis gcig la gcig gsang gtam byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-14: snod gcig tu zos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-15: ne tso ma ta ras kyang de dag thos nas sman chen po la smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-16: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-17: nang du phyin nas de thams cad smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-19: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-22: de nas rgyal po skyed pas mngon par rtogs shing de dag mthong nas yul med par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-23: ae ma'o bdag gi blon po 'di dag ni 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa can gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-24: gang na bdag mi dbang ba der deng zhig ces de dag bskrad de bkye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-26: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-27: gang de'i dus de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-28: sman chen po ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130a-29: rgyal po skyed pa de ni dge slong sh'a ri'i bu 'di'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-0: gang @130b de'i dus kyi blon po drug po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-1: da ltar gyi ston pa drug po de dag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-2: de'i dus na yang blon por gyur nas yul med par byas sos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-3: da yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-4: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyis pham par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-6: de bas na dge slong khyed kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa la brtson par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-9: ye shes mchog tu gyur pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-10: de lta bu'i yon tan du 'gyur ba de lta bur bsgrub par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-11: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-12: mu stegs can dag ni cis kyang smra phab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-13: lha dang mi ni dga' bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-14: skye bo dam pa rnams ni mgu bar mdzad pa de'i dus na yul so so na gnas pa'i bzo bo grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-17: yul de dag nas mnyan du yod par lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-19: de dag gi bu pho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-24: phu nu dag phan tshun du tshol zhing mnyan du yod par lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-25: de mthong nas 'phags pa khyed cag ni 'dir dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-27: bdag cag gi 'tsho ba sus sbyor zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-28: de dag gis 'di nyid du 'khod la 'di nyid du khyed slobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:130b-30: de dag gis legs te de bzhin bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-1: dag slob pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-2: ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-3: de dag gis de dag mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-4: bzo bo 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung na bdag gi las sus bya zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-5: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-8: nyes pa 'di dmigs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-9: de lta bas na de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud las de dang 'dra ba'i cha spyad mi 'chang bar dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-10: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-13: khyim bdag dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-14: de lta bas na dge slong dag de dang 'dra ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-15: de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud kyi cha spyad ma 'chang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-16: dge slong rnams kyis de dang 'dra ba las de dang 'dra ba'i cha spyad 'chang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'dra ba'i cha spyad ma 'chang zhig ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-18: ji tsam na sman pa gzhan zhig rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-19: ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-20: de la dge slong dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-21: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong nad pa 'di'i sman dpyad byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-23: tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-24: de dang 'dra ba las de dang 'dra ba'i spyad ma 'chang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131a-26: de la sman dpyad cis bya zhes zer ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-3: gnang ba ni sman pa rab tu byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-4: gtar dpyad kyi spyad chongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-5: sngon yi ge bas ni ram phyis chongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-6: 'dreg mkhan rab tu byung na ni sen mo gcad pa chongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-10: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-13: mu stegs can rnams ni sma phab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-14: lha dang mi rnams ni dga' bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-15: skye bo mang po dag ni sems mgu bar mdzad pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa shin tu rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-17: bkur sti mang du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-19: rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung ba gcad par dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-20: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-21: la ba rdo dkar las shing pa ri dz'a ta ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:131b-22: ko bi da ra ka dang /
