K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-13: dpag tshad bcu gnyis man chad mi'i dri ma mnam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-14: lha rnams snom par mi bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsandan gor shir sha'i dri mngon du sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-16: dri de mi mnam par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-20: bud med rnams kyis lha'i bu mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-21: 'di ltar de dag gang khrag dron mo skyugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-22: dus byed par gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-23: ci nas ngas ji ltar skyes pas lha'i bu mthong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-24: bud med rnams kyis lha'i bu mo mthong bar 'gyur bde lta bur rdzu 'phrul mngon du 'du bya ba mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:137b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar skyes pas ni lha'i bu mthong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-1: med kyis ni lha'i bu mo mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur rdzu 'phrul 'du byas pa mngon par 'dus byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-2: de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shing gzhan zhig gi drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-3: nyin par spyod pa'i phyir 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-4: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-5: bcom ldan 'das longs spyod mchog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-6: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-7: dzambu'i gling du babs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-8: mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-9: lha 'di dag ni 'di bzhin du rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-11: bcom ldan 'das bor te rang gi gnas su dong ngo; ;mi 'di dag kyang lo brgya 'das pa dang dus byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-13: 'di lta bu'i longs spyod chen po yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-14: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-15: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-19: 'dus byas thams cad kyis chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-22: rnam par grol bar bya bar shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-23: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi rtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-26: bdag med pa nyid du yid la byed pa la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138a-27: des nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams la mi rtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-2: bdag med par yid la byas pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-3: mi rtag pa'i rnam pas 'di bzhin 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-4: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-5: de nas bden pa mthong zhing shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-6: dad pa dang ldan pas myur du skyil mo krung bshig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-7: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-8: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-9: de nas dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog mas 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-10: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-12: de la thabs ci zhig gis bdag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-13: bcom ldan 'das la thog mar phyag bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-14: de ste 'di bzhin du song na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-15: dge sbyong ma mgo reg ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-17: che zhing che ba'i lha dang mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-18: bcom ldan 'das bskor bas nang du 'gror yang mi ster gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-19: ci nas bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o snyam bsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-20: des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs su bdag nyid mngon par sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-21: rin po che sna bdun ni thog mar drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-22: blon po stobs kyi mchog sa ya phrag bdun cu rtsa dgus ni bskor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-23: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i bu stong gis kyang zla ba kham pa bzhin du bskor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:138b-28: mi mchog stong gis ni rjes su 'brang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-2: nyi ma'i 'od zer stong shar cing 'phro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-5: gzhal med khang mdzes par bcas pa zil gyis mnan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-7: 'khor de dag gis dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma rgyad ma nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-8: mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-9: mig tshugs su blta zhing rtog pa sna tshogs su gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-10: kha cig ni kye rgyal po 'di lta bu gang nas 'ongs zhes smra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-11: kha cig gis ni 'di rgyal po'i sa'i steng na 'di lta bu dmag phun sum tshogs pa ni ga la yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-12: 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'jig rten gzhan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-13: bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs yang dag ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-14: de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba de'i longs spyod de lta bu mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-15: ae ma'o bdag cag kyang 'di lta bu'i dngos por mngon par sgrubs shig ces chags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-16: de dag gis go yang phye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-17: de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-19: kye 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-20: 'di ni dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-21: rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139a-23: 'phags pa 'di dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog yin par khyod kyis ji ltar shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-0: kye @139b autpa la'i dri shin tu mnam pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-1: 'di ni autpa la'i kha dog ma ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-2: rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-3: de nas dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog mas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus byas pa slar brtul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-8: dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-11: dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul byed pa ni mi rigs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-13: phyogs gcig tu song ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-15: gang su zhig dge slong ma ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul ston na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-17: de lta bas na dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul mi bya bar dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-18: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-20: dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul ston pa mi rigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-21: de lta bas na dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul ma ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-22: dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar ston na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:139b-23: de la kha cig gis ni dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i longs spyod du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-0: @140a *// kha cig ni lha rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi longs spyod du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-1: lha rnams su chags pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mir skye ba las bzlog pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-3: 'khor de dag la 'di lta bus chos bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-4: gang gis de thos pa na kha cig gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-5: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-6: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-7: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-8: kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-9: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-10: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-11: kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-12: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-13: kha cig gis ni drod du gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-14: kha cig gis ni spyi bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-15: kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-17: 'khor de dag las phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-19: dge 'dun la rab tu bab par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-21: de lta bu'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-22: sa rnams gcig gis thob pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-23: lha rnams su yang 'gro ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-24: yang na ting nge 'dzin thob pa bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140a-25: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-0: 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par @140b bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-3: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-4: gdan la bzhengs te bzhud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-5: dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-6: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-8: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas autpa la'i kha dog ma dri las rtogs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-12: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-13: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'char kas dri las rtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-15: dge slong dag sngon byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-16: yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-17: ded dpon gzhan zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-18: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-19: de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-20: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-21: chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-22: ded dpon de yang rgya mtsho mching rnams chen por chas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-23: des de la bzang mo bdag ni zong khyer te yul gzhan du 'gro'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-24: khyim gyi bya ba la bag yod par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-26: des jo bo de ste de ltar na bdag kyang mchi yi khrid ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-27: des bzang mo khyod la de na su zhig g-yog byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-29: de ngu zhing 'dug nas g-yog po dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-30: ded dpon ci'i phyir na 'di ltar ded dpon gyi btsun mo ngu zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:140b-31: des 'di yang bdag dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-2: de de'i phyir na ngu zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-4: de dag gis ded dpon de ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-5: de bzhin ci'i phyir ma bkri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-6: de na su zhig 'di la g-yog byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-7: ded dpon de lta bas na nyes pa med kyi khrid cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-10: des de khrid de rim bzhin dong pa las rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po'i nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-11: de dag rgya mtsho mching rnams chen por zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-12: gru bo che chu srin nya lta bus mi rigs par bzlog pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-14: de'i chung ma di shing leb gcig la 'jus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-15: rlung gis rim bzhin du phul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-16: gling ka she rur phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-17: de na bya'i rgyal po gshog bzang gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-18: des de'i chung mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-19: de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang btsas na bu pho zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-20: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa bzang po zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-21: de nas yang bya'i rgyal po gshog bzang de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-22: de dag rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-23: bu 'dab gshog bzang po zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-24: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-25: bya'i rgyal po gshog bzang dus las 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-26: bya mang po 'dus nas gshog bzang 'das pa'i skyin par bu rgyal por bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141a-27: de la mas bu khyod ni pha'i skyin par rgyal por bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-0: khyod kyi phu bo 'di 'khor mo 'jig gi rgyal por @141b chug cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-3: de'i dus na 'khor mo 'jig gi rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-8: mi la sogs pa skye bo mang po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-12: mi 'dum pa rnams rab tu zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-17: ma her ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-18: de don byed pa'i phyir 'dug pa las bya'i rgyal po gshog bzang gi spar mos lag nas bzung ste; rgya mtsho chen por bor nas phu bo de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-19: seng ge'i gdan de la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-20: de nas blon po dag la kye 'di ni khyod kyi rgyal po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-21: 'di la gang gis nyes pa cung zad cig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-22: de la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i gnas su bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-25: de'i tshig bzhin mnyan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-26: de dag gis de su la yang ma smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-27: 'jig rten pa dag ni de nyid tshangs byin yin par shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-28: des bya'i rgyal po la nu bo khyod kyis bdag dus dus su ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-30: des kyang legs kyi; blta'o zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-31: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-32: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi ba glang mo be'u byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:141b-33: de'i be'u mngal gyi sgor thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-0: blon po dag gis rgyal po la @142a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-2: des btsun mo'i 'khor du 'khrid la btsun mo rnams kyis bden pa'i tshig gis zug rngu med par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-4: des de'i btsun mo'i 'khor du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-5: btsun mo rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i tshig gis smon lam btab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-6: de dag gis kyang de'i zug rngu dang bral bar ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-7: der sgra chen po drag po byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang nas mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-9: ba lang rdzi mo zhig gnas pa des thos nas des gzhan zhig la rgyal po'i pho brang na sgra drag po chen po 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-10: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-11: des bdag gis bden pa'i tshig gi smon lam btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-12: de'i zug rngu dbral bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-14: de dag gis blon po dag la gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-15: blon po dag gis de btsun mo'i 'khor du khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-16: des bden pa'i tshig gis smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-17: des bdag la khyo gcig pur zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-18: skyes pa gnyis pa med par bden na bden pa'i tshig 'dis ba lang mo zug rngu dang myur du bral bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-19: ces bden pa'i tshig gis smon lam btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-20: de las be'u byung na mjug ma la thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-22: 'di tsam yang bzod par ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142a-23: btsun mo dag gis ci zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-0: bdag gis khye'u chung ngu zhig pang bar blangs @142b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-2: gcin de bdag gi mo mtshan du song ba bdag gis dga' bar tshor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-3: de'i phyir mjug ma thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-4: des ji ltar gyur pa de yang smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-5: mjug ma yang de nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-6: blon po dag gis rgyal po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-7: lha bal glang mo de be'u 'brangs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-9: de zug rngu las sus phral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-11: de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-13: gdon mi za bar bdag gi btsun mo thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-14: tshul khrims ngan par gyur pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-15: bal glang rdzi mos bden pa'i tshig gis smon lam btab pas zug rngu las bral bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-17: kye bal glang rdzi mo de la dri yi bos shig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-19: rgyal pos khyod kyis bal glang mo de bden pa'i tshig gis smon lam btab pas zug rngu las 'bral bar byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-22: rgyal pos gang 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i bu mo yang 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-23: de ste 'di la bu mo zhig yod na de chung mar blang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-24: skad cig dri'o snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-25: khyod la bu mo yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-29: lha ming ni sho shum pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-34: su la yang ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:142b-35: ma ma de ste de ltar na nga la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-0: rgyal pos dpal chen po'i tshogs dang sbyar @143a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-2: rgyal pos de ste 'di btsun mo dag gi 'khor 'dir bzhag na ni tshul khrims ngan pa can du gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-4: des bya'i rgyal po gshog bzang la ji ltar gyur pa smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-6: ka shi ru'i gling du khrid la mtshan mo khrid de shog cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-10: de des bya gshog bzang la bskri nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-11: 'di ltar phar khrid la tshur khrid de shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-12: de nyin par ni ka shi ru'i gling du khrid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-13: mtshan mo ni 'khor mo 'jig tu khrid cing 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-14: ka shi ru'i gling na me tog tri ma ri zhes bya ba dri zhim po zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-15: mos de phreng bar brgyus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-16: rgyal po tshangs byin la nyin gcig bzhin bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-17: 'khor mo 'jig na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-18: de dus phyi zhig na yam shing gi phyir nags su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-19: de der mi'am ci mo zhig gis mthong nas de brag phug tu bcug ste bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-20: mi de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-21: nam mi'am ci mo me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-23: brag phug gi sgo bram ze'i khye'us bskyod mi nus pa'i rdo leb chen pos 'gebs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-24: ji tsam na de la bram ze'i khye'u de'i bu zhig btsas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143a-25: de gar 'gro yang myur du 'gro bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-0: bram ze'i khye'u @143b des de'i mdun na rtag tu yul 'khor mo 'jig gi yon tan brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-1: bu 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer na yon tan 'di dag dang 'di lta bu'i yon tan yod do zhes brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-2: des pha khyod yul gang yin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-3: des bdag ni yul 'khor mo 'jig na skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-5: pha de ltar lags na ci'i phyir mi 'bros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-7: des khyod kyi ma me tog dang 'bras bu'i phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe brag phug gi sgo 'di rdo leb chen pos bkab cing 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-8: 'di ni ngas bskyod par mi nus na ji lta 'bros zhes smras pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-11: des rdo ba la goms par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-12: zhes zer zhing nyi ma gcig ni rdo ba chung ngu zhig bteg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-13: gnyis pa ni de bas che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-14: gsum pa ni de bas kyang shin tu che ste; 'di bzhin du rdo leb de nam 'degs nus kyi bar du gom par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-15: de nas des pha rdo leb dor gyi bros te bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-17: des bu 'di ltar khyod kyi ma me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-19: slar myur du 'ong gi mi 'bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-21: gdon mi za bar yu bu cag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-24: des pha ci nas myur du mi 'khor ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-27: des me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:143b-28: des de khar bcug cing bcug cing bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-0: mas bu ci'i phyir khar bcug cing @144a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-4: ma khyod le lo byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-6: me tog dang 'bras bu kha ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-7: skyur ba sha stag khyer te 'ongs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-8: mi zhim ste za mi nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-10: mas bu de ste de bzhin na sang ni ring du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-11: nye pa na ni zhim po med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-12: sang ni ring du 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-14: ma de bzhin du gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-17: de'i phyir de nyin ring mo zhig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-18: myur 'gros pha bdag gis ring du btang gi da ni 'bros pa'i dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-21: bu legs kyi rdo ba bor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-22: des rdo leb bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-23: de myur 'gro dang lhan cig bros te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-27: ring zhig lon nas 'ongs te bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-28: brag phug stong par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-31: ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-33: bram ze khye'u des nga'i bu yang khrid de bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-37: mi'i nang na bde ba ni de la mya ngan ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-38: des bdag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa'i phyir ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-40: bdag gis de la 'tsho ba cung zad kyang ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-41: phu nu mo ci ster ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144a-42: bdag gi lag tu skur dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-0: de ste @144b mthong ba dang sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-2: des de'i lag tu pi wang gcig byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-3: phu nu mo de la khyod kyis pi wang 'di long la 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-4: rgyud ya thog ma la ma re ga cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-5: nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-6: des de khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-7: bram ze des khye'u myur du 'gro de bram ze mang po slob pa la phul nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di slobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-9: des de klog tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-10: khye'u de dag gsang ste gang gi dus na mi klog par gyur pa de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-12: ci tsam na khye'u de dag mi klog par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-13: de dag yam shing thur dong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-14: myur 'gro de shin tu ring par song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-15: de'i ma'i grogs mos mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-18: des ci 'dra ba'i gtam zhig bkres skom pas gzir to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-21: khyod kyi ma de ni mya ngan byed de ngu zhing 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-23: ma 'bar ma mo de dang lhan cig tu smra bar mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-24: bu de ste mi 'gro na khyod kyi 'tsho ba zhig sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-25: de su la yang mi sbyin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-27: de su la yang mi sbyin par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-28: des de la pi wang de byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-30: nyes pa'i dmigs su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyud ltag ma la ma re ga cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-31: des ma nyes kyi de bzhin bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:144b-33: des blangs te bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi nang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-1: khyod ci'i phyir ring zhig thogs te 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-5: kye bdag gi ma'i grogs mos mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-6: des bdag la pi wang 'di sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-7: de dag gis khye'u khyod pi wang len shes sam zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-13: des rgyud ltag ma la ma reg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-15: khye'u ci'i phyir na khyod rgyud ltag ma la mi reg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-17: des kye de ste 'di la reg na ni nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-19: de dag gis bram ze'i bu reg pa lta na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ba ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-21: de dag gis reg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-22: de dag thams cad mchong rgal zhing gar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-23: de dag gar byas pas 'phyis par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-24: de dag nub kar mkhan po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-25: des khye'u dag ci'i phyir ring zhig lon te 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-27: de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-28: des myur 'gro de la khyod pi wang len cing glu len shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-31: bram ze'i khye'u de lta bas na pi wang mnyan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-33: des de len cing glu blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-34: des rgyud ltag ma la ma reg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-35: des bram ze'i khye'u ci'i phyir rgyud ltag ma la mi reg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145a-37: des smras pa mkhan po de ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-0: 'di la reg na ni @145b nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-1: des bram ze'i bu 'di la reg na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ba ci yod reg cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-4: bram ze chung ma dang bcas te mchod rgal zhing gar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-5: khyim de thams cad kyang mchongs pas zhig par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-6: de zhig pas rdza ma'i snod thams cad chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-7: bram ze de khros nas bram ze'i khye'u de'i mgrin pa nas bzung ste bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-10: len pas 'tsho ba sbyor ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-11: phyi zhig na tshong pa lnga brgya rtsam zhig rgya mtsho chen por 'dod pa'i zong rnams sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-12: rgya mtsho chen por chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-14: kye bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-17: de dag la gcig gis gang bkri zhes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-18: gzhan zhig gis bram ze'i bu myur 'gro zhes bya ba bkri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-20: kha cig gis legs kyi de bzhin bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-22: de dag gis bram ze'i bu myur 'gro khrid de rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-23: de nas rgya mtsho chen por dong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-24: myur 'gro rol mo'i pi wang mnyan gyi long zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-25: des pi wang len cing glu len pa la zhugs pa na des pi wang de'i rgyud ltag ma la ma reg nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-26: tshong pa de dag gis ji ltar myur 'gro rgyud ltag ma 'di la ci'i phyir mi reg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:145b-28: kye de ste 'di la reg na ni nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-1: bram ze'i bu nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ba ci zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-2: reg cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-4: gru bo che 'phar te gru bub cing zhig pas tshong pa de dag dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-5: de ni sngon gyi las kyi mthus shing leb cig zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-6: myur ba'i rlung gis gling ka sher phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-7: de de na skyed mos tshal gzhan zhig na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-8: de na mi gzhan ni med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-9: des sho shum pa de mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-10: de dang lhan cig du nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-11: de nyin par ni myur 'gro dang yongs su spyod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-12: mtshan mo ni rgyal po tshangs byin dang spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-13: des bzang mo khyod mtshan mo gang du 'gro zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-14: de de dang mdza' bar 'gyur bas thams cad smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-17: de bzhin bdag kyang 'khor mo 'jig tu khrid cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-23: bzang mo bdag gi ming ni myur 'gro zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-24: khyod kyi ming ci zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-26: jo bo bdag gi ming ni sho shum pa zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-27: des rdo ba las thabs su sbyar bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-28: nyin gcig ni rdo chung ngu zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-30: nyi ma gnyis na rdo de tsam gnyis so; ;nyi ma gsum na rdo de tsam gsum po nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-31: de bzhin du mi'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i bar du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146a-32: de nas myur 'gro dang lhan cig tu bya gshog bzang la zhon te dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-2: nyes pa byung ta re zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-3: des mig btsums nas nam 'khor mo 'jig dang nye bar phyin na des skye bo mang po dag gi sgra ca co thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-4: des bsams pa; da ni phyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-6: des mi phye ba dang mig byung ste long bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-7: sho shum pas de skyed mos tshal tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-8: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo rnams kyi nang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-9: de nas dus phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-17: 'tsho ba 'tsho byed rnams sgra 'byin pa'i nags stug por rgyal po tshangs byin btsun mos bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-18: sho shum pa dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal tu dong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-19: bram ze'i bu myur 'gros me tog ti mi ra'i dri mnam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-21: de 'dra ba'i glu blang bar bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-22: rlung gis su ni bskyod pas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-23: ti mi ra yi dri mnam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-24: gang na sho shum pa gnas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-25: ka sher ru yi gling dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-26: de rgyal po tshangs byin gyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-28: kye 'di na glu len pa su yin tshol cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-29: de dag gis lha mig dang bral ba'i skyes bu zhig skyed mos tshal 'di na glu len cing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-32: kye skyes bu khyed kyis glu blangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-34: lha bdag gis glu blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:146b-35: kye skyes bu yang long zhig dang mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-1: bdag gis blangs pa de snyan pa lta zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-2: de'i phyir rgyal po nyan par 'dod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-3: gal te cung zad thob kyang srid snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-5: rlung gis su ni bskyod pas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-6: ti mi ra yi dri mnam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-7: gang na sho shum pa gnas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-8: ka she ru yi gling dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-10: kye skyes bu ka she ru'i gling 'di nas ji srid ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-11: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-13: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rnams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-14: de na gnas pa sho shum pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-15: ka she ru yi gling dag na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-16: de la rgyal po tshangs byin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-17: de'i lan tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-18: de ste bdag gi yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-19: sho shum pa zhes bya ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-20: khyod kyis nges par mthong thos na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-21: lus la mtshan yod pa yang smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-22: des kyang slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-23: sva ti ka ni brla la yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-24: de yi nu bar 'khyil ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-25: ti mi ra yi me tog rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-26: rgyud pa khyod kyi phyir yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-27: rgyal pos 'di yang 'di ltar ngan pa spyod par gyur pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-28: 'di mi dgos kyi long ba 'di la sbyin no snyam bsam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-29: phyir yang khros te tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-30: sho shum pa ni khyod sbyin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-31: rgyan kun gyis ni klubs bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-32: bong bu bskyon la sbug nas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-33: grong khyer nas ni myur du dengs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147a-34: rgyal po de khros nas bzhon pa bong bu la sho shum pa dang lhan cig tu bskyon de phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-0: des khrid de phan tshun du @147b 'khyam 'khyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-2: ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-3: de na lha khang stong pa zhig tu gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-4: de'i nub mo mi rgod lnga brgya tsam zhig ri brags kyi grong der 'joms su lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-5: ri brags kyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis tshor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-6: de dag gis kun tu bsgrags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-7: ri brags kyi grong mi dag gis mi rgod rnams btags bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-8: de nas mi rgod kyi dpon po de ma zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-9: lha'i khang pa de nyid du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-10: ri brags kyi grong mi dag gis lha'i khang pa de khor khor yug tu bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-11: mi rgod kyi dpon po des sgo bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-12: ri brags kyi grong mi dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-16: kye bdag cag ni mgron pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-19: gyi na 'da' khyod nyid don med par byas ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-20: mi rgod kyi ded dpon des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-21: sho shum pa la kye long ba 'dis ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-22: 'di bskrad la bdag cag gnyis yongs su spyod do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-23: des jo bo legs kyi de bzhin mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-26: de dang mi rgod kyi ded dpon gyis long ba de ra ba'i rtsig pa'i kha nas bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-27: ri brags kyi grong mi de dag gis de'i mgo bcad de bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-28: de'i phyi de nyin mi rgod kyi ded dpon gyis khrid de dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:147b-29: chu bo ka ra da bar phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-0: rgal du gru med nas des bzang mo ka ra da ba 'di ni chus gang ba la brgal bar bya @148a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-1: na; khyod rgyan dang bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-2: brgal du ni mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-3: khyod re zhig khrus byed cing 'dug cig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-5: phyir 'ongs nas phyis khyod bsgral bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-7: mos jo bo legs kyi de bzhin du khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-9: des de la gos dang rgyan thams cad byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-10: de chu'i nang du zhugs te sgren mor 'dug go ;de yang chu'i dbus su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-11: de la 'dis bdag gi gos dang rgyan rnams phrogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-12: mi 'ong ngam zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-13: ka ra da 'di chu yis gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-14: bzang mos khyod la rdzas kun byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-15: bdag ni dogs sems skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-16: sdig can khyod ni bdag ma bslu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-17: des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-18: mi shes khyod kyis bshes rnying bsad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-19: skyes bu de ni don med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-20: de bas khyod la yid brtan dka'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-21: bdag kyang khyod kyis mi bsad dam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-22: des de la phrogs te bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-23: de yang sgren mor nags stug po'i nang du zhugs te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-24: ji tsam na wa rgan mo zhig sha ltar ltar bo zhig khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-25: chu bo ka ra da pa'i 'gram nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-26: nya zhig kyang rgyags ches pas chu las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-27: skam sa la lhung nas des sha de bor te nya'i phyir rgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-28: nya ni phyir chu bo ka ra da bar zhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-29: sha de yang bya'o la bas khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148a-30: de gnyis ka las bral bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-0: rna ba phab cing 'gyod cing @148b 'dug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-1: sho shum pa rtsva stug po'i nang na 'dug pas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-2: mos tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-3: sha dum de ni 'ol bas phrogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-4: nya ni chu bo'i nang du bros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-5: gnyis ka las su bral bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-6: was ni mya ngan ci zhig bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-7: des phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-9: de nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-10: mi rgod gar yang mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-11: glu la bdag ni mi dga' na; ;rtsva yi nang na gnas pa su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-12: bdag la 'phya zhing dgod par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-13: des zhang po bdag ni sho shum pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-15: wa de khros te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-16: sbyar ma 'di bdag la 'phya bar shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-17: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-18: khyo ni khyod kyis bsad pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-19: byi bo de ni bros pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-20: gnyis ka las ni bral bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-21: sbyar ma mya ngan cir mi byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-22: mos slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-23: bdag ni khyim du song nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-24: khyo gcig cig ni blang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-25: de nas khyo gcig rnyed pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-26: rigs sun dbyung bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-27: was tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-28: gang gi dus na gangg'a slar log cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-29: zho yi kha dog tu ni bya rog gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-30: ta la 'bras byung de dus na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-31: khyod gdod tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-32: nam zhig bya rog 'ug pa gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-33: shing gcig la ni gnas bcas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-34: yid ni dga' bar gyur bas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-35: de dus tshul khrims khyod ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-36: nam zhig sbrul dang sre mo gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-37: khung gcig tu ni gnas pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:148b-38: dga' bar byed cing 'khod pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-2: nam zhig rus sbal bal las ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-3: bgo ba dag ni legs byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-4: dgun gyi bgo bar gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-5: de tshe tshul khrims khyod ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-6: nam zhig sbrang bu'i lag ngar las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-7: skas ka ru ni legs bcas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-8: mtho ris 'gro ba'i skas btsugs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-9: de tshe tshul khrims khyod ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-10: nam zhig ku mud sdong bu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-11: zam pa rab tu legs byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-13: de tshe tshul khrims khyod ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-14: nam zhig rgya mtsho'i dbus nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-15: legs par yang ni me 'bar la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-16: skye bo mang po dag ni 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-17: de tshe tshul khrims khyod ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-19: bdag gis bzhad gad byas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-20: der zad na bdag gis khyod sngon gyi gnas su slar bzhag par bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-21: khyod kyis bdag la lan ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-23: des kyang zhang po de ste bdag khyod kyis sngon gyi gnas su bzhag na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-24: khyod la bdag gis nyin re zhing shu dum bu re re sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-26: des de ste de bzhin bzhag gi ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-27: khyod chu klung du zhugs la lkog ma man chad chur chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-28: shar phyogs su ltos te 'dug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-29: bdag gis lha la gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-31: des rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-32: lha 'di ltar sho shum pa ni dge zhing bden te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-33: dka' thub spyod pa byed kyi myur du 'bod pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149a-35: rgyal po tshangs byin gyis wa'i skad la mkhas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-0: kye chu bo ka ra @149b da na sho shum pa dka' thub spyod cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-1: zhes thos kyi de tshur khug cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-2: de dag gis gos dang rgyan bskon te 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-3: rgyal pos sngon gyi gnas su slar bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-4: mos de la nyi ma re re zhing sha'i dum bu re re byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-5: ji srid cig gi dus su byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-6: de nas ma byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-7: wa des rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-8: sho shum pa de ste khyod kyis bdag la sha'i dum bu byin na ni dge'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-9: ma byin na ni legs par brdegs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-10: ji ltar sngon gyi gnas su phyir yang gzhag go zhes bsdigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-12: yang de la nyin re re zhing sha'i dum bu byin pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-13: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems gang sho shum pa de ni 'di ltar 'di bzhin de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-14: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-15: gang myur 'gro de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na yang 'di ltar 'dis dri las shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-18: da ltar yang 'dis dri las shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-20: dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang nas mngon par dga'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-24: chu bo 'bal gu ma ta'i 'gram na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:149b-25: dge slong dag 'jim pa'i ril bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-1: bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-2: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-4: de lta bas na dge slong dag gis 'di bzhin du 'jim pa'i ril bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-5: pho long gi sbyor ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-9: ji ltar chu bo 'bal gu ma ta'i 'gram na; dge slong rnams brtson par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-12: dge slong dag gis brtson 'grus ma gtang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-13: dge slong dag gis brtson 'grus btang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gro ti ka zhes bya ba'i drung ri ki ti'i nags stug po na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-15: de'i tshe ri ki ti'i dge slong tha skar skyes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-17: dge slong dmar skya rnams gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-18: de dag gis 'di lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-21: ched du bltar 'dod zhing 'khod pa de 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150a-34: bya la ba ka 'thab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150b-2: gzhon nu ma stobs 'gyed du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150b-6: 'di ltar dge slong legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150b-8: byed du 'jug pa'i dge slong mgo reg 'di la ci'i phyir bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:150b-9: mchod par bya snyam du bsams so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:182b-2: de dag gis kyang gzhan dag rab tu byung ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:183a-15: da dung yang dad pa'i bram ze dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:183b-1: da dung yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis yan lag gi mchog las skyes pa'i skra sa la bting ste; dge sbyong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:183b-2: skra 'di'i steng du gshegs shig dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:183b-12: da dung nga'i bstan pa lo stong tshang bar nyes pa med cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-12: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-13: de'i dus na mnyan du yod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-15: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-16: de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-17: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-18: de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-25: des de srang zhig tu mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-26: bu mo khyod su'i zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-27: des 'phags ma su'i yang ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184a-28: mgon med pa'o zhes smras pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-1: des su zhig gis bdag rab tu 'byin ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-2: des bu mo ngas rab tu dbyung gi tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-5: de dang lhan cig tu dbyar mo khang du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-6: sbom dga' mos rab tu phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-7: de nyon mongs pas gzir nas slar babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-8: sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-9: des bu mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-10: des rkang pa la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-14: bu mo de ste de bzhin na ci'i phyir yang rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-16: 'phags ma su zhig dag slar babs pa las rab tu 'byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-17: bu mo bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-18: legs so zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-20: bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-22: khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ma legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-23: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu mo dag ni chos la ngal bsos shing ngal bsos shing chos la spyod do zhes 'phya'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-24: de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-25: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-27: gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-28: dge slong ma dag babs shing slar rab tu byung ba'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:184b-29: de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis babs pa la slar rab tu mi dbyung bar dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-2: dge slong dag bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-3: khyim bdag rnams ni rigs par 'phya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-4: de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lan cig babs pa mthu med pa dge slong mas rab tu ma dbyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-5: rab tu 'byin na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-10: gshe ba dang yang 'phya ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-11: dge slong la ni dge slong ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-12: 'phya ba dge slong dge tshul ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-14: de'i tshe na yul 'khor mo 'jig na khyim bdag go'u ta ma zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-16: longs spyod chen po zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-17: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-18: de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-19: de dus phyi zhig na grong khyer nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-20: khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-21: des de la bde bar 'ongs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-22: zhes bya ba'i tshig snyan pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-23: ngal bsos te gcig la gcig byams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-24: khyim bdag go'u ta ma de dang lhan cig mdza' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185a-25: khyim bdag go'u ta mas zong rnams btsongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-0: slar zong rnams khyer nas grong khyer 'khor mo 'jig @185b tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-1: yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag kyang phyi zhig na zong khyer nas 'khor mo 'jig tu 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-2: de yang khyim bdag go'u ta ma'i khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-3: des kyang de la ri mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-4: mdza' ba'i tshig gis bde bar 'ongs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-7: de gnyis gcig la gcig mdza' ba las mdza' ba rab tu skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-8: yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis khyim bdag go'u ta ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-9: grogs po bdag cag gnyis dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-12: sum tsha dag mdza' ba'i rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i thabs ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-16: bdag gis kyang de snyam bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-17: de bas na tshur shog bu ma byung ba nas gnyen du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-18: de ste bdag la bu pho zhig byung ba khyod la bu mo zhig byung na khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-19: 'on te khyod la bu pho zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-20: bdag la bu mo zhig na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-22: grogs po legs kyi de bzhin bya'o zhes zer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-23: yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-24: khyim bdag go'u ta ma gnyis lhan cig tu bu ma byung ba nas gnyen du 'thams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-25: des zong btsongs te slar gyis zong khyer nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-26: des de na chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:185b-27: phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-1: brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang btsas nas bu pho zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-2: de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyas par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-3: der rigs dang mthun pa'i ming zhig btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-4: 'khor mo 'jig gi khyim bdag gis yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag las bu pho zhig btsas pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-5: des bdag gi grogs po la bu pho zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-6: khye'u de ni bdag gi mag par 'gyur yang srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-7: de'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskur ro snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-8: des de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-9: yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag de la grogs po khyod la bu pho zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-11: grogs po la bu btsas pas bdag la shin tu dga' ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-12: khye'u'i phyir gos dang rgyan zhig bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-13: long zhig ces yi ge spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-15: slar gyis lan spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-16: khyim bdag go'u ta mas de bklags nas bu mo zhig 'byung du smon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-17: chung ma dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-18: de rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-19: chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-20: de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang btsas nas bu mo zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-21: gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-22: cung zad du rid cing nyam chung ba zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186a-23: de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyas par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-1: bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes bgros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-3: bu mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la khyim bdag go'u ta ma'i bu mo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-4: de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming ni skem mo go'u ta mi zhes ming du gtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-5: yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis 'di ltar 'khor mo 'jig gi khyim bdag go'u ta ma la bu mo zhig btsas so; ;zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-6: des bdag gi grogs po las bu mo zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-7: bu mo de ni bdag gi mna' mar 'gyur bar nges kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-8: de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur ba'i rigs so snyam bsams te; khyim bdag go'u ta ma la grogs po bdag gis ni khyod la bu mo zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-9: zhes thos nas bdag shin tu dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-10: grogs po'i bu mo la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-11: long zhig ces des yi ge spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-13: slar grogs po mdza' bos byas pa de ni legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-15: bu mo skyes nas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-16: zhes lan spring ngo; ;khyim bdag go'u ta mas yi ge bklags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-17: bu mo de bud med kyi bslab pa rnams slob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-18: yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis kyang bu de bslab pa slob tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-19: des smad 'tshong ma dag dang sngon lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa de la bu mo 'di la bslab pa rnams slobs shig par gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:186b-20: des de la bslab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-3: bdag gis bslab pa rnams lobs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-4: da ni 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-5: bud med des bu legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-6: lobs par byas da dung ma 'gro zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-8: bdag gis legs par lobs zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-10: des rgya skyegs kyi thum po zhig thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-11: bu de ste khyod bshol bzhin du 'gro bar 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-12: bdag gi mgo bo brdung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-13: des ma ma de ltar ma byed cig dang bdag mi 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-17: ngas bslab pa rnams lobs so zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-18: khyod kyis 'di tsam yang ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-19: gzhan gyi bu'i phyir bdag gi mgo bo brdung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-20: khyod ni shes rab can ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-21: de yang ji srid cig tu 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-22: ma ma 'gro'o zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-23: mos bu 'dug cig ces smras kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-24: de 'dug tu ma btub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-25: mos bu de ste khyod bshol bzhin du yang 'gro bar 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-26: bdag gi lus khron par mchong ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-27: des ma ma de ltar na bdag mi 'gros ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-30: bkren pa khyod na re ngas bslab pa rnams lobs zin to zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187a-31: 'di tsam yang khyod kyis mi shes te 'di ltar gzhan gyi bu'i phyir bdag nyid khron par ci'i phyir mchong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-0: khyod 'dug tu ma btub na bdag gis khron @187b pa'i nang du glod bcas pa der bdag 'dug tu zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-1: khyod shes rab can ma yin gyi 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-2: des ji srid cig tu 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-3: ma ma mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-5: bu de ste 'di ltar dus kyis then na sdod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-6: 'o thug btsos te 'thung la song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-8: des 'o thug btsos te de nyid kyi mdun du snod du mar dang sbrang rtsis btab ste 'thungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-9: snod de nyid du slar skyugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-10: skyugs nas yang rje'u de nyid du blugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-14: ma ma 'di ni skyugs pa yin na ji ltar btung zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-15: mos ngu ba ltar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-16: khyim mtshes de dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-18: kye ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-19: des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad zhib tu smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-20: de dag gis bu khyod kyi phyir thug pa 'di sbyar na ci'i phyir mi 'thung zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-21: des kye 'di ni skyugs pa yin na skyugs pa ji ltar btung zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-22: de'i phyi phyir brang brdungs te ngu zhing 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-23: kye ci'i phyir kho mos 'di la skyugs pa blud ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-24: de 'khor gyi khyim mtshes de dag gis nan gyis blud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-26: mos de'i lag pa nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-27: gdong du thal mo gcig brgyab nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:187b-29: ngas bslab pa rnams lobs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-1: khyod kyis bslab pa rnams lobs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-2: 'di ltar khyod kyis mngon sum du skyugs pa mthong yang 'thung bar shom na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-3: khyod ni shes rab can ma yin no zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-4: des de bskrad de btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-5: de dus phyi zhig na tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu zong khyer te yul gyi dbus su dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-6: des tshong pa de dag gi mdun du phyi phyir zhing bud med la smod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-7: de dag rim bzhin du 'khor mo 'jig tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-8: tshong pa de dag sngon gyi smad 'tshong ma de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-9: de dag kyang de dang bsten pas kyang bud med la smod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-10: smad 'tshong ma gang gi khyim du yang mi dong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-11: smad 'tshong ma de dag gcig la gcig gros byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-12: de dag las gcig gis che zhe sngon ni yul rdo 'jog gi tshong pa dag lhags nas de dag yu bu cag dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod par 'ong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-13: da ni thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-14: su yang bdag cag dang lhan cig yongs su mi spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-16: gzhan gyis che zhe bdag gis ni de dag gi ded dpon de ni g-yem pa'i cho ga la mkhas pas bud med la shin tu smod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188a-18: de dang bsten pas na de dag kun bdag cag dang lhan cig tu ma spyod do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-0: de dag gi nang nas smad 'tshong ma @188b rgan mo zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-1: bu mo de skyes pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-3: de dag gi che zhe de ni skyes pa ste skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-5: de ste bdag gi bu mos de bsgyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-6: de ste khyed kyis dpon mor gzhug gam zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-7: de dag gis gzhug tu ni rung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-8: de ste ma gyur na khyod kyis ci sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-11: karsha pa na lnga brgya khyed la sbyin no; ;de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-13: de nas bud med rgan mo des de dag dang nye ba'i khyim zhig glas na snod spyad mang du bsags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-14: de ded dpon de'i khye'u dag der 'ongs shing lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-16: des de dag la bu khyed su zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-18: ma ma bdag cag ni yul rdo 'jog gi ded dpon gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-20: bu bdag gi bu yang ded dpon yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-21: zong khyer nas yul gzhan du song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-22: de'i khye'u dag kyang ji ltar khyed bzhin du de dag kyang gzhan las snod rnyen pa snyam bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-23: de bas na khyim 'di na snod yod pa de dag kun khyed cag nyid kyi dang 'dra bas ci bde bar spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-24: de dag gis de nas snod spyad nyin gcig bzhin du blangs shing 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-25: de dag la ded dpon gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-26: kye khyed la nyin gcig bzhin snod spyad dang yo byad sus byin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:188b-27: de dag gis ded dpon gnas 'di na ded dpon gyi ma zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-0: bdag gi bu yang yul gzhan du @189a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-2: de'i khye'u dag kyang 'di ltar khyed bzhin du gzhan las snod spyad rnyed gdon mi zas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-3: de lta bas na khyim 'di na snod spyad yod pa dag kun khyed cag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar ci bder spyod cig ces mchi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-4: de nas snod spyad 'tshal zhing mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-5: des de la byams pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-6: kye khyed la de ltar byams pa byed na de bdag gi yang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-8: de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-10: khyed la yon tan shin tu brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-11: 'di ltar khyed la kun sbyor ba de bdag gi yang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-13: mos de ltar na bu mthong yang ci ma rung zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-14: de dag gis kyang ma ma legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-15: ded dpon la bgyi'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-16: de dag gis de la ded dpon ma ma ni khyod la blta bar 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-19: de de'i khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-20: mos de bsti stang du bcas pas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig snyan pa brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-21: bu bdag gi bu yang khyod ci 'dra ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-25: de'i ming yang de bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-26: mdor na khyod dang de gnyis bdag gi bur khyad par med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-27: khyod gzhan du ma sems shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189a-30: ma ma de ltar na de bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-0: de nyid bdag ste khyod kyi bu dang @189b khyad par med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-1: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des bu mo bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-2: bu mo tshur shog ming po'i zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces bos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-3: de phyir byung na na tshod dang des de'i gzugs bzang mo dar la bab cing mdzes ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-4: rlung gi shugs bzhin du 'dod chags kyi mthus yog pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-5: bdag nyid ma tshor bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-6: des de la kun tu brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-7: ma ma bu mo 'di su'i zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-10: khyod nyid kyi sring mo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-12: ma ma gzhan la byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-16: 'di su la yang ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-17: des de ste de ltar na kho bo la ci'i phyir mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-21: gzhan lta su zhig la sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-22: cung zad du gang khyod la nyes pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-23: khyod ni bshes mi brtan pas chung mar blangs shing blangs nas bor zhing dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-27: mthon dman du khrid de mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-29: bu khyod kyis bdag gi rdzas thams cad 'dir bskyas te bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-30: gdod mthon dman du khrid cing 'gro bar kho mo yid ches so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-32: ma ma de ltar na gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-33: des de'i khyim du rdzas rnams bskyas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-35: des ni sgo gcig nas nang du bskyas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-36: mos kyang sgo gnyis pa nas gud du bskyes [* bskyas ?]so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:189b-37: nam des nor rdzas thams cad bskyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-2: gdod de la bu mo byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-3: des zhag dang tshes grangs mthun par sbyor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-4: bag ma len pa'i tshe mos smad 'tshong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa kun mgron du bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-5: des bag ma blang ba'i tshe na phan tshun du rgyu zhing 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-7: ma 'di na thams cad kyang bud med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-8: skyes pa gcig kyang med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-10: gzhan zhig gis de'i sna drung du gsang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-11: ded dpon 'di ltar gyur pa khyod kyis mi shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-12: bdag cag kun kyang smad 'tshong ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-13: skyes pa ga la yod ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-14: des bdag gis ni smad 'tshong ma zhig blangs pa lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-15: mdor na 'dis ni bdag bslus so snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-16: bu mo de yang de dang lhan cig ji srid cig tu longs spyod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-17: jo bo karsha pa na stsol cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-19: bzang mo bdag gi nor rdzas ci yod do cog thams cad 'dir bskyas te 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-20: bdag la karsha pa na gzhan ga la yod ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-21: de gnyid kyis shin tu log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-22: mos re lde'i nang na dkris te tshong 'dus kyi dbus su bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-23: nang par nam langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-24: grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag 'ong zhing 'dong bas sad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190a-26: des bdag nyid mi rigs par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-0: sems dang sems las byung ba'i @190b rgyu ba rnams nyams te mig mchi mas gang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-2: srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-3: sum mdo dag na 'khyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-4: bkres pas gzir te zas tshol pa'i phyir gla mi dag gnas par song nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-5: de'i tshe na khyim bdag go'u ta ma'i khyim brtsig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-6: de gla mi rnams tshol ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-7: der mi gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag go'u ta mi'i drung du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-8: des de mthong nas kye 'di ni rab tu gzhon zhing shin tu gzhon pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-9: sngon su'i las kyang ma byas pa zhig gi gzhan zhig tshol cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-10: de'i mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim bdag go'u ta ma'i gdong du lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-11: de la khyim bdag go'u ta mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-15: des snying rje zhing dman la sdug bsngal bas mig mchi mas gang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-16: tshig kyang brnangs bzhin du ngal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-17: pha bdag ni byang phyogs na rdo 'jog gi grong khyer de nas sngon gyi las kyis 'dir bde bar phyin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-18: da ni gar mchi yang ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-19: bar ma dor dus las 'da' ba zhig tu 'gyur yang ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-21: des de'i nyams dang tshig gi rgyud thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-22: khyim bdag go'u ta mas de la yid kyis sdug par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:190b-23: bu rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag khyod kyis shes sam zhes dris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-1: 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-2: pha de ni bdag skal pa nyams pa'i pha lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-4: khyim bdag go'u ta ma'i yid la yang shin tu sdug par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-5: bu mi dga' bar bya mi dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-7: khyod ni nga'i mag par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-8: khyim 'di dag khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-10: de yang mi dga' ba dang bral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-11: khyim bdag go'u ta mas byug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-19: dga' ba'i tshig gis ngal bsos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-21: bzang mo khyod kyi mag pa 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-22: bu mo bag mar btang gi sta gon byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-30: gnyen bshes su bcas pas bu mo long zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-31: des pa skad cig mi blang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-32: nor rnams je btsal bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-33: des bu khyim na nor yod pa 'di dag thams cad khyod kyi yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-36: de yang smad 'tshong ma de la khon lan glon par 'dod nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-37: pha de ni de ltar lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-38: bdag mi ma rabs bzhin du bag ma mi len no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191a-39: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-1: yan man du 'khyam zhing 'dug pa las chu 'gram du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-2: chu de'i nang nas mi ro zhig khyer 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-3: bya rog gcig chu'i 'gram de na 'dug nas mi ro za bar 'dod na mchus ma slebs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-4: de nas mchu de shing bu zhig la brdor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-5: ring po zhig tu gyur te des ro de zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-6: de nas yang des shing gzhan zhig la mchu brdar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-7: ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gyur to; ;ded dpon des kyang lag pas shing bu de gnyis blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-9: de nas karsha pa na lnga brgya khyer nas smad tshong ma de'i khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-10: bzang mo khyod kyis bdag la karsha pa na med pa'o zhes bskrad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-11: de ni karsha pa na 'di re yongs su spyad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-12: tshur shog ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-13: de yang karsha pa na la chags nas de dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-14: de nas ded dpon des de la yongs su spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-15: de'i sna shing bu des brdar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-16: shin tu ring bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-17: des sman pa thams cad bkug ste bstan na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-18: de dag gis sman dpyad bya bar ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-19: de ltar de sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-20: des ded dpon la jo bo bzod par gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-24: de ste khyer ba de kun slar sbyin par dam 'cha' na gdod bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-25: mos jo bo nyi rim du yang slar dbul gyi mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:191b-26: des shing bu gnyis pas brdar na ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-1: ci khyer ba thams cad de la slar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-2: de nas ded dpon des bu mo skem mo go'u ta mi dpal chen po dang sbyar te bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-3: khyim bdag go'u ta ma ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na zhing rmed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-4: des mag pa de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-5: bu khyod kyi chung ma 'di khrid la ri brags kyi grong 'di zhes bya bar 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-6: des de la ri brags kyi grong gi zhing thams cad byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-7: de skem mo go'u ta mi shing rta la bskyon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-9: de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-10: de de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-11: dus phyi zhig na skem mo go'u ta mi sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-12: de bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-13: jo bo bdag gi bu btsar nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-14: bdag gnyen gyi khyim du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-15: der bdag la bdag gi mas bdag gi g-yog bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-18: des bu mo gnyen gyi khyim du bskyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-19: de la der btsas na bu khye'u zhig byung nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i bcas ston rgyas par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-20: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-21: des khye'u de khyer te slar ri brags de nyid du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-22: de phyis yang sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-23: bu 'byung ba'i dus su bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192a-24: jo bo bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-0: der @192b bdag la mas bdag gi g-yog bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-1: des kyang bzang mo legs kyi dong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-3: des ma dang bur bcas te shing rta la bskyon nas dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-4: de lam gyi phyed du bu btsas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-5: des bu btsas pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-6: shing rta las babs te shing gzhan zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-7: de nyid du gnyid kyis log go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-8: de gnyid kyis cher log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-9: sbrul gdug pas zin nas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-10: mo yang shing rta'i steng de nyid du khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-11: de shing rta las babs nas shing drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-12: jo bo khyod kyi bu khye'u zhig btsas kyi dgyes pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-14: de sems med pas lan ma glan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-15: des lag pas bskul te brtags na dus las 'das par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-16: mo de ngu bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-17: ba lang yang ma byin par len pas phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-18: de nas ring zhig tu dus nas mi dga' ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-20: de bu da gzod btsas pa 'di pang du thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-21: snga ma ni lag pa nas bzung ste song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-22: de na dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-25: khron pa dag chus gang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-26: de'i lam ka na chu bo rgal dgos par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-28: de ste khye'u dang lhan cig tu rgal na ni bdag kyang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-30: re zhig khye'u je bsgral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-31: phu bo de chu'i 'gram du bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:192b-32: chung du khyer te rgal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-0: @193a *// de nas de yang 'gram du bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-1: bu phu bo'i phyir yang chu rgal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-2: chu bo'i phyed du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-3: khye'u chung du de was khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-4: de nas mos chu bo'i dbus su 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-5: lag pa g-yabs nas ku ku zhes bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-6: khye'u phu bo de ma bdag la 'bod do snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-7: de chu'i nang du mchongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-8: chu 'gram yang gad pa chad pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-9: lhung ma thag tu dus las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-10: de nas mo rings shing myur bar byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-11: wa de'i rjes bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-12: des de bor te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-13: de la bltas na dus las 'das pa mthong ba dang /
