K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-14: mos dus nas de chur bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-15: de nas bu chen po de yang chus khyer ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-16: de mi dga' ba chen por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-18: de yang dus las 'das par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-19: de khyo dang bu las bral bas yi chad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-20: gcig pu gos gcig gis smad g-yogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-23: chu bo rnams kyi sgra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-24: bya'i sgra du ma rnams mnyan cing thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-27: kyi hud bu chung ngu ma zhes zer zhing snying rje zhing brtse bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-28: mchi mas brnangs bzhin du ngu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-29: sa la phan tshun 'gre zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193a-30: las kun rgyas shing rdzogs pas nges par gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-0: de ma thag tu 'di'i pha dang ma dang khyim gyi skye @193b bo mang po dag gnam lcags kyis phog ste shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-1: de'i nang nas skyes pa gcig cig thar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-2: snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du myur bar 'gro zhing de'i mdun logs su 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-3: mos de skrag pa lta bur mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-4: kye skyes bu ci'i phyir rings par rgyug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-6: des de'i mdun du rang gis lus brdabs nas ngu zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-7: khyod kyi pha dang ma dang khyim gyi skye bo mang po kun gnam lcags babs pas phog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-8: bdag gcig bu ni las kyis thar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-9: de thos nas phyi phyir mya ngan slong shing du bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-10: bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs su sdig ci zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-11: dus gcig tu khyo dang bu la sogs pa gnyen bshes dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-12: de bas khyim na gnas pas ci zhig byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-13: skal pa chad pas gang du ci snyed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-14: khyo dang gnyen bshes dang yang ba dag bral ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-15: bdag 'gro khyim na gnas par mi rigs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-16: dgon pa rnam par dben pa de dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-17: khyim stong de dag tu ni gnas pa bla; ;khyim na gnas pa sdig ste cir mi rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-18: mya ngan sdug bsngal rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-19: der phyogs gcig tu zhugs te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-20: phan tshun du 'khyam 'khyam pa las rim gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-21: de na bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig ras 'khal ba zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:193b-22: de de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-0: des de la ngal bsos nas de dang lhan cig tu ras 'khal ba @194a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-2: de na thag pa khye'u gzhon nu gzhan zhig rang gi bzos 'tsho ba la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-3: de la bud med rgan mo de dus dus su ras kyi skud pa de la 'tshong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-4: de nas gzhan zhig tu des skud pa phra mo zhig khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-5: de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-6: des ma ma khyod kyis sngon ni sbom por 'khal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-9: des 'di ni bdag gis ma bkal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-11: bu bdag gi khyim na bud med gcig cig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-12: des bkal ba 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-13: des ma ma khyod kyis ci'i phyir na bdag la de mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-14: bdag la yang chung ma med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-15: bdag gis de'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-17: 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag sbyar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-19: mos bu re zhig de la gsol bar bya ste; ci zer ba las lan phyir sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-20: des de'i skud pa'i rin rgyal par byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-22: de nas dri dang me tog gis brgyan te btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-23: skem mo go'u ta mis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-24: ma ma skud pa su la btsongs na rin rgyal zhing legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-25: khyod kyang dri dang me tog gis sus brgyan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-27: dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-28: zas kyang sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-29: de'i phyir 'di lta bu ga las byung zhes 'dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194a-30: des kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-0: khye'u tha ga pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par snyan pa brjod de smras @194b pa; bu mo khye'u tha ga pa de khyod slong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-1: de'i chung ma med kyi khas long zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-4: chog gi phyin chad skad ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-5: bdag ni khyim na gnas pas skyos; ji ltar yang rung ste de lta bu'i 'tsho ba mi bya'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-7: bu mo bud med rten med pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-8: sdug bsngal ba'i gnas na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-9: phyi rol gyi skyes pa dag glags lta bar yang 'gyur gyi gnas su soms la khas long ste 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-11: des de la nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur bar smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-12: gdod des khas blangs so; ;de nas khye'u tha ga pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-15: skar ma'i rim dang sbyar te khyim du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-16: de yang mi srun cing smyo la khro bas rtag tu de la dbyig pa dang thal mos rdeg ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-17: des bud med rgan mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-18: ma ma khyod kyis bdag srin po la phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-19: des bdag la nyin gcig bzhin du dbyug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-20: thal mos brdeg na ji ltar bya ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-21: bu mo nam khyod la bu ma byung gi bar du khyod la kho rdeg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-22: khyod kyang bu thur gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-23: khyim de yang khyod nyid dbang byed kyi mi dga' bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-24: de nas dus phyi zhig na de sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-25: khye'u tha ga pa de mo la byams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-26: mo yang de la brnyas pa byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:194b-29: de nas dus phyi zhig na khye'u de tha ga ba'i grogs po rnams kyis chang mang du blud pas ra ro nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-1: de yang sgo bcad de bu 'byung zhing 'dug pa'i tshe des sgo phye zhes byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-2: de bu 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis kun tu gzir nas sgo ma phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-3: de rab tu khro ba skyes nas phyogs gcig tu song ste 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-4: des bu byung nas sgo phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-5: de nang du 'ongs pa la gus par byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-6: jo bo dgyes par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-7: khyod kyi bu pho zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-8: des de la khro bas kun tu khebs pa dang ni ma bral gyi gnod sems kyis kun tu khebs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-9: des bu ma byung bar yang bdag la brnyas par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-10: gang gi tshe 'di bu skyes par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-11: 'di dang bu gnyis bsdoms nas bdag la gdon mi za bar gsod par byed do snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-13: bzang mo thab tu me bus la zangs tshugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-14: des thab tu me bus te zangs btsugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-16: yungs mar lugs la skol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-17: des yungs mar blugs te bskol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-18: des bu chung 'dir chug la skol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-20: mos jo bo 'di khyod nyid kyi bu yin na 'dis ci zhig nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-21: gzhon nu ma bsad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-22: des de la dbyig pas brdegs so; ;bdag las sdug pa med pas des skrag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-23: de yungs mar khol ba'i nang du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195a-25: nam de tshos par gyur ba na des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-0: da phyung zhes bsgo @195b ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-7: bu'i sha ji ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-8: des de nyid kyi lus thams cad du brdegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-10: de des brdegs pas bu'i sha yang zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-12: 'dod chags kyi kha na ma tho ba chung mod kyi 'bral bar ni dka'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-13: zhe sdang gi kha na ma tho ba che la 'phral bar sla bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-14: tha ga pa'i khye'u de phyis 'gyod pa'i mes gdungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-15: ring zhig tu ma log pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-17: de shin tu log par go'u ta mis rig nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-18: 'di bu bsad nas bdag la yang bu'i sha zar bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-19: mi 'di ni srin po yin gyi 'bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-20: snyam nas rgyags ci theg cig khyer te bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-21: byang phyogs kyi lam grogs dag cig yul 'khor mo 'jig tu zong rnams btsongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-22: slar gyis zong rnams khyer nas byang phyogs kyi lam du zhugs te dong ba dang lhan cig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-23: ji tsam na ded dpon gyis de'i gzugs mdzes pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-24: mthong nas de la chags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-26: da gang du 'gro zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-29: bdag gi khyo ni sbrul gdug pas zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-30: bu gnyis las gcig ni was zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-31: gcig ni chu'i nang du dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:195b-32: pha dang ma ni gnam lcags kyis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-1: med pas gar dga' bar 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-2: mgron pa mang po de dag gar dong ba der mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-4: ring du gar song yang 'di 'dra ba'i bud med dang lhan cig yongs su spyod do snyam nas des de chung mar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-5: ji tsam zhig na mgron pa mang po de dag mi rgod kyis bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-6: ded dpon de yang 'thab pa las bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-7: skem mo go'u ta mi ni mi rgod kyi ded dpon gyis chung mar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-8: mi rgod kyi ded dpon de yang byang phyogs kyi rgyal pos bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-9: skem mo go'u ta mi ni rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-10: ji tsam na rgyal po de yang dus las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-14: skye bo mang po dag gis de skem mo go'u ta mi dang lhan cig tu bkur sti cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-15: mchad pa'i nang du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-16: byang phyogs kyi mi rnams dur rku ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-17: de dag gis mchad pa brus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-18: skem mo go'u ta mi snar rdul song nas des sbrid pa byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-19: dur rku ba'i mi rnams skrag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-20: ro langs so snyam nas de dag bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-21: skem mo go'u ta mi khung bu brus nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196a-22: des sdug bsngal rnam pa du mar brtags pas rlung rab tu langs shing kha zas med pa'i rkyen gyis smyon mar gyur nas des smad g-yogs bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-0: lag pa dang rkang pa gas shing @196b rtsub; skra ring zhing skya mo seng seng mor gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-1: phan tshun 'khyams 'khyams pa las mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-3: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-4: des sngon las byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-5: sngon gyi las kyis dze ta'i tshal du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-6: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya stong du ma'i mdun na chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa skem mo go'u ta mis rgyang ma nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni yang dag par brgyan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-8: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus ni sku la rnam par spras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-9: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba rin po che'i ri 'gro ba bzhin kho ra khor yug nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-10: mthong nas kyang bdag gi sems dran pa slar thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-11: de ngo tsha ba'i tshul du gyur nas phyogs gcig tu tsog pur 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-12: de'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-15: rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-17: chos nyid kyi thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-18: srung ba gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pu gnyis su mad pa gnyis su mi smra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-19: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:196b-20: gdul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi'i mthil rab tu brtan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-3: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-4: yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-5: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-6: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-8: gnas drug la rtag tu gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-9: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-10: lam gyi yan lag brgyad 'chang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-11: mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-12: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-13: phyogs bcur snyan par grags pa rnams brgya phrag bcu'i dbang du gyur pa las rab tu nges pa rnams mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-14: ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-17: gang la sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-25: gang ngan song la rab tu bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-26: ngas gang ngan song nas phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-27: mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya; gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-28: gang bskyed pa rnams yongs su smin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197a-29: gang smin pa rnams rnam par grol bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-0: @197b rgya mtsho chu srin gnas de yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-1: gal te dus las yol yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-2: gdul bar 'gyur ba'i sras rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-6: ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo go'u ta mi la bla gos byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo go'u ta mi la bla gos byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-9: de nas ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo go'u ta mis bla gos gyon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-10: bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-17: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-18: gang thos pas ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo go'u ta mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-19: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rje bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-20: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-21: de bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-22: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-23: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:197b-24: btsun pa legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-2: dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad nas des rab tu phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-5: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-6: 'dul ba la bslabs te lung bsgo ba byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-9: bsgrub par byas pas na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-11: 'dus byas kyi rgyud thams cad zhig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-14: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis rab tu bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-15: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-17: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-18: bong ba dang gser du 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-19: nam mkha' dang lag mthil ltar chags pa med pa bzhin du sems mnyam pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-20: ste'u dang tsan dan du 'dra bar rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-22: mngon par shes pa yang dag par so sor rig pa ni thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-25: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-28: lhar bcas pa rnams kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-29: tshig snyan par brjod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198a-30: de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge @198b slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-1: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ma'i dge slong ma 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-2: mchog ni dge slong ma skem mo go'u ta mi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-3: nam bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skem mo go'u ta mi 'dul ba 'dzin po'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-4: de'i tshe de'i drung du dge slong ma rnams dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-5: des 'ongs pa de dag skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir las kyi rgyud rnams brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-6: dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong dag la de ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-7: de nas dus phyi zhig na skem mo go'u ta mi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-9: dge slong dag gis mthong nas gcig la gcig de'i las kyi rgyud rnams brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-10: de nas skem mo go'u ta mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la ci'i phyir na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-17: dge slong rnams phan tshun rna bar bshub ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-21: sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-22: las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:198b-23: 'jig rten pa'i rnams ni rang gi las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-0: @199a *// las ni rjes su 'jug pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-1: gang gis ji ltar las byas pa de la de rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-2: dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-3: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-5: btsun pa dge slong ma skem mo go'u ta mis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-6: de'i phyir 'di'i khyo sbrul gyis zos te dus las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-8: gnyis pa ni chu bos 'tshal te dus las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-9: pha ma gnyis ni gnam lcags lhung bas bkum par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-10: bu'i sha yang 'tshal nas smyos shing g-yengs pa'i sems kyis de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-13: dgra bcom pa mngon du bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-15: zhes ci'i slad du bka' stsal ces zhus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa; dge slong dag dge slong ma skem mo go'u ta mi nyid kyi las dag byas shing tshogs pa rnyed cing rkyen smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-17: chu bo bzhin mngon du 'byung ste nges par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-18: skem mo go'u ta mis las byas la bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-19: gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-20: dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199a-21: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par mi smin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-2: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-5: skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-6: las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-7: bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-8: dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-9: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-10: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gcig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-11: phyug la nor mang zhing longs spyod che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-12: gnas yangs shing rgya che ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-13: ngal bsos po'i nor dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-14: ngal bsos po'i nor la sdo ba zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-15: rigs dang mnyam pa zhig las chung ma zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-16: de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-17: des rtse dga' yongs su spyod kyang bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-19: bdag gi khyim du nor du ma zhig 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-20: nga la bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-23: bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o zhes zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-25: zhes de 'gram pa lag pas brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-27: 'dug pa de'i chung mas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-28: jo bo khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la brten te rab tu sems shing 'dug ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-30: bzang mo bdag gi khyim na nor du ma zhig 'dug kyang bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:199b-33: bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o zhes zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-2: ci'i phyir rab tu sems shing mi 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-6: bu mo yang med na ci bdag gi skal pa chung ngam 'di ni gzhan ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-7: bdag la nyes pa'i skyon btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-8: chung ma gzhan len par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-9: de'i phyir bdag gi mdun du 'gram par lag pa gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-11: 'di skad du bdag gi khyim na nor du ma 'dug kyang bu pho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-14: bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o zhes zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-15: rgyal po'i dkor du 'gyur ro zhes zer kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-16: des bas na bdag nyid thar par bya'o zhes bsams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-17: jo bo 'di ltar bdag skal pa chung bas khyod kyi bu pho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-19: chung ma gzhan zhig long zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-23: bzang mo khyod kyis skyes bu gang la chung ma gnyis yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-24: de ni nam yang chu grang mo'i skyo ma mi 'thung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-25: rtag tu de'i khyim na 'thab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-28: rtsod pas nang gi skye bo rnams dkrug par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-29: rang gi las la brtson par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200a-34: de ste phu nu mo tsam du gyur na ni phu nu mo'i 'du shes kyis bskyang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-0: 'on te bu mo tsam zhig na ni bu mo'i 'du shes @200b kyis bskyang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-1: des de la g-yo byas te smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-2: de yang bu mo 'tshol ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-3: de nas ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-4: khyim bdag cig gi bu mo zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-5: skyes pa dang pha ma gnyis dus las 'das pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-6: de nas de'i ming po las de bslangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-7: dpal chen po dang sbyar te bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-8: thams cad kyang chos nyid kyis sar pas rnying pa zil gyis gnon pas de de la shin tu byams shing sems zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-9: de nas de'i chung ma rnying pa de rang bzhin gyis phrag dog gis mngal gyi gnas dag par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-10: sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-13: jo bo dga' ba skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-14: bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-17: de ste bu pho zhig btsas na ni bdag 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-20: jo bo khyod kyi chung mas mngal nas lhung ba'i cho ga zhig sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-21: lhung bar ma byas na ni khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-23: bzang mo sngon yang bdag gis 'di lta bu'i phyir smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-24: da dung bu cung zad kyang med par khyod kyis brtsam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-25: de lan med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-26: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-28: de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:200b-29: rigs dang mthun pa las ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-0: de sngon gyi las kyis 'di btsas na sems can 'di @201a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-1: ma yar mo 'dis mi gsod pa la pan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-2: de bas na 'di nyid la gzhar ro zhes bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-4: che zhe khye'u 'di khyod dang bdag gi yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-5: 'di bdag cag gnyis kas bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-6: des legs kyi 'di bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-7: de skyed pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-8: des de bskyed na log par rtog pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-9: gang gi bu yin pa de'i khyim ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-10: de bas na 'di bskyed kyang 'di ltar khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-13: de log par rtog pas bskyod pas khye'u de'i khar smyug ma'i thur ma zhig btsugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-14: des sdug bsngal gyis gzir bas ngu bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-16: che zhe khye'u 'di ci'i phyir du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-19: che zhe ci'i phyir du ba ma 'tshal to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-20: des de blangs te dga' ba bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-21: lag pas 'khyud de 'o byas nas pang par blangs kyang mi btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-22: des de la nu ma blung nas ji tsam bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-23: smyug ma'i thur ma zhig khar btsugs par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-24: des myur du kha phye ste lag pas drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-25: khye'u de dbugs med de dus las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-26: brang brdungs te ngu zhing sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-27: khyim gyi skye po rnams brgyugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-28: 'di ci nyes zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201a-29: des snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-0: kye ma ma @201b yar mo sdig pa'i chos spyod pa 'di phrag dog gis khros nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-1: bdag gi bu'i khar smyug ma'i thur ma btsugs te bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-2: de dag ngu bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-3: 'khor gyi khyim mtshes dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-4: de dag gis kyang brgyugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-5: ae ma'o 'di ni glo bur zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-6: byis pa 'di nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-8: des de la skye bo mang po dag gis ae ma'o zhes zer zhing kun tu bskor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-9: de ni brang brdung zhing ngu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-11: bdag gis khyod kyi bu gsad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-12: bdag gi khyo yang sprul gyis zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-14: bu gcig ni was zos par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-15: gnyis pa chu bor lhungs te dus byed par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-16: pha ma gnam lcags kyis gsod par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-17: bu'i sha yang zos la smyo zhing phyar ba'i sems kyis phan tshun 'khyam par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-19: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-20: khyim bdag de'i chung ma gnyis pa ni 'di ltar 'di bzhin dge slong ma skem mo go'u ta mi 'di'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-21: 'di shin tu nyon mongs pas kun tu khebs pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-22: khye'u bsad na yang rdzun du smra zhing mna' bor ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-25: bu gcig ni was bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-26: gcig ni chu bor lhung ste dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:201b-27: pha ma ni gnam lcags lhung bas shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-1: man du g-yeng pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du 'khyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung las rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-3: der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod kyang yon tan gyi chos mang po gang yang ma chud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-4: gang la rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-5: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-6: de na 'di 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-7: gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bla na med pa yon gnas kyi drung du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan mang po gcig kyang ma chud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-8: bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-9: sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu 'byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-11: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202a-12: ji ltar bdag gis mkhan mo 'di la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya'i rgyal po des 'dul ba 'dzin pa nang na mchog tu @202b gsungs par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-1: 'dis de na tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-2: de nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-3: gang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang nas mchog tu shog cig ces smon lam btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-4: smon lam de'i mthus da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-5: gzhan yang dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-6: btsun pa skem mo go'u ta mi'i pha ma gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las gang gis rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-7: gnam lcags lhung ste gum par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-8: khyos las ci zhig bgyis na sprul gyis 'tshal nas dus las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-9: bu gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na gcig ni was 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-10: gcig ni chu bor lhung ste dus las 'das par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-12: dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed cing rkyen smin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-13: chu bo bzhin du nye bar gnas pa ni gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro; ;de dag gis las byas shing bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-14: gzhan sus kyang myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-15: dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-16: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-19: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:202b-22: skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-0: mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par @203a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-2: las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-3: bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-5: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba na bskal pa bzang po 'dir skye bo tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'od srung zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-12: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer gyi drang srong bzhin gyi ri dvags gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-13: de'i dus na yul 'khor mo 'jig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-18: ngal bsos bu bzhin nor 'du ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-19: ngal bsos po'i nor la sngo ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-20: chu bo bar ka ya'i pha rol tu gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-21: der yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dag gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-22: khyim bdag de las skye bo'i grong mi dag gis zong blangs shing 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-23: de la gcig gis lan gsum gyi bar du zong chus gsan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-25: 'di ltar drin med pa khyod kyis brnogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-26: bdag gi zong lan gsum du chud gsan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203a-27: nor ma byin gyi bar du ma 'gro zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-1: khyim bdag lan cig stsol la de chud gsan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-3: bdag chung mar bcas pa khyod kyi bran du snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-4: des yang tshig rgya bris nas de la zong byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-5: de yang cung zad kyang mi nus pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-6: de yang chud gsan nas khyim bdag des de chung ma dang bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-7: gtsug lag khang de'i las byed par phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-8: de yul 'khor mo 'jig na gnas pas nyi ma re re zhing chu bo rgal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-9: gtsug lag khang der dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'bras chan 'tshed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-10: chung ma dang bu dag ni phyag tshang byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-11: gtsug lag khang de na dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-12: de nas dus phyi zhig na char pa babs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-13: chu bo bar ka chus gang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-14: las byed pa bu dang chung mar bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-16: dge slong dgra bcom pa de 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-17: kye skyes bu gdugs tshod 'di tsam 'das kyi bar da dung yang khyod mi 'ong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-18: ci dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos rnams gcad par bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-20: chung ma dang bcas nas khros te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-21: 'di 'ong ba na klad par ci'i phyir na gnam lcags mi bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-23: 'di sprul gdug pas ci'i phyir ma zos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-24: bu 'bring pos smras pa; 'di ci'i phyir chu bor lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:203b-28: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-0: gang khyim bdag chung mar bcas pa de nyid ni @204a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-1: skem mo go'u ta mi'i pha ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-2: gang bu chen po de ni 'di'i khyo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-3: gang bu 'bring po de ni 'di'i bu chen po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-4: gang bu tha chung de ni 'di'i bu chung ngu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-5: de ltar dgra bcom pa la ngan sems kyis tshig rtsub po phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-6: de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas gnam lcags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-9: chu bor lhung ba dang bzhi char dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-10: de lta bas na dge slong dag shin tu gnag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang shin tu gnag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-11: shin tu dkar ba'i las ni shin tu dkar ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-13: de lta bas na dge slong dag shin tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-15: shin tu dkar ba'i las la nan tan du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-16: de bzhin du dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-17: khyed kyis bslab par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-19: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-23: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-24: nam skyes bu glen pa 'phags skyes pos sh'akya rnams la nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par bsad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-25: sh'akya'i chung ma rnams kyis ming po dang khyo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-26: pha rnams las bral bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204a-27: sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-0: legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la @204b rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-1: sdug bsngal ni dril bu'i sgra dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-2: nam de dag mya ngan dang bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-3: de'i tshe 'dod chags rab tu che ba'i nyon mongs pas gzir te bzod par bya ba ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-5: sbrul nag po la nyes pa'i dmigs lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-10: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-12: de ltar de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes pa'i dmigs lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-17: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-19: de la bud med kyi dug rno ba gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-20: bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-21: de dag gcig la gcig gros byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-22: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo gang na ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-24: sbom dga' mo'i rkang pa la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-25: mdun du 'khod nas 'phags ma nyon mongs pa rnams ni gzung bar dka' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-26: bud med rnams la slu bar bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-27: ji ltar bdag gis bzlog par bgyi bar bshad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-30: de la shes par bya ba ci zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-31: khyed cag ni na chung dar la bab pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-32: deng la khrims phul te nor can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-35: gzhan yang nal gyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:204b-36: su'i bu rtol med pa rnams dang lhan gcig tu yongs su spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-0: de ste nga yang gzhon ni khyed cag dang lhan cig tu @205a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-2: des de dag bslus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-5: che zhe 'phags ma sbom dga' mo na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-6: 'di la shes par bya ba ci zhig yod ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-7: de dag las kha cig gis che zhe des smras pa legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-8: 'dong la yongs su spyod do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-11: bud med rnams kyis legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni rnyed par dka' na skad cig 'phags ma skem mo go'u ta mi la yang dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-12: de dag gis che zhe legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-15: de dag skem mo go'u ta mi'i drung du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-16: rkang pa la phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-17: 'phags ma nyon mongs pa ni gzung bar dka' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-18: bud med rnams la slu bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-19: bdag cag gis ji ltar bzlog par bgyi bar bshad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-21: che zhe dag 'dod pa rnams kyi ming yang ma 'dzin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-23: 'dod pa ni bde ba chung la sdug bsngal che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-26: nyes pa'i dmigs lnga yang dag par mthong zhing mkhas pas ni 'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205a-28: 'dod pa ni dga' ba chung la sdug bsngal che ba nyes pa'i dmigs mang por yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-0: 'dod pa la bsten @205b nas sbyor ba'i rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-1: 'dod pa la bsten pa gtong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-3: chog pa med par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-5: sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ni cung zad kyang med par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-6: 'dod pa ni rnam grangs du ma las kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-8: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-10: yang dag par song ba'i skyes bu dam pa dag gis smad par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-11: yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-12: rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-14: rang gi don ma 'dres pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya bar rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-19: gang dgar 'gror med pa las de dag gis mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-20: bsngags par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-21: bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-22: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:205b-23: bdag bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-0: mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa dag ma thob na yang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mthong @206a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-1: ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-2: rnam grangs du ma las kyang rab tu 'byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-4: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-5: mkhas pa dang yang dag par song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-6: skyes bu dam pa dag gis bstod par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-7: ci bdag gis tshe gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba de mnyan par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-8: 'on te tshe 'di la myong ba rnams mnyan par 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-9: de dag gis 'phags ma khyod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-10: tshe gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba ni re zhig zhog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-11: gang tshe 'di nyid la myong ba rnams gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-13: des de dag la pha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-16: bu rnams las bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-17: bu sha zos pa'i sdug bsngal ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-18: de dag skyo nas pa spu kun gyi khung bu yang g-yos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-19: rna ba byo nas skem mo go'u ta mi'i gdong du bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-20: des de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-24: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-25: de thos nas de dag gis 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-26: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-27: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206a-28: de dag bden pa mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-0: 'phags @206b ma bdag cag do zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-1: bdag cag rab tu do zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-2: 'phags ma spom dga' mes bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dam du do bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-5: nu mo dag ci byas zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-6: de dag gis kyang zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-9: de ni nyes pa sbom po spyod pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-10: des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chu 'gram gyi gad pa bzhin 'dor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-12: don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag 'phya spong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-13: kha ngan du zer ba na dge slong mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-14: dge slong ma dag slar khyim du bskrad pa ga la srid ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-15: de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-16: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-18: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong ma khyim du 'jug par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-19: 'jug par byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-20: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-21: dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis dge slong la spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-22: dge slong de skrag par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-23: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-25: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong la spyo bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-26: spyo bar byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-27: ji ltar dge slong mas dge slong pha la mi bya ba bzhin du dge slong ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:206b-30: dge tshul ma la mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-5: dge tshul ma la mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-6: dge tshul mas dge slong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-8: dge slong ma dang dge tshul pha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-9: dge tshul ma la yang mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-11: mdun du 'gro bar mi bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-12: ldang par bya'o dge slong ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-13: zhus nas 'dug par bya ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-14: skyil mo krung dang rnam grangs med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-16: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mnyan du yod pa'i sngon gyi skyed mos tshal ri dvags sgra'i khang pa na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-19: mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-20: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang snga dro sham thabs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-21: chos gos gyon lhung bzed khyer nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-22: des tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-23: glen pa 'di la mi dga' bar bya'o snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-24: khyim gang du tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'gro ba der mo thog mar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-25: sgo'i nang logs su 'dug nas 'phags pa da ltar ni sbyar ba cung zad kyang med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-28: de khyim gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207a-29: der yang mo sngar song ste snga ma bzhin du gtses so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-0: 'di bzhin du yang @207b gcig nas gcig tu byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-1: ma dgongs par ni dgra bcom pa'i ye shes kyi gzigs pa mi 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-2: su zhig bdag la 'tshe snyam dgongs na spom dga' mo yin par gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-4: sring mo khyod kyis ma nyes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-6: nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas; dge slong ma'i dngos por gnang bar byas pas nyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-7: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-8: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-10: gang cung zad dge slong mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-11: dge slong pha spyod yul du 'gro ba'i mdun du song na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-12: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms mi bslang bar dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-15: dge slong 'od srung gis dge slong ma la rigs par spyos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-16: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms ma bslang zhig ;dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms ma bslang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-19: dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul spangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:207b-20: de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-0: de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma rnams kyis dge @208a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-1: slong rnams la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-4: dge slong mas dge slong spyod yul du 'dod ba'i mdun du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-5: gang spyod yul dge slong dag gis spangs par dge slong ma de dag dong bar byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste; sbom dga' mo 'khor brgya stong du ma'i mdun na 'dug cing chos 'chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lam der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-9: 'khor de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong nas langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-10: sbom dga' mo ni rkub ma bskyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-12: 'phags pa 'od srung chen po lha dang mi'i mchod gnas de mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-13: bdag cag ni langs na khyod stan las kyang ma 'phags pa ni ma legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-15: des 'di ni mu stegs can las rab tu byung ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-19: rab tu glen pas na bdag sh'akya mo las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-20: sde snod gsum pa chos kyi gtam can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-21: rig pa dang grol ba la spobs pas ci'i phyir 'di mthong ba dang stan las ldang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-23: dge slong dag gis de thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-26: dge slong dag dad pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208a-27: khyim bdag rnams ni rigs par 'phya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-0: de lta bas na dge slong mas @208b dge slong mthong ma thag tu stan las longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-1: ma langs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-3: dge slong mas dge slong mthong ma thag tu stan las longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-5: dus phyi zhig na dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma dbyar mo khang gi phyi rol na 'khor brgya stong du ma'i mdun na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-7: che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-10: mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-11: mnyan du yod pa nas bsod snyoms las slar bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-12: gang na dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang yod pa der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-13: dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog mas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-14: mthong ma thag tu stan las langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos stan la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-16: 'dug nas sring mo khyod kyis mdo sde gang zhig brtsams zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mdo sde rgyas par bshad pa brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-20: autpa la'i kha dog ma 'greng bzhin du rna ba byo ste nyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-21: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chos 'chad pa la chags pas de la 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-23: de ring zhig 'greng bas nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas rmya ste brgyal bar gyur nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:208b-24: ma dad pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-1: autpa la'i kha dog ma 'dod chags dang bral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-2: zhes thos na sh'akya gzhon nu gzugs sdug pa mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-3: 'dod chags kyis bskyod ba'i rtog pas sa la 'gyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-4: zhes zer ba dge slong dag gis thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-9: khyim bdag 'phya ba rigs par 'phya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-13: de ste dge slong brel te ma dran na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-14: dge slong mas zhus la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so; ;der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-19: dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-23: de lta bas na dge slong dag don 'di ni dpe yin par shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-25: dge slong ngag nyi ma shar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-30: chos 'chad pa'i gang zag gi tshig bla dvags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209a-31: zhing pa ni zhing rmod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-0: gtong ba sbyin @209b bdag gi tshig bla dvags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-3: bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig bla dvags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-4: de lta bas na dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-5: 'di ltar ston pa rjes su brtse ba can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-9: thugs brtse bar gyur pa ngas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-10: nyan thos khyed rnams la bya ba ni byas zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-11: da ni khyed cag gis dgon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-16: sog ma spungs pa bla gab med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-20: bas mtha' 'di dag tu gnas shing sgoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-22: bag med par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-23: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-32: 'bras bus brgyan pa'i shing de lta bu'i steng na khyad par can du dga' ba'i gnas su dong nas yid la byed pa bsgrub pa la rtsom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-33: dge slong ma yang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-34: nye ba'i tshal stug por gzhan yang bud med dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-35: yid la byed pa bsgrub pa la rtsom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-36: de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-37: bud med ces bya ba'i rma'i sgor srog chags dag zhugs par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-41: dge slong ma yid la byed pa bsgom pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:209b-42: skyil mo krung bcas te ma 'dug par skyil mo krung phyed du chos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-0: @210a *// 'dug pas yid la byed pa sgoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skyil mo krung phyed du chos te 'dug la yid la byed pa sgoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-3: dge slong ma dag gis skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te 'dug nas yid la bya ba bsgom pa la rtsom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-4: 'on kyang de'i mo mtshan du srog chags phra mo dag zhugs pa gsan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-7: lo ma srab mo lhung bas glon la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-8: skyil mo krung phyed du chos la 'dug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-9: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-10: tshe dang ldan pa au pa lis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-11: btsun pa nam dge slong mas khrims phul nas babs par gyur pas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la slar rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-12: bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tshal na rab tu 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-17: au pa li lan gcig babs pa'i dge slong mas phyis legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-18: bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'byung du med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-19: gleng gzhi ni gnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-20: tshe dang ldan pa au pa lis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210a-22: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di ltar dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-2: 'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng bar mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-6: dge slong mas dge slong pha la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-10: zhes gleng bar bgyi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-11: dran par bgyi ba'i rnam grangs 'ga' tsam mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-13: au pa li dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-16: 'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng bar bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-17: dran par bya ba'i rnam grangs gang yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-19: tshong dpon gyis kyang zas lhag ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-20: bzhag pa dag ni mi spangs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-21: bar chad chos ni mi 'dri ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-22: gzhan phyir dag dang khrag 'dzag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-23: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-24: mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-25: phyug la nor mang zhing longs spyod che ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-26: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-27: de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-28: de de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod kyang bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-29: bu mo yang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-30: de dus phyi zhig na nor zad par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-31: longs spyod kyang zad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-33: bzang mo da ni bdag rgas pas nor btsal bar mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-34: dze ta'i tshal du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:210b-38: khyod rab tu byung na bdag su'i drung na 'dug gi bdag kyang rab tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-1: des bzang mo legs kyi 'dong zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-2: de khrid de go'u ta mi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i drung du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-3: rkang pa la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-4: 'phags ma rang gi las kyis 'di legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-6: bdag kyang dze ta'i tshal du mchis la rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-9: bu khyod chung ma dang bcas te sems bskyed pa ni legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-10: rab tu byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-11: yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-13: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-14: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-16: yang dag par song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-17: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas kyang rab tu byung ba ni bstod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-18: legs te rab tu dbyung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-19: song zhig ces smras nas de rab tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-20: de yang dze ta'i tshal du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-21: dge slong dag las rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-22: de mnyan du yod pa'i tshong dpon zhig rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-24: bsod nams chen po thob pa ni chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-27: nad kyi rkyen sman spyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-29: de dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211a-30: de'i chung ma de yang bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-0: de'i dus na mu ge @211b chen pos de bsod snyoms kyis phongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-1: des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-3: des 'phags pa mu ge'i dus la bab pas bsod snyoms kyi zas su yang mi ster te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-6: des sring mo nga la bsod snyoms 'byor pa yod mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bsod snyoms kyis phyed sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-9: de cang mi zer bar dbyar mo khang du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-10: ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-11: de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-12: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-14: dge slong des mu ge'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-15: de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-16: de de la the tshom ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms shig 'byor na dge slong des mu ge'i dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-19: de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-21: des de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-22: des de za zhing song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-23: de la dus phyi zhig na 'phral la byin pa'i bsod snyoms zhig rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-24: dge slong de'i drung du ma song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:211b-26: de ni gud nas zas rnyed du nges te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-1: nas; des de ma bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-2: ji tsam zhig na dge slong ma de yang 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-3: des sring mo khyod mi 'ongs snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-4: bdag gi bsod snyoms ma bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-5: zas 'di ni bzhag pa zhig na de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni 'di bdag gis sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-6: des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-7: dbyar mo khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-8: des ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-9: de dag gis dge slong dag la smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-10: dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-13: dge slong dag gis bzhag pa dge slong mas byin len byos la bza' bar gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-14: gang yang dge slong mas bzhag pa de ni dge slong gis byin len byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-15: 'di la the tshom ma byed par dge slong mas ni dge slong la byin len bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-16: dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma la byin len bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-17: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-18: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-19: de ngo tsha nas gdong smad de 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-20: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-22: dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dri bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212a-23: dge slong ma nyid kyis dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-0: @212b dge slong gis dge slong ma la dge slong ma de'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos 'dri na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-1: dge slong dag gis thun mong gi bar chad kyi chos dri bar brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-2: 'on kyang ngo tsha nas ma smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-4: dge slong ma drung du zhog la dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-5: des ni dge slong mal smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-6: dge slong ma des kyang dge slong la smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la dge slong ma zhig bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-9: 'di ltar khyod shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-10: ji ltar khom pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' ba 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-11: ces bsgo ba de'i bar du der khrag zags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-12: de la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sring mo longs te song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-14: de khrag zags te ngo tsha nas yid la gnong bas ma langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de shes nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-16: de la dge slong ma dag gis nu mo dkyil 'khor nyid du khyod kyis slob dpon la ma dad par bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-17: longs zhes bsgon [* bsgo na ?]khyod ci'i phyir mi ldang zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-18: des phu nu mo dag 'di ni yon tan chen po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-19: bdag la 'di lta bu las med na khyed kyang 'di skad smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-20: bdag tsog bur 'dug pas khrag zags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-21: ji ltar ldang zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:212b-22: de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-0: de ltar gyur pa de dag @213a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-1: gis dge slong dag la byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-2: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-4: de lta bas na dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa tsog phur ma 'dug par pha gu'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-6: stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du gzhag par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-7: bud med lto snyi ba'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-9: dge slong lhag ma mi rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-10: mi gtsang ba ni rked chings dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-11: nu chings dang yang nu rten gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-12: bar chad de dag bcang mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-14: de nas go'u ta mi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-15: 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-16: nyi ma nub kar dze ta'i tshal du phyin nas des mnyan du yod par 'dong du ni dus las yol na 'di nyid du 'di ji lta bu de lta bur nub mo gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-17: nang bar nam nangs nas dong ngo snyam bsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-18: de sa la nyal bas de'i chos gos rnams rdul gyis gos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-19: de nang bar nam nangs nas phyir yang 'ong dgos kyi cig car ston pa la phyag byas te 'dong ngo snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-20: de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i chos gos rdul gyis gos par @213b gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-1: go'u ta mi khyod kyi chos gos la rdul sus bsgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-3: des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-6: dge slong dag gi dge slong ma la dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma ma byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-9: kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnang ba ni dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-10: de la the tshom ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-13: dge slong gzhan gyis mal stan shin tu bzang po blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-14: de'i lhag ma dge slong dag gis dge slong ma de dag la sbyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-16: bzang po las ma sbyin par gos rnying pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-18: ras lta bu las byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-19: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-20: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-22: mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-23: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang gtsug lag khang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-24: ston gyi dus su gyur pas chu bo rnams chus gang bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:213b-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po zam pa la rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-3: de 'gros mgyogs shing myur du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-4: de zam pa rgyal ba des zam pa de bsgul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-5: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lhung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-8: lhung bzed shor ba chur nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-11: sring mo khyod kyis ni ma nyes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-13: 'di ltar nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-14: dge slong ma'i dngos por rjes su yi rang bas lan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-15: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-18: gang su zhig dge slong ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-19: dge slong lhan cig tu zam pa gcig la rgal na nyes pa'i dmigs yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-21: dge slong mas dge slong pha dang lhan cig tu zam pa gcig lam rgal cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-22: rgal na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dge slong dang lhan cig tu zam pa gcig tu ma rgal cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-25: zam pa brtan pa zheng chen po gzhan la yang de dag ma rgal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-27: zam pa gang brtan zhing zheng che ba la ni de dag rgal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214a-28: de la the tshom du ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-0: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du @214b yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-1: de na dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-2: lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-3: rim bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-4: des bde bar 'ongs pa'i tshig snyan par smras nas stan ba ting ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-5: de gtam zer zhing skad cig 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-6: phreng ldan ma khyod kyis rked pa phra zhing phra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-8: des 'phags ma khyod kyis 'di dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-10: bdag ni ci nas kyang rnam pa gang gis lha'i sems mnyes par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-12: phreng ldan ma do bzhin mod kyi 'on kyang the tshom dgrol ba tsam du dris /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-13: smros shig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-14: des 'phags ma bdag gis rked chings bcangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-17: de'i phyir khyod la skye bo mang po dag gis yid mgu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-20: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-24: sbom dga' mo chu bo aa dzi ra ba ti'i drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-25: dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig khrus byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-27: 'phags ma bdag cag gi rked pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-29: khyod kyi phra zhing phra ba 'di ci zhig gi phyir zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-31: bdag gis ni rked chings bcangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:214b-32: de bas na bdag gi rked pa 'di 'dra'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-3: des nu mo dag rung yang bla /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-7: dge slong ma dag 'phya zhing smod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-9: de ltar gyur pa de dag gis dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-10: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-12: de lta bas na dge slong mas rked chings ma 'chang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-13: dge slong mas rked chings bcangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-17: snga ma bzhin du skad cig 'dug pa'i bar du gtam byas pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215a-32: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215b-0: sbom dga' mo dbyar mo @215b khang du song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:215b-22: nge cang mi zer bar 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rked chings ma 'chad @216a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-4: des rked pa bcings pa dang /
