K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-20: dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rung rked pa dkris na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-22: btsog pa'i gnas su mi dor te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-23: mngal dang mi gtsang mi btung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-24: bdag gi bu la reg par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-25: gzhan gyi bu la reg mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-0: tshe dang @216b ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-2: mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-3: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bshang sa'i chu khung dang nye ba zhig nas mar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-7: blun po 'di la mi dga' bar gyur pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-9: myur zhing rings par song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-10: bshang sa'i chu khung gi nang du pha gu 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi snod thams cad ma rung par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-13: sring mo khyod kyis ni ma nyes pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-15: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-16: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-18: de lta bas na dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-19: dge slong mas dge slong pha la mi gtsang bas ma rung par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-20: dge slong pha la mi gtsang bas ma rung bar byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-21: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-22: mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-23: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-24: de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:216b-25: de dus phyi zhig na zong khyer nas yul gzhan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-2: bzang mo zong khyer te yul gzhan du 'gro yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-3: khyod ma g-yeng zhing bag yod par khyim srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-6: dus dus su gtam springs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-8: de zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-10: zas bzang ba'i phyir nyon mongs pas gzir bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-11: des skyes pa gzhan zhig dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyad pas sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-13: mngal na gnas pa gsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-14: bdag gi khyo 'ongs pa dang ma rung bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-16: des mngal na gnas pa bsad nas lhung bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-18: gang du dor mi shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-19: rab tu sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-20: sbom dga' mo khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-21: des mtshan bzang ma bsod snyoms byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-23: des bdag ni mi dga' bas gzir bas bsod snyoms sbyin du su yang med kyi bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-28: des 'phags ma su yang ma shi mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-29: bdag las bu zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-31: gang du dor ba bdag gis mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217a-34: mtshan bzang ma des bdag gis dor na bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-0: phyi bzhin @217b 'brang ba'i dge slong ma la yang sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-2: dge skos la yang sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-5: des de lhung bzed chen por bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-6: khang pa stong par khyer nas der dor ba la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-7: khyim stong pa der sngar skyes pa zhig zhugs pa des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-8: des mgo reg dge sbyong ma ci byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-10: des khyed cag lta bu nal gyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-11: su'i bu rtol med pas rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med 'di 'dra ba'i las pa byas te dor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-13: des de la brgyad bkag ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-14: des dge slong ma zhig mthong nas dge slong ma mi srun ma khyed kyi sbom dga' mos 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-16: de lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-17: de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong pha dag la smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-18: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-20: 'di ltar dge slong mas lhung bzed chen po 'chang na nyes pa'i dmigs yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-21: de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed chen po mi bcang bar mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-22: dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-23: dge slong dag dge sbyong ma yin pa'i sbom dga' mos dge slong ma ma yin pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-24: de lta bas na dge slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i las mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:217b-25: lhung bzed chen po yang ma 'chang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-0: dge slong mas de 'dra ba'i las byed @218a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-6: dge slong gis lhung bzed chung ngu ni dge slong ma'i chen po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-9: gcig ni mngal gyi sgor bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-10: sems can gyi las kyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas gzhon nu 'od srung byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-11: de la gub tas ma reg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-12: de du nas de'i gnyen bshes dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-14: khye'u ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-16: dge slong ma dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-17: dge slong mas skyes pa la ma reg cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-19: de bas na du'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-20: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can na ci'i phyir na rang gi bu la reg pa 'gog par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-21: byis pa khye'u 'di la de ste mas ma reg na 'di dus byed par nges so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218a-25: bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par bya'o zhes smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyod par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-12: dge slong ma dag gis pang pa nas pang par khyer te de pang pa nas pang par spos pas rid cing nyam chung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-13: rke nas lus rmya zhing ma rtas par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-14: de'i gnyen bshes dag gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-15: de dag gis ci'i phyir khye'u 'di rid cing nyam chung la rmya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-18: des de dag la zhib tu smras na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-20: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-25: phra mo'i sgo drug rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-29: the tshom dang yang dgon pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-30: sang ka kshi dang gnyis kyi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-32: dge slong ma dang phyi rol gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:218b-34: the tshom lhan cig nyal ba yang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:220b-26: yul gyi mi rnams la longs spyod 'phel bar gyur cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-3: sa ni 'bru dang ldan par 'gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-16: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-17: de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-18: yul ga dha ra na yang panytsa la zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-19: des kyang yul ga dha ra'i rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-24: yul gyi mi rnams la bsrung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-27: de'i mthus yul ga dha ra'i rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-32: yul gyi mi rnams la longs spyod 'phel bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-33: de dag la rtag tu shing gi me tog dang 'bras bur ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-35: sa ni 'bru dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-36: zas bslang pa rnams ni mod pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-40: pho brang 'khor de dang de dag gi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221a-41: yul so so na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-1: phongs pa thams cad yul ga dha rar lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-2: de dag la gnod sbyin panytsa las bsrung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-5: des kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-6: de yang de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-7: de nas dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-8: gnod sbyin panytsa la gnyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'dus par 'dong nas; de gnyis phan tshun mdza' bor gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-9: gnod sbyin sa tas de la dus dus su yul nyams dga'i me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-10: 'bras bu la sogs pa skyes su bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-11: gnod sbyin panytsa las kyang gnod sbyin sa ta la yul ga dha ra'i me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-13: de gnyis 'di bzhin phan tshun du rab tu mdza' bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-14: de gnyis phyir yang gnod sbyin 'dus par 'dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-15: gnod sbyin sa tas grogs po'i bu gnyis dus la 'das kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-19: sum tsha rnams rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i thabs ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-21: gnod sbyin panytsa las smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-24: de lta bas na ma skyes pa las gnyen du bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-25: de ste bdag la bu pho zhig btsas pa la khyod la bu mo zhig yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-26: khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-27: 'on te khyod la bu pho zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:221b-28: bdag la bu mo zhig na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-2: de gnyis phan tshun du ma btsas par gnyen byas te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-3: de nas dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-4: de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-6: dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-8: gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-11: rgyud gcig pa rnams kyis btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-13: bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes gros byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-14: gnyen bshes dag gis 'di btsas pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-15: gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-16: de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming dga' byed mar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-18: de'i ming dga' byed mar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-19: yul ga dha ra'i gnod sbyin panytsa las 'di ltar rgyal po'i khab tu gnod sbyin sa ta las bu mo zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-22: bdag gi grogs po la bu mo zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-23: bu mo de bdag gi mna' mar 'gyur yang dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-24: rgyan rnams bskur ba'i rigs so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-25: des gnod sbyin sa ta la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222a-27: bdag gis khyod kyi bu mo btsas par thos nas shin tu dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-0: bdag gis grogs po'i bu mo @222b la gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-1: rgyan rnams bskur ba 'di blang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-4: slar yang grogs po bdag cag gnyen yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-5: de ste khyod la bu pho zhig btsas na 'di ni de nyid kyi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-7: gnod sbyin panytsa las de bklags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-8: bu nam rnyed ces rtag tu sems shing chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-10: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-11: de yang bdag gi rigs dang mthun pa rgyud gcig pa dag gis btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-13: khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes pa gros pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-14: gnyen bshes dag gis khye'u 'di gnod sbyin panytsa la'i bu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-15: de bas na khye'u 'di'i ming panytsi kar gdags so zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-16: de'i ming panytsi kar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-17: rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin sa tas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-18: 'di ltar yul ga dha ra'i gnod sbyin panytsa la'i bu pho zhig btsas pa thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-19: des bdag gis grogs po las bu pho zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-20: gdon mi za bar bdag gi mag par 'gyur snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-21: des de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-22: grogs po bdag gis khyed kyi bu pho zhig btsas so zhes thos nas shin tu dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:222b-23: bdag gis grogs po'i bu la gos dang rgyan zhig bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-0: @223a *// slar gyis lan bag ma blang ba'i ston mo sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-2: gnod sbyin sa tas yi ge bklags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-4: bu mo dga' byed ma ni bdag gis sngar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-6: des de skyed cing chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-7: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-8: nam gyi tshe sems can dang ldan par gyur pa de'i nyin mo nyid du ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-9: de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-10: gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang ba zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-11: btsas ma thag tu yang ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-12: de dag gi rigs dang mthun pa'i rgyud gcig pa thams cad kyis btsas pa'i btsas ston cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-14: khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes bgros na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-15: gnyen bshes dag gis 'di mngal du zhugs pa na yang ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-16: btsas pa na yang khrung khrung gi skad phyung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-17: pha yang sa ta zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-18: de bas na khye'u 'di'i ming yang sa ta gi rir gdags so zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-19: de'i ming sa ta gi rir btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-20: khye'u sa ta gi ri de gsos bskyed de cher gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223a-21: ji tsam dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta chung ma dang bcas pa dus las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-0: sa ta gi ri @223b khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-1: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dga' byed mas sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-5: sring mo yu bu cag gi phas yul nyams dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-11: yul mi rnams la rtag tu srung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-15: yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya bar rigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-16: 'di ni yu bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-17: 'di la gzhan dag gcig gis kyal ka byed na yang de la yu bu cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin bya mi rigs par khyod kyi sems bskyed pa de slar zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-19: de log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas bcos su ma btub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-20: yang sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-22: sa ta gi ris de'i dus kyis brten pa las na bcos su mi btub par shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:223b-23: 'di phyi phyir zhing rtag tu dgag mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-0: des gnod sbyin panytsa la bu mo dga' byed ma ni na chung du gyur @224a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-2: tshur gshegs la bag ma long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-3: ces yi ge spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-4: gnod sbyin panytsa la des gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka la dga' byed ma dpal chen po dang sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-5: bag mar blangs nas yul ga dha rar khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-6: gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-7: mo nam mdza' zhing sbobs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-8: dga' zhing yid bde ba mang por gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-10: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-14: bzang mo de ni khyod kyi gnyen gyi gnas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-15: der gzhan dag cig kyal ka byed na yang de bdag cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de lta khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed pa slar zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-17: de sngon gyis log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags bsgos pas sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-20: de gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-21: de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-22: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-23: de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224a-24: bu lnga brgya'i bar du btsas te de dag thams cad kyi tha chung gi ming dga' byed du btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-0: de @224b nam bu las mthu rnyed par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-1: de na panytsi kas bzlog kyang ma bzlog nas de mi dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-3: de nas gnod sbyin mo dga' byed ma gar dga' bar rang nyam du 'gro zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-6: des rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-7: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-8: rgyal po gzugs can snying po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-9: lha bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag gcig gis phrogs na su zhig bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid pa rma ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-11: rgyal pos gnas thams cad la dbang ba rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-12: kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag sus phrogs pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-14: de dag gis nan tan du bag yod par rmed pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-16: yang de dag gi yang phrogs par gyur nas gnod pa cher gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-17: su gang gi bud med sems can dang ldan par gyur pa des yul gzhan du phyung ste bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-18: blon po dag gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la; lha gnod pa cher gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-19: su gang gi bud med dag sems can dang ldan par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:224b-20: des yul gzhan du phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-2: de dag gis lha gnod sbyin khros kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-3: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma stsal la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-7: rgyal pos blon po rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-8: kye song la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-9: rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po thams cad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-10: yul so so na gnas pa thams cad kyis gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-13: de dag gis kyang de bzhin du dril bsgrags te; kye rgyal po'i khab dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-15: bdag gi yul dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po gnas pa rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-16: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-17: gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-20: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis grong khyer de dag rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-23: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-24: dri zhim po'i pog phor dag so sor dpyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225a-27: dar gyi lda ldi mang pos ni dpyangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-0: me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal @225b dga' ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-1: de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du gtor ma byin zhing mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-3: 'on kyang dga' byed ma zhi bar ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-4: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-5: kye khyed la gnod sbyin mo dga' byed mas khyed kyi bu rnams phrogs kyi khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-8: de dag gis kye 'di ni dga' byed ma ma yin gyi de ni 'phrog ma ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-9: des bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-11: de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba ldog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-12: gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mar ming du 'gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-13: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-14: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-16: bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma 'di rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yun ring po nas ma 'khon pa dang ni 'khon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-17: dgrar ma gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-18: snying mi ring ba la ni snying ring bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-19: des bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams ni phrogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:225b-20: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma 'dul bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-1: ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba bzhin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-2: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-3: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ba bzhin gnang bar shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-6: de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-8: rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-9: rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms las slar bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-10: zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-11: bsod snyoms phyis len pa spangs te gshegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-12: gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma'i gnas gang na ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-13: de'i tshe na gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mas bu dga' byed khyim du bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-14: spyod yul du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lhung bzed kyis bkab ste bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-16: ji ltar bu phu bo dag gis de mi mthong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-17: des de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-18: de ma thag tu gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma spyod yul nas 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-19: bu dga' byed mi snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-20: de sdangs te phan tshun khyim khor khor yug tu bltas na 'on kyang mi snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-21: bu thams cad la bu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226a-22: bu dga' byed mi snang na ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-0: ma bdag cag @226b gis kyang ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-2: des brang brdungs nas mdog nyams shing mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-5: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-17: gzhan yang khyim dog pa'i gnas dag tu btsal na 'on kyang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-18: des bla gos med par myos nas ngu zhing smre ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-22: ces yang dang yang sgra 'byin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-27: pho brang 'khor rnams su bltas te 'on kyang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-28: de nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-31: byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-35: byang phyogs de dag na yang mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-36: de nas skrag cing sgren mor gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-42: tsog pur 'dug pa de lta bu'i thabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi ri nag po bdun rgal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-43: gser lta bu'i ri bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-45: ma dros pa'i mtsho chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:226b-46: ri dri rgyas dag tu yang btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-0: de nas de skad cher du @227a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-1: zhing shar phyogs kyi lus 'phags gling dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-2: nub phyogs kyi ba glang spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-3: byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams kun btsal yang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-14: aa ha ha zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-18: padma chen po lta bu la sogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-19: sems can dmyal ba dag tu btsal na yang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-20: de nas ri rab kyi bang rim dang por 'dzegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-23: gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ngal bso po la ma dris par sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-24: skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-27: dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du yang btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-28: pa ri ya tra ko d'a bi dha ra'i drung du yang song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-29: de nas lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba grong khyer bzang po'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-30: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal du 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-31: der gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gnod sbyin du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227a-32: lha stong gis bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-0: de myur du mgyogs par @227b grong khyer bzang po'i nang nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-1: phyogs gzhan zhig tu ring zhig tu gnas nas mdor na yi chad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-2: gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ngal bso ba'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-3: rdo leb la bdag gi lus brdabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-11: bu slong na stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-13: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-14: che zhes mya ngan thong la mchi ma phyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-15: khyod kyi gnas su nyin par gnas shing su 'ongs soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-18: sde dpon dge sbyong go'u ta ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-19: des de ste de bzhin song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-20: bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-21: khyod la dga' byed de bcom ldan 'das kyis ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-23: de srog stor ba las slar rnyed pa bzhin du rings shing myur du rang gi gnas su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-26: dpe byad bzang pos sku spras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-27: nyi zer stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:227b-28: rin po che'i ri 'gro ba bzhin kho ra khor yug nas bzang ba mthong ma thag tu dga' ba skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-0: snyam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na @228a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-1: ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-4: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas; gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-6: kye go'u ta ma khyod kyis bdag gi bu dga' byed bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-7: bdag gi bu dga' byed ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-11: 'phrog ma khyod la bu mang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-12: ji snyed yod ces rmas pa dang; des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-13: bcom ldan 'das bu lnga brgya mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma de ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-15: khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las gcig cig med pa lta ci nyes zhes gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-16: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dga' byed ma mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-17: khrag dron mo skyugs te gdon mi za bar dus bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-19: 'phrog ma khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las gcig ma mthong na yang 'di 'dra bar sdug bsngal na gang la bu gcig pu yod pa yang khyod kyis bsad de zos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-21: des bcom ldan 'das de bas sdug bsngal ba rab tu che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228a-24: 'phrog ma khyod bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra bar shes bzhin du gzhan gyi bu ci'i phyir za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-0: @228b des bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-3: nga la skyabs su song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-4: bslab pa'i gzhi gzung la rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la mi 'jigs pa byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-5: gal te 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du dga' byed mthong bar gdon mi za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-8: 'di ltar deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-10: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal to; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu dga' byed bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-11: des kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-12: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la mi 'jigs pa byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-13: nam gyi tshe 'phrog ma bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-14: bslab pa'i gzhi bzung nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-15: dge slong dag the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-16: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-17: btsun pa gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-18: las ci bgyis; las gang gi rnam par smin pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:228b-19: mdangs 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin mor skyes la 'di las bu lnga brgya btsas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-2: dge slong dag gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-3: rkyen smin pa ni chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-5: 'phrog mas las byas shing bsags pa ni gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-6: dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin; chu'i khams la ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-8: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-10: khams dang skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-11: mi dge ba'i las byas pa ni rnam par smin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-12: las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-13: bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-14: dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-15: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-16: dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-17: rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid na grong khyer gzhan zhig tu ba lang rdzi bo zhig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-18: rigs dang mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te; des de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-19: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-20: dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-21: sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba na rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-22: nyams shing dman pa la thugs brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229a-23: gnas pas mthar tsha ba 'jig rten pa'i yon gnas gcig pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-0: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas @229b gzhan zhig yul rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-1: de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dus ston nye bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-2: der sdun [* sngun ?]zan pa lnga brgya tsam zhig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-5: me tog ku su ma dri zhim pos brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-8: rnga rdung zhing skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ba'i bar du ba lang rdzi mo zhig dar ba bum pa gang thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-9: lam de nas mar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-10: sdun [* sngun ?]zan pa de dag gis de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-14: des kyang de dag gar ji ltar byed pa de lta de ltar byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-15: de'i mngal zhig par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-16: de khros nas rang sangs rgyas la aa mra'i 'bras bu smin pa lnga brgya phul nas smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin mo zhig tu skyes la rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyi bu dang bu mo bdag gis phrogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-19: bdag la bu lnga brgya btsa' bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-21: dge slong dag de'i tshe ba lang rdzi'i chung mar gyur ba ni da ltar 'phrog ma 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-22: smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bur skyes pa yin no ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:229b-25: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dgon pa la gnas @230a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-5: lam gyi sum mdo dag tu bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-6: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-7: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-9: dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khang du gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-11: dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la dbyar mo khang gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-13: de dag gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang brtsigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-14: dge slong ma dag la de bzhin du mi rgod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-16: su'i bu gtol med pa dag glags lta bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-17: ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu ma brtsigs par grong khyer gyi nang du brtsig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-20: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-21: dge slong ma sbom dga' mo dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-23: khyim bdag dag la 'phyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230a-26: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-0: @230b gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-1: dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug pa'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-2: de lta bas na dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug par mi bya bar dgongs nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-5: de lta bas na dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug par mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-12: de dag kyang ngor 'phya nas snga ma bzhin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-14: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-19: de dag bsnyen par des rdzogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:230b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te; dge slong ma dag gi dbyar mo khang na chos gos lnga gyon te las kun byed pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:231a-4: dbyar mo khang gi las kun byos shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:235b-21: 'phags pa thugs rjes dgongs te cung zhig bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:235b-23: des 'phags ma ci dgos zhes dris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:235b-24: des 'phags pa bdag la nyes pa zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:235b-25: de 'phags pa'i spyan sngar bshags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-1: rkang pa la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-2: mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-4: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong ma la 'di lta bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyes pa zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-5: de bdag gis 'phags pa'i spyan sngar nyes pa byung ba bshags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-8: mthol zhing bshags na bde bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-9: ma bshags ma mthol na ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-10: des 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi nyes pa byung ba ni 'phags mas ma legs pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-12: dge slong ma de skyengs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-13: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-14: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-16: de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas dge slong pha'i mdun du nyes pa mthol bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-17: dge slong ma yongs su dag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-18: lta ba mthun pa'i mdun du nyes pa mthol bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-19: dge slong mas dge slong gi mdun du nyes pa mthol na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-21: dge slong phas ni las brjod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-22: dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-23: khri dang khri'u yang sbyin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236a-24: g-yogs pa dag la mi gzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs @236b so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong pha'i las kyang so so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-1: dge slong ma'i yang so so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-2: spyi'i las ni ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-4: dge slong ma dag dge slong pha'i mdun du las byas pa dang 'jigs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-5: las byed par ma sbobs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-6: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-8: dge slong dag gis las byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-9: dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-11: dge slong dag dge slong gis ni las byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-12: dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-14: dge slong ma dag gis ji ltar brtag pa mi shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-15: de dag gis de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-17: dge slong ma dag gis bag yod par yid la bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-23: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyan pa bsgrags par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-26: dge slong dag gis stan ma bting nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:236b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis stan thing zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-0: de nas dus phyi zhig na @237a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-1: chos bshad pa bsgrags par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-2: dge slong ma dag 'ongs nas g-yogs pa'i khri'u la 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-3: chos nyan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-4: der dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis dran pa nye bar ma bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-5: khrag zags nas g-yogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-6: de nas chos bsgrags pa zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-7: dge skos kyis stan bsdu bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-8: ji tsam na g-yogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-9: sbrang bus gang ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-10: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-13: dge slong ma dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa la g-yogs pa'i khri'u mi sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-14: des kyang khri'u'i g-yogs pa la 'dug par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma chos nyan du 'ongs pa la khri'u g-yogs pa ma sbyin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-17: dge slong dag gis de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa rnams la khri'u ma g-yogs pa byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-18: ji tsam na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-19: de la yang khri'u ma g-yogs pa zhig byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237a-21: bdag sngon khyim na gnas pa na yang khri'u g-yogs pa la cung zad kyang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-1: dge slong dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-2: go'u ta mi bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-3: dge slong ma chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa la khri'u g-yogs pa ma sbyin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-5: dge slong ma gang dag dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa de bzhin du bdag kyang nyes pa'i dmigs ci bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-7: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-10: de lta bas na gnang ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-11: dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i dge slong ma de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs na de dag la khri'u g-yogs pa sbyin par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-12: 'di la the tshom ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-16: bran mo dang yang reg mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-17: gnod pa'i gos dang brang mi rdung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-18: dge slong dag gi nang du gzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-20: de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus na sham thabs dang chos gos bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-21: lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-22: de bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-23: khyim mi mo zhig mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:237b-27: des de mthong nas nu mo khyod kyi gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-5: de las 'di dag thams cad rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-7: sbom dga' mos thabs 'di ni legs pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-10: snyam bsams nas des de la dmigs shing dran pa bzhin du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-12: gnas gzhan zhig na bud med cig gos dri ma can gyon la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-14: de rid la gom pa dal gyis 'gro ba zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-19: gang bdag la bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-20: bgo ba ster ba de'i las bdag gis bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-22: de ste de bzhin na chang 'tshong ba ci'i phyir mi spyod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-24: des 'phags ma ci 'di bzhin nyid du chang 'tshong ba spyod du rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-25: der thog mar nor mang du dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-26: zong yod kyang snod dang chang 'thung ba dag bde bar 'dug pa'i khang pa rgya chen po rnams kyang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-30: bdag gis de dag thams cad sbyar la khyod kyi bza' ba dang bgo ba yang sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238a-31: rnyed pa thams cad bdag la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-0: de dbyar mo khang dang nye bar de'i khang pa zhig brtsigs @238b te; zong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-2: yo byad rnams byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-3: des der chang 'tshong ba la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-4: chang yang zhim por gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-5: chang 'thung ba dag der mang du 'dus shing 'tshogs pa dang; de dag mthong nas chang 'tshong ba gzhan dag phrag dog skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-6: sbom dga' mo'i yang rnyed pa dag 'phel lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-7: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-8: rgyal po pho brang du chang zhig dgos par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-9: rgyal po'i skyes bu dag gis chang 'tshong ba thams cad bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-10: de dag phrag dog langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-11: de rnams kyis rgyal po'i skyes bu dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-12: 'di ni sbom dga' mo'i chang 'tshong ma zhig dbyar mo khang dang nye ba na chang 'tshong zhing 'dug gi chang ma de yang khrid cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-14: de dag gis de bzung ste khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-17: rgyal po'i skyes bu 'di dag gis bdag khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-19: de myur du gom pa mgyogs par song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-21: bdag gi bu mo 'di gar bkri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-25: mi mdza' ba rnams kyi gnya' bar rdog pas mnan la chang yang 'tshong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-26: ci 'phags ma la yang dgra yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-28: khyed cag nyid nga'i dgra chen po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:238b-29: de'i phyir bdag gi bu mo khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-0: de dag 'thab pa bram ze dang khyim bdag gis @239a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-2: de dag gis kye 'di dag ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-4: de dag gis zhib tu smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-7: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu dge sbyong dag ni tshig pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-8: de 'di ltar dge slong mgo reg ma yang chang 'tshong ba la zhugs pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-9: dge sbyong dang tshangs pa yang rab tu tshig pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-10: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-13: sbom dga' mos dge sbyong ma yin pa cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-14: de lta bas na dge slong mas chang 'tshong ba ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-15: 'tshong na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-16: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-17: de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus na sham thabs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-19: lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-20: de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-22: gos dang sham thabs rab tu bzang ba zhig gyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-23: rgyan rab tu bzang bas brgyan pa zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-29: des 'phags ma bdag gis smad 'tshong byas pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-30: de las 'di lta bu dag rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239a-32: sbom dga' mos thabs de ni legs pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-2: de la dmigs shing dran bzhin du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-3: ji tsam na gnas gzhan zhig na bu mo zhig gos dri ma can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-4: zas kyis kyang mi 'byor par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-6: byad bzhin ni bzang mo zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-9: des 'phags ma gang sus bdag la zas dang gos sbyin pa de'i las kyang bdag gis bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-12: de ltar na smad 'tshong ma ci'i phyir mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-17: mi mdzes pa de lta bu dag ni bdag cag gi rigs la sngon chad sus kyang ma bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-21: bud med kyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-22: rgyal po 'di zhes bya ba'i bu mo yang de bzhin du smad 'tshong bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-24: bram ze 'di zhes bya ba'i bu mo yang de bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-25: rigs mchog las kyang de lta bu mang du byung na; bud med ni skyes pa la sems pa yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-26: bdag rab tu ma byung na de lta bu bya ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-27: rab tu byung bas mi bde'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-29: des de bslus nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-33: smad 'tshong ma 'di lta bu spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:239b-34: de la yang yo byad mang por dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-1: khang pa rgya chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-6: btung ba dag kyang mang du dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-9: de ltar na bdag gis thams cad sbyar la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-10: khyod kyis rnyed pa thams cad bdag la byin na ni khyod kyi zas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-11: gos la sogs pa bdag gis sbyar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-14: de bzhin du rnyed pa sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-16: sbom dga' mos dbyar mo khang dang nye ba zhig tu de'i khang pa zhig brtsigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-17: des ci smras pa bzhin du byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-19: gos dang rgyan bzang po dag kyang byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-20: zhag du ma zhig gi bar du chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-21: de gzugs gzhon zhing mdzes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-22: smad 'tshong ma'i gzugs su byas te 'dug go; nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis gzir nas thams cad kyang der 'dus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-23: de smad 'tshong ma gzhan zhig gis mthong nas phrag dog langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-25: sbom dga' mo'i rnyed pa dag cher gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-26: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-27: rgyal po'i pho brang du dus ston chen po zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-28: de dri mang po zhig dgos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-29: rgyal po'i skyes bu dag gis dri btab pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma thams cad bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-30: de dag gis phrag dog gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240a-31: de yang rgyal po'i skyes bu dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-0: dbyar mo khang gi drung na sbom dga' mo'i smad 'tshong @240b ma zhig 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-1: de yang khrid ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-2: de dag gis de bzung ste khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-5: bdag ni rgyal po'i skyes bus khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-9: bdag gi bu mo 'di gar bkri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-11: 'phags ma yang smad 'tshong ma spyad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-12: dgra rnams kyi gnya' bar rdog pas mnan la spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-13: ci 'phags ma la yang dgra yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-14: nga'i bu mo khrid pas na khyod nyid dgra'i nang na chen po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-15: de dag 'thab pa bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-17: de dag gis kye ci zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-19: des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-22: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong ma ni rab tu tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-24: tshangs pa yang rab tu tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:240b-25: da ni dge sbyong mgo reg mas kyang smad 'tshong ma yang byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:245b-29: de ste khyod la bu pho zhig byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:245b-30: bdag la bu mo zhig byung na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-4: de dag gcig la gcig ma btsas par gnyen byas te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-5: de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag byin pa'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-18: bu mo 'di rtag tu chos 'dod pa la chos la rna ba byos te nyan la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-19: khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo yin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-25: gnyis ni rtse ba'i ma ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246a-26: ma ma de brgyad kyis gsos bskyed de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-5: bdag gi mna' ma yin par yid la yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-6: des de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-7: mdza' bo grogs po khyod la bu mo zhig byung bar thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-9: mdza' bo'i bu mo'i gos dang rgyan dang bskur ba 'di yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-15: de ltar byas pa legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-17: khyod la bu pho zhig byung na de la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-18: khyim bdag ri dvags sgras de'i lan thos pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-20: rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma mngal sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-22: de btsas nas de la yang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:246b-28: khye'u 'di skar ma sa ga'i tshe btsas pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-0: de bas na khye'u 'di'i ming sa gar gdags @247a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-3: de'i ming sa gar btags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-7: gnyis ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-8: gnyis ni rtse ba'i ma ma'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-21: mdza' ba'i bu la bdag gis gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-24: des de blangs nas phrin lan mdza' bo khyod kyi bu mo skyed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-30: nam bu mo chos sbyin bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247a-31: de rab tu byung bar 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-0: des pha'i @247b rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-1: pha bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-4: bu mo khyod ri dvags sgra'i bu sa ga la khyod sngon btang zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-5: khyod kyi khyim thab de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-6: ngas ni gnang du mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-9: khyim der dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ces bya ba rigs pa dag ston par byed de dus dus su 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-12: bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-13: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob par 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-14: bdag ni phas mi gnang zhing bsrungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-15: phyir 'byung du yang mi ster na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-16: khyod kyis 'di nyid du rab tu mi 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-18: des bu mo sems de ltar bskyed pa ni legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-19: 'dod pa ni bde ba chung la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-21: rab tu byung na ni dge ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-23: mkhas pas nyes pa rnam pa lnga mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-24: des 'dod pa lnga la bsten par mi rigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-27: bde ba chung la sdug bsngal che zhing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-29: des 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:247b-30: 'dod pa la bsten pas kun tu sbyor ba 'phel bar 'gyur bar mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-5: des 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-6: 'dod pa la bsten na sdig pa cung zad kyang mi bya ba med par mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-7: des 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-8: 'dod pa ni rnam grangs de lta bur sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-9: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-11: yang dag par song ba skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs par mkhas pas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-12: 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-13: mkhas pas yon tan lnga mthong nas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-15: bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i don rjes su thob par 'gyur ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-16: mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-17: bdag gang dag gi bran dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-21: ci dga' mgur byed pa de dag gis slar mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-23: mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-24: bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su 'thob par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248a-25: mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:248b-25: slad rol du 'byung du yang mi ster to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249a-11: dge slong ma rnams la bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249a-13: dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma la bsgo ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-18: khyod ni da dge slob mar gyur kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-19: 'di dang 'di ni khyod kyis byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-20: ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa bzhin du bsdam par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-21: de nas de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:249b-22: des thos pa dang chos sbyin mas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-3: des khyim bdag byin pa la mdza' bo khye'u yang gzhon nur gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-4: bu mo yang gzhon nur gyur na nyi ma nam bzang ba brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-10: khyim bdag byin pas ltas mkhan dag bsags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-12: bu mo 'di nam bag mar btang na rung ba rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-14: de dag gis yid mthun par brtsis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-15: bag mar btang ba'i nyi ma bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-16: de bzhin du khyim bdag ri dvags sgras kyang bag ma blang ba'i zhag bstan to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-25: gnyen rnams la de bzhin du yi ge spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-26: khyim bdag de gnyis kyi skye bo dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-28: phu nu dang; gnyen rnams lhags pas mnyan du yod pa'i nang thams cad gang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250a-29: yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nang gi btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-2: khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo ri dvags sgra la byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-3: de bag mar len par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-4: de dag gi gnas nas mdza' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-6: gnyen rnams dang; skye po mang po dag lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-9: kye khyed kyis kyang de gnyis kyi grogs kyis shig par bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-10: de dag gis kyang gnas gnas kyi dbang po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-11: rgyal po'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams la so sor gang gi yul na yo byad ci yod pa rnams deng bdag gis khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-14: de dag gis kyang de ltar thos ma thag tu bdag gi ci 'byor pa rnams sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-15: mnyan du yod par lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-16: de nas sems can mang po brgya stong yang 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-17: de nas blon po rnams kyis mnyan du yod pa'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-19: de'i 'khor du bcas pa thams cad byi dor byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-22: bong bdag kyang phyags nas med par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-23: tsandan gyi chus ni chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-24: bdug spos zhim po'i pog phor sbyangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-25: g-yas g-yon du bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-27: rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas dar gyi lnga ldi dbyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-28: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-29: yid du 'ong ba'i lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-31: de nas chos sbyin mas yo byad sbyar ba rnams mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:250b-32: nang gi skye bo dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-1: ma yin pa'i dus ston 'di ci zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-3: de dag gis khyod kyis sngon gyi legs pa'i tshogs rnam par bsags pa de'i mthus ni dus la ma bab pa'i dus ston chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-4: khyod bag mar gtang ba'i phyir dus la ma bab pa'i dus ston chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-8: pha'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-9: yab bdag 'dod pa 'tshal ba ni ma lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-10: rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du mchir ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-13: bu mo khyod ma skyes par khyim bdag ri dvags sgra'i bu sa ga la byin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-14: da ni nga la dbang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-15: khyod kyi khyim thab de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-16: de lta bur ni yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-22: yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis kyang shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-23: ngas khyod la ji ltar gnang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-26: gnyen rnams btson rar bcug ste 'chi bar 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-27: khyod ni sang bag mar 'gro ba ltar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-31: skye bo mang po dag kyang 'dir 'dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251a-33: khyod rab tu gzhon bas ma rtogs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-0: tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa thong @251b zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-2: de brtson pas lam yid la byed pa sgom pa la zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-3: 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i thabs ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-4: de'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-7: rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-9: 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-13: gnyis su ma yin par gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-14: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-15: 'dul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-16: chu bo bzhi las rgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-17: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil la rab tu rtag par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-18: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-19: yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-20: skye ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-21: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-23: spyod pa drug la rtag tu spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-24: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-25: lam yan lag brgyad pa 'chang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-26: dgu mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-27: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-28: phyogs bcur snyan pa rgyas par grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:251b-29: brgya phrag bcu las dbang sgyur ba khyad zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-0: nyin lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs @252a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-1: nas ye shes kyi mthong ba la 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-7: gang dga' ba dang; dog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-11: gang ngan song la rab tu bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-12: gang ngan song las byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-13: mtho ris dang thar pa la rab tu gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-15: gang bskyed pa rnams yongs su smin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-16: gang yongs su smin pa rnams ni grol bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-19: rgya mtsho chu srin gnas de ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-20: dus las gal te yol yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-21: gdul bar bya ba'i bu rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-22: sangs rgyas dus las 'da' mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-24: chos nyid kyis nam gyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das der 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-25: zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-30: kha cig ni steng du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-31: gang 'og tu dong ba de dag gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252a-41: shin tu chu bur can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-3: padmo chen po lta bu dag gi sems can dmyal bar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-4: gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba der bab na ni bsil bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-5: gang grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba der bab na ni dro bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-6: des sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par slar bde bar gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-7: de dag 'di snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-10: 'on te gzhan zhig tu skyes snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-11: de dag dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa der btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-13: de dag sprul pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-14: de dag 'di snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-15: kye bdag cag ni tshe 'di nas shi 'phos pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-16: gzhan du skyes pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-17: sngon chad ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-18: bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par bde bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-20: de dag sprul pa la mngon par sems dad pa las de dag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi las zad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-21: gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod 'gyur ba der lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-22: mi'i phyir nyid mtshams len to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:252b-23: gang steng gi phyogs su dong pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-9: 'og min gnas kyi lha dag gi drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-15: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-16: 'byung ba la ni brtsam par byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-17: sangs rgyas bstan la nan tan gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-18: 'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-19: ba glang gis ni rtsva khyim bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-21: bag yod pa ru su spyod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-22: skye ba'i 'khor ba spong ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-23: sdug bsngal ba yi mthar byed 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-24: de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam gyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-26: de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-28: ma 'ongs pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-29: mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-30: sems can dmyal bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-31: zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-32: byol song du skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-33: zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253a-34: yi dvags su skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-0: zhabs kyi mthe bor @253b mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-1: mir skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-2: pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-3: stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-4: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-5: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-6: phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-7: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-8: lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-9: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-10: zhal gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-12: mdzod spur mi snang par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-14: gtsug tor gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-15: de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog stong gis brgyan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-20: zhal gyi nang nas mang po 'byung ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-21: thams cad phyogs su gang gis snang mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-22: snang byed shar bas ji ltar de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-23: yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-24: 'phyar ba med cing mi dga' dregs spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-25: sangs rgyas skye bo mchog gi rgyur gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-26: rgyu ma mchis par dung dkar padmo'i rtsa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:253b-27: 'dzum pa mi ston rgyal ba dgra pham mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-1: kyi rtogs pa bstan pa'i blo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-2: nyan pa rgyal dbang la ni thos par 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-3: thub pa khyu mchog gtan tshigs dam pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-4: the tshom skyes pa mchog gis bsal bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-5: mgon po brtan pa rgya mtsho'i ri bo bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-6: rgyu med par ni sangs rgyas bzhad mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-7: brtan pas gang gi phyir ni 'dzum bstan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-8: skye bo mang po 'di dag thos par 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-14: rgyu med rkyen med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-15: kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo chos sbyin ma la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-16: nga'i bkas dge slong ma autpa la'i kha dog ma phrin par btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-17: skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas rim bzhin du rab tu phyung ba la lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-18: rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa yang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-19: de ni sang bag mar gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-20: de'i phyir skye bo mang po 'dus pa rnams mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-24: bu mo de slar khyim du mi mor gnas pa'i skabs ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-26: dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i longs spyod la longs spyad pa'i gnas su 'di mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254a-27: 'di ni da phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-0: @254b dgra bcom pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-2: dge slong ma rnams la 'di ltar chos sbyin mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-3: lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-4: rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa la bslabs zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-5: de la autpa la'i kha dog ma phrin par thong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-6: de tshangs par spyad pa bskyed pa'i sdom pa byin par bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-10: dge slong ma la bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-11: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang autpa la'i kha dog ma phrin par bsgos te btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-12: de song nas bu mo khyod ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis tshangs pa spyad pa bskyed pa'i sdom pa gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-13: da ni khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-14: ci nas 'di lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-15: des thos ma thag tu slar phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-17: autpa la'i kha dog ma song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-24: autpa la'i kha dog ma phrin par thong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-25: bu mo chos sbyin ma bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:254b-29: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-2: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang dge 'dun sde gnyis ka bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-3: chos sbyin ma khyim de na 'dug bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-4: autpa la'i kha dog ma las phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-5: autpa la'i kha dog ma song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-8: dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so; ;zhes bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-9: 'di lta bu'i chos kyang bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-11: dge slong ma chos sbyin mas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo dum bu lnga po 'di g-yo pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-13: 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad 'jig pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-16: rnam par zhig pa'i chos nyid kyis rab tu bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-17: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-18: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas; dgra bcom par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-19: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-21: nam mkha' dang lag mthil ltar chags pa med pa bzhin du mnyam pa'i sems ste'u dang tsan dan du 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-22: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-25: so sor rig pa rnams thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-26: srid pa'i 'dod chags la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255a-27: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:255b-24: rab tu 'byung bar gdon mi zas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256a-16: de nas khyim bdag byin pas mdza' bo dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256a-21: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256a-34: khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256b-3: bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256b-6: stan dma' ba zhig bting nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:256b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdza' bo dang /
