K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-18: skye bo mang po dag gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-19: sems can mang po brgya stong gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-22: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-29: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257a-31: nyan thos pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-0: @257b rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-3: 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-5: dge 'dun la rab tu bab par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-6: de nas dge sbyong ma chos sbyin gyis thob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-8: sems can rnams kyi don chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-9: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-14: bsnyen par rdzogs pas nga'i dge slong ma nyan thos chos kyi gtam smras ba'i nang na dge slong ma chos sbyin ma 'di ni mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-15: dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-16: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-18: dge slong ma chos sbyin mas las ci zhig bgyis na de khyim na mchis bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-19: phrin las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-20: dge slong ma'i dngos po thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-21: 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu gsungs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:257b-26: dge slong ma chos sbyin mas las byas shing bsags pas tshogs pa rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-0: @258a *// rkyen smin pa ni chu bo bzhin du nye bar gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-2: chos sbyin gyis las byas shing bsags pa ni gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-3: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-6: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-9: skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-10: las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-11: bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-12: dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-13: lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-15: sngon byung ba ni bskal pa bzang po 'di'i skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-16: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-21: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer na bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-23: drang srong gnas kyi ri dvags kyi tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258a-24: de'i dus na yul 'khor mo 'jig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-0: de de @258b dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-1: de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-2: de dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-4: dgu 'das pa dang de las bu mo zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-5: de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-6: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-7: de nas lus cher gyur pa de na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pas de'i pha ma dag gis rab tu 'byung du mi ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-8: khyim de na dge slong ma rgan mo gzhan zhig rigs pa ston par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-9: de'i khyim du dus su 'ong ngo; ;bu mo des dge slong ma rgan mo de la 'phags ma bdag ni legs par bshad pa'i 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-10: bdag gis pha mas mi gnang zhing khyim las phyir 'byung du yang mi ster na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-11: gnas 'di nyid du rab tu dbyung bar nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-13: des bu mo bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-15: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-16: de nyid phrin par btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-17: de khyim de na 'dug bzhin du rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-18: dge slong ma'i sdom pa yang gnang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-19: dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:258b-20: dge slong ma rgan mo des de la chos bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-1: bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-2: de nas dge slong ma rgan mos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-3: bu mo 'dis khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-4: slob pa'i sdom pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-5: khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa de thams cad kyang bdag las gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-6: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-7: dge ba ci spyad pa'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-8: bram ze'i bu bla ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-9: bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu lo brgya thub pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-11: zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la 'di ltar khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-13: dge slong ma'i dngos po thob cing khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-14: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259a-15: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya thub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-0: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya'i rgyal pos chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog @259b tu bsngags par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-2: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-3: dge slong ma rgan mo de ni da ltar gyi dge slong ma chos sbyin ma 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-4: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-5: 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyod de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-7: khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin pas rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-9: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po yang thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-10: khyim na 'dug bzhin du des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-11: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-12: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-13: de lta bas na dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-14: las gcig tu gnag pa ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-15: dkar ba ni gcig tu dkar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-17: de lta bas na dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-20: gcig tu dkar ba'i las nyid la bsgrub par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-22: de lta bur bslab par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-24: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la yi rangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:259b-29: phyi rol dge slong bzod mi gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-2: dbyar mo khang ni glar mi gtang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-3: pha gus yang ni lus mi phyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-5: dge slong ma gcig cig dge slong la klog slob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-6: de nas dus phyi zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-7: de nyes pa zhig byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-8: des spyos pa dang; de dbyar mo khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-11: gzhon nu ma khyod ci zhig nyes na 'phres te 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-13: des mkhan mo slob dpon gyis spyos na da ji ltar bya mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-16: de la gzhan ci zhig byar yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-17: slob dpon dang mkhan mo ni bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-18: song la bzod par gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-21: de ltar byas bzod pa gsol du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-23: dze ta'i tshal du song ste mi snang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-24: des de btsal nas ji tsam zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-25: de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-26: des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-27: dge slong des ma gus par byas te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260a-28: byis pa dag gis mthong nas de dag nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis gzir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-0: 'phags ma khyod kyis don ci'i phyir khyod kyis bzod pa byas pa bdag cag @260b gis shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-2: des ni mi bzod na tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-3: bdag cag gis khyod kyi don bsgrub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-5: de ngo tsha nas cang mi smra bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-6: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-7: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-9: gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong ma la spyos nas bzod pa gsol na yang rim gro mi byed par 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-10: byis pa dag gis kyang phyi phyir mi dge ba gzhan du rtog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-11: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa mi gsol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-12: dge slong phas dge slong ma la ma gus pa bzhin du 'gro bar mi bya bar dgongs shing mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-13: dge slong dag byis pa rnams phyi phyir mi dge ba la rtog par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-14: de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong khros pa la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa ma gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-15: de ste yang dge slong mas dge slong pha la bzod pa gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-16: ma gus par byas te ma 'gro zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-17: dge slong mas dge slong pha la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-18: dge slong phas dge slong ma bzod pa gsol ba la ma gus pa byas te song na gnyis ka la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-19: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:260b-20: dge slong ma dag 'breg mkhan gyis skra breg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-0: de na 'breg mkhan gzhon nur gyur @261a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-1: pas dran pa nye bar mi 'jog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-2: des de dag mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-4: rnam pa de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-5: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-9: dran pa nye bar ma bzhag pas bslus par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-10: bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags rab tu che ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-11: de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gcig pu 'breg mkhan gyi drung du skra 'breg par ma byed par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-12: de'i drung du dge slong ma gzhan zhig zhog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-13: de ste 'breg mkhan de chags par gyur na de'i drung na dge slong ma 'dug pas 'di skad smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-15: dge slong ma 'di'i lus ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-16: 'di ni rgyan med la lus dri ma can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-17: 'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-18: de lta bu'i sems zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-19: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-20: de ste dge slong ma chags par gyur na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-23: khyim ba'i las ni khyod kyis spangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-24: ci khyod kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-25: dge 'dun sde gnyis la khyod kyis khas blangs pa de soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-26: 'dod pa ni bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-27: nyes pa'i dmigs mang bar ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261a-29: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa spongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-0: rab tu byung @261b ba'i sems nye bar zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-1: des de la 'di skad du smra na ni legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-2: de ste ma smras na drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong ma la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-3: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-4: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos khyim bdag gzhan zhig dad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-5: dbyar mo khang brtsig tu bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-6: de na dge slong ma mang zhig gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-7: ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs nas tshong ba lnga brgya tsam zhig zor khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-8: mnyan du yod par lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-9: tshong pa de dag nor gzhag pa'i khang pa glas btsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-11: de nas de dag gis mnyan du yod par kun tu btsal kyang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-14: lam gyi bzhi mdor nor rnams spungs te 'khod na 'brug kyang zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-15: nyi ma yang nub tu nye nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-16: de'i tshe char pa cung zad cig bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-17: de dag lag pas 'gram pa la brten nas rab tu sems shing 'khod pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-20: bzhin bzang char pa yang 'bab na; srang du 'khod de ci byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-21: nor rnams gnas shig tu gzud na ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-23: bdag cag gis mnyan du yod par khyab par btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-24: 'jig rten pa mi srun pas khang pa glar yang ma rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-27: des bu rnams mtshan mo'i tshe ci 'dra bar shes par byos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:261b-28: gla yang lhag par byin te khyi ma tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-2: char bas gsher nas su zhig nyo ba yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-6: de dag la bdag cag gis khyim gyi gla nyis rim du byin yang ma ster to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-7: bdag gi las 'byung ba lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-8: ji lta bur yang rung ste zhag gcig lon nas gzhan du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-9: zhes byas pa dang des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-10: bu de ltar khang pa'i gla lhag par byin na bdag gi dbyar mo khang gi nang du skyos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-11: de dag gis 'phags ma legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-15: dge slong ma dag nub mo dbyar mo khang nas bskrad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-16: dbyar mo khang de tshong ba de dag la glar btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-17: dge slong ma de dag char pa babs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-18: chos gos gsher bzhin du dbyar mo khang gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-19: de'i dge slong ma dag gis che zhe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-20: khyed cag nub mo chos gos gsher bzhin du 'dir ci la 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-22: de dag gis zhib tu smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-23: don nyung du ma'i dge slong ma dag gis 'phya zhing smod la ngan du 'dzer ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-24: sbyin bdag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du byas pa'i khang pa glar gtang bar ga la rigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-25: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-0: @262b dge slong ma dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-1: de bas na dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khang glang ma gtang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-2: dge slong mas dbyar mo khang glar btang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-3: 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro gleng gzhi ni gnyan du yod pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-4: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos byis pa gzhon nu dag lus 'khru ba'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-5: so phag gis lus drud cing khrus byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-6: de dag chags par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-7: kun tu blta zhing gtam 'dzer ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-9: dge sbyong ma mgo reg ma pha bi gyad chen po go char bgos pa dang 'dra ba zhig lus pha gus phyi zhing phyis nas phyi zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-10: de dag de la 'phya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-12: de la de dag rab tu dgod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-13: de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-14: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-16: byis pa gzhon nu de dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-17: mi rigs pa'i las byas par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-19: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos mi mdzes shing las ngan pa byas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-20: byis pa gzhon nu de dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-21: de lta bas na dge slong ma dag lus pha gus ma phyi zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-22: dge slong ma dag lus pha gus phyis na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-24: lus la pha gus phyi mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-25: rdo leb dag kyang de bzhin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-26: gos dkris dang ni khu tshur gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:262b-27: ci dang cis kyang mi phyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-1: 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-4: lus pha gus ma phyi zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-7: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-9: rdo leb kyis ma phyi zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-11: de dag gis gos dkris pas phyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-12: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-14: gos dkris pas ma phyi zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-16: de dag gis khu tshur gyis phyis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-17: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-19: khu tshur gyis ma phyi zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-21: de dag gis ci dang cis kyang phyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-22: de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-24: lag pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan ci dang cis kyang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-26: phyis na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-27: 'dul ba phra mo'i dngos po sgo bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-29: dge slong ma yi bkur sti bri //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-30: sgo ba dang ni lcags kyi snod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-31: bud med gnyis kyis blta ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-32: de bzhin nag mo au di ka /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-34: bsti stang med dang rkun ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263a-35: lus bstan pa ni ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-0: bkyigs pa @263b las kyang mi sbyin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-1: gso sbyong dang ni tshul nas gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-3: rgyal byed kyi tshal kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-5: tshe dang ldan pa gre las skyes dus las 'das pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-6: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sdes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-7: de'i rus pa rnams bsdus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-8: bkur sti chen pos sa phyogs yangs par mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-14: snyam par smra ba'i dge slong ma gnyis kyang bskos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-15: der nyin gcig bzhin du sa dang; chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-17: me tog dag 'jog par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-18: de nas dge slong gang dag yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-19: lag pa bkru ba byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-22: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-23: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-24: tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to; ;dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma dgongs par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-25: des mchod rten de rgyang ring po nas mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-26: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi skra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-27: sen mo'i mchod rten sar pa yin pas song la phyag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-29: de dag der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-30: dge slong ma de gnyis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-31: de dag la lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:263b-32: rkang pa bkru ba'i sa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-4: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-5: de 'khor lnga brgya dang phyag byas nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-6: mchod rten de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-7: tshe dang ldan ma autpa la'i mdog shing drung zhig na nyin par gnas pa'i phyir 'dug pa des de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-8: tshe dang ldan ba chu 'thung khyod kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-10: ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan ma autpa la'i mdog can 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-11: tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung khyod kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-13: des smras pa re zhig bsam par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-14: re zhig sems pa la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-15: dge slong gre las skyes kyi rus pa'i mchod rten yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-16: de rgyud zhe sdang gis kun nas dkris pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pas slar log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-17: tshe dang ldan pa autpa la'i mdog can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-18: bstan pa la chu bur byung na khyod 'di na 'dug bzhin du yal bar bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-20: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-22: nye gnas de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa la sdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264a-24: phangs par byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-0: rus gong gi phung po 'di las so @264b phag re re phyung la drol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-1: de'i 'khor mang po yin pas de dag gis rus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-2: rus gong gi phung po las so phag re re phyung ste bor nas skad cig nyid la bshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-3: dge slong ma de gnyis dus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-4: rings pa rings par dbyar mo khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-5: dge slong ma rnams la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-6: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-7: de la yid gzhol zhing mdza' ba 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gzhan dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-8: bdag cag gi ming po deng gdod shi ba lta zhes du [* ngu ?]zhing 'khod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-11: de la su zhig gis bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-13: de ni glo bur du 'ongs pas snying nas mi shes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-14: 'phags ma autpa la'i mdog can phyogs de na 'dug pa des de dag la smras pa yang dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-17: de ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-18: de yang de rang bzhin nyams pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-19: de'i las yin par bdag gis ni smras pa tsam kho nas shes so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-21: 'khor gyi nang du gzhag par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-22: zhes legs par gsungs pa yin pas de'i phyir de la bsam du ci yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-25: de dag khro bas kun nas dkris pas de dag de bsad pa'i phyir mtshon cha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:264b-27: seng ldeng gi phur bu dag blangs nas dong /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:275b-24: de dag kyang de rnams kyis spring ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279a-27: ci bdag gi bu mo yang yongs su gtang ngam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279a-29: ci bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid yongs su gtang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-0: des rang nyid khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag bya bar brtsams pa @279b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-1: de'i sten grogs shig khyim du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-2: de'i ming nyid nas ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-5: de nang du zhugs te khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-7: khyod kyis chung ma dag bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-8: bgo ba sbyar zhing las byed du gzhug mi nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-9: gang gi phyir rang nyid khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-11: sten grogs bdag gis nus mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-12: 'on kyang bdag gis chung ma gcig blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-13: de rang gi las kyis dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-14: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-16: bdun gyi bar chung ma blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-17: de dag kyang rang gi las kyis dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-18: gang dag bdag gi ming chung ma gsod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-21: des ci gzhan yang mi bslang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-23: de dag bdag cag gi bu mo yang yongs su gtang ngam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-25: ci yugs sa mo mi bslang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-26: de yang bdag gis byas mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-27: ci bdag nyid yongs su gtang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-30: de lta na g-yas zhar ma ci ste mi bslang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-31: de dag gi bu mo de yang mi ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-33: khyim bdag de kun tu skyo bas ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-34: des de bskul nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:279b-37: nang mi dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-1: de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-3: de bzhin du dus byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-4: gang gi nyin par bzang ba de la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-6: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-7: bu mo bag mar gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-10: tsha ba'i dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-11: de dros nas ma rung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-12: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des chang 'tshong ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-13: bdag gi bu mo bag mar gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-14: chang 'di tsam zhig dgos kyi sbyor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-16: de dag gis legs kyi dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-18: des re zhig chang dag sta gon byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-19: ji tsam na sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing de'i khyim zhig tu zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-22: khyim bdag gi chung ma de yang yang dang yang du chang dag lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-25: bdag ni sems khong du chud cing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-26: bsod snyoms lta ga la zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-29: ci 'di skad zer ba las ngas cung zad nyes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-30: des 'di ltar rgyas par bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280a-33: de lta na ci'i phyir slar mi bcos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280b-4: las kyi gnas gang yin pa nges par ngas mi shes pa med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280b-6: slar bcos te stsal bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280b-8: mtshan bzang ma ngas slar bcos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280b-9: gal te bza' ba'i rin sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:280b-12: shin tu dbul gyi slar chos shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:286a-31: nga la rin mi dgos kyi de nyid byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:286a-33: 'phags ma gzhan zhig bgyis la dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:286a-37: de dag phan tshun rtsod par gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:287a-2: de'i mi gtsang ba yang byung /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-15: dge slong bskos par gyur pa de'i grogs dge slong bzhi bsko bar bya'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-19: brtags nas 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-20: bram ze'i rigs kyi dge slong dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-21: bzhi yis dri bar bya ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-22: so shing dag kyang bkru bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka la nad kag nas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa'i dge slong gi grogs dge slong bzhi bsko bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-26: dge slong dag gang du mgron du pos shing 'gro ba der chos ston pa'i dge slong gsol ba btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-27: grogs dge slong bzhi bskos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-28: de dag gis ma brtags par bshang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:293b-30: rigs kyi khyim dag tu song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-2: de'i skabs dge slong dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-5: gang chos ston pa'i dge slong gi grogs su bskos pa de dag gis de la ma brtags par gzhan du 'dod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-6: song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-7: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-8: mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-9: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-10: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-16: chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-17: de zla ba dgu nas bu khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-18: de btsas nas btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-19: rigs dang mthun par ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-20: de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-21: de'i khams ma snyoms pas na bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-22: de sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-24: bdag gi lus kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-28: 'di dang 'di lta bu'i bska ba byos dang sos par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-29: des bska ba byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294a-30: ji tsam na lan gcig 'khrus nas des chu grang mos khrus byas pa dang chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-0: bska bas legs par @294b gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-3: lan cig kho na las ma 'khrus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-6: khyod kyis chu grang mos khrus ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-8: bzhin bzang ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-11: ma legs pa zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-12: chu grang mos chad na ji ltar 'khru bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-13: de na der zad kyi yang 'di ltar bska ba de nyid byos la sngar khrus ma byed par 'khru ba mthar phyin nas khrus byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-19: de lta na bska ba'i cho ga ngas ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-20: zhes pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-22: de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste phyi bdag gzhag par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-23: 'khru ba mthar phyin nas khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phyi ba dag gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-26: dge slong dag gis ji lta bu dag gis phyi ba ma shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-30: ras ma dag gis phyi bar bya zhing 'khru ba mthar phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-31: chu dron mos bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-32: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-33: de nas yang de'i tshe nags na sbrul gdug pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:294b-34: ji tsam na nags der ba lang rdzis me btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-0: sbrul gdug pa de mes bsregs nas phan @295a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-1: tshun du song na yang me'i 'od kyis bskor bas ma shi tsam du 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-2: mes bsregs pa las mchongs te shing zhig gi drung du bskyil nas dkris te 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-3: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing phyogs der nye bar 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-4: des shing drung du song ste bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-5: sbrul gdug pa zhig mes tshig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-6: rab tu tshig nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag par mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-7: mthong nas kyang de'i rgyud la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-8: ci dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam med brtags na yod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-9: gang gi dbang du 'gyur ba brtags pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-11: des de la chus gtor nas chos tshig gsum zhig bshad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-12: bzhin bzang 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-13: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-14: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-15: nga la sems rab tu dang bar gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-16: 'di ltar dud 'gro'i 'dod chags dang bral nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-18: zhes smras nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-19: de ma thag tu bya khra zhig gis khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-20: de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la sems mngon par dad nas dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-21: mnyan yod na bram ze las drug dang ldan pa zhig gi rigs su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-22: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295a-23: sbrul gdug pa de gor ma chag par dus las 'das na gang du skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-0: ces thag gi @295b zad cig brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-1: mnyan yod na bram ze las drug dang ldan pa zhig gi rigs su skyes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-2: mthong nas kyang de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-3: de'i khyim du 'gro bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-4: der song nas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-5: chung mar bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-6: bslab pa'i gzhi la rab tu bkod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-8: gcig pu de'i khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-9: de la bram zes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-11: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong 'ga' yang ma mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-12: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-14: ci bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtsva ku sha'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-15: ka sha lta bur gzhan nas skye bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-16: gang khyed lta bu las thob pa de bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-18: 'phags pa bdag la 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'os pa'i khye'u su yang ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-19: bdag gi mchis brang sems can dang ldan pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-20: gal te khye'u zhig btsas par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-21: de bdag gis 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-26: ji tsam na bram ze mo de zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-27: btsas nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:295b-28: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming brtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-5: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-7: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-8: de ma'i nu ma 'thung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-9: gal te bag med pas so'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-10: sen mos nu ma la reg na skrang bar 'gyur ro; ;de chen por gyur nas gang gi tshe khye'u dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-11: bu mo dag dang lhan cig rtse ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-12: de rnams gal te khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa la gnas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-13: so 'am sen mos btab na phyogs de ring po mi thogs par skrang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-14: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-15: de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-17: des bram ze de'i chung ma la chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-18: khye'u 'di ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-19: zhes mtshan ma zhig bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-21: bu khyod ni ma skyes pa nyid nas ngas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du phul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-23: srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-24: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gdong du ring zhig brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-25: de'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-26: de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-27: rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296a-28: des so shing zhig zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-0: lce bzhar @296b nas ma bkrus par bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-1: de la sbrang ma zhig gis zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-3: de nas srog chags khyim sbyong gis cung zad zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-5: de nas yang bya sna tshogs kyis zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-7: de la byi las zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-9: gang sbrang mas zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-11: grog ma mang po dag gis zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-12: de dag thams cad kyang dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-13: de bzhin du ji ltar srog chags mang po dag dus las 'das pa dngar zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-14: ci tsam na phyi de nyin par dge slong dag phyogs der so shing bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-15: de dag gis srog chags dus las 'das pa dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-16: de la gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-18: srog chags mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir dus las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-21: zhes de dag de bzhin du dpyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-22: dge slong gzhon nu gzhan zhig 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-25: phyogs 'dir bram ze las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-26: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang lhan cig gnas pa des so shing zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-27: lce bzhar nas ma bkrus par bzhag pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-28: srog chags mang pos zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:296b-29: 'di ltar lce'i dri ma zos pas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-0: zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa @297a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-4: skyes bu gdug pa 'di lta bu kha cig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-5: de lta bas na dge slong dag gis so shing ma bkrus par de bzhin du dor bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-6: bor na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing zos nas bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-9: dge slong gzhan dag gis chu nyung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-10: de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-11: gang la chu nyung bar gyur na des re zhig sa la brud nas lce'i dri ma med par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-12: des dus gzhan zhig na btso blag bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-13: des gos dag tshon du btsos te bzlog cing skems pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-14: ji tsam na phyogs der tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' nye bar 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-17: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis grogs bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-19: gnas brtan legs kyi mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-20: nye dga' rang bzhin gyis gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-21: des gos sar pa rnams ni grib ma la bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-22: gang rnying pa rnams ni nyi ma la bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-23: gang bsher ba rnams ni grib ma la bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-24: des gnas brtan de ltar ma mdzad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-25: des yang dang yang du byas te ldog tu ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297a-26: de kun nas dkris pas nye dga'i steng du rgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-1: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phyogs der 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-2: des tshe dang ldan pa ci byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-3: ci byed ces smras na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-4: de kun nas dkris pa khro ba 'phel bar gyur nas sdod du ma btub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-5: nye dga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-6: nye dgas n+ya gro dha'i shing gis brdegs par brtsams na yang sdong du ma btub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-7: de la yang tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-9: nye dga' 'bros su btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-10: des 'on kyang n+ya gro dha'i shing la sos btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-11: des n+ya gro dha'i shing gi 'dab ma thams cad lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-12: de'i skabs dge slong dag gis thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-13: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-15: de lta bur khro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du khro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-18: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-19: nye dga' la dge skos bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-20: de de'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-22: tshe dang ldan pa las 'di lta bu zhig bab kyi byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-24: des de mthong ma thag tu de bzhin du kun tu dkris pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-25: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-27: gang 'di 'dra ba'i khro ba kho na yod pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-28: rang gis mngon sum du las bsgo bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:297b-29: 'on kyang de'i drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gis bsgo bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298a-1: la khyod kyis las 'di lta bu byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298a-3: des kyang de la bzhams te las 'di lta bu byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298a-6: brtson 'grus drag pos 'bad pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298a-7: 'dus byas su gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298b-17: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298b-21: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:298b-33: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-2: grong khyer w'ara n'a si'i drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-3: de de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-5: de la dge slong rnams kyis byams pa la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-6: byams pa la gnas pa zhes rab tu dgod de smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-7: des de dag la bkag na yang 'dug tu ma btub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-8: de khro ba drag pos kun tu dkris pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-9: de dag la ngan sems kyis nga ni byams pa la gnas pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-10: khyed cag ni skyes bu gdug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-11: zhes ngag gi las drag po brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:299a-22: de da ltar yang las de nyid kyi lhag mas sprul gdug pa 'dir skyes so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-24: zhes de dag de la mi bzod pa skyes nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-29: de dag mtshan mo nyid phyogs de nas dong ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-30: de yang mtshan mo nam nangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-31: de bzhin du tshul mi sdug par rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-32: dge slong dag gis mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-34: tshe dang ldan pa gang gis 'di 'dra ba'i gnas su bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-35: des ji ltar gyur pa zhig tu smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-36: de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:302b-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-0: dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge slong gi kun @303a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-1: tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-2: dgon pa pa'i dge slong gis rtag tu me dag gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-3: phye nyung zad tsam bcang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-4: ras ma dag gzhag par bya; gang 'bras chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-5: zan dag zos pa'i lhag ma yang gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-8: nyi ma dag la mkhas pa bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-10: spyod yul la mkhas par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-12: mar dang 'bru mar cung zad bcang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-16: tha na snyan par smra ba tsam la yang mkhas par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-17: dgon pa pa'i dge slong gis ji ltar kun tu spyad pa'i chos bcas pa la yang dag par mi 'dzin cing ma bsgrubs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-18: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-19: mnyan yod na 'tsho ba pa zhig gnas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-20: dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-21: de sman pa'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-26: bsro khang gi khrus gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-30: bdag ni slong mo la rgyu zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303a-32: ji ltar bdag gis bsro khang du khrus 'byor par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-0: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu dag zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus byed @303b kyi; der song la khrus byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-1: des khrus bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-2: dge slong dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-3: de'i gos sa dmar du kha bsgyur ba gyon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-4: dge slong thams cad kyis de yang dge slong zhig go snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-6: de yang myur ba myur bar khrus byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-8: ji tsam na dge sbyong dag cig phyogs der 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-9: de dag gis de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-10: de dag la gcig la gcig sems des pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-13: 'di na dge sbyong rgan zhugs shig 'dug gi khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-14: de dag gis smras pa; legs kyi de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-15: de dag drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-20: de dag gis de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste bslang ngo; ;des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-21: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu mi gtsang ba khrus ma byas pa dag gis khrus byas pa la reg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-23: nged ni dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu dag yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-24: rgan zhugs khyod lta bu su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-28: kye 'tsho ba po khyod sus khrus byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-29: zhes de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-30: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:303b-31: de'i phyir dge slong rnams kyis bsro khang du khrus byed pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-0: sgo srung dag gzhag par bya zhing nang du @304a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-1: 'ong ba'i dge slong dag gi ming dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-2: de dag gis dge slong ming shes pa yang dri bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-4: ngo shes pa'i dge slong dag gi ming ma 'dri zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-7: 'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-8: de nas yang de'i tshe bram ze padma'i snying po zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-9: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpya rgyu rtsva dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-11: chur bcas par bram ze'i sbyin mthong su byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-12: shas chen po rgyas pa la longs spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-13: bram ze padma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug ces bya ba mang du thos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-15: thags thogs med pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-16: bram ze padma'i snying po'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-17: bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-19: dge slong go'u ta ma sh'akya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-20: dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304a-22: shes ldan go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-0: tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di phyogs dang phyogs mtshams @304b su grags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-1: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-4: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-6: 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-7: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-8: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-10: bdud dang bcas; tshangs pa dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-11: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-12: lha dang mi'i skye dgu dang bcas pa 'di la mthong ba'i chos 'di khon rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-14: tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-16: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-17: de'i chos kyang thog mar dge ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-27: yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-28: zhes go bar byed pa de gsang tshig las kyang 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-29: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-30: gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-31: gal te khyim na gnas na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-32: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-34: chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:304b-35: de'i rin po che sna bdun ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-4: glang po chen po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-6: nor bu rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-7: bud med rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-8: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-9: bdun pa ni blon po rin po che nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-10: de la yang bu dpa' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-12: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-13: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing; de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-14: chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-15: chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-16: gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-17: dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-19: zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-20: ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas; 'dod pa mthun du byon nas 'dod pa mthun pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-21: 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-23: thos nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-24: ma sdug gang yin pa shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-25: kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma sh'akya'i sras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305a-26: sh'akya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-0: dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim @305b nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-2: 'jig rten tu sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-3: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-4: kho bo de gsang tshig las bton pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-5: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-6: gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-7: gal te khyim na gnas na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-8: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-10: 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-11: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-12: de ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-15: 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-17: bram ze'i khye'u tshur khyod shes ldan go'u ta ma gang na ba der song zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-18: phyin nas; ji ga shes ldan go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-20: sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po phyogs mtshams su ji ltar grags pa de kho na bzhin yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-22: de'i mtshan rnams grags pa yang dag pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-25: bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-26: bram ze padma'i snying po'i ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-27: shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs mang po dag dang lhan cig tu shas che ba nas byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:305b-28: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-2: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-3: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te; phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis shas che ba'i bram ze rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-6: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-7: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-9: bcom ldan 'das shas che ba'i bram ze rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-10: bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-11: glo bur du gtam dag gleng bar byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-12: gtam mthar phyin par mi sdod par ma gus pas snyems shing bzlog par sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-14: bram ze'i khye'u khyod bram ze gsum rig pa rnams dang lhan cig glo bur du gtam de lta smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa shas che ba'i bram ze rnams chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ba na khyod mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306a-18: glo bur du gtam gleng bar byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-0: gtam mthar phyin par mi sdod par ma gus pas snyems shing slar bzlog par @306b sems pa lta bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-2: bram ze 'gro ba rnams ni 'gro ba rnams dang lhan cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-3: 'greng ba rnams ni 'greng ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-4: 'dug pa rnams ni 'dug pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-5: nyal ba rnams ni nyal ba rnams dang phan tshun legs par smra'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-6: dge sbyong mgo reg nag po'i rtsa lag pho reng gang dag yin pa de dag dang ni kho bo lhan cig tu 'di lta bu'i glo bur gyi gtam gleng du rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-8: da ltar shes ldan go'u ta ma dang gleng ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-9: bram ze'i khye'u khyod don du gnyer ba la zhugs nas 'dir 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-10: de lta bu ni bsnyen bkur ma byas pa las gzhan la med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-11: bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug ni bla ma'i tshogs las bsnyen bkur ma byas pa zhig yin pa lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-13: bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug la bkur sti med pa'i tshig gis spyos pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-14: khros 'khrugs rngam zhing yi ma rangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-15: bcom ldan 'das la kha bya bar 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-19: 'di tsam gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la kha bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-22: dran par bya ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-24: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;'di ltar kye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-26: sh'akya 'di dag ni da byung kho na yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-27: da byung gi rigs yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:306b-28: bram ze rnams la bla ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-1: ze'i bu khyod la sh'akya rnams kyis gnod pa cung zad byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-4: bdag nyid dang mkhan po'i bya ba zhig la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir phyin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-6: sh'akya'i bu mo rnams khang bzang gi steng du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-7: mdzub ker gyis ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-8: bram ze padma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-9: bram ze padma'i snying po'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-10: zhes de dag bdag la mdzub ker kho nas ston par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-14: mchod pa ni mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-16: re zhig bye'u khug sta yang rang gi tshang na 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-18: sh'akya rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-20: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi 'di ni sh'akya rnams rang gi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-29: bram ze rnams la bkur sti byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-34: da byung kho na yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-35: da byung gi rigs yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307a-36: bram ze rnams la bkur sti mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:307b-0: de @307b nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:337a-2: skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos @360b phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-3: 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-4: 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-5: nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-6: 'dug gnas kyi nang du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-7: de nas yang de'i tshe yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gzhom pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-8: dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-9: de'i tshe dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-12: bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin mo spyod par bzhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-13: lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi sa 'dre bar gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-14: gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-16: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-17: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:360b-19: dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa de su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-0: btsun pa bdag gis yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze @361a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-1: dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gzhom pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-2: dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par rtsom par thos lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-5: kun dga' bo yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed mkhas pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-6: 'di ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig kun dga' bo nga 'di na nyin mo spyod pas bzhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-7: lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-8: dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyi sa 'dre bar gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-9: kun dga' bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyi sa dres pa'i phyogs der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-11: gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-12: phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-13: phal pas gnas kyi sa dres pa'i phyogs der ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-15: gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-16: phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-18: dmar bu can gyi grong 'dir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyi sa dres pas phyogs 'dir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-20: gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-21: kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-22: ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361a-23: tshong pa ya rabs rnams kyi lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-0: zong dgram sar yang 'gyur @361b te; 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-1: dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-2: 'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-6: de nas yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-7: dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul ma ga dha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-8: dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten gyi drung na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-9: de la dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-11: thos nas kyang dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-12: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas; bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-13: yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-17: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-18: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-19: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-20: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:361b-23: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-0: de nas yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar @362a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-2: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-4: shes ldan go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-8: de nas yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par bstod de; stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-11: de nas yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-12: bca' ba sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-13: nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu snod nor bu can bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-14: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-15: kye go'u ta ma gdugs tshod lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-16: da de'i dus la bab na shes ldan go'u ta mas dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-0: @362b chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-1: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-2: yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-4: de nas yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-5: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-6: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-7: bca' ba rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-8: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-9: bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-11: phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-13: kye go'u ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang; dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-14: bde ba'i gzhi gang lags pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-15: dmar bu can gyi grong na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-16: phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-17: ces de nyid la yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:362b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-2: gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-3: sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-4: de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-5: mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-6: gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-7: tshul khrims ldan la bshos gsol nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-8: de yi 'og tu yon bsngo byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-9: de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-10: mchod pas yang ni mchod par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-11: de nas lto nas byung ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-12: bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-13: lha rnams brtse ba'i skyes bu de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-14: bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363a-18: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-3: byang phyogs su rgyus nas chu bo gangg'a gang na ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-4: de nas de'i tshe yul ma ga dha'i mi rnams chu bo gangg'a la phan tshun rgal bar byed de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-6: kha cig ni sku ba'i gru zam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-7: kha cig ni sngas nang tshangs can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-8: kha cig ni ra rkyal gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-11: 'on te tshu rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi 'gram du bzhugs par bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu tshu rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi 'gram na bzhugs par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-13: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-14: de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:363b-19: gal te kun na chu yod na //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366a-14: lha'am mi rnams kyi nang du srid pa lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyar nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366a-18: des de bzhin gshegs pa la bde bar mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366a-19: skye ba yod na nges par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen cing yang dag par thugs su chud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366b-5: rab tu ston par mdzad pa ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366b-10: 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366b-11: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:366b-12: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367a-15: sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367a-20: dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas yangs pa can du byon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-0: yangs pa can gyi aa mra skyong ma'i @367b tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-1: aa mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-2: yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag nyid kyi tshal na bzhugs par thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-3: thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-4: bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-5: bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-6: yangs pa can nas byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-7: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-9: des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du zhon te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-10: bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-11: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi gung la chos ston cing bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:367b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis aa mra skyong ma rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:368a-2: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:368a-17: dge slong dag shes bzhin du gyur cing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gnas pa gang zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:368a-33: ngal bso ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gyur pa ste; dge slong dag 'di ni shes bzhin du gnas par gyur pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:368a-34: dge slong dag ji ltar dran par gyur pa yin zhe na /
