K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-11: ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-12: zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-13: de lta bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-14: ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-15: de dag yun ring sum cu rtsa gsum gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-16: lha dag dang yang skal ba mnyam par dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-17: sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-18: rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-19: de na de dag rtsen cing dga' byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan mang po dag dang ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-21: ma bcings skyob pa de yi gsung thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-22: bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis aa mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-26: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373a-27: gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-0: @373b de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-1: kun dga' bo 'od ma can gyi grong gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-3: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-6: 'od ma can gyi grong du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-7: 'od ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-8: de nas de'i tshe mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo ba rnams kyis zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-10: dge slong dag da ltar 'dir mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo ba rnams kyis zas rnyed par dka' ba byung gi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-11: dge slong dag tshur khyed las smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-12: gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-13: 'grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-14: yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-15: nga yang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang 'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-16: thams cad bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-18: zhes dge slong de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-20: smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:373b-21: 'grogs shes ji lta bu yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-1: ji lta bu yod pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-2: yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-5: bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag po grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-7: bdag nad tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag po shi la thug pas thebs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-10: bdag gi cha ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-11: ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis bcil la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-12: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrub te gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-15: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du mdzad pa bsgrubs nas bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374a-16: des na bcom ldan 'das lhag par spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dgongs ka nang du yang @374b dag 'jog las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-1: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'chal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-4: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-5: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag po grongs la thug pas thebs par glo bar chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-6: bdag ni dug 'tshal ba bzhin du lus kyang g-yo ba ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-8: chos thos pa rnams kyang bskyud par gyur lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-9: de la bdag glo ba re ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-10: re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi slad du zhal chems cung zad bka' ma stsal gyi bar du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-11: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-19: ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-20: ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du dgongs pa mi mnga' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:374b-21: ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal chems kho na cung zad bstan du ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-1: la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rag lus pa ci zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-3: ngas rtag tu goms par bya ba'i chos /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-6: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-10: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-11: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bshad zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gang zhig gzhan dag gis shes na mi rung bas de bzhin gshegs pas bcab bo snyam du dgongs pa'i slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-14: kun dga' bo 'on kyang gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa snyun tshabs chen po mi bzad pa drag pa grongs la thug pas thebs pa de la nga 'di snyam du dgongs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375a-20: snyam nas ngas tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yang na tshong lo brgyad cu lon pas sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-20: gang yang ngas khyod la sdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-23: yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-27: mi ldan par 'gyur ba snga nas bshad zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-29: de lta bas na da lta'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-30: 'das kyang rung gang su dag bdag nyid gling dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-33: chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:375b-35: skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376a-6: chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376a-8: skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376a-10: nga'i nyan thos bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376a-12: ji ltar na dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:376b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:377a-21: lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:377b-0: mi @377b rnams la ni tshe gces pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:377b-1: kun dga' bo gang su yang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:377b-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la brten bsgoms mang du byas pas na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-14: gzhan gyis mi bkri gnyis su med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-15: dka' thub kyis su lam bshad pa ru gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-16: gang gis chos tshig legs bshad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-17: lam 'tsho dka' thub dran pa'i bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-18: kha na ma tho'i tshig la slob pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-19: gsum ste dka' thub kyis ni lam 'tshor gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-20: legs dga' nang na g-yogs byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-21: rab skems rigs sun byung rgyal smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-22: rgyu can sdom med rab smra ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-23: mi rigs spyod pa de ni lam sun 'byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-24: khyim bdag gang zhig de ltar rab bsams pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-25: thos dang ldan te 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-26: rab shes thams cad 'di 'drar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-27: shes nas de yi dad pa 'bri mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-28: mi srun 'di dang srun pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-29: dag pa dang ni ma dag pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:391b-30: mnyam pa ru ni ji ltar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-2: sdig mi byed la'ang 'gro rnams dogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-3: kha dog gzugs ldan mir mi brtag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-4: ma rabs mthong ma thag tu yid mi brtan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-5: rab tu mi sdom mang du mtshan ma can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-6: mi thub pa ni 'jig rten 'di na spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-7: gser gyis g-yogs pa'i rna cha 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-8: lcags kyi dong tse gser gyis g-yogs pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-9: nang ni zhe sdang phyi ni 'phags pa'i gzugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-10: g-yo dang ldan pa kha cig 'di na spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgar ba'i bu tsun da'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-12: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-14: legs pa can gyis sdig pa spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-15: nyon mongs zad nas mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgar ba'i bu tsun da la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-19: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-20: rnam grangs du ma'i chos kyis yang dag par bskul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-22: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed nas stan las langs te song ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-26: tsa pa la dang tshe yi 'du byed mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-27: glang po chen po gzigs par mdzad pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-28: ru rta la sogs grong khyer bcu rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392a-29: g-yos pa mdo sde dag dang sdig pa can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-0: @392b de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-1: kun dga' bo grong khyer rtsva can ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-3: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das gyad kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-5: sdig pa can gyi bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-6: chu bo dbyig can gyi bar du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-7: bcom ldan 'das shul du zhugs te gshegs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-10: kun dga' bo nga rgyab mi bde ste ngal bsos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi ltab tu ltobs la thing zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-13: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-14: rings pa rings par bla gos bzhi ltab tu bltabs te bting nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-15: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi ltab tu bltabs te bting lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' snam sbyar ltab ma mang du mdzad nas phangs su bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-20: zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:392b-24: bzhengs pa'i 'du shes thugs la mdzad nas gzims so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' @393a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-2: kun dga' bo song la chu bo ka kus sta nas chu lhung bzed gang long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-3: chu de ngas btung bar yang bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-4: lus la gtor bar yang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-6: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-8: chu bo ka kus sta ga la bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-9: de'i tshe chu bo ka kus sta la shing rta lnga brgya tsam gyi tshad cig gis brgal nas ring po ma lon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-10: de dag gis chu bo dkrugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chu bo ka kus sta las chu lhung bzed gang blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-13: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-15: btsun pa 'di ltar chu bo ka kus sta la shing rta lnga brgya tsam gyi tshad kyis brgal nas ring por ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-16: de dag gis chu bo ka kus sta dkrugs shing klongs te rnyogs par bgyis pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-18: btsun pa 'di nas mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-19: chu bo dbyig ldan mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-20: bcom ldan 'das de la gsol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-21: sku la yang gdab par bgyi'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393a-24: nges na bcom ldan 'das bzod cing bde bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs te skyil mo @393b krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393b-1: dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393b-9: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar ba de shing drung gzhan zhig gi drung na rten cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393b-10: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:393b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-1: mi gzhan zhig shing rta de'i phyir lus pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-3: ci shing rta lnga brgya tsam gyi tshad cig song ba mthong bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-6: gang shing rta lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i sgra yang thos par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-11: nga nyal bar yang ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-12: ci khyod mi nyal ba'i 'du shes kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i sgra ma thos par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-14: ngas mi nyal ba'i 'du shes kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i sgra ma thos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-15: de nas mi de 'di snyam du bsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-16: ji srid cig nas rab tu byung ba zhi bar gnas pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-17: gang 'di ltar mi nyal ba'i 'du shes kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam gyi tshad dong ba'i sgra yang ma thos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-18: 'di ltar chos gos kyang rdul gyi phye mas yog par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-19: ces mi de ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-20: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la dad cing dad pa'i dbang du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-22: de lta bas na bdag sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gyi gtsang sbra'i chos la dga' ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-23: g-yung po ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-24: gang shing rta lnga brgya tsam gyi tshad dong ba'i sgra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-25: gang 'brug chems zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394a-26: thog babs pa 'di gnyis kyi sgra gang rgya che ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-1: shing rta lnga brgya tsam lta zhog gi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-3: ci lags shing rta brgya stong 'di dag gang bas kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-4: gang 'brug chems zhes mchi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-5: thog babs pa'i sgra che ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-6: g-yung po dus gcig cig na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-8: nga snga dro na bza' smad g-yogs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-20: de nas yul aa du ma yar skye bo mang pos sgra chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-21: sgra mang po sgrogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-22: nga yang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-23: 'byung po'i khang pa'i khyams nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-24: 'byung po'i khang pa'i grib ma bla gab med par 'chags na 'chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:394b-25: de nas mi gzhan zhig skye bo mang po de dag gi drung nas nga ga la bar 'ongs te phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395a-0: nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag @395a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395a-5: yul aa du ma ya na skye bo mang po'i sgra chen po dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395a-31: kye skyes bu nga ni mi nyal ba'i 'du shes kyis 'brug chems zhes zer ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395b-0: de nas mi des 'di snyam du ji @395b srid cig nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395b-6: 'di skad ces btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la su zhig mngon par mi dad lags /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:395b-14: de nas gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa g-yung pos ras bcos bu sar pa gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba zung gcig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa g-yung po song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-14: ras bcos bu sar pa gser gyi mdog ltar ser bzung gcig kha tshar dra gris chod la nga la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ras bcos bu sar pa gser gyi mdog ltar ser pa kha tshar dra gris bcad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-17: bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396a-18: de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-0: bcom @396b ldan 'das kyis gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog gsal ba ma nyams par snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;btsun pa bdag gis dgung lo nyi shu lhag cig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring na mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog gsal ba 'di lta bu 'byung ba bdag gis mngon par ma 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-5: rkyen gang gis 'di lta bu'i sku'i kha dog gsal ba byung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-6: kun dga' bo sku'i kha dog gsal ba 'di lta bu 'byung ba 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-10: gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-11: gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-12: 'di ni sku'i kha dog gsal ba 'di lta bu 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyis pa dang rkyen gnyis pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-14: kun dga' bo chu bo dbyig ldan ga la bar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:396b-16: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo dbyig ldan la bar gshegs te byon nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi 'gram mtha' @397a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-1: gcig tu na bza' chos gos bzhag ste bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-2: chu bo dbyig ldan gyi nang du zhugs te sku khrus legs par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-3: chu bo dbyig ldan brgal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-4: na bza' chos gos gcig pu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-7: kun dga' bo mgar ba'i bu tsun da 'gyod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-8: gang gi phyir ston pa'i bsod snyoms phyi ma gsol bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-9: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-10: skul byed de ni ma rnyed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-13: bde ba rnyed pa ma yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-14: zhes gzhan dag gis 'gyod pa bskyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-15: kun dga' bo mgar ba'i bu skul byed 'gyod pa bskyed pa la gnas gnyis kyis 'gyod pa bsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-16: tsun da bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-17: mngon sum du bzung ba ni bsod snyoms kyi rnam par smin pa mnyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-18: mi mnyam pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-19: gang du bsod snyoms gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397a-20: gang du bsod snyoms gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su gshegs pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-0: 'di @397b ni bsod snyoms kyi rnam par smin pa mnyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-1: mi mnyam pa gnyis yod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-2: kun dga' bo de lta bas na 'di ni mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis las byas shing bsags pa yin te; tsher 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-7: phyug po 'khor dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-9: tshe dang kha dog stobs dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-10: longs spyod bde 'gro phyug po rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-13: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa 'di ni gtum po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-17: khro ba bdag cag dge slong rnams la kun tu gshe ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-19: kun dga' bo dge slong 'dun pa 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i chad pas bsdig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-20: tshangs pa'i chad pas bsdigs nas kyang skyo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-21: de ltar kun tu skyo ba skyes nas kyang ka ta ya na la lung nod du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo grong khyer rtsva can ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:397b-24: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-1: gyad kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-2: grong khyer rtsva can gyi bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-3: chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar du shul du zhugs te gshegs pa las shul nas gyu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-5: kun dga' bo nga rgyab mi bde ste ngal bsos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi ltab tu ltobs la thing zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-8: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas rings pa rings par bla gos bzhi ltab tu bltabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-9: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi ltab tu bltabs te bting lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' snam sbyar ltab ma mang du mdzad de phangs su bcug nas glo g-yas pas phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-12: zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-15: shes bzhin dang; bzhengs pa'i 'du shes thugs la mdzad nas gzims so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-18: byang chub kyi yan lag smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-19: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dran pa byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par mkhyen cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398a-20: yang dag par thugs su chud de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-0: 'dod @398b chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-2: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-3: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-8: btang snyoms byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par mkhyen cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-10: yang dag par thugs su chud de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-12: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-14: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-17: bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus smras lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-18: kun dga' bo brtson 'grus bsten cing bsgom te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-19: lan grangs mang du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro; ;zhes gsungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-21: bcom ldan 'das bzhengs te skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-22: de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-23: ston pas chos ni mang rab gsan slad du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-24: bdag nyid bsnyung bar gyur kyang gsol btab nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-25: dge slong rang nyid kyis ni chos smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-26: byang chub yan lag de yis ston par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-27: mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa rtogs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-28: gnas brtan kun dga' bo yis legs smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:398b-29: thub pa'i gsung ni rab tu dkar ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-0: chos nyid de dag kho na 'thob par @399a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-2: yang dag dran dang rnam par 'byed pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-3: brtson 'grus dga' ba shin tu sbyangs pa'i lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-4: sems dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms dang; ;dga' ba 'di dag byang chub yan lag lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-5: byang chub yan lag rnams kyi gtam gsan cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-6: byang chub yan lag ro ni rnam mkhyen pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-7: bcom ldan thugs ni shin tu mi bde ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-8: snyun tshabs chen po dag las bzhengs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-9: de lta bas na chos rje de yis kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-10: rin po che yi chos 'di 'chad pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-11: chos ni gsan par bzhed gyur gzhan dag lta //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-12: ci'i phyir des ni 'di la mnyan mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-13: dge slong gang gzhig shes rab mchog yin par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-14: shes rab stobs bcu ldan pas bstan pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-15: nye rgyal de yang na bar gyur mod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-16: dam chos mnyan pa'i don du 'gro bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-18: mkhas pa chos lugs mkhyen pa de dag kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-19: chos rnams nyan par byed na gzhan dag lta //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-20: ci'i phyir de ni 'di la mnyan mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-21: thos nas ji ltar chos kyi bka' la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-22: sems kyis rtogs shing nye bar bzhag gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-23: zang zing med pa'i sangs rgyas gsung 'di ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-24: dga' bas de bzhin nyid 'di 'thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-25: dga' ba'i yid kyis shin tu sbyangs pa'i lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399a-26: bde ba dag kyang de bzhin skye bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-0: bde bar @399b gyur pa'i sems ni rtse gcig ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-1: de yi 'og tu ting 'dzin reg par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-2: mnyam par gyur pa'i sems ni 'di dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-3: 'du byed rnams la skyabs su mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-4: skye bar gyur pas 'dod chags rnam bral te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-5: sems ni rnam par grol ba dag tu 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-6: srid par 'gro ba dag la skyo gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-7: lha dang mi rnams la yang mi chags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-8: ji ltar me ni bud shing med gyur bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-9: dgra bcom gyur nas yongs su mya ngan 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-10: chos thos pa yi phan yon mang bar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-11: rgyal ba rnams kyis de dag kun tu bshad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-12: de lta bas na ston pa'i gsung 'di la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-13: nan tan 'bad de rab tu mnyan par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-15: kun dga' bo grong khyer rtsva can ga la bar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-17: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das gyad kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-19: grong khyer rtsva can du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-20: grong khyer rtsva can gyad kyi yul dang nye ba shing s'a la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-22: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-24: shing s'a la zung gnyis kyi bar du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:399b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khri chos la phangs byang phyogs su ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:400a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun 'di la phung po lhag ma med pa'i @400a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:400a-1: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:414b-20: khang pa rtseg ma ba gam can la sogs pa khang pa rtseg ma brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:414b-24: yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de lha 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du spang zhing yal bar dor du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-0: @415a *// 'di ltar bdag cag ni lha la mdza' bshes bzhin bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-1: 'gran zlar mi bgyid na lhas mi rnams ni yun thung ngur 'tsho ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-2: mi 'chi ba med cing tshe rabs gzhan du mchi bar 'gyur bas dge ba bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-3: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-6: yud tsam la lha'i sku thams cad nas thams cad du 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-7: gang lha'i bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-11: yid du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag lha 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du spang zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-12: btang snyoms su mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-13: gang dag lhas blon po rin po che la sogs pa mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-14: glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-15: rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415a-16: shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-0: de nas rgyal @415b po legs mthong chen po la btsun mo rin po ches gdams pa 'dis btams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-1: chos dang mthun pa'i khang bzang du 'dzegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-2: gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-3: dngul las byas pa'i khri'i steng na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-4: khri'i steng na 'dug nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-7: yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-8: tshad med pa; shin tu bsgoms pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-9: phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-11: de bzhin du gsum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:415b-12: de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-18: yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-19: tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-21: de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po tshangs pa bzhi la gnas shing bsgoms te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-22: de lan mang du byas pas 'dod pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-24: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du bskal pa mnyam par skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-26: rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'chi ba'i tshe 'di 'dra ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-28: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-29: kha zas bzang po zos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:416b-30: de'i mod la kha zas kyis dub par gyur pa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-0: @417a *// grong khyer rtsva can nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-1: shing s'a la zung gi tshal gyi bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-2: gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis kho ra khor yug 'di dag tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mdzad pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-4: lan drug btang bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-6: der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang lan bdun te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-8: sa phyogs de las gang shar phyogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-11: gang byang phyogs dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'dor bar 'gyur ba brgyad pa ni ngas ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-13: srid pa'i sred pa bcad cing 'khor bar skye ba zad pas 'di las srid pa'i srid pa gzhan mi 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-14: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dpe can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dpe can la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-17: kva'e dge slong nga'i mdun na ma 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-20: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-22: bdag gis dgung lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring nye gnas bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417a-23: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dpe can la bka' dag tu phab cing smad pa ni sngan chad bdag gis ma thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-1: tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa'i lha rnams 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-2: brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig ci zhig ltar 'jig rten 'dir 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-4: me tog au dum w'a ra bzhin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-5: bcom ldan 'das de yang deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-6: dge slong dbang che bar grags pa de yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-8: des bdag cag la rgyab kyis bltas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-9: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-10: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar ma nus so zhes 'phya bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-14: lha ji snyed cig mchis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-16: ji tsam grong khyer rtsva can nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-17: ji tsam shing s'a la zung gi chal gyi bar nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor khor yug tu dbang che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-18: dbang che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-19: ma khyab cing ma gang ba cung zad kyang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-20: chung ngu na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i khyon tsam yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-21: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-22: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:417b-24: tshe dang ldan pa dpe can 'di las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-4: dge slong dpe can 'dis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-6: 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-7: dge slong dpe can gyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-8: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-9: phyi rol gyis sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-10: chu'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-11: me'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-12: rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-14: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-16: skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-17: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-18: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-19: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-21: dge slong dag bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-22: skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-23: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-27: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-28: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-0: yul w'a ra n'a si grong khyer drang @418b srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-1: de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dge skos kyi res bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-3: dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-5: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-6: yul w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-7: dgun gyi dus su dus ma yin par sprin chen po las char bab par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-9: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dus ma yin pa'i char bab pas gsher nas grang bas nyen te 'ongs pas me bud par bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-10: des bsro khang du zhugs nas me bus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-11: khyams kho ra khor yug tu gzar thag bres nas gtsug lag khang gi sgo na slar 'ong ba lta zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-12: ji tsam na dge slong rnams slar 'ong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-13: de nas bsro khang du stan bting ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-14: dge slong de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos gzhan la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-15: gang char gyis gsher ba de dag gzar thag la gzar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-16: de nas dge slong de dag bsro khang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-17: me la bskor nas me 'de zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-18: ji tsam na grang ba med par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-19: de dag me'i 'od tsha nas rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-20: de nas dge skos de dad pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-21: dge slong de rnams kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smon lam bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:418b-22: gang bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa 'di dag grang bas nyen pa'i skyabs byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-0: gang su dag yang dag par rdzogs @419a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-2: bram ze'i khye'u skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-4: zhes lung bstan pa thob pa de'i bstan pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-5: bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-6: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-7: ji ltar de dag gis me'i 'od 'di mi bzod pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-8: bdag gi gzi brjid la lha rnams kyis kyang mi bzod par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-9: ces de skad smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis 'di nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-11: dbang che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid zil gyis gnon mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:419a-14: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-11: des kyang rgyud gcig bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-12: pi wang gnyis ka'i rgyud dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gnyis bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-15: de bzhin du sgra dang gdangs khyad par med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-16: de bzhin du gsum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-17: bzhi pa nas rgyud gcig pa'i bar du bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-18: rab dgas kyang gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-20: bzhi pa nas rgyud gcig pa'i bar du gzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-21: de bzhin du pi wang gnyis ka skad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gcig pa yang bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-24: nam mkha' kho na la yang sgra dang gdangs de bzhin du gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-25: dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ngo mtshar skyes nas nga rgyal gyis dregs pa med par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-27: bdag pas 'phags pa'i dri za gzhan yang yod pa lta snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za'i cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-0: bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu @424b rtsa gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-1: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-2: sku nyi ma stong gi 'od bas lhag pa'i 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-3: rin po che'i ri ltar kun nas bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-4: rang gi sku nyid du bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-5: dri za'i rgyal po rab dgas mthong ste de dad pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-7: chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-12: des 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-13: gang thos pas dri za'i rgyal po rab dgas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-14: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-16: lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-17: btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-22: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-24: dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-25: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-26: rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-27: ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:424b-28: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-2: btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-4: dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-5: dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa las log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-6: mngon par dad nas skyabs su mchi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-11: ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-12: tha ma'i gzims mal du bzhugs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-13: de'i tshe grong khyer rtsva can na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-14: kun tu rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-18: lo brgya nyi shu lon pa de la grong khyer rtsva can gyi gyad rnams kyis bkur stir byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-22: de dgra bcom par grags pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-23: grong khyer rtsa can na rdzing dal gyis 'bab pa'i 'gram au du ma w'a ra'i tshal gyi drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-24: nyin par gyi spyod pas gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425a-25: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-0: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la @425b lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-1: glang po che ltar bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-2: yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-3: au dum w'a ra'i tshal sbal mig thon par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-4: gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-5: gang gi tshe gzhon nu rol pas rol pa de'i tshe me tog kha 'bus par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-6: gang gi tshe rga ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-8: 'chi ba gzigs te thugs byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-9: dka' thub kyi nags tshal du zhugs pa de'i tshe me tog kha bye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-10: gang gi tshe dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe me tog kha bye ba rnyings par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-11: gang gi tshe dka' ba spyad pa don med par mkhyen nas ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-14: zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-16: mar sar gyis byugs te zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-18: de'i tshe me tog thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-19: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-20: yul w'a ra n'a sir gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-21: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-22: au dum w'a ra'i tshal lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:425b-23: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-2: ljongs de dang de dag tu gdul ba rnams btul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-3: grong khyer rtsva can du tha ma'i gzims mal du bzhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-4: au dum w'a ra'i tshal rnyings par 'gyur ba de thams cad kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis mtshan mar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-5: grong khyer rtsva can na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-6: grong khyer rtsva can pa la de bzhin gshegs pa ni deng gi nam gyi gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-7: zhes smras pa de kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-8: thos nas kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma deng gi nam gyi gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-9: bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom yod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-10: bdag gi the tshom yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-11: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-12: snyam du bdag sems shing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-13: ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-14: gal te zhus nas lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-16: snyam nas grong khyer rtsva can nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426a-17: shing s'a la zung gnyis kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-0: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa @426b kun dga' bo phyi rol tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-1: bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-2: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyi rol tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-3: bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-4: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-8: bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro; ;zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-9: bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom yod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-10: bdag gi the tshom yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-11: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro; ;snyam du bdag sems shing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-12: gal te btsun pa kun dga' bos nang du mchi bar gnang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-13: gal te zhus nas lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tshe bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni dub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni dub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-20: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:426b-23: bdag gis kun tu rgyu spyod pa can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-4: 'di ltar me tog au dum w'a ra bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-6: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-7: deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-8: bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom yod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-9: bdag gi the tshom yod pa de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-10: bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-11: snyam du bdag sems shing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-12: gal te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nang du mchi bar gnang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-13: gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slang du skabs phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-15: zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-16: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tshe bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni dub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-21: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni mnyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-22: de ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427a-23: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gnyis lhan cig bar skabs kyi gtam zer ba bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i snyan rnam par dag cing mi'i las 'das pas gsan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-0: gsan nas @427b kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-2: kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ma dgag par ci dang ci 'dod pa 'drir thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-4: nga dang mu stegs can lhan cig bar skabs kyi gtam gleng ba'i tha mar 'gyur ba 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-6: kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-7: ngas mngon sum du tshur shog ces byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-8: nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha mar 'gyur ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-9: de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-15: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-16: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-17: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-18: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;kye; go'u ta ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-19: gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-21: rab bzang ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-25: mu stegs can tha dad du gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:427b-28: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-0: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag par rgyal ba @428a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-2: mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-3: ka tya'i bu nog can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-4: gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams kyi rang rang gi khas 'ches shing so sor rig pa dag go ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-5: rab bzang ngas ni na tshod nyi shu dgu lon te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-6: rab tu byung nas lo grangs lnga bcu lhag gcig tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-7: dge ba gang yin ci zhes btsal bar byas gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-8: rab bzang ngas ni rab tu byung ba de yi tshe //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-9: tshul khrims dang ni ting 'dzin rig pa rkang pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-10: nga yis rtse gcig sems ni kun tu bsgoms byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-11: rig pa'i chos ni phyogs tsam bshad par byas gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-12: 'di las phyi rol dag na dge sbyong gzhan yang med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-14: chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi snang ba de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-15: dge sbyong dang po yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-18: dge sbyong bzhi pa yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-20: chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa snang ba de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-21: dge sbyong dang po yang snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-24: dge sbyong bzhi pa yang snang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-26: chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa snang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428a-27: dge sbyong dang po ni 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-2: dge sbyong bzhi pa 'di la 'di las phyi rol na dge sbyong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-4: phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-5: bram ze rnams kyis stong ngo; ;zhes 'di ltar 'khor rnams la nga sengge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-7: kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-8: de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-12: som nyi las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-13: the tshom las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-14: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-15: gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-16: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-17: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-20: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-21: gang gi phyir btsun pa kun dga' bo ni slob dpon chen pos dbang bskur bas dbang bskur mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-22: bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:428b-23: bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos po thob ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:429b-8: bdag gi cha ma yin gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:429b-20: rab bzang mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:429b-21: bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:429b-22: rab bzang mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir smra na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:429b-23: las ci zhig smrar yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-3: ma la bdag gis gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs te mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-5: bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni skra bregs te snam sbyar gyon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-6: mu stegs can rnams kyis ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa mthong bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-7: bdag gi khyogs mu stegs can rnams kyis ni 'degs mi nus par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-8: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni 'degs nus par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-9: rdzing bu gcig sprul nas bsams pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-11: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni spyod nus par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-12: mu stegs can rnams la ni nya dang rus sbal gyis gnod pa byed nus par gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-14: mu stegs can rnams kyis ni bdag bsreg cing me sbor mi nus par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-15: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni me sbor nus par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430a-16: ces des gnas 'di lnga byin gyis brlabs te; phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-0: mu stegs can kun tu rgyu gzhan dag gis kun tu rgyu rab bzang yongs su mya ngan @430b las 'das so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-6: sum mdo dag tu bskor nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-22: 'di khyogs kyi steng du zhog la theg cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-24: de dag gis khyogs kyi steng du bzhag nas gdeg par brtsams na bsgul yang ma nus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-25: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-27: nged kyis gdeg gam theg cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-30: de dag rdzing bur dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-31: yang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:430b-33: gal te 'di khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-5: bying nas nya dag rus sbal dag gis gnod pa byas te spyod ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-6: rings pa rings par slar byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-7: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-11: de dag zhugs nas ma bying zhing nya dang rus sbal dag gis gnod par ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-12: der spyod nus par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-13: de dag spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-14: gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-19: de dag gis me sbar zhing bsreg bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-21: dge slong rnams kyis shes ldan dag nged kyis sbar bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431a-23: de dag gis me sbar nas 'bar bar gyur pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-3: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-12: dge slong dag ci nga da ltar 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-23: 'khrug pa las kun tu grol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-27: kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:431b-28: de gcig tu grub pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-6: brtag cing 'jig nus pa dang ni ma bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-7: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ni skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-8: rang gi srog la yang mi lta ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-9: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gi skyabs byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-10: grong khyer rtsva can gyi gyad rnams la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lung pa zhig gi nang na ri dvags kyi khyu dpon ri dvags mang po'i tshogs stong gis bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-16: mkhas shing gsal ba yid gzhungs pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-17: ri dvags kyi khyu dpon de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-20: de nas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-21: ri dvags kyi khyu dpon de thams cad bskor to;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-22: de nas ri dvags kyi khyu dpon des bsams pa /
