K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-24: thams cad med par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-25: de nas ri dvags kyi khyu dpon gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-26: phyogs gang du ri dvags kyi tshogs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba kun tu brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-27: lung pa de na chu bo zhig 'bab pa des mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432a-28: chu bo'i rgyun de yang drag po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-0: 'phrog cing rab tu @432b 'phrog pa zhig la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-1: ri dvags de dag kyang nyam chung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-2: de nas khyu dpon gyis mod la chu bo der zhugs nas dbus su 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-3: skad phyung nas khyed cag tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-4: 'gram 'o ni nas nga'i rgyab tu rkang lag zhog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-5: pha rol gyi 'gram du song zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-6: 'tsho ba'i thabs ni de las med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-7: gzhan du na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-8: de nas ri dvags des de bzhin du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-9: de'i rgyab tu rmig pa dag gis phog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-11: sha dang khrag dang rus pa dag byung yang 'on kyang brtson 'grus ma btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-12: de nas thams cad kyis rgal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-13: gang kha cig slar rgal bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-14: zhes de dag la snying rje bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-15: slar rgyab tu bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-16: ri dvags kyi phru gu gcig ma rgal bar des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-17: de nas khyu dpon gnad rnams ni chad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-18: tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-19: chu 'gram 'dir tshogs rnams la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-20: ri dvags kyi phru gu de rgyab tu bkal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-21: chu bo las bsgral te 'gram du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-22: des ri dvags kyi tshogs mang po rgal bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-23: 'chi ba'i dus su smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-24: ji ltar bdag gis ri dvags 'di dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-25: ri dags kyi phru gu 'di la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:432b-26: nyon mongs pa las kyang kun tu bskyabs pa 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-0: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon @433a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-1: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-4: bde ba mthar phyin par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-8: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dvags kyi khyu dpon gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-10: ri dvags de dag ni grong khyer rtsva can gyi gyad 'di rnams yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-11: ri dvags kyi phru gu gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-12: dge slong dag gzhan yang gang gi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-13: nga brtag cing 'jig mi nus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-14: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-16: tshigs rnams ni 'byed pa'i tshor ba gnad du bab par byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-17: kun tu rgyu rab bzang gi skyabs byas pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-18: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-19: yul w'a ra n'a sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-20: rgyal po byed pa 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-24: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-28: 'khrug pa rnams rab tu zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-34: ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433a-35: chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-0: chos bzhin @433b du rgyal po byed pa de'i rta cang shes shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-1: khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis 'di ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-2: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rta cang shes shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-4: de dag gis der pho nya btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-5: yang na ni dpya gcol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-6: yang na ni grong khyer gyi sgor ma 'byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-7: gzhan du na nges par ske nas btags la 'dir 'gug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-10: grong khyer gyi sgor yang ma byung mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-11: 'on kyang grong khyer nyid na gnas shing rta cang shes tshol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-12: de dus gzhan zhig na rta cang shes rnyed nas de de la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-13: dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-14: shing rnams me tog gis rgyas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-21: shang shang te'u yi sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-22: de; de na rtse zhing dga' la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-23: dga' mgur cha ba'i sbyor bas bag med par gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-24: grong khyer du yang ma zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-25: ji ltar rgyal po tshangs sbyin skyed mos tshal na bag med par gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-26: grong khyer du yang ma bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-27: zhes khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-28: de dag gis gros byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-29: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-30: yul w'a ra n'a si'i sgo bskor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:433b-31: blon pos rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-0: lha khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis grong khyer @434a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-2: bde bar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-4: shes ldan rta cang shes gang na 'dug pa yang long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-5: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi yang go skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-6: de dag dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-8: des rta cang shes kyang bsnyen /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-9: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang go bskon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-10: de de dag dang lhan cig g-yul bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-12: khams kyi rgyal phran gzhan zhig gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rta cang shes kyi glor mdung gcig bsnun nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-13: de'i rgyu ma dag byung ste sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-15: tshigs rnams kyang 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-17: ma la 'di ltar rgyal po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-18: sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga bar phyin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-19: bdag gis dor bar bya ba ni bdag gi tshul ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-20: brtson 'grus kyis sdug bsngal bzlog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-21: thabs ci dang cis sge'u chung nas grong khyer du phyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-23: phan tshun du grong khyer du 'gro ba'i glags bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-24: w'a ra n'a si'i skyed mos tshal gyi bar na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434a-25: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-0: padma dkar po dag gis brgyan @434b pa; ngang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-1: bya ka ran da ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-2: dur pa dag gis mtsho gling brgyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-3: kho ra khor yug tu me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-5: nags tshang tshing gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-6: bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-7: de shugs drag pos nags tshal stug po de'i nang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-8: rdzing bu tshangs ldan gyi padma'i 'dab ma nas padma'i 'dab ma'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas rgal te sge'u chung nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-9: de nas rgyal po babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-13: blon po de rnams kyis phan tshun kun du btsal bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-14: kha cig ni skyed mos tshal du song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-15: gzhan dag gis ni phyogs bzhir brgyugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-16: gang gis kyang de ma rnyed nas rang rang gi rta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-17: glang po che dag bzung nas slar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-18: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis srog 'byin pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-19: de yul w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i grong mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-21: blon po lhag ma dag bsdus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-23: gang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-24: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-26: lha rgyal srid kyi phyed stsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-28: nga'i srog 'byin pa ni rta cang shes yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-30: de la byin yang des ci zhig byar yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:434b-32: lha de'i slad du grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa dag gtang bar bgyi zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-1: ma yin pa'i mchod ston dag bgyis la bsod nams dag bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-4: legs kyi de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-5: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-8: yul mi dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-10: gzhan yang grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-11: grong khyer de na rdo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-13: gyo mo dag sel du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-14: tsandan gyi chus ni chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-15: dri zhim po'i pog por dag ni bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-18: dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni btags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-19: lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sil ma nyams dga' ba ni bkram ste; dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-20: grong khyer du 'di skad dril bsgrags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-22: yul w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-23: yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-24: 'dir lha'i rta cang shes kyi phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa gtong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-25: dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston dang bsod nams byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-26: de'i phyir khyed cag rnams kyis gos sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-29: 'byor pa mchog gis chos la byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435a-31: de nas grong mi dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-0: @435b dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-1: grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir yang 'dod pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa dag sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-4: rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na yang na gnad rnams ni chad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-6: tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung bzhin du de'i srog gi skyabs byas so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-9: de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-10: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-12: tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-13: de nas nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-16: dge slong rab bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-19: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-20: myong bar nges par rab bzang gis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-21: gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-22: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-25: rlung gi khams la ma yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:435b-28: skye mched rnams la las byas pa'i dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-0: mi dge ba dag rnam par smin par @436a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-2: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-3: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-4: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-7: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-8: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-9: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yul w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer ri dvags 'dzin gyi tshal na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dbon po mya ngan med ces bya ba de thar par bya ba'i don du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-16: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung las rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-17: de thar cing rang dbang thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-18: snyam nas 'bad pa ma bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-19: ji tsam na dus shin tu ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-20: mya ngan med ces bya ba ljongs rgyu zhing 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-21: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-22: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436a-23: dge slong mya ngan med shing aa sho ka'i drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-0: ji tsam shing aa sho ka de la lha zhig @436b gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-1: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung mya ngan las 'da' bar thos nas ngus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-2: de ngus pa'i mchi ma thig pa gcig mya ngan med kyis lus la lhung bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-3: de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-5: lha ci'i phyir ngu zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-6: lhas deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung mya ngan las 'da'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-7: zhes smras so; ;de nas mya ngan med lha'i tshig thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-8: gnad du phog pa bzhin 'gyel te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-9: de snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-10: de nas lhas ci'i phyir du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-12: mya ngan med kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-14: bla ma dang bral ba'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni bdag gi zhang po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-16: bdag gis shin tu sbyangs shing gnas pa la ma 'bad pas bdag ni so so'i skye bor gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-17: lam shin tu ring bas blta ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-20: gal te de lta na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-21: ci khyad par rtogs par nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-22: mya ngan med kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-23: ci ltar lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-24: bdag gi blo ni kun tu smin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-25: de bzhin du khyad par rtogs par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-26: de nas lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mya ngan med rdzu 'phrul gyis khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:436b-27: des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dad pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-1: ldan 'das 'od srung gis chos rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-2: de thos ma thag tu dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-3: dang por tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-5: de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das par mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-8: tshe dang ldan pas gang cung zad khyad par rtogs pa de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-9: bdag las brten pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-10: bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-11: ston pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-12: tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-13: bdag de'i nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon logs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-20: lha gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437a-21: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-0: gang gi phyir dge ba'i @437b bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-1: dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-2: dge ba la bsten par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-3: sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-4: sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-5: sdig pa la mi bsten par dge slong rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-7: btsun pa bdag gcig pu dben pa zhig tu mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-8: nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-9: sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-12: dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-13: dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-14: sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-15: sdig pa la ma bsten na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-16: 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-17: kun dga' bo; khyod 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-18: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-19: dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-20: dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi bsten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-21: sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-22: sdig pa la ma bsten na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-23: 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-24: zhes de skad ma zer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-26: kun dga' bo de ni tshangs par spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:437b-27: kun tu mthar phyin pa; ma 'dres pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-7: kun tu dga' bar bya ba'i chos drug la sogs pa mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-8: khyad du gsod par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-9: gang rab tu byung ba ngan pa dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-11: khyim bdag dad pa can dag bstan pa la ma dad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-12: mu stegs can la rten par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-13: gang dag log par 'tsho ba kun tu spyod pa zhing rmo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-15: rgyal po la rten cing 'tsho ba ltos par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-16: gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs nas bas mtha'i gnas mal du rten pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-17: sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag bor bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-18: dge sbyong ma yin pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'khrug par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes smra ba'i rigs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-22: 'od srung la sogs pa zhes smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:461b-23: thugs rje chen po la goms par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-0: kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa'i ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs @462a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-2: 'gro ba'i ru skya 'dzin ba med nas 'jig rten 'khrugs par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-3: stobs bcu dang ldan pa mi rtag pa'i stobs kyis non par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-4: sems can thams cad kyi ston pa bdag cag sad par byed pa'i mgon po ma gzims sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-5: sangs rgyas nyin byed ma nub bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-6: thub pa'i dbang po'i zla ba sgra gcan gyis bcom nas snang ba med par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-7: sum cu rtsa gsum na dbang phyug dpag bsam gyi shing dri zhim po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-8: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-9: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzang po bzhi dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-10: mi rtag pa'i glang po che smyon pas ma bcom mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-11: ye shes kyi sgron ma mi rtag pa'i rlung gis bdas nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-13: de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-14: blo ldan bstan pa gnas bya'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-15: nyan thos dge 'dun tshogs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-16: de dag der ni 'dus gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-17: khyod la sdod cing de brtson byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-18: gru chen rkyal pa de zhig ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-19: ye shes ri yang rnam par rnyil //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-20: bstan pa rab mchog ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-21: dge slong mang po rnam par zhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-22: gyi na ma lags legs par ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-24: bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462a-25: de bas khyod ni nges par bzhud //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag @462b gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-1: tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-6: 'gro ba'i sgron ma mgon po bzhugs na der //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-7: bdag ni 'gro bar bya ba'i blo yod kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-8: de nas pha rol rab zhi gshegs gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-9: blo ldan gang zhig 'jig rten de dag 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-10: lhung bzed chos gos rnam gsum mchog 'di dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-11: khyod kyis dge 'dun dag la dbul bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-12: bdag ni zhi ba yang srid med par 'gro'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-13: bdag gis bsams pa 'phags la bzod par gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis sbar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-17: gsal ba mchog dag gi cho 'phrul chen po bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-18: phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-19: de'i lus rang las byung ba'i me'i khams kyis rnam par tshig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-20: de las chu'i rgyun rnam pa bzhi bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-21: chu'i rgyun gcig las sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bstan pa; da ltar dus rnams ngan gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-22: sems can rang gi las la rten //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-26: 'dus byas bsags pa skad cig 'jig 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-27: skye la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyon mongs ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-28: so so'i skye bo bdag tu nga rgyal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:462b-29: de dag byed pa med par rig par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-2: mkhas pas rtag tu dgongs pa bag yod cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-3: bsod nams yid la bya ba de brtson bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-4: 'byung po'i tshogs kun song zhing 'jig 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-5: srog dang bcas pa'i dpal ni g-yo bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-7: thub pa de la slob mchog yang dag btud //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-8: rang gi dgos pa ma lus thams cad byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-9: gus shing rab tu dad pas bla ma de'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-10: phyi bzhin pa lang bdag kyang de ltar song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-12: tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gi rus pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-13: rus pa'i mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-14: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-15: shing sha ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang nas mi snang zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-16: grong khyer rtsva can gyi gyad rnams nye bar rten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-17: shing s'a la zung gi tshal du gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-19: ji ltar rgan rims la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-20: lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa la byin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-21: mgon po'i sku ni med par des thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-22: bsod nams las kyis rab tu zhi bar song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-23: de yi lhung bzed chos gos 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463a-24: des bsams dge 'dun dag la bzod par gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge @463b slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-1: kye tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-2: ji ltar de ni 'phags pa'i tshul gyis 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-3: gzhan gyis de bzhin rab zhir 'gro mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-4: de bas ji srid dgos pa'i don bya zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-5: dbang can tshogs nas de srid 'gro bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-6: de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-7: dge slong de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-8: ji ltar bsod nams las kyis zhi gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-9: shi ri sha ka'i sems mchog ba lang bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-10: de ltar khyed kyis de bzhin mi bsam ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-11: 'gro don dgos phyir tshogs nas blo gros bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-13: dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la khrims su bcas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-15: bdag ji skad smra ba gson cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-16: ji ltar bdag cag gis chos kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin bshad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnam par bral ba'i sdug bsngal can gyi dge slong phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag gis thos nas 'dir 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-18: de dag gis bdag cag gi sems g-yeng bar byed mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-19: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga dhara byang chub cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-20: gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pa der chos kyi tshul bgro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:463b-21: de na dge slong gcig gi legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-0: gzhan zhig gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa ci byang chub kyi shing drung du @464a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-3: tshe dang ldan pa yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-4: chos kyi tshul rab tu sbyor bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-5: zhal ta yang byed pas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-7: legs kyi de bzhin du bgyi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-8: de lta na yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa yang yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde 'di mtha' dag gtad na; de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-12: gal te de lta na slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa'i dge slong gzhan 'khod pa de dag kyang 'khrug par 'gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-13: de la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-14: 'di chu'i zhal ta par bsko ba'i spro bas bskos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-15: lhag ma ni bzlog par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-17: legs kyi de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-20: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal ta byed par spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464a-22: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po spro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol @464b ba dang gnyis kyi las bya bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-1: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ta pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba na 'dug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-4: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde mtha' dag gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-5: de lta bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal ta par bsko te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chu'i zhal ta par bsko na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-7: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-8: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-9: dge slong kun dga' bo chu'i zhal ta ba chu 'brim par bsko ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-10: dge slong kun dga' bo chu'i zhal ta ba chu 'brim par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-13: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-14: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ta pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba na 'dug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-15: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde mtha' dag gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-16: de lta bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bsko ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bsko zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:464b-20: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-0: @465a *// dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bskos lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-1: 'di ltar mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-6: kun dga' bo khyod tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-7: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig ci dga' bar ljongs rgyus la rgyal po'i khab tu song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-8: nga ni lam drang po nas 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-10: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun dang ci dga' bar ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang snga ma bzhin lam drang po nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-12: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgra'i spyod pa ni gang du glang po che la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-13: bcom ldan 'das mthong na de ma thag tu rang lhung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-14: de bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ma nyams par sa la 'jog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-15: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-16: mthong nas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-17: de bzhin du rang sa la lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465a-18: de tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bzung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-0: rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag @465b ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-1: nyan thos dag ni mnyam par ma bzhag par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-2: de res 'ga' ni de bzhin du mnyam par bzhag nas gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-3: res 'ga' ni mnyam par ma bzhag par gnas pas de phyin chad khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-5: rta las rang lhung bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-8: 'phags pa ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-9: 'phags pa 'on kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-10: bdag bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-11: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-12: da bdag gis gang zhig la bkur sti bgyi lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-13: de lta bas na bdag la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-15: blon po la shes ldan 'phags pa 'od srung chen po'i dgos pa thams cad sbyor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-17: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-19: bcom ldan 'das ni yul ma ga dhara byang chub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-20: der bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku brnyes pas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams lam du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:465b-21: lha'i gnas 'dir chos kyi tshul 'di bgro bar 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-0: bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la @466a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-1: yo byad thams cad bstab par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-4: chos mngon pa bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-5: rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-6: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras dgra bcom pa lnga brgya rgyal po'i khab tu phyin par thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-7: thos nas kyang grong khyer dag byi dor byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-8: lam dag bstar nas btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-11: pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis bsu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-12: de nas skyes bu bzang po stong gis zhabs 'bring byas nas rab tu mdzes par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams grong khyer du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-14: yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-15: de nas rgan rim kyis 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-16: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-17: 'phags pa phyogs gang du bgro bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-19: rgyal po chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir yang dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-20: sdug bsngal skyes pas phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag 'dir mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-21: des bdag cag gi sems g-yeng ba'i skyon mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-22: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-23: shing n+ya gro dha'i phug 'di ni rab tu dben mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466a-24: 'on kyang mal stan ma mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-0: 'phags pa @466b khyod kyis sems bskyed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-4: rgyal po ni 'di skad ces shing n+ya gro dha'i phug 'dir bgro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-6: dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams kyang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-8: 'phags pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-9: bdag la ma sbran pa kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-10: khyod kyis kyang ma brtags par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma mdzad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-13: je dang por dbyar sbyor ba ral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-14: 'drums pa dag bcos nas phyir dbyar gnas par khas blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-15: chos bgro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-16: des dang por dbyar sbyor ba ral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-18: phyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems la kun tu bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-20: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-21: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-22: 'khor 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bsngags pa'i nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-23: dge slong 'dod chags dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:466b-27: len pa dang bcas pa slob pa dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-0: @467a *// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gcig pu 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-5: len pa dang bcas te slob pa yin par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-6: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams ni snying po med pa dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-12: bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-17: len pa dang bcas pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la ci spro ba byas pas 'dul bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-21: 'on te spyo bas 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnam par brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-22: ji tsam spyos nas 'dul bar mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-23: des de la nged ni 'dus pa'i mchog yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-24: kun dga' bo khyod dang nged lhan cig chos bgro bar mi byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-27: de gnad du phog pa bzhin du rab tu g-yos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467a-28: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-0: bdag gis @467b tshul khrims nyams par ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-1: lta ba nyams par ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-2: spyod pa nyams par ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-3: 'tsho ba nyams par ma byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-4: bdag gis cung zad kyang dge 'dun la nyes pa ma byas mod kyi; btsun pa 'od srung chen po bzod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-5: des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring nye ba na 'dug 'dug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-7: tshul khrims nyams par ma byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-8: lta ba nyams par ma byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-9: spyod pa nyams par ma byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-10: 'tsho ba nyams par ma byas blta ngo mtshar ci che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-11: ngas dge 'dun la nyes pa cung zad kyang ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-13: longs la tshul shing zung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-14: khyod kyi nyes pa bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-17: de langs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan gsum du g-yos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-23: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-24: mig phye ste aa la la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-26: kye ma 'phags pa 'od srung chen po ni bden par smra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-27: phan par smra ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-28: da ltar thub pa lus 'phags kyi gnas 'di na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-29: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la rab tu drag pas spyo bas spyo bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:467b-30: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-1: dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-3: ngas dge 'dun la gnod pa ci yang ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-5: ji ltar khyod kyis dge 'dun la gnod pa ma byas pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-6: bcom ldan 'das ni bud med rnams gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pas rab tu dbyung bar mi bzhed na khyod kyis gsol ba btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo bud med rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-8: dge slong ma'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ba nga la ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-9: de ci'i phyir zhe na; kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-10: chos 'dul ba la bud med rab tu phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-11: 'di ltar chos 'dul ba yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-13: 'bras s'a lu phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing la ser ba bab na 'bras s'a lu gang yin pa de brlag cing med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-14: chos 'dul ba 'di la bud med rab tu phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-15: chos 'dul ba yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-17: btsun pa 'od srung chen po chog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-20: 'dzem med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-21: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sru skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis dka' ba spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468a-22: gang bcom ldan 'das kyi yum ni dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-0: rang gi nu ma bsnun nas @468b gsos shing bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-1: gzhan yang sngon gyi dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'khor bzhi yod pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-2: gang bcom ldan 'das 'di la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-4: bdag gis byas pa gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-5: nye du dang gnyen pas bud med rab tu dbyung bar gsol ba bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-6: de gcig pu nongs pa ni bzod par gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-7: kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar byas pa gzo ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-8: chos kyi sku la gnod pa byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-9: ji ltar khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-10: ser ba bab pas lo stong tshang par gnas pa'i yun thung ngur lhag ma tsam du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-13: gnyen gyi phyir rab tu phung ba ni tshul ma yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-15: nyes pa yin no; ;ji ltar sngon gyis dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khor bzhi yod pa ngas thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-16: gang bcom ldan 'das 'di la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-18: de sngon gyi dus na mi rnams ni 'dod pa chung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-23: kun tu sbyor ba srab pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-24: de dag ni de ltar rigs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-25: 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-26: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das mi bzhed bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:468b-27: ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du grub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-0: de bas na 'di ni nyes pa dang po @469a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-3: khyod la nyes pa gzhan yang yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-4: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo gang dang gang du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po la bsten cing bsgom te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-5: lan grangs mang du byas na 'dod na bskal pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-6: bskal pa las lhag par yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-8: 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-9: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-10: bde bar gshegs pa bskal pa bas lhag par bzhugs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-11: zhes gsol ba ma btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-13: btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-14: rab tu 'dzem pa med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-15: 'on kyang bdag de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-16: de ltar de nyid khyod kyi nyes pa chen po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-17: ston pa ni dri nga ba spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-18: bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-19: ji ltar khyod bdud sdig can gyis khyab par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-20: de ltar 'di ni khyod kyi nyes pa gnyis pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-21: gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i zhes bka' stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469a-24: gzhan rmas pa na lan gzhan du 'debs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-0: de ltar 'di @469b yang khyod kyi nyes pa gzhan gsum pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-1: gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' gser gyi kha dog can phrugs gcig la rkang bas brdzis so; ;btsun pa 'od srung chen po dag des ngo tsha med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-3: rab tu ngo tsha ba ni med pa ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-4: de'i tshe na g-yas g-yon nas dge slong grogs byed pa med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-6: de khyod kyis nam mkha' la ci nyes te mi dor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-7: 'on kyang lha rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur na zhes smras pa 'di ni khyod kyi nyes pa bzhi pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-8: gzhan yang khyod kyi nyes pa 'di dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-9: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-10: shing s'a la zung gi drung du skye mas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-11: chu rnyog ma can gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-12: btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-13: rab tu ngo tsha ba med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-14: de'i tshe na shing rta lnga brgya tsam zhig chu bo ka kus sta rgal bas rnyog pa can du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-15: de'i phyir khyod kyis nyes pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-16: de na khyod kyis lhung bzed nam mkha' la ci ste ma bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-17: lha dag gis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag gis bkang bar 'gyur ba 'di yang khyod kyi nyes pa lnga pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-18: gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa nga zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:469b-20: gang gis tshul khrims phra mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis phyir glod la bde ba'i reg pa la gnos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-4: de'i tshe khyod kyis tshul khrims bslab pa phra mo dang; phran tshegs gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-5: zhes ma zhus pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-6: de 'dir bdag gis smra ba ni phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-7: dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum gyi chos dang; ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-8: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-9: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-10: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-11: bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams las lhag ma rnams ni phra mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-14: phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-15: snga ma bzhin du so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi'i bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-16: de las lhag ma rnams ni phra mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-19: phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470a-20: dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-6: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis las lhag ma rnams ni phra mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-8: de ltar dge slong gis khong du chud pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-9: phas pham par 'gyur ba bzhi la gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-10: kha cig ni dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-11: mu stegs can gyis skabs rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-12: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i chos ni dud pa bzhin du gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-13: dge sbyong go'u ta ma bzhugs pa'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-14: nyan thos kyi bslab pa yang dag par sdom zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-15: da ltar ni ci dga' bar spyod cing lhod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-16: 'dod na ni de bzhin du byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-17: mi 'dod na ni mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-18: de bas na khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la ma zhus pa nyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-21: rab tu ngo tsha med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i mya ngan dran pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-24: de yang khyod kyi nyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-26: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:470b-27: khyod kyis mya ngan byas pa de yang nyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-3: bud med spyod pa ngan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-6: rab tu ngo tsha med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-7: bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-8: bud med ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags che bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-10: mo mtshan dang bral bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod de lta bu'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ga las byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-12: 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-13: bud med dag bud med kyi mo mtshan ji ltar spong bar 'gyur ba ni nyes pa rnam pa bdun no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-14: gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog ltar ser ba bud med dag la bstan pas de la mchi mas dri ma can du gyur pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-16: btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-17: rab tu ngo tsha med pa ni ma lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-19: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i kha dog dang ldan pa mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-20: sems can mang po dag kha dog dang ldan par sems kyis smon lam skyed par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471a-21: kun dga' bo khyod gcig tu shes pa ma yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-0: gzhan gyi sems shes pa ma yin pa 'di dang nyes pa brgyad @471b do; ;khyod 'dod chags cung zad dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-1: 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog 'dus pa'i nang du ma 'dug par da longs te song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-2: khyod dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i bzlas pa mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-3: de ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos nyes pa byas pa rnam par brgyad glengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-5: phyogs bzhir bltas te snying rje ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-6: sdug bsngal ba'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-8: nga'i dus ni 'di 'dra bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-9: bdag de bzhin gshegs pas ni spangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-10: mgon dang skyabs byed pa ni med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-11: snang ba yang med na su la brten par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nyes pa rnam pa brgyad glengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-14: de nas nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-15: aa la la zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-16: kye da ltar lha rnams kyi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-17: lha ma yin gyi lus rnams ni smas par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni rgyas par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-19: da ltar ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen pos ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen po la nyes pa rnam par brgyad glengs pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-20: de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-21: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:471b-22: btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar lags pas bzod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-1: du bgyid cing slan chad kyang mi bgyid mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag khyod la gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-3: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-5: smre sngags 'don bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-6: khyod dge slong 'od srung chen po la gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-7: khyod nyes pa chung ngu la mi bzod pa med par bka' bzhin byos la bzod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-8: kun dga' bo khyod ma ngu bar khyod kyis dge ba'i chos dag 'phel te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-10: ngas ni bstan pa la brtson par bya ba'i phyir mchog 'dus pa'i nang nas longs te song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-11: khyod dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i bzlas pa mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-12: zhes chad pas bcad pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo med na bdag cag gis yang dag par ji ltar bshad par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong kun dga' bo yon tan dang ldan du zin kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-18: de dang lhan cig mi gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-19: de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472a-21: gti mug dang bcas pas bslab dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-0: khyod dang yang dag par bzlas pa mi @472b bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod longs la song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-4: khyod kyis rab tu brtson pas bya ba byas te; dgra bcom par gyur na lhan cig tu yang dag par bzlas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mig mchi mas gang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-6: ston pa dang bral ba dran pas yid mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-7: de nas mchog 'dus pa'i nang nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-8: yul bri dzi'i grong khyer du song nas dbyar der tshul du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-9: de nas kun dga' bo'i g-yog tshe dang ldan pa bri dzi'i bus byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos shin tu brtson pas 'khor bzhi la chos 'chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa bri dzi'i bus 'di snyam du bsams so; ;bdag gi mkhan po 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral te slob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-12: 'on te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral bar slob pa bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-13: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems kyis mkhan po'i sems blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-15: tshe dang ldan pa bri dzi'i bus rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-16: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems kyis tshe dang kun dga' bo'i sems bltas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:472b-17: tshe dang ldan pa bri dzi'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-0: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' @473a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i slob par mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-3: de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song nas phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mdun du 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-6: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-7: go'u tam khyod ni bag med ma mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-8: shing drung thibs por brten nas mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-9: thugs la bzhag ste bsam gtan mdzod cig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-10: ring por mi thogs zhi ba'i gnas thob 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-12: tshe dang ldan pa spong byed kyi bus gdams ngag 'dis btams nas nyin bar gyi 'chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-13: 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-14: de nyin bar gyi 'chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-15: 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-16: mtshan gyi thun dang po la 'chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-17: 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-18: de mtshan gyi thun dang po la 'chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-19: 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-20: mtshan gyi gung thun la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu rkang pa bkrus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473a-21: gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-0: glo @473b g-yas pas phab nas rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-3: shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la byed cing nyal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sngas nang tshangs can la mgo ma bzhag pa kho nar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-5: 'di ltar yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos len pa med par zag ba rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dga' ba dang bde ba so sor myong nas rnam par grol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-7: dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-8: 'od srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po shing n+ya gro dha'i phug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-9: chos sdud cing 'dus pa ga la bar phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-11: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-12: dge slong rnams brjed ngas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-13: lus nyam chung bas mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa ma yin par mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-15: chos mngon par 'dzin par ma nus pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-16: de bas na snga dro'i dus su mdo'i tshigs su bcad pas brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-17: phyi dro ni mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-20: zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de skad ces smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-21: dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po las thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:473b-22: dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-1: pa 'od srung chen po mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-3: ma mo dag las gang sngar bgro bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-6: je re zhig mdo sde sngar bgro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas chos bsdu bar gsol ba btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la spro bar byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni sgrub pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bsdu bar spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-15: gnyis kyi las bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-16: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba bsgrub par spro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-18: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-19: 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdo sde bsdu ba bsgrub par sko ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde sdud pa bsgrub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-24: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474a-26: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsgrub par bskos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-0: @474b tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu bar bsgrub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsgrub par bskos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba bsgrub par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-3: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-4: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba bsgrub par bsko ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-6: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po chos smra ba'i sengge'i khri'i steng du dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas snam sbyar lnga brgya bting ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-9: sems can rnams la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-10: chos la ni gus pa bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-11: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la ni zhe sar dmigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-12: sengge'i khri'i g-yas phyogs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-13: mgo bos gtugs nas rgan rims su ji ltar 'os par phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-14: mi rtag pa yid la byas te sengge'i khri zil gyis mnan nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-15: de nas rgya mtsho ltar zab pa'i 'khor mi g-yo ba la bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-16: gal te ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde ma lus par gsungs pa bdag gis bzung pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:474b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gang dag klu'i gnas su bshad pa dag kyang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-1: lha'i gnas su bshad pa dag kyang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-2: gang dag bdag la mngon sum du bshad pa dag kyang yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-3: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa gang dag de bzhin du thos nas bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-4: 'di ltar thos pa thams cad bshad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-6: lha dag gi shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin te; gcig la gcig kye ma lus 'phags ma'i thub pa 'phags pa kun dga' bo ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'chad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-8: sems rtse gcig tu byas nas mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-10: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-11: gang la chos rnams rab gnas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-12: 'jig rten gsum pos rtag tu mchod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-14: seng+ge bzhin du chos rnams sgrogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-15: kye ma zhi ba de bshad la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-16: khyed rnams bde bar 'dod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-17: nges par snying po snying po'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-18: de dag la ni gus par nyon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-20: ston pa 'jig rten phan bzhed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-21: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-22: rnam pa mchog ni gar bshad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-23: tshe dang ldan pas mdo sde gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475a-24: ston pas gang dag yongs su bsgrags pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-0: sangs rgyas rjes su @475b dran pa rab tu rtogs pa yid la bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-1: bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang du rab tu zhi zhing thugs su chud pa der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-2: mngon par bltas te 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te sgras khyab par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-4: bcom ldan 'das yul w'a ra n'a sir drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-5: zhes tshig gis rab tu brjod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-6: de ma thag kho nar nam mkha'i dkyil dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-7: gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-8: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i dge slong la sogs pa rnam pa mang po stong dag gis gnod pas btsir cing gnad du phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-9: sdug bsngal tshor bzhin du aa la la zhes tshig tu brjod cing smra ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-11: mi rtag par ni khyad par med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-12: gang gis rin chen gter de yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-13: yon tan rgya mtsho dag kyang bskams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-14: gang las bdag gis mngon thos pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-15: chos ni thar pa'i bde ba byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-16: 'di skad thos shes rab sbyar te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-17: de yang de ring bsgrags pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-20: sngon ma thos pa'i chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-21: zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rgya cher bskor nas mdo sde bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:475b-23: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-1: ldan pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon sum du thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-2: bdag gi don du mdo sde 'di bshad cing rjes su bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-3: bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-4: rus pa'i ri las ni rgal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-5: ngan song gi sgo ni bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-6: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-7: mdo sde rin po che 'di bshad pas bdag dang lha stong phrag brgyad cus chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-8: de ring 'dir 'di skad thos nas bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-9: kye ma thams cad mi rtag par khyad par med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-10: zhes smras nas stan las babs te sa la 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de blta ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-12: dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad sdug pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa'i yid kyis rang rang gi stan las babs nas sa la 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-13: kye ma ji ltar bdag cag gis chos 'chad pa mngon sum du mthong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-14: mi rtag pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das de yang da ni thos pa'i lam du gshegs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-16: lha dang mi dang lha min klu rnams kyi rgyal zhing gshegs na; ;khyed cag ci'i phyir 'tsho zhing zhi ba'i gnas su 'jug mi byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476a-17: skye bo'i nang na thams cad mkhyen pas stongs par mngon mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-0: dge ba'i blo gros gang dag srog @476b la chags shing dam por byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-1: de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba bas mtha'i gnas mal du bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-2: smon lam gyi shes pas rnam par bltas te; dga' ba'i yid kyis 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi lung de yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-6: bdag gi lung de lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag gi lung de lta bu lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de kho na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po de 'di snyam du /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-19: des gsal bar yul w'a ra n'a si kho nar dge slong lnga po'i ched du ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:476b-24: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-2: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-4: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-9: sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-10: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-11: gang 'dod pa btsal te mi rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-12: mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-13: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:477a-14: sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:478a-11: dge slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin par gyur tu zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:478a-16: 'di lta bur ni ma gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:478a-23: 'di lta bur ni ma gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-3: bdag dang bdag gi med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-4: des de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-7: rang nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-8: bdag gi skye ba ni zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-9: tshangs par spyod ba ni spyad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479a-11: 'di las srid pa gzhan med do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-2: de phung por bsdus te bzhag go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-6: de nyan thos kyis bshad par bsdus so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-9: yang dag par spong ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-16: gang yang dag par brjod pa mang ba'i mdo sde ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-17: de yang dag par brjod pa'i sder bsdus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-18: tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas par yang dag par ldan pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-19: yang dag par ldan pa'i lung zhes bsdus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:479b-20: gang mdo sde ring po ni de lung ring por bzhag go /
