K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484a-17: kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba la sogs pa mtshan ma rnams tha mar mchod par 'dod de 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484a-18: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484a-19: lha gzhan dag gis tha ma zhes thos pas yid mi dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484a-20: zhes bskyed nas cung zad kyang mi smra bar de dag gis de phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484a-21: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-0: mche ba de lag pa sa bzung nas mig mi 'dzum par bltas te spyi bo la bzhag @484b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-1: me tog man da ra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-3: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye mas rab tu gtor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-4: brgya byin la sogs pa lha brgya stong mang po rnams la bag yod par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-5: ces mdor bsdus te chos bshad pa byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-6: ri rab kyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-7: des 'di snyam du bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-8: rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sbran par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-10: de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-11: chab sgo ba'i mi la 'di skad ces kva'i skyes bu khyod song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-12: rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'od srung ni sgo na sdod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-13: lha blta bar 'tshal gyi mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-15: de nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-16: ji tsam rgyal po nyal te cha ba sgo bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-21: 'phags pa rgyal po ni gtum ba zhig bas chad pas gcod du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-22: 'o na nam gnyid sad par gyur pa'i tshe 'od srung ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbron to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-24: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lho phyogs kyi ri bo bya gag rkang gi ri la 'dzegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-25: ri gsum gyi dbus su rtsva gding ba byas nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-26: ma la bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa byin pa 'di lus la bgos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:484b-27: byams pa'i gsung rab rgyas kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-0: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis slob ma'i @485a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-1: tshogs sems can gyi mchog de dang kun tu skyo bar byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-2: ji tsam ting nge 'dzin de lta bu bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-3: bdag gi lus 'di rigs gsum gyis g-yogs pa'i khang pa'i nang 'dir 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-4: byams pa'i bstan pa rgyas kyi bar du ma nyams par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-5: gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'ongs na sgo bye bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-6: gal te des bdag gi lus ma mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-7: khrag dron mor skyugs nas dus byed pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar rig cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-8: ji tsam na tshe'i 'du byed kyang spangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-9: tshe'i 'du byed spangs ma thag tu sa yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-12: bar snang la lha dag rnga yang rdung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-18: cho 'phrul chen po rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-19: rang gi lus byin gyis brlabs nas glo g-yas pas phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-20: rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas nyal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-21: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-23: tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams 'di snyam du ci'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-24: bdag cag gi sa 'di g-yos par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485a-26: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-0: tshangs pa @485b la sogs pa lha rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-1: lha brgya stong du mas me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-3: punda ri ka la sogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-5: aa ka ru'i phye ma thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-6: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i sku gdung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-7: gnas brtan gyi sku la me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-10: padma dkar po bzang po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-12: aa ka ru'i phye ma dag gis mchod cing gtor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-13: ri gsum sbyar nas bkab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-14: de nas lha rnams gnas brtan dang bral bas mya ngan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-15: da ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang bral ba'i mya ngan skyes pa yang ma byang bar 'dir shing n+ya gro dha'i phug 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dge ba'i chos kyi bar chad kyang byung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-16: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po'i yul yang stong nas snang ba med par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-19: mgon med pa'i srang du byams shing phan 'dogs pa'i mgon yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-20: skye bo rnams dge bas dbul por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-21: da ni bcom ldan 'das gnyis kho na yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-23: da ni dam pa'i chos kyi ri'i rtse mo yang lhung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-24: da ni dam pa'i chos kyi gru yang rab tu g-yos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-25: da ni dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba yang nub /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-26: da ni dam pa'i chos kyi rgya mtsho yang 'khrugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-27: da ni ston pa phan 'dogs pa mi snang bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:485b-28: bdud dag kyang dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smre sngags rnam pa mang @486a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-2: phyag byas te mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-3: ji tsam na rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i rmi lam du rgyal rigs kyi zhang po'i rgyud chad par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-4: mthong nas kyang skrag nas sad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-5: sgo srung gis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbron to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-7: thos nas rgyal po brgyal tes la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-8: ji tsam na chus gtor nas bslang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la lus thams cad kyis gtugs nas dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-11: bdag gis de ring gnas brtan 'od srung chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das par thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-13: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-14: rgyal po ma skyes dgra khrid nas ri bya gag rkang la 'dzegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-15: ji tsam na gnod sbyin dag gis ri phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-17: de'i sku me tog man da ra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-19: tsandan sa mchog gi phye mas g-yogs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-20: mthong nas lag pa bsgreng ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-21: shing drung pa nas bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la lus thams cad kyis gtugs nas langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-22: bsreg cing bsam par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-23: gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-24: rgyal po chen po ci zhig rtsom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486a-26: gnas brtan gyi sku zhugs la bzhen par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-0: rgyal po @486b chen po 'di ni byams pa'i gsung rab 'byung gi bar du byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-1: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa nyan thos bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus bskor ba phyogs 'dir byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-2: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i lus 'di bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-3: 'di ni 'od srung zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i nyan thos 'dod pa chung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-4: chog shes pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'chang ba'i mchog tu gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-5: des bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bsdus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-6: zhes nyan thos rnams la bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-7: ji tsam na de dag 'di snyam du de'i dus kyi mi rnams ni lus chung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-8: nges par bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku ni chen por gyur pa zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das des de'i lus las snam sbyar blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-11: 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i snam sbyar yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-12: zhes nyan thos rnams la bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-13: de dag gis de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-14: de nyid kyis dge sbyong bye ba drug cu rtsa dgus sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs nas ci nus kyi byas shing bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-15: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par des byin gyis brlabs pas lus 'di me la bsreg par mi nus mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-16: 'on kyang 'di'i steng du mchod rten brtsig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:486b-17: ji tsam na rgyal po sgor byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-0: ri 'byar cing de'i lus bkab par gyur @487a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-2: de'i 'og tu rgyal pos steng du mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa yang byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-3: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-5: gnas brtan bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-6: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po yang ma mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-7: 'di ltar gnas brtan yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba blta bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-9: zhes gnas brtan gyis khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-10: ji tsam na sha na'i gos can rgya mtsho chen po nas bde zhing legs par 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-11: des nor rnams gter du sbas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dri gtsang khang gi sgo na 'chag pa la phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-14: btsun pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-15: bdag ni lo lnga'i dus ston bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-16: bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po brgal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-17: bde zhing legs par mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-18: de bas na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la lo lnga'i dus ston bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-20: gnas brtan gyis bu bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-21: zhes smras pa sha na'i gos can gyis thos nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-22: ji tsam na chus gtor nas bslang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487a-23: des sems kyi 'du shes slar rnyed nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-0: @487b gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu gang na de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-1: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-2: 'od srung chen po yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-3: de shin tu mi dga' ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-4: dad pas lo lnga'i dus ston byas te mjug tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-5: gnas brtan gyis bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la zab zing gi bsdu ba ni byas zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-6: da ni chos kyi bsdu ba byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-8: sha na'i gos can gyis gnas brtan ci zhig bka' stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-9: ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-10: bu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-14: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rab tu phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-15: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa zin par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-16: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sha na'i gos gyon zhing 'chang bar yang dag par len du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-17: de thos pa 'dzin pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-18: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das las dge slong sde gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thos shing bzung ba thams cad tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis kyang bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-21: sde snod gsum rgyas par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-22: ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-23: dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-24: gang na lo brgya 'tsho ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-25: nges par chu la bya gar bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:487b-26: chu la bya gar mthong ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-0: @488a *// bdag nyid gcig pu'i 'tsho ba dge /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-1: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-2: de ga la bar song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-3: bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de skad ma gsungs mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-5: gang na lo brgya 'tsho ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-6: nges par skye dang 'jig pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-7: gang zag gnyis la ston pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-8: sa 'dir rtag par bshad pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-9: ma dad zhe sdang blo can dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-10: dad la phyin ci log gyur pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-11: mdo sde log par bzung gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-12: ba lang 'dam du song ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-14: rang gi 'chi blos blo med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-15: thos pa mi shes 'bras bu med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-16: log par shes pa dug dang 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-17: thos pa yang dag nyid shes pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-18: bral ba 'bras bu blo ldan yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-19: des de'i mkhan po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-20: kun dga' bo yang rgas gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-21: de yi dran pa'ang nyams par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-23: rga ba dag gis gzir gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-24: lus can de ni dran pa nyams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-25: yang dag rjes su mi dran pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-26: de yi blo ni rgas pas gnon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-27: khyod song la de skad smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-29: gnas brtan kun dga' bo sla ra log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-30: dge slong de yang de skad 'don pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-32: bu bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ma gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488a-34: dge slong des mkhan po'i tshig bzhin smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-0: ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' @488b bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-1: gal te bdag nyid kyis dge slong la smras na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-3: de ni drung du 'ong du mi btub /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-4: de'i drung du ni bdag 'gro ba'i cha ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-6: des bsams pa; 'di ltar sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-7: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-8: 'od srung la sogs pa chen po de dag kyang 'das zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-9: ma la bdag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul lo stong du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-11: snyam du bsams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-12: rnying pa gang dag sngar 'das te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-13: gsar bu de dang bdag mi mthun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-14: bdag ni gcig pu bsam gtan la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-15: sgo nga las skyes bzhin du gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-16: bdag gi grogs dang mdza' bo kun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-17: sngon du 'das shing song bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-18: ji ltar bsam gtan gnas dran pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-20: dri ma byang nas zhir song 'gro ba'i sgron ma ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-21: bdag nyid chen po'i gti mug mun nag rab rib bsal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-22: de dag gis ni gdul ba tshad med btul gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-23: gcig pu dgon pa mchod rten tshal shing lhag ma 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-24: de nas sha na'i gos can la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-25: bu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-26: des kyang nga la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-27: da ni ngas bstan pa khyod la gtad nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:488b-28: de khyod kyis kun tu skyongs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-0: grong khyer bcom brlag ri mu run dha zhes bya ba der yul @489a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-1: bcom brlag gi tshong dpon gyi bu na ta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-2: pha ta zhes bya bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-3: gtsug lag khang gi yon bdag tu 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-4: ri mu run dar gtsug lag khang brtsigs zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-5: yul bcom brlag na spos tshong sbas pa zhes bya ba de'i bu nyer sbas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-6: zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-7: de rab tu phyung shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-8: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sang mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-9: mtshan med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-10: des sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-12: sha na'i gos can gyis mkhan pos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-14: ci tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-17: de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-18: bdag 'dir yongs su mya ngan las 'das na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-19: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-20: yul spong byed pa gnyis po phan tshun rtsod par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-21: yul yangs pa can pa dag la yang sha ri ram gyi skal pa ma byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-22: gal te yangs pa can du mya ngan las 'das na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-23: de dag gis kyang mi byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-24: ma la bdag ni chu bo gangg'a'i dbus su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-25: snyam nas de der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489a-26: de nas yang rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i rmi lam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-0: rgyal po'i steng du @489b gdugs 'dzin pa de'i yu ba chag par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-1: mthong nas skrag ste sad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-3: lha gnas brtan kun dga' bos ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbran to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-5: de thos nas rgyal po brgyal te 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-6: ji tsam na chus gtor te bslang nas sems kyi 'du shes rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang du yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-9: tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-10: rgyal po chen po 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes song sras su mngon 'khrungs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-11: dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod ni yongs su bsrungs ngos pa'i bdag nyid can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-12: srid pa 'gog par mdzad pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-13: grong khyer yangs pa can du mngon par rab tu gshegs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-14: ji tsam na rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-15: chu bo gangg'a'i 'gram du chas te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-16: yangs pa can bdag la lha dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-17: 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'gro ba'i sgron ma ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-18: skye bo phal po che la thugs rje mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-19: thub pa 'dis ni mya ngan mun bsal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-20: rab zhi brtan par yangs pa can du gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-21: ji tsam na yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po go bskon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-22: chu bo gangg'a'i 'gram du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:489b-23: gnas brtan kun dga' bo yang grur zhugs nas chu bo gangg'a'i dbus su 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-1: rgyal po ma skyes dgras gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-2: 'dab ma brgya pa lta bur kha bye sangs rgyas yangs pa'i spyan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-3: srid pa gsum gyi sgron mar gyur pa zhi bar gshegs gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-4: bdag cag khyod la skyabs 'ongs gal te zhi bar gshegs gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-5: bdag cag don du tshur gshegs khyod kyi sku ri 'dir 'ong cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-6: ji tsam na yangs pa can pa dag gis kyang de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang 'di ltar bsam pa bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-8: gal te ma ga dha yi grong du bdag gi lus bor na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-9: li tsa byi rnams gdon mi za bar sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-10: gal te grong khyer spong byed dag tu bdag gi lus bor na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-11: ma ga dha yi bdag po nges par mi dga' bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-12: de bas lus phyed mi yi dbang po la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-13: lus kyi phyed ni tshogs la byin byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-14: 'di ltar de dag gnyi kas yang dag par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-15: rtag pa kho nar mchod pa nyid du 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-16: ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-17: sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-18: de'i tshe drang srong gzhan zhig 'khor lnga brgyas bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-0: thal mo sbyar nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la bdag cag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu @490b dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-1: dge slong gi dngos po gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-3: ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos slob ma rnams lhan cig tu bdag gi drung du tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-5: des bsam pa de bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du slob ma lnga brgya der 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-6: gnas brtan kun dga' bos chu'i dbus sa gzhir sprul nas lam med par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-7: ji tsam na drang srong 'khor lnga brgya po rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-8: 'khor lnga brgya pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-9: las gsum pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-11: de dag chu bo gangg'a'i dbus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-12: nyi ma'i gung la rab tu byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-14: kha cig ni nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bar kun tu grags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-15: de dag gis bya ba byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab bzang thams cad kyi tha mar rab tu phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-17: dang por yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-18: mkhan pos bka' stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-19: bdag cag ni sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-20: mkhan po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bar ni bdag cag mi 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:490b-22: bu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-1: chen pos kyang nga la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-2: da nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-3: bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kha che'i yul ni bsam gtan dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-6: zhes 'di ltar kha che'i yul lung bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-8: dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-9: des 'dir bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-11: de bas na bu khyod kyis bstan pa la 'jug par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-15: ma ga dha pa snying rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-16: spong byed pa yang snying rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs 'bod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-17: chu 'gram dag na skye bo gnyis kyis tshig brjod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-18: gsan nas blo gros can gyi sngon gyi sku ni so sor byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lus byin gyis brlabs nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-20: me la chus gtor ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lus phyed ni yangs pa can pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-21: lus phyed ni rgyal po ma skyes dgras thob nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-22: ye shes rdo rje rnon po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491a-23: rang gi lus kyi ri bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-0: phyed @491b ni mi yi dbang po byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-1: khyed ni thub pas tshogs rnams byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-2: de nas li tsa byi rnams kyis yangs pa can du mchod rten brtsigs nas bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-3: rgyal po ma skyes dgras kyang grong khyer skya snar can gyi bur mchod rten brtsigs nas bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-4: de nas nyi ma'i gung gis bsam pa skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-5: bdag gi mkhan pos kyang kha che yul du bstan pa zhog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-8: des kha che'i yul du klu mi srun pa hu lun ta btul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-11: ma la bdag gis ston pa'i dgongs pa yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-13: tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma'i gung gis kha che'i yul du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-14: skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-15: de nas nyi ma'i gung gis kha che'i yul gyi klu 'di zil gyis mnan la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-16: klu de dag 'khrugs par byas na 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-18: de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-19: 'di ltar kha che'i yul rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-20: klu de dag kyang 'khrugs shing rab tu rngam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-21: rdzi char drag po dag bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-22: gnas brtan la gnod pa bya bar chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-23: gnas brtan gyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:491b-24: klu de dag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos kyi mtha' ma yang g-yo bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-0: de nas klu de dag gis mda'i @492a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-2: gnas brtan gyis kun tu gsal ba'i me tog autpal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-5: pad ma dkar por phab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-6: klu de dag gis rdo rje rtse gcig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-9: dgra sta dag 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-10: gnas brtan gyi steng du me tog ku su ma'i char bab nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-11: gangs ri'i rtse mo de ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bzhus pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-12: ri bo'i rtse mo de dag kun ni med par song gyur mthong ba ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-13: phyag dar char phab ku su ma yi char ba sna tshogs bab par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-14: gnam las mda' yi char phab me tog phreng ba kun tu gnas par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-15: de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-19: klu rnams ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-20: de nas klu de dag gnas brtan gyi drung du stong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-26: dbul bar rngo mi thog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-28: gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i gnas su lung bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-29: gang kha che'i yul 'di bsam gtan dang mthun pa'i gnas mal yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492a-30: deng phan chad nga'i yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-0: gnas brtan bcom ldan 'das @492b kyis bka' stsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-5: ji tsam zhig dbul bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-7: skyil mo krung bcas pa tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-8: klu rnams kyis btsun pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-10: gnas brtan gyis skyil mo krung bcas pas lung pa dgu'i mdo skyil mo krung gis non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-11: klu rnams kyis gnas brtan 'khor ji snyed cig mnga'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-13: gnas brtan gyis dge slong ji snyed cig 'du bar 'gyur snyam du bsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-14: ji tsam na dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-15: snyam du gnas brtan gyis bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-18: klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-19: gal te dgra bcom pa gcig cig gis ma tshang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-20: de'i tshe kha che'i yul bdag cag gis dbrog par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-22: gnas brtan nyi ma'i gung gis kha che yul gyi klu rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-23: de yin mod kyi 'on kyang gang na sbyin bdag gnas pa de na len pa yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-24: ngas khyim bdag kyang 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-25: klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-27: ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis rang nyid kyis grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-30: skye bo'i tshogs dag zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:492b-31: de dag gis gnas brtan ji ltar bdag cag 'phel bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:493a-2: ji tsam na gnas brtan gis skye bo'i tshogs dag khrid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:493a-3: ri spos kyis ngad ldang du phyin nas gur gum dag thon cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:493a-4: ji tsam na ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi klu rnams 'khrugs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-22: kho bo'i sems kyang cung zad dub //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-23: 'on kyang brnag par ma dor bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-24: spro dang 'dun pa'i sems kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-25: dam pa'i thugs dgongs mthar phyin cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-26: bstan pa'i rgyun la'ang phan bsams nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-27: dus ni cung zad 'gor na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-28: long med rings tshul ma byas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-29: 'ol tshod rang bzo spangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-30: legs brtags legs par rab dpyad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-31: shin tu nges pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:507b-32: the tshom za rnams zer mchan bkod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-2: tshul 'di mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-3: phyi mtha'i bar du 'gyur par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-4: 'di ni phyi mo la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-5: snar thang gi dpe la gtugs pa'i zhus dag gnyis kyi rjes la sog tshul khrims bla ma'i phyag dpe la gtugs pa'i zhus dag nan can lan gnyis te bzhi tshar ba'i rjes su /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-6: slob dpon tshul khrims bskyangs kyi 'grel pa dang bstun cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-7: mdo rtsa'i 'grel chen rnams su lung drangs pa dang yang bsgrigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-8: cho ga rnams las brgya rtsa gcig gi gzhung dang yang bstun /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-9: tshig 'dra la 'dra men rnams kyang don la legs par dpyad nas dag par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-10: 'di la da rung chad pa 'ga' re yod pas rgya dpe rnyed na gtug dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-12: sngon bstan pa snga dar ba la lung phran tshegs kyi gzhi 'di bsgyur ba'i dus su lo tstsha ba du mas dum bu dum bu mang por dgos te so sor tha dad du bsgyur bas glegs bam gcig tu sdom pa'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-13: gnas tha dad du 'thor nas ma tshang bzhin du bsdebs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-14: lo tstsha ba chen po dpal 'byor gyis rdzogs par zhu chen ma grub pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-15: 'khrugs chad can du phran tshegs phal cher bzhugs pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-16: dus phyis gnas brtan dar ma sengges la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi bzhengs pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508a-17: zhing mo che pa 'dul 'dzin byang chub sengges dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag khang rnams su bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-0: khyad par bsam yas @508b mchims phu na dgas chung pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-1: tshul khrims yon tan gyis rnyed pa'i lung dag pa la dpe yon phul nas 'bad pas dag par bgyis pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-2: bam po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mgor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-3: sman chen po'i gtam gyi skabs su /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-5: gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-8: bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-9: ji tsam na de grong khyer nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-10: bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' nas 'jus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-11: zhes pa'i bar bam po gcig bsabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-13: nga yang sman gyis de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-14: zhes pa'i 'og tu yig tshar gcig bskangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-15: bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad ne tsho spyod gsal gyi skabs rdzogs par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-16: ae ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-18: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-20: dge slong ma'i bkur sti bri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-21: zhes pa'i bar bam po dgu chad pa bsabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-22: de'i 'og tu sdom tshig yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-23: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'i mjug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-24: bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gi gtam 'phror /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-25: dge sbyong rnams kyi yon po'i spyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:508b-27: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i dbur de'i tshe bram ze pad ma'i snying po khyim mchog gi sa mthon po zhig na shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rnams dang lhan cig 'dus shing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-0: zhes pa'i bar bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa bsabs @509a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-1: de nas bam po lnga bcu pa'i mjug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-2: kun dga' bo la gdams par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-3: chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-5: skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-7: bam po nga gnyis pa'i stod du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-9: tsa pa la dang tshe'i 'du byed mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-10: kyi bar bam po gcig bskangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-11: spyir bsdoms na bam po bcu gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-12: sdom tshig yig tshar gnyis tshad pa bskangs pa gang yin pa de nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-13: gangs can gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen po sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-16: sde snod kyi ma mo 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong shes bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-17: snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis phyogs kun tu khyab par gyur pa mchims thams cad mkhyen pas la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang nas dpe phyi gdan drangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-18: bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi tshang la dag par bzhengs pa'i dpe la gtugs te zhus dag bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-011-001:509a-19: lo rgyus 'di lung phran tshegs kyi glegs bam la shin tu gces pas sus kyang mi 'dor bar thugs tshis mdzad par zhu ////
